Whole Foods, WeWork, and other industry leaders have approached us and expressed interest in our product/mission. Food Network called us one of 'the most buzzworthy foods for 2019' and an 'innovation in high-quality snacking.'
short-description: Snack Jack's mission is to heal the planet one bag of jackfruit jerky at a time, impacting the environment and the community in major ways.

description: NetObjex is an Intelligent Automation Platform for Smart Cities and Connected Enterprises that enables tracking and tracing of assets, asset performance optimization, and reduce asse.  It serves 4 major market segments - Smart City, Transportation/Automotive, Supply Chain & Logistics, and Manufacturing/Industry 4.0.  We have 14 OEM Clients in 4 Continents reaching 20MM Consumers.  2018 Revenues were $780K and scaling.  Company has operations in California/USA, Hanoi/Vietnam and Trivandrum/India.
short-description: NetObjex is an Intelligent Automation Platform for Smart Cities and Connected Enterprises utilizing IOT, AI and Blockchain.

description: NOVAM protects devices with industry standard encryption and authentication by default. We combine a blockchain security fabric and cloud integration to provide immutable integrity checks to critical files that need to be monitored as well as correlating and segmenting data from when a device is compromised to when it was remediated. We implement blockchain technology as a trusted security mechanism for secure and tamper-proof integrity for device files and data.
short-description: NOVAM is a patent-pending distributed security company providing IoT device and data integrity using a blockchain security fabric and cloud.

description: SipScene helps adults missing a platform for creating new meaningful friendships, romantic or business relations and the opportunity to learn and grow. We offer an instant community to have real conversations in an inviting space where everyone is owning the purpose of finding their people through pop up social events in people's homes. The events can be built around food, drink or activities of any kind - the consistent theme across events is people come to meet new people.
short-description: Connecting people IRL at intimate pop up events where anyone can host events around their interests and build community them.

description: In 2018, there were 158 police fatalities and 998 civilians shot and killed by officers. We spoke to over 40 police depts and found that current training methods are ineffective. Classes are not hands-on, while live actors are expensive and limited. SURVIVR features realistic and cost-effective VR scenarios that mimic real-world situations, so any officer can learn to respond appropriately in high-pressure situations. We have demoed to 15 police departments with 4 signed pilots (and counting).
short-description: A virtual reality platform for immersive and accessible police training. We help first responders improve decision-making and public safety.

description: Single Baked Sweets provides single-serve, bake-at-home dessert kits that come with the pre-measured dry ingredients, bakeware and simple instructions needed to make a delicious, homemade treat for one. Customers can have the ‘homemade’ experience, quality and taste of baking, but in a single-portion – making it easy, fast and less wasteful to satisfy a craving. We’re on a mission to make homemade simplified - so you can have your cake and eat it too!
short-description: Single Baked Sweets provides single-serve, bake-at-home dessert kits

description: For thousands of years, the Yaupon Tree was the scared plant in North America, It was exalted for it  medicinal value. It was even traded to the Mayans for Cacao. Yaupon was North America's original 'Red Bull' as it is the only native source of caffeine in North America.
short-description: We discovered America's forgotten medicinal plant while walking in a maritime forest.

description: WMC started as a class project between 10 students here at TCU. The goal was to make some damn good coffee and make a business out of the $1,000 we collected together. Well we decided: Whiskey + Coffee... By aging our beans in whiskey/bourbon barrels the 'tang' found in most coffees goes away and you get the smell and aftertaste from the whiskey/barrels.
short-description: Whiskey + Coffee... Nuff' said. All our coffee is aged in whiskey barrels

description: Ninety-percent of smoking cessation attempts fail. Sancura Biotechnologies understands that a comprehensive approach to smoking cessation is necessary. We offer a two-pronged treatment strategy that targets mental risk factors and nicotine withdrawal symptoms by coupling a digital mental health intervention with an effective, non-addictive nasal spray. This powerful combination increases the chances for successful, long-term results. Join us in delivering a smarter solution to smoking cessation.
short-description: Sancura Biotechnologies delivers a comprehensive solution to smoking cessation by targeting the physical and mental challenges of quitting.

description: AeroMINE is initially targeting the commercial rooftop distributed energy market for co-installation with solar. Big box stores and distribution centers have committed to renewable energy. The market is established for solar. US market is $2B per year. Installing both solar and wind, sustainability goals can be met. Further customization will make AeroMINE deployable for remote military operations, disaster relief, remote sensors and other smaller installations.
short-description: AeroMINE is a motionless wind turbine created for the building environment. It installs like solar panels, but is more cost effective.

description: Animatus Biosciences is a research and development startup company which was founded as a partnership between academic and industrial scientists to facilitate the commercialization of innovative discoveries in biotechnology. Our modified mRNA platform can activate gene expression networks that can induce cells in many tissues to reprogram to a stem cell-like state. These new stem cells can then repair a damaged organ. Our first product will address the acute need for a therapy for heart failure.
short-description: Animatus Biosciences is an R&D company focusing on the development of unique regenerative therapeutics based on our modified mRNA platform.

description: VioLume designs, manufactures, installs and maintains a room disinfectant system that integrates a traditional, energy-efficient lighting fixture with a non-touch, on-demand surface decontamination capability in a single platform. The system can effectively neutralize viruses, bacteria, and fungi that are on exposed surfaces, which are responsible for a large percentage of Healthcare Acquired Infections (HAIs).
short-description: VioLume makes healthcare spaces 99.9% safer, effectively neutralizing pathogens on exposed surfaces, which cause a large percentage of HAIs.

description: XELPHAhealth's is a modern solution that enables medical facilities to overcome operational efficiencies and increase the adoption of electronic medical record technology. Through the interlacing of technology, innovative business models, and value-based healthcare, XELPHAhealth is addressing the unique challenges of healthcare delivery.
short-description: A patient-centric, clinically-focused healthcare engagement hub providing universal data management support.

description: DOSS is an Intelligent Personal Assistant built exclusively for the real estate industry. Built on top of IBM Watson and Google Cloud, we have developed a Real Estate Operating System that will radically evolve the way people search and transact real estate around the world. No more clicking and tapping pre-filtered boxes that provide basic search results.
short-description: DOSS is a Intelligent Personal Assistant built exclusively for the real estate industry.

description: Foul smelling shoes is one of the most commonly known problems associated with playing sports. Another lesser known problem associated with playing sports is that shoes and gear that are in constant use become an environment perfectly suitable for the development and growth of many different types of harmful bacterial and fungal colonies. Our athletic shoe-bags neutralize those threats with a double acting technology and provide our users the comfort of not having to smell their nasty shoes.
short-description: We are creating sleek athletic bags with patent-pending technology in the lining of the bags that eliminate bacteria and neutralize odors.

description: Swoovy is a mobile app that connects single people to go volunteer at a nonprofit for a date.  It provides daters with a better way to make meaningful connections in a world of online dating, and it increases volunteerism for nonprofits hungering for more support.
short-description: We are a mobile app that connects single people to go volunteer for a nonprofit as a date.  We utilize behavioral economics + data science.

description: Over 220,000 individuals travel between one major Texas city and the next every single week for work. Every existing travel option requires a compromise in either time/productivity or comfort. No one wants to drive after a 10 hour meeting. Bus schedules are limited and force you to plan your day around them. Why go through TSA when your flights going to be delayed anyway.
short-description: City to city, door to door in private-professionally driven Teslas with Wi-Fi and laptop charging. Book online to any major Texas city.

description: Our mission is to provide high quality, cost-effective devices for circulatory disorders affecting extremities.
short-description: Rehabmaker - manufacturer of physical therapy equipment and marketplace.

description: Keys® is a first in the market, cloud-based software that provides both professionals and their employers a way to continuously track and verify healthcare credentials in real-time via an API. Individual clinicians sign up for an account using their smartphone and can easily track and capture new documents as needed. Our enterprise solution provides employers a 'single source of truth' that is continuously maintained by the individual and synced across facilities and internal departments.
short-description: We've built a cloud-based platform that automates professional credential management and verification for clinicians and their employers.

description: PTC Wizard is the best online scheduling platform designed for K-12 schools.
short-description: Helping K-12 schools streamline their scheduling and sign-up process thereby improving parent involvement and decreasing overhead.

description: In America, we fail to diagnose over 5MM, among 7MM, of our children with developmental delays. Ideally, we should diagnose them before schooling age to provide effective interventions. However, most diagnosis occurs during school years because parents have limited opportunities to get children into the system of identification/treatment.
short-description: AI-based Cognitive therapy and diagnostic solution for all children

description: Every year, Americans go through over 138 billion plastic straws and over 500 billion plastic cups, contributing over 10 million tons of plastic waste dumped into our oceans and spurring plastic bans. Celise works to cut down on our single-use waste as we are a supplier of compostable disposables for the foodservice industry. Our products are made from PLA: a bioplastic with inputs of solely plant starch and water, making them compostable in 40 days or biodegradable on their own in about 2 years
short-description: Celise BioProducts is a premium, plant-based disposables company working with foodservice establishments to replace single-use plastics.

description: Combined Arms is combating the fragmented and highly populated VSO landscape to overcome the challenges transitioning veterans are facing. They assess and customize resources based on individual veteran needs, simplifying how veterans connect to the resources they need. Combined Arms brings a data-driven approach together with a collaborative, connected model of service delivery so that veterans and the community are united after the uniform.
short-description: Combined Arms is a forward-thinking nonprofit that is committed to unleashing the impact of veterans on Houston.

description: Learning outcomes are determined by the students’ ability to process their learning materials, which is why Bright Angle is providing teachers a scaleable, reliable way to deliver activities, assessments, & testing to students with EQUITY. Our digital personalizations are so robust that they serve as accommodations for students with learning disabilities with Individualized Education Plans(IEPs) who are in a general classroom, which represents 17% of all public school students.
short-description: Providing teachers a scaleable, reliable way to deliver activities, assessments, & testing with EQUITY to students with all abilities.

description: Captain catalyzes the growing $700BN+ outdoor trips market by retiring the burden of booking adventure sports trips. With enhanced search, adventurers find the perfect trip based on their core criteria. Guides create profiles and upload trips using our intuitive, sport-specific templates. Guides market directly to their target customers via free profiles and can cancel pricey ads on generic sites like Google. QR code bookings replace cash, permits populate automatically, and more!
short-description: Connecting outdoor sports adventurers and guides.

description: We are a B2B company renovating the current parking market by building an automated parking solution for all vehicles from level 0 to 5 autonomy. We are starting with building technology to help garages become more profitable, while creating a comprehensive parking network that connects vehicles, users, and garages. We will transform existing parking garages from today’s simple storage spaces into one-stop show for the vehicles of the future.
short-description: Our vision is to transform high worth parking garages from simple storage spaces into a tech-enabled marketplace for all vehicles

description: EBT Medical develops clinical-grade, discreet neurostimulation therapies for the enormous and growing Overactive Bladder market. Our first product is a non-invasive neurostimulator and associated eco-system which, when used for 30 minutes 2x / week, delivers prescription strength efficacy without side effects. EBT’s “secret sauce” is our patented superficial peripheral nerve target. EBT’s management team and advisors have decades of relevant OAB, neuromodulation, and consumer health experience.
short-description: EBT’s clinical-grade, non-invasive peripheral nerve stimulator is the only first-line, at-home therapy for those silently suffering from OAB

description: Millions of families stress over a prehistoric shopping process to find and book camps for their kids, while spending over $18B each year. The same fragmented, antiquated system is making it hard for camps to fill seats and connect with potential customers in a meaningful and efficient way.
short-description: We plan to disrupt the $18B children’s camps industry and in the process improve the lives of millions of working parents.

description: Waterdata is made of mathematicians and computer science engineers with strong expertise in data & analytics
short-description: Liquidprice is the Intelligent pricing software, optimising prices with AI by fast adapting to customers, competitors and market behaviour

description: Today, heart arrhythmias are treated with a manual surgery requiring several hours’ intervention from specialized staff with limited effectiveness (600k+ surgeries/year for a market of CHF 10+ B). EBAMed's medical device consists of a  real-time heart motion tracking system to enable the safe and effective treatment of arrhythmia patients in existing protontherapy centres in a non-invasive single out-patient session, whilst saving hospitals 5 times the time and 3 times the costs.
short-description: Effective, non-invasive and automated treatments of heart arrhythmias using proton beams

description: Prodibi is a photography infrastructure (iaas) for photographers, enterprises, and agencies.
short-description: Prodibi is a unique professional image solution that solves all issues of displaying pictures online for any image of any size on any device

description: Thrombosis is a leading cause of death in developed countries. The currently used antithrombotics are associated with an increased risk of severe bleeding, which can be life threatening. The inhibition of a novel target, FXI, was found to efficiently prevent thrombosis without causing bleeding side effects, providing a much safer strategy. We have developed the first peptide-based FXI inhibitor, which shows a superior anti-coagulation effect, lasting for more than 10 hours in mice.
short-description: We have developed a novel anticoagulant that does not increase the bleeding risk, thus overcoming the safety issues related to current drugs

description: SurgiBox makes surgeries safer for patients and providers alike.A platform technology developed at MIT/MGH,SurgiBox has won recognition by the WHO,US Army,MSF,and more.A team of doctors,engineers,and business experts with experience from 6 global surgery NGOs,7 military branches of 4 nations,and 12+ successful startups,we have perfected beyond-OR-level control of surgical microenvironments plus ergonomic,Ebola-level protection for surgical teams,all in an ultraportable,self-contained system.
short-description: SurgiBox is the Operating Room in a Backpack: Protecting Patients and Providers Any Time, Any Place.

description: By leveraging technologies developed for early cancer detection, personalized medicine, and microbiome analytics, EQO is revolutionizing environmental management. EQO’s cutting-edge platform for zebra and quagga mussels allows for the earliest possible detection and is being deployed as an automated platform. In collaboration with the DOI, EQO is developing a biological treatment product capable of eradicating invasive mussels without impacting native species or the environment.
short-description: EQO brings uses molecular solutions for environmental problems. We treat aquatic invasive species like cancer.

description: Sempulse is transforming field triage and vital signs acquisition. We automate vital signs acquisition, anywhere.  Our device applies in seconds to the ear and can monitor all 5 major vital signs non-invasively and in non-sterile conditions. That's cuffless blood pressure, pulse oximetry, heart rate, respiratory rate, and core body temperature in real-time, simultaneously for all patients. Once triaged patient prioritization, geolocation, and real-time collaboration add to patient survivability.
short-description: Applies to the ear and monitors vital signs within 2 seconds, non-invasively and in non-sterile conditions supporting triage & telemedicine.

description: Oxalo Therapeutics is developing a novel drug to prevent recurrent kidney stones. Spun out from the University of Chicago, we use breakthrough discoveries from microbiome research to finally address an underlying cause of kidney stones. Every year kidney stones cause 1.3M+ ER visits and $10+ billion of healthcare costs. Most dangerously, they have a recurrence rate of ~70%. By focusing on prevention, we can end the debilitating pain and tremendous economic burden of this chronic disease.
short-description: Biotech company developing a first-in-class drug to treat and prevent kidney stones using breakthroughs in microbiome research.

description: Single-cell profiling devices can process & record millions of parameters from each individual cell, however research clinics and pharmaceutical companies are challenged by the complexity of the data & missing out on critical levels of biomedical insight. To address this need,  we use single-cell big biomedical data to train our artificial intelligence software to discover novel biomarkers for early detection of complex diseases, accelerate drug discovery, and reduce research costs.
short-description: Scailyte uses AI technology to unlock single-cell data for biomedical research, pharmaceutical discovery and precision diagnostics

startupname: Host a Pet SAPI de CV
description: Host a Pet in an online marketplace where we connect pet owners with a wide list of certified nearby homes to provide pet boarding services to their pets while away on business or on vacation for either day care or night care (extended boarding). Hosts can offer additional services such as dog walking, training, transportation & grooming.
short-description: Online marketplace where we connect pet owners with a wide list of certified nearby loving Hosts to provide pet boarding and other services.

description: XiliNat is a biotechnological startup that solves environmental, health and economic issues by buying corn residues from farmers to tranform them into xylitol, a natural sugar substitute that tastes identically to sugar, is ideal for diabetics, is low in calories and protects teeth against cavities.
short-description: We solve environmental, health and economic issues by transforming agricultural wastes into a sweetener with beneficial for human health.

description: Environmentally friendly bags, similar to plastic bags, fully dissolves in water. Our formula is versatile, we aim to replace trillions of plastic bags used annually in various industries and by private customers polluting our surroundings and oceans. We have the first prototype. We will  start with trash bags and bags for the cement, food and packaging industries. The co-founders are women, specializing in chemical engineering and business.
short-description: Environmentally friendly bags similar to plastic bags, dissolves in water, will replace bags in many industries starting with trash bags.

description: Depression affects 350 Million world-wide every year. A third of patients do not respond to treatment and struggle to find an adequate solution for their depression. Genetika+ is developing the first cellular and genetic based platform to provide meaningful predictions of patient responses to antidepressants. This technology will allow patients to find their best treatment for depression more rapidly and accurately.
short-description: Genetika+ uses innovative personalized medicine tools to help depression sufferers find their best treatment, faster and more accurately.

description: Today’s water distribution systems lose an average of 20 percent of clean water due to leaks. Moreover, leaks are often found too late, after they have already caused sink holes and other serious structural damage to buildings and roads. At WatchTower Robotics (previously Pipeguard at MIT), we offer a unique robotic solution to find leaks early, many months before they become big problems. Thus, we can prevent the loss of billions of gallons of water annually and protect infrastructure.
short-description: WatchTower uses robots to help water pipe operators find leaks, save water, and protect infrastructure.

description: Poorly designed packaging is the root-cause of low plastics recycling. Magnomer’s patent pending technology delivers magnetizable coatings on packaging to design for recycling. Our food-safe coatings can be applied to standard bottle caps or shrink sleeves thus transforming them into products which complement magnetic separation equipment widely used by MRFs or reclaimers.  Magnomer enhances recycling by easing technological bottlenecks in materials segregation at low cost
short-description: Magnetizable coatings for recyclable plastic packaging

description: Contemporary treatments for chronic ear infections fail in 40% of cases, resulting in hearing loss, pain, & unnecessary surgical procedures. PionEar has developed the first implant that efficiently delivers drugs directly to the middle & inner ear while preventing clogging and early extrusion, improving patient outcomes, & saving >$20B in medical costs. We have a pipeline portfolio of bioinspired devices to tackle other ear & hearing disorders, including hearing loss and eardrum rupture.
short-description: PionEar is revolutionizing the treatment of ear infections with minimally invasive, antifouling, drug delivery ear tube implants

description: Infinite Cooling has developed a patent pending technology that can efficiently capture the escaping water from cooling tower systems in a cost effective manner, greatly reducing the water consumption for power plants.
short-description: Disrupting the way power plants use water by capturing and recycling evaporative losses in cooling towers

description: IQ BAR is pioneering the ready-to-eat 'brain food' category. Our first line of products consists of nutrition bars optimized for cognitive energy, performance, and health. We're the only bar on Earth that's built for the brain, the only bar that hits the Keto/Paleo/Vegan trifecta, and the only bar that includes Lion's Mane extract.
short-description: IQ BAR is the first and only 'brain food' nutrition bar.  6 brain-functional nutrients + 6g plant protein + the Keto/Paleo/Vegan trifecta!

description: Have you ever wished for an laptop extra screen while traveling or working at a co-working space? Do you feel the need to have multiple screens while working on your laptop? We at Mobile Pixels designed an unique laptop accessory that gives you the extra screen real estate you need for multi-tasking and increasing productivity. Using the best materials in the industry we build this sleek, light weight dual monitor for your laptop that you can carry around with convenience.
short-description: Whether you are working in a hotel room or in a cafe, no matter where you are, we let you pack your productivity anywhere you go.

description: MTonomy ≡ future of digital media
short-description: Complete blockchain infrastructure for media enterprises and artists to directly license, distribute and monetize media content worldwide

description: Using,  our “Zero Knowledge” system, data can be stored in any, un-trusted, third party cloud. Queries and computations can be executed on encrypted data without having to decrypt first. Unlike contemporary cloud providers, we do not store information like username, password digest, etc. Privacy is the default. Now, cloud providers can no longer profile or mine personal and confidential enterprise data. This is the holy grail of security - At Rest, In Transit and even during Processing.
short-description: Now you can trust any untrusted, third party cloud without compromising usability, privacy and business confidentiality

description: Genómica Médica, led by a world-class scientist, develops DNA tests in saliva to prevent common diseases, avoid adverse drug effects & promote healthier lifestyles. Mexico offers a business opportunity for direct-to-consumer genetic testing for the Mexican market scalable to Latin America. Our lab produces & commercializes kits online with over 20,000 payment spots across Mexico. We are eager to network with business leaders and investors who share our goals and help us accelerate our business.
short-description: We develop DNA tests in saliva to prevent common health problems for a growing direct-to-consumer market in Mexico scalable to Latin America

description: We revolutionize the music industry's content discovery process, offering successful performing-artists and their teams to receive and utilize high-end digital artworks (focusing on music and lyrics) created by talented artists from around the globe or gathering dust at music publishing catalogs. We've developed a highly-tailored and private, artificial intelligence backed platform, supported by a network of industry professionals that further enhance artistic capabilities of contributors and
short-description: MyPart is a game-changing A.I. backed platform for ArtSourcing, crowd sourcing of music & digital art.

description: Cuéntame is an online psychological platform that helps young people become their best version. Unlike traditional & online therapy, we offer “specific programs”,  where customers choose the emotional goals they want to work on their weekly sessions with the mentor, interactive tasks & follow up advancements, plus being affordable (40% less than traditional). We want to help the 39.8 MM young people in LatAm experiencing an emotional illness. Join the movement & start talking about emotions.
short-description: Cuéntame is an online psychological platform that helps young people to become their best version with a goal oriented technology.

description: SmartPlate is the only patented, intelligent nutrition platform that deploys computer vision, deep learning, and proprietary image recognition techniques to help consumers and patients seamlessly track their food intake. Since soft-launching last year, we have pre-sold over 5000 units in 20 countries and are on target to generate over $500,000 in sales this year. We have partnered with some incredible retail and healthcare partners such as Bed Bath & Beyond, QVC, and Johnson & Johnson.
short-description: SmartPlate is the only patented, intelligent nutrition platform that tracks a user's food intake with the highest degree of accuracy.

description: At Folia Health, we believe that family caregivers have a unique perspective that will change the way that healthcare is delivered. Family caregivers, including parents, notice important changes in a patient's health at home every day - what if these observations could be easily captured as datapoints to help understand the patient's progress? Our platform, Folia, enables caregivers to record this data by answering simple, personalized multiple choice questions.
short-description: At Folia, we're creating a new form of health outcomes data, with the help of the most motivated healthcare consumers - caregivers.

description: Mammography is unreliable for women with dense breasts, rendering it inappropriate for women under 40, and unreliable for 40-50% over age 50 with dense breasts. Even if it was appropriate for every age and density, it would not change the fact that breast cancer can manifest and metastasize in a matter of months. We are directly empowering women with cutting edge affordable technology for monthly monitoring in the home enabling the earliest detection of breast cancer possib
short-description: Creators of the first at home, hand held monitoring device, empowering the earliest detection of breast cancer possible.

description: Project Alianza employs an innovative model to build, develop and staff robust primary schools directly on privately-owned coffee estate farms. We build schools with local materials, hire and train local women as teachers, and provide them with the school supplies and resources to create an effective learning environment. We improve quality learning through a proven curriculum to give children the skills they need to thrive in a world beyond a coffee farm.
short-description: We build schools and provide education programs for children living on coffee farms to put them on a path to a better future.

description: Boston Materials is a Northeastern spin-out working in advanced material production. Specifically Boston Materials is working on commercializing its breakthrough three-dimensionally reinforced carbon fiber composite SuperPly™. SuperPly™ enables the production of significantly more impact resistant and durable composites. These composites are ideal for applications in the pressure vessel, wind turbine, aerospace, automotive, marine, and tooling industries.
short-description: Boston Materials is creating a revolutionary three-dimensionally reinforced carbon fiber composite.

description: Do you know your nutrition status? Key nutrient deficiencies are more common than you think and can lead to major health problems. Unfortunately, existing diagnostics are slow, expensive, and inaccessible, and many deficiencies remain undiagnosed for years. VitaScan’s handheld device enables accurate and convenient testing of your body’s vitamins and micronutrients and gives results in minutes, not days.
short-description: Nutrition deficiencies lead to major health issues and are hard to test. We provide fast, accurate, and mobile nutrition deficiency testing

description: NovoThelium provides an allograft regenerative nipple areolar matrix for nipple regeneration after mastectomy. Current reconstruction techniques only recreate the appearance of a nipple. Our tissue-engineered matrix enables patients to regenerate a real nipple made from their own cells that maintains shape and projection, has natural pigmentation, and the potential for improved sensation.
short-description: We provide a tissue engineered matrix for nipple areolar regeneration after mastectomy

description: CRM systems are notorious for being slow, complicated, and inefficient for their users. Trying to fix this problem with customization only escalates the issues and creates a money pit with limited results.
short-description: addapptation redesigns Salesforce.com into a simple, beautiful tool that results in a more engaged, better performing, happier workforce.

description: Cleancult makes household green cleaners that actually clean. Most green cleaners on the market haven't updated the brand, innovated in their formula, and haven't lived online. Cleancult wants to attract the next generation of responsible consumers by introducing the next generation of green cleaners that actually clean, look great, and are delivered direct to consumer.
short-description: Cleancult makes household green cleaners that actually clean.

description: Cloud 9 is on a mission to disrupt massive waste and mistreatment of mental illness in the U.S. and globally. Our technology and service model innovation is proving our ability to save billions for state and local budgets while also helping underserved populations before they lands in ERs, jails, courts or the streets.
short-description: Cloud 9 is on a mission to provide mental healthcare to those who need it most - before  they land in ERs, jails, or on the streets.

description: Popspots is modernizing retail grocery with AI-powered technology that helps brands drive awareness, engagement, and conversion. Popspots’ smart displays combine video advertising with a product management platform to better capture the mind and wallet share of U.S. consumers who spend 98% of their grocery dollars in physical stores. With actionable reports and access to both current and historical performance, brands can make data-driven decisions that deliver immediate, impactful value.
short-description: Popspots is modernizing retail grocery with AI-powered technology that helps brands drive awareness, engagement, and conversion.

description: Antibiotic resistance is currently one of biggest threats to global health. Resistell proposes an alternative to culture based antibiogram - the current gold standard in antibiotic susceptibility testing. Our offering is a diagnostic device. The method is based on the detection of movement caused by living bacterial cells. Because the test is growth independent, we provide the information on which antibiotic should be used to treat the patient, in hours instead of days. We save lives and cost.
short-description: Resistell is the world’s fastest antibiotic resistance test. It saves lives by determining the right antibiotic for the patient on time.

description: FreshStrips is a smart-materials/smart-packaging company ($20bn market) with an aim to reduce food waste (annual cost: >$1 trillion) and improve food safety. Our solution to these problems is a simple plastic sticker that gets attached to food packaging. If the food is exposed to unsuitable heat the FreshStrip changes color irreversibly indicating the food is no longer edible (NO-GO state). Compared to our competition (Avery Dennison, 3M) we offer vivid coloring and a radically lower price.
short-description: FreshStrips is a smart-materials/smart-packaging company with an aim to reduce food waste and improve food safety.

description: High quality nutrients like fats & proteins need not be lost to landfill; not when local farmers lack affordable animal feed. GrubTubs collects leftovers from restaurants and gets paid to drop it off at various farms. Each farm is equipped with a colony of hungry grubs that grow fat and happy devouring these leftovers. Once fully grown, Farmers harvest the grubs, sanitize them and feed them to chickens, pigs & fish. By empowering farmers to make feed using insects, farmers earn a livable income.
short-description: GrubTubs transforms food waste from restaurants into animal feed -- saving local farmers on feed costs and keeping waste out of landfills.

description: Agile's first product, EyeQ, was built from 5 farmers and engineers, for the farmers who want to apply the optimal amount of fertilizer and pesticide to every inch of their farm and eventually make 15% more revenue than they do today. Our patent pending solution, is based on machine vision and learning, while collecting all the available data, which are given back to the farmer analyzed, through a web app. We sell HW direcltly and SW with annual subscription, while licensing anonymous data B2B.
short-description: We are taking the guesswork out of fertilization and pesticide spraying in real time, with a machine vision/learning plug and play device.

description: Based on research conducted in multiple university hospitals and the Centre Suisse d’Electronique et de Microtechnique (CSEM), our breakthrough smartphone software platform enables anyone to measure and manage blood pressure with clinical level accuracy – anytime, anywhere. Our proprietary algorithm leverages the smartphone's camera by optically measuring and interpreting the pulse wave the patient’s fingertip. No more need for additional hardware, no uncomfortable cuff experience.
short-description: Biospectal's proprietary solution transforms any smartphone into a medical grade blood pressure monitor without any additional hardware.

description: We are in a literacy crisis: 64% of US 4th graders can't read at grade level. Children with disabilities fare far worse: for example, 92% of blind children cannot read braille.
short-description: T-var EdTech designs and sells devices that teach children of all abilities how to read.

description: Mobsya is a non-profit association which mission is to create and make available products and services that enable children to understand digital technologies and sciences. To achieve this goal, Mobsya offers an innovative and comprehensive educational concept based on the programmable Thymio robots, software and educational activities. Mobsya proposes a learning experience accessible to all, trustworthy and transparent thanks to its links with the academic world and its open source philosophy.
short-description: We create and distribute products to help children understand and master digital technologies and sciences thanks to programmable robots

description: The CBC system is  a scalable generation system that provides site specific renewable energy production. Utilizing patent pending technology with a stationary enclosure, the Hidden in Plain Sight(tm) System (HIPS)  can be used in urban wind farms, resilient micro grids and on existing buildings and structures , while meeting the financial needs of owners, developers and investors.
short-description: The CBC wind energy system cost effectively  produces renewable, resilient power in built environments, including urban and coastal areas.

description: About one-third of the food produced in the world for human consumption every year is lost to pests. In short, there’s a growing need for a cost-effective and eco-friendly pest control solution. We've developed an automated pest protection service that conducts active drone surveillance and leverages our proprietary intelligent recognition algorithms to deliver unparalleled pest detection and control. We're now able to deploy timely and targeted countermeasures, thus minimizing crop loss.
short-description: We’re reducing crop loss through automated pest detection & control using real-time thermal surveillance from unmanned drones & AI.

description: Labby is building a portable IoT analyzer using AI and spectroscopy that provides food quality analytics along the supply chain. We are focused on the dairy industry and enable farm level milk quality testing to farmers and dairy companies on a real-time basis. This not only cuts costs incurred due to lab testing but increases the efficiency of farm operations leading to increased income for farmers. For enterprises we are decreasing procurement risks by providing this data in timely manner.
short-description: Labby is an IoT analyzer that uses AI and spectroscopy for food, beverage & agro testing

description: The Mentor Method is an enterprise platform using mentorship to bridge the access gap between diverse candidates and companies seeking to hire more diversely. Our approach helps companies attract, screen and engage diverse candidates while increasing their internal engagement and retention rates.
short-description: The Mentor Method creates inclusive workplace cultures through mentoring diverse talent

description: HALL+HAVEN is a real estate developer/owner/operator creating a new concept in apartment living for urban renters priced out of the neighborhoods where they want to live. Our right-sized rentals provide renters the option to pay only for the space they need, when they need it, without compromising privacy, location, quality, or size. Development and operational savings are passed on to renters, saving them up to 50% on total housing expenses.
short-description: We create right-sized rentals at the right rent, right where you want to be.

description: We have a nontoxic short duration breast cancer treatment. Our main drug is an intracellular cancer killing peptide eradicating 100% of ALL breast cancer cells in 96 hours in vitro and 91% of ALL breast cancer cells within 14 days in vivo. While our cancer targeting Cell Penetrating Peptide (CPP) delivers our cancer killing cargo with no healthy cell interaction. Our CPP can also be conjugated to increase efficacy by 4-6x and decrease toxicity by 6-20x of currently approved FDA chemotherapeutics
short-description: We have a revolutionary nontoxic short duration breast cancer treatment. Offering a higher quality of life compared to current treatments.

description: Biofire is changing the way the world thinks about firearms. For 50+ years this $13B industry has seen no core innovation. It’s time for change.
short-description: Building the future of firearms to prevent gun violence.

description: Food for All makes quality food accessible to all, by stopping perfectly good food from being wasted.

description: AirWorks makes aerial data accessible and useful to decision-makers in the built environment. We provide automated analytics such as site plans and building models through artificial intelligence that allow developers and engineers to yield time and cost efficiencies as well as to identify and eliminate build errors.
short-description: AirWorks provides aerial intelligence and analytics to the construction industry to yield time and cost efficiencies

description: Smallholder farmers lack access to information on what buyers need in terms of quality or their purchasing conditions. Agri-food companies in Mexico purchase from intermediaries that lack transparency, traceability and generate price volatility. Smallholder farmers and agri-food companies live in very distinct realities and rarely can engage directly: that is the space that Nuup bridges by gathering and sharing information, facilitating collaboration and increasing transparency.

description: OURgrain is a food sustainability start-up based in Providence, Rhode Island that creates nutrient-packed alternative flour from brewers’ spent grain (BSG), grain that is leftover from the brewing process. Breweries use barley, rye, wheat, and sometimes corn to make beer and malt liquor, and at the end of the brewing process, the by-product usually throws out or given to farmers for livestock feed. It is estimated that BSG contributes approximately 50,000 tons to landfills each year.
short-description: OUR mission is to rescue and recycle all brewers' spent grain, pioneering a new food waste recycling model.

description: Our marketplace solution to dental staffing empowers the dental community by creating real-time connections.  Dental offices enjoy 90% less expensive recruiting costs, can book staff in minutes instead of hours, and gain access to high-quality, peer-reviewed talent. Dental staff earn more money by monetizing underutilized time, receive free exposure to the community, and enjoy a living, breathing profile that tracks their user reviews and work history.
short-description: Online/mobile marketplace that connects dental offices and staff for work assignments, in real time.

startupname: PYT Funds Inc, Pay Your Tuition
description: (PYT) is a financial technology platform that helps college students complete the last stretch of their college education by facilitating microloans when they fall short of funds to graduate. Since many low- to moderate-income families face $5,000 or less annual gap in tuition funding.  We are the number platform to get students into debt to ensure they finish school but the only platform created to help students get out of debt.  We truly help families PYT ' Pay Your Tuition'
short-description: PYT, Pay Your Tuition is changing the way families finance and pay for higher education using technology to create the best private loan.

description: re:3D® Inc. is a social enterprise decimating 3D printing cost & scale barriers in order to create jobs & enable problem-solvers worldwide to independently address local needs.

description: We design and manufacture indoor agricultural appliances to bring the revolutionary principles of aquaponic and hydroponic farming into the home, office, and classroom.
short-description: AquaSprouts allows anyone to easily bring an aquaponic or hydroponic garden into their home, office or classroom, right out of the box.

description: Painting with data is a user-friendly, collaborative, web-based spatial data visualization and modeling platform suitable for users across disciplines and across levels of data literacy. Anyone with a modern browser can now visualize and explore the relationship of multiple datasets at once, leading to sound, informed policy or business decisions.
short-description: Painting with data is a web-based tool that introduces a visual programming language for the analyzis and visualization of spatial data.

description: Partboyz Auto Parts is the foremost retailer of quality aftermarket automotive replacement parts, lubricants and accessories in Nigeria. Founded in July 2015, in a small kiosk, we have grown into 5 modern retail shops and twenty staff members and are on track to become the “AutoZone” of Nigeria. Our website www.partboyz.com was launched in January 2017 and is growing rapidly in traffic.

description: TextUp is a software that helps social workers manage and strengthen their client relationships. TextUp creates cost savings by eliminating the need for work phones, while also providing features that save time, build capacity, and improve professional quality of life for social workers. We are the only software company providing a product uniquely tailored to social work at a social work-friendly price.

Our platform manages delivery, return and cleaning. We opened a showroom in Geneva to complete market validation but we are looking to digitalise and scale our business across the country by using e-commerce high-tech (eyefit)
short-description: La Garde-Robe is an online clothing rental business for women. Renters and owners can exchange high-end outfits for few days.

description: Allergy is a rising worldwide health issue with huge economic impact. Innoprick is developing a medical device and data platform for the main allergy diagnosis test (the skin prick test) which is currently performed manually. Innoprick helps perform more efficient diagnosis and a more objective follow-up of allergic patients under treatment. It is also a useful tool for clinical studies, allowing to perform demographic and epidemiologic studies of great scientific, social and economic interest.

description: Half of every marketing budget is wasted due to the lack of validation in the analog environment of outdoor advertising. Abraxas Technology is bringing that analog industry into the Digital Age using custom technology providing the ability to track impressions, capture follow through, and provide direct customer engagement. Billboard owners are able increase advertising sells based on a targeted approach and advertisers are able to get more out of each marketing dollar spent.
short-description: Abraxas Technology is bringing out-of-home advertisement into the digital age by allowing advertisers to calculate their ROI in real-time.

description: Our solution lets farmers scale to meet growing consumer demand (20%+ y/y).  Designed with farmers, our solution:
short-description: We make the global aquaculture industry more profitable with a SAAS based farm management system.

description: Zoni Foods' bridges the plant-based eating gap with tasty frozen plant-based meals that go from freezer to plate in under 10 minutes. Each meal contains a creative, flavorful recipe made up of a freshly made, sealed and frozen protein, starch, and a unique sauce. Unlike frozen 'TV dinner” meals, Zoni's meals contain plant-based, all-natural, locally grown food that, as our customers say, doesn't taste or look frozen - filling a growing need among busy, health-conscious millennials.

description: - Compressed Video Delivery consumes some 80% of all Internet bandwidth

description: Smallholder farmers represent 85% of world’s farmers and half of the poor. Their poverty is both reason and result of being financially excluded. This is while agricultural production must at least double by 2050 to meet the exponential growth of population, and this will not happen unless agricultural finance changes dramatically. Drawing up on years of financial experience, agri-data, machine learning and Blockchain, we innovated a lending platform that provides loan to marginalized farmers.
short-description: Providing affordable loans to financially marginalized farmers through an innovative lending platform and risk assessment system.

description: We are a hedge fund fully managed by A.I. to trade Foreign Exchange Market. Our models are proprietorially developed and trained with the most cutting edge Deep Reinforcement Learning algorithms. So far, our core models have been in live testing for 4 month, and the performance are sustainable and outstanding. We believe that we are at the frontier of applying end-to-end machine learning to trading. Like what AlphaGo did in Go, our A.I. could revolutionize the hedge fund industry.
short-description: As Google's AlphaGo A.I. has solved the game of Go, we are using the same algorithm to solve the game of quantitative trading.

description: pumpspotting is the first-ever social platform and global community for breastfeeding moms. We nourish mothers while they nourish their babies. description: News echo chambers are fueling political polarization, and many citizens are only reading opinions from one side of the spectrum. short-description: We help people escape news echo chambers by providing quick facts and arguments from both sides for trending news stories.

description: 1upHealth is an inclusive data platform for patients, providers, researchers and app developers to automate data integrations with health systems and wearable devices. Providers and researchers can view that shared data in the 1upHealth EMR integrated application.

description: We empower manufacturers to identify and prioritize process improvements with our IoT monitoring platform. Our product delivers real-time, closed-loop feedback to operators and managers to help them meet today's production goals:

description: The BlocksCAD 3D modeling software fills a critical need for teachers in k-12 schools seeking ways to leverage engaging 3D printers, makerspaces and virtual reality environments with teaching math and coding fundamentals. description: Black Girls Nutrition (BGN)  is the 1st online nutrition platform that helps Women of Color break the cycle of dieting, lose weight and connect with other dieters. 'Lose the Weight, NOT your Roots!'

description: Of the 3 billion people worldwide suffering from severe headache and migraine attacks, 80% report that stress is a major trigger.  Office-based behavioral interventions, while effective in reducing headache frequency, are inadequate due to inconvenience, cost, and lack of availability.  BioTrak's Ease provides these same evidence-based behavioral interventions for convenient use at home at an affordable price.  In a 28 day clinical study, Ease users demonstrated a 60% reduction in migraine days.
short-description: Digital therapeutic, Ease, along with a healthy lifestyle, helps reduce the risk of future migraine and severe headache attacks by half.

description: Travel Now, Pay Later! Awaymo is a one-stop-shop for vacationers to spread the cost of flights, hotels, & in-vacation spending. Customers book flights/vacations for only a 10% upfront payment, while the rest is spread over 9 equal monthly instalments, collected by Direct Debit.
short-description: Travel Now, Pay Later! Spread the cost of vacations over 10 months with the Awaymo Account, interest free. Book today for only 10% upfront!

description: Information flow in the cloud connected modern world is so fast, frequent, and at such high volume that traditional management paradigms like 'Inbox', 'Files & Folders' and 'Search' just don't work anymore. Dependency on those paradigms has users spending in excess of 30% of their time just looking for information. Many simply accept that. Whats needed is a new paradigm built for the modern world's information management needs and not based on computing relic's from the floppy disk era.
short-description: Intelligent Information Management - Smart Work at Warp Speed.

description: zipOns® pants are stylish and functional to meet the needs of the differently abled. Though clothing is a basic human need, for many people with a temporary or permanent disability, it is simply an ongoing daily hardship. The design of zipOns makes dressing and undressing safer, easier and more comfortable. They open completely on the sides with zippers that span from waist to hem, can be taken on and off without going up through the legs and can be widened from the bottom as needed.
short-description: zipOns® pants are stylish and functional to meet the needs of the differently abled.

description: Ocean health readings such as temperature, salinity, and pH, are crucial to understanding the world's great environmental challenges (climate change; ocean acidification) and improving some of its largest industries (fishing; weather forecasting; insurance). Blue Water Metrics will build a new generation of public-private partnerships to crowdsource data-gathering with ocean-going vessels such as cruise ships, cargo ships, and fishing ships. Our solution is both inclusive and scalable.
short-description: Blue Water Metrics solves the gaps in ocean health monitoring by crowdsourcing data collection through ocean-going vessels.

description: Pharmaceutical companies lose $1.5B per drug that fails in human trials. We solve that problem by manufacturing cutting-edge 3D Organ-on-Chips that identify which drug candidates will fail long before hundreds of millions of dollars are wasted on them.
short-description: A new way to create 3D Organ on Chips for pharmaceutical development and personalized healthcare.

description: Chronic disability due to aging will more than double in the next 15 years. Rehab therapy is a long, boring, and hard process but it is essential to a patient's recovery.  AUGMENTx combines augmented reality, neuroscience, and medicine to make rehab therapy affordable and fun so that patients can get living a full life and reach their full potential.
short-description: AUGMENTx is an augmented reality digital health platform for chronic medical conditions with long-term rehabilitation therapy needs.

description: Efficient, sustainable, and precise. The tiny house movement inspired us to start a small project with a big idea. At Tiny House Coffee, our goal is simple: a better world with better coffee.

description: Bluelaces Theater Company creates immersive, multi-sensory theatrical experiences specifically designed for audiences with autism and other developmental differences. description: At AKUA, we're creating food in the right way - healthy and delicious with a positive impact on the planet.

description: Breegi Scientific, Inc. is a medical device company with a mission to save lives of newborns in low and middle income countries (LMIC). description: dondoctor provides a 24/7 online scheduling system for Medical Centers and Hospitals. The system uniquely adapts to the scheduling workflow of each medical provider improving operational efficiency, decreasing costs, reducing no-shows, and improving patient satisfaction

description: Dig infuses the energy of dating and finding true love with the passion and commitment of dog lovers to creatively and efficiently pierce the booming $70 billion pet industry. Dig secured partners such as BarkBox and WeWork, has 10,000 unique users, and launched in 5 cities with large dog-friendly events and major press placements. 55% of single adults in the U.S. are pet owners, and one-third of U.S. marriages now start from online dating. It's the combination dog lovers have been waiting for.

description: The Dreamweaver bra is an innovative new lounge and sleep bra for full-busted, small-waisted women. description: DetraPel is a nanotechnology protective coatings company that provides clear, protective, and durable coatings for materials. We distribute our proprietary solution directly to consumers through our website, and retail channels. Our customers use DetraPel to protect their valuables (clothing, shoes, furniture, etc.) from liquids and save cleaning and replacement costs.

description: Over 4M people in the US need intermittent catheters to urinate, using 2200 catheters a year. People often reuse catheters for financial and logistical reasons, leading to negative health outcomes such as UTIs, preventable hospitalizations, and outsized burdens on insurance providers. CathBuddy allows users to safely sterilize & store their catheters. It restores user dignity, relieves financial burden, and reduces users’ ecological footprint by reducing annual catheter needs from 2200 to 50.
short-description: CathBuddy is a handheld catheter sterilizer that empowers intermittent catheters users to regain agency and reduce their carbon footprint.

description: Drones are increasingly used to jeopardize aircrafts in airports, disrupt sports events, smuggle weapons and drugs into prisons, and harass politicians and celebrities. Current anti drone measures-electromagnetic  guns, GPS spoofers, RF jammers and net throwers–are ineffective and unsafe in urban environment. Founded by Israeli electronic warfare and cybersecurity experts,  D-Fend is developing a system that detects and identifies unauthorized drones and land them safely in a designated location
short-description: We detect, identify and safely intercept rogue drones in urban environment

description: Every year 250k servicemembers leave the military with rich experience and strong leadership skills, yet struggle to land jobs that compensate for their experience and skills. It's simply because they've never had a job interview before.

description: Almost half of the 27 million SMBs in America alone do not have a website, because barriers to entry are still too high for technically unsavvy business owners making thin margins. short-description: Fisherman is automating the development of websites for the millions of technically unsavvy business owners.

description: Canomiks has curated proprietary databases of: 1) human gene interactions of, 250+ herbs, 35 micronutrients, and 8 common contaminants of functional foods,  2) human transcriptomic signature of chronic conditions. Using these databases, analytics, machine learning, bioinformatics, and systems biology, Canomiks has created the proprietary GeneTune® algorithm that can be used for developing functional foods and dietary supplements or for standardizing the biological  effect of their ingredients.

description: CPT has developed technology for xenon preservation of blood products and cell cultures. CPT provides blood banks and hospitals tools to enhance their processing, handling and storage of perishable blood components such as platelets, stem cells, bone marrow, and other cellular cultures and tissues. CPT’s ExtendXe™ storage system triples the shelf life of human platelets from 5 to 14 days while inhibiting bacterial growth. It increases availability, reduces wastage and improves safety.

description: Every boater's nightmare is engine failure, an unnecessarily common and frustrating event. Our ground-up design utilizes all the advantages of electric power, eliminating common failure points of existing gas engines. At the same time, we provide increased performance and peace of mind in an innovative, sustainable package.

description: We offer free Human Capital Management (HCM) systems tailored for the needs of 51 Mn small businesses in India employing 120 mn people, who are neglected by mainstream HCM system providers. description: Inclusion in employment should include people with disabilities. 80% of people born with a disability that are capable of working cannot find a paying job and are living in poverty, like I was. I have landed a national market chain and need help with funds scaling up.

description: Our vision is that findSisterhood becomes the number 1 app for women (and everyone identifying as woman) to turn to when they have questions they feel too embarrassed or judged for to ask anywhere else. We launched only a few weeks ago and already have an average user time of 15min/day. Our iOS app has an amazing dashboard that allows us to learn from user behavior, we run new tests every week and host experts that bring in their own community and expertise to the questions asked anonymously.
short-description: findSisterhood is an app that allows women to ask and answer questions anonymously, safely and free. We help women empower each other.

description: ImmunArtes develops a vaccine to block colonization and prevent diseases caused by Staphylococcus aureus and its antibiotic-resistant strains (MRSA).  Annually, 3.8M Staph infections occur in the US, incurring $12.4B cost for prevention and treatment. Designed to address the bacteria's immune evasion mechanism, the vaccine demonstrated protection against infection and colonization in mouse models.  cGMP manufacturing and pre-clinical study for IND filing are the next steps.
short-description: ImmunArtes develops a vaccine to block colonization and prevent disease caused by Staphylococcus aureus.

description: Regenerative farming practices hold huge potential to build soil health, sequester carbon, and reward growers for ecosystem services, but because sequestration rates vary based on geography, soil type, and farming practices, accurate and cost-effective soil measurement is needed to fully unlock this potential. To date, accurate testing has remained expensive, limiting its use. Haystack is bridging this gap with an accurate, cost-effective, and scalable soil carbon measurement solution.
short-description: Haystack Ag provides cost-effective and accurate measurement solutions for growers and soil carbon markets.

description: TruRest is a patented, ergonomically designed rest aid that fully supports the user's body (both head and torso), eliminating muscle tension and dramatically improving airplane passenger comfort. Customers will have a unique option to either purchase or rent TruRest from manned booths/ kiosks at airports. Think bike-sharing model for in-flight comfort! Partnerships with airlines and retailers will increase revenue and create positive brand perception for all parties involved.
short-description: An innovative way to improve the health and comfort of airplane passengers. Think bike sharing model for in-flight comfort!

description: Over 200 million people worldwide are at risk of developing irreversible diseases from drinking groundwater contaminated with high concentrations of naturally occurring fluoride. Global Water Labs aims to provide technical expertise and partner with field implementation partners to pilot and commercialize the Scalable and Affordable Fluoride Removal (SAFR) method, which uses locally sourced bauxite ore to inexpensively remediate fluoride-contaminated groundwater in resource-constrained regions.
short-description: Global Water Labs uses the Scalable and Affordable Fluoride Removal process to provide safer drinking water in resource-constrained regions.

description: Heepsy is a tool that allows brands and agencies to find the right people to promote a product or service.

description: Insect-borne diseases destroy $300B ($22B in US alone) worth of crops annually. Current insect monitoring techniques are labor intensive, with varying levels of sensitivity and accuracy. FarmSense has developed a real-time, cloud-based insect monitoring platform which detects, classifies, and quantifies insects. When this information is integrated with additional crop and environmental information, it enables optimization of pest interventions, reducing crop losses.
short-description: Next Generation of Insect Surveillance

description: 1- Clients -UK, IRE,USA, Africa
short-description: FM is a mobile workforce management platform designed to improve communication between service & Maintenance Fieldworkers & Office staff.

description: Leveraging its land, machinery, and network of co-ops, Eleis Farm provides unrefined palm oil to the growing African diaspora. Mixing traditional fermentation techniques and low-cost mechanization we provide the highest quality of a staple food while reducing environmental impact and hardship to 90 families. Access to the US market will increase income for our co-ops, reducing water use and deforestation. Our fully traceable oil is already cherished by customers and African Stores in NE USA.

description: Forward F1rst is deploying text-based nudging to provide first generation college students and graduates with the information they need to succeed on the road to graduation and beyond. We partner with colleges and employers to serve the first generation students and graduates they support. Our text message tool is built not only to alert the first generation students and graduates we reach to key deadlines but also to help them grow as driven, self-motivated, and collaborative leaders.

description: A real­time music platform that enables anyone to become a live and interactive radio station.
