EchoMe offers multiple real-time social music features including public/private virtual music rooms, collaborative song queues, 24 hour song history, and friend song feeds. Advisors/partners include Noah '40' Shebib (Drake's Producer/Partner) and Cortez Bryant (Maverick Records).
short-description: EchoMe lets you play and listen to music with friends and influencers in real-time!

description: Ejenta is an AI platform for remote monitoring and connected care.  Customers include health providers and insurers, like Kaiser Permanente, who use Ejenta to build remote monitoring and patient engagement applications to improve outcomes for patients with chronic conditions.  Our approach is innovative in that each patient has their own personal intelligent agent that monitors device data and medical records to learn individual health patterns, predict outcomes and provide personalized care.
short-description: An intelligent agent that uses NASA-licensed AI technology to provide personalized remote care

description: We change behavior by increasing positive experiences. Our Solutions Grid Tracks, trains, and assesses progress for real world social skills coaching. We make Inclusion work for children with and without a diagnosis such as austism.  We are scaling our field tested social skills strategies to train 1-1 aides, for whom no training exists,  through a software based assessment grid that tracks next steps for teaching in a way that can also document student progress, and training needs for schools.
short-description: We build training tools to rapidly increase Peer Interactions+Motivation using behavioral economics to improve the child's real world play.

description: KB's additive battery manufacturing technology saves battery manufacturers 20% on capital equipment costs and 20% on the unit price of batteries. Our additive battery manufacturing technology eliminates inactive ingredients & toxic solvents, and totally removes the need for post-processing. This enables roll-to-roll processing or customized 3D printing of battery electrodes on a flexible platform that saves costs, reduces environmental impact, and enables flexible manufacturing.
short-description: We are ending battery manufacturing stagnation in the lithium ion industry through our cost-saving, eco-friendly AM batteries

description: Iterate Labs provides smart wearables to collect data on workers & give haptic feedback when doing unsafe motion. Our software performs automated safety assessments, while alerting companies of safety risks, & how to prevent the injuries. Our market is the work-related muscular and skeletal injuries that cost employers $54 billion in indirect costs every year. Our initial target market is the meat processing industry. We are in the process of finalizing pilots with several large companies.
short-description: Iterate Labs is a biomotion insights company that creates a feedback loop between the body and ideal performance.

description: Health is wealth, and wealth is empowerment. We are empowering mothers, daughters, and sisters to take control of their feminine health by giving them the power to choose what's best for their health, their way! Kushae, the only brand of its kind, is an all-natural solution to the chemical-laden feminine hygiene products available today. We've combined the power of nature with the intelligence of medicine to create healthier women...one 'Kushae' at a time!
short-description: Rescuing women from chemicals and MAN-dated options; we are an all-natural solution to feminine hygiene and care created by women for women.

description: Kernal is a Cambridge-based startup developing onco-selective messenger RNA (mRNA) immunotherapy for cancer. We program mRNAs using AI algorithms to hack cancer cells, and spare healthy ones. They convey a selective message to induce 'loud suicide' only in cancer cells. This suicide stimulates a durable immune reaction against cancer. Kernal's disruptive technology has a potential to cure cancer. We are a member of MIT STEX and a recipient of Amgen's Golden Ticket award.
short-description: Kernal Biologics is a developing onco-selective mRNA therapeutics for cancer.

description: Quantum computing has the potential to revolutionize computing, allowing problems to be solved that cannot be computed in the age of the universe on a classical computer. Today, researchers have implemented small-scale quantum algorithms with 10-20 qubits, but as we scale up to larger devices quantum computing becomes a massive control problem. We provide software solutions for controlling, calibrating and tuning up quantum devices, allowing users to accurately implement the intended algorithms.
short-description: Labber Quantum - A toolkit for experimental quantum computing

description: Inkrypt seeks to implement blockchain technology to create a global decentralized network for data storage and retrieval aimed specifically at media outlets in order to circumvent government censorship. Through its distributed nature and IPFS-based platform, our protocol will provide both front and back-end protection from censorship attacks. Ultimately, by providing a comprehensive media hosting solution, we hope to make journalism truly free and return the liberating effects of the internet.
short-description: Creating a censorship-resistant distributed global network for content storage and retrieval geared towards journalism firms.

description: Learning Beautiful creates timeless toys to teach computer science to children as young as age 3, without the use of computers. Learning Beautiful uses research-based, Montessori-tested approach to develop a comprehensive curriculum for computational thinking, the logic behind computer science. Computational thinking is a new literacy, and Learning Beautiful creates the ABCs. We provide the resources and hands-on play for young children and parents in their communities, schools, and homes.
short-description: At Learning Beautiful, we create timeless, Montessori-inspired toys for young children to learn about computer science, without computers.

description: Too often food is thrown out when there is great need in nearby communities. MEANS Database modernizes food recovery by connecting excess food to nearby nonprofits feeding the hungry. Those with excess food - such as restaurants or grocery stores - post it on our website. Nearby nonprofits then receive an email and/or text notification about the food, click claim, and arrange pick up. In the last three years MEANS has recovered over 1,600,000 pounds of food across 48 states and DC.
short-description: We fight food waste and hunger throughout the US by connecting retailers and restaurants with unsold food to nearby hunger nonprofits.

description: Skin disease is very common, and primary care physicians address 2/3rds of these skin disease cases. Unfortunately PCPs misdiagnose skin disease 50% of the time, as they significantly struggle with visually distinguishing these diseases. At LuminDx, we’re building a tool to enable every doctor around the world to have the visual expertise of a dermatologist, using computer vision and AI. We're focused on helping patients get the right care at the right time.
short-description: Elevating every doctor around the world to have the visual expertise of a dermatologist, using computer vision and AI

description: Smokers cost corporations $6,000/smoker/year in low productivity & high healthcare costs. 60% of corporations in the US offer smoking cessation programs but suffer from low success rates & low compliance. Lumme combines machine learning & behavioral psychology to improve success rates by 10x, user engagement by 5x & lets corporations measure outcomes in real time. With an SBIR grant from National Cancer Institute, this solution was developed in collaboration with UMass Amherst & Yale.
short-description: Smokers increase annual corporate spending by $70M on an average, Lumme helps reduce that by 54%

description: For Medical Device manufacturers whose implanted devices and biosensors have limited biocompatibility and are prone to infection, our surface coating technology permanently modifies implanted devices and biosensors to dramatically improve biocompatibility and reduce infections. Our competitors' coatings do not last long inside the body and interfere with the sensitivity of biosensors. Our coatings are long lasting and do not interfere with the sensitivity of biosensors.
short-description: We develop innovative surface coating technologies that improve the biocompatibility and performance of implanted devices and biosensors.

description: MAKOMAS Hibiscus, Baobab, Moringa and Ginger drinks are derived exclusively from sustainably grown fruits, flowers, leaves and roots to create uniquely tasty beverages typical to West Africa, using family traditions handed down for generations. We started Makomas Foundation, our philanthropic initiative that provides meaningful economic opportunity  to local women in Burkina Faso. The Foundation supports enterprising women who harvest and process baobab fruits by sourcing from small communities
short-description: Let MAKOMAS excite your palate with hibiscus, moringa, baobab and ginger, all authentic, delicious, nutrient-rich beverages.

description: Neurescence has commercialized a microscope targeted to Neurology research market.  Our Quartet™ system is implanted in multiple regions of the brain and spine. It follows the activities of 100s of neurons in each region for months while the subject freely moves around. Quartet™ establishes the causal connection between the effect of the treatment (e.g. a drug) on both the neuronal micro-circuitry and the disease phenotype to take treatment from a trial and error method to an intelligent design.
short-description: We combine the power of AI with our patent pending brain imaging technology to cure brain diseases such as Alzheimer's, Epilepsy, depression

description: The process for paying a bill at a restaurant is Frustrating for customers, wait staff have increased workload, and restaurants loose revenue through longer table turn or non-paying customers.
short-description: Paying and splitting the bill for customers and restaurants sucks! Paerpay solves this problem by securely making dining and dashing legal!

description: Reason8 is a service that turns conversations into summaries for in-person business meetings progressively adding various verticals. We use multiple smartphones and AI patent pending approach to boost quality of speaker identification and drafting meeting summaries. The network effect is reinforced by increased quality when more people use our applications in a meeting. We are actively working on advanced summarization, collaboration features for teamwork, and integrations.
short-description: Reason8 is an AI-powered service that automates creating meeting summaries.

description: Self-driving cars rely on lidar to detect and identify objects around them, which helps the car decide how to drive.  Lidar generates a detailed 3-D map of the world in real time by sending out pulses of infrared light and measuring how long they take to come back after hitting nearby objects.  Both lidar and NODAR measure the range to the target, but NODAR does so more efficiently at lower cost.
short-description: Mass-producible 3D-sensors for every car

description: Natured brings groceries from local food makers to your doorstep.  We're an end-to-end grocery service and online market that sources the best groceries directly from local food makers and allows customers to enjoy foods that are locally made, wildly fresh, and mission-driven. We're on a mission to grow local communities with great food, starting right here in New England.
short-description: Natured brings groceries from local food makers to your doorstep.

description: Needles are painful! Over 800 million needles used per year (or over 2 million needles a day) in the US for drug administration through injections. Most of the patients using those needles are diabetic or have some sort of chronic condition that need multiple injections every day. Apart from being painful, injections leave wounds and scars. “noP” aims to be a medical device company to make drug delivery painless.
short-description: Needles are painful! Over 800 million needles are used per year in the US for drug administration. “noP” aims to make drug delivery painless

description: Current treatments are insufficient to reduce the growing burden from neonatal abstinence syndrome (NAS), a postnatal drug withdrawal syndrome occurring in opioid-exposed newborns.  Prapela SVS is a stochastic (random) vibrating pad proven in peer-reviewed studies to significantly improve relaxation and increase rhythmic breathing in NAS babies.   Designed for use in hospital bassinet baskets, our SVS is a novel alternative to hospital staff cuddling babies 24/7 and unproven consumer products.
short-description: Prapela reduces the pain experienced by newborns as they withdraw from opioids their Moms took during pregnancy.

description: Phood is food waste prevention technology that leverages analytics to help food businesses reduce food waste volume by up to 50%, increase donations by 30%, with annual cost savings of $100,000/year.
short-description: Phood is food waste prevention technology that helps food businesses reduce food waste by up to 50% and create cost savings of $100,000/yr

description: Pilleve's mission is to prevent the costs of opioid abuse and addiction.
short-description: Pilleve is an integrated pill bottle that prevents prescription opioid abuse, misuse, and addiction using real time data and security.

description: Partrunner enables home service contractors to save time and money by offering an on-demand delivery service that avoids them having to leave the job site and having to pick up parts themselves.
short-description: An on-demand delivery service for Home Service Contractors and Supply Houses.

description: Tarjimly empowers bilinguals to volunteer as translators for people in need - refugees, immigrants, and NGOs. We anonymously connect them in realtime chat and phone calls to translate, interpret, and eventually perform more services via our growing community of 3000+. We've built a whole new category of volunteerism by removing the physical divide and making it extremely easy to help with our matching algorithm and session system. This creates two-way value that's insanely scalable and low cost.
short-description: Tarjimly solves the language problem for NGOs, immigrants in need, and the 23 million refugees worldwide

description: STEMgem is a device toolkit that empowers socially-motivated teens to create real, relevant, impactful IoT devices and wearable tech. Our mission is to engage girls in STEM. With detachable sensors and an online program editor, students can easily build hardware and mobile apps and invent new communication, sports, and medical devices. An online community lets girls share projects to stay engaged long-term. User feedback has shown that STEMgem increases girls’ motivation for STEM by up to 45%.
short-description: STEMgem provides wearable device toolkits that allow students to build real, useful, and relevant technology. STEMgem engages girls in STEM

description: Current wearable technologies are insufficient and lack versatility for full body tracking or remote training. Trainers tradeoff providing services in-person, limiting their reach, and virtually, limiting their efficacy. Tacit Motion’s kinetic sensors provide a new medium for body language communication, which doesn’t transcribe with print or video. Recordings create a digital impression that may be copyrighted and licensed. Kinetic tracking and training is constraint-free; whenever, wherever.
short-description: Utilizing a network of wearable sensors, Tacit Motion provides kinetic monitoring and personal sports coach, whenever, wherever.

description: The 1854 Cycling Company was founded to create 21st Century careers for formerly incarcerated women. The company is named for the year that the Anti-Slavery Society met for the first time, on July 4 in Framingham, marking the start of the abolitionist movement. The company has been featured by Bloomberg, Ebony Magazine, Bicycle Retailer and Industry News, WCVB 5 Boston's 'Chronicle' Show, and various other blogs and podcasts.
short-description: A premium electric bicycle & apparel brand that creates living wage jobs targeted towards formerly incarcerated people.

description: Spirrow Therapeutics is a pharmaceutical company providing the first therapeutic treatment for Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS), a high mortality condition annually affecting 200,000 patients in the US and over 2 million world-wide. Our therapeutic is a bio-compatible nano-polymer surfactant with preemptive treatment capability that restores and maintains lung function in patients with ARDS or high risk factors of developing ARDS; significantly improving their chance of survival.
short-description: The first therapeutic treatment for Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome, restoring lung function with nano polymer surfactant technology.

description: SPLITFIT is the easiest way to get quality personal training in reputable Gyms & Studios near you on-demand for $20. Share the cost of the session with up to 3 people and get a custom workout at an affordable price. Our network of established Gyms & Studios offers safety, consistent quality and great amenities. Say goodbye to monthly memberships and costly training packages – simply pay as you go when you want, where you want with SPLITFIT.
short-description: SPLITFIT is the easiest way to get quality personal training in reputable Gyms & Studios near you on-demand for $20.

description: Most efforts to harness biomass as renewable energy have met with difficulties because biomass is bulky, moist, and disperse, which makes transportation costly. Utilizing a novel concept called oxygen-lean torrefaction, we demonstrated its potential to simplify reactor design,  enabling small-scale, portable, and decentralized deployment at 1/300th the capital cost. We estimate that this can bring an additional $17 billion/year of biomass at play in the market, at competitive prices.
short-description: We use decentralized biomass upgrading technology to bring a larger fraction of biomass energy to cost parity.

description: While people have long been able to warm themselves up by adding layers, or even heated garments, we have yet to come up with an effective means for outdoor personal cooling.
short-description: Powerful personal cooling via a proprietary, bio-inspired solution

description: Point-of-care ultrasonography (POCUS) has the capacity to revolutionize primary care prognosis, decrease complications, limit pain and suffer, saving and improving life quality of millions of patients. Somax Systems has solved all barriers of POCUS technology and the result is ECHOPHONE: the most versatile, high-quality and wireless ultrasound imaging system. A disruptive and user friendly hand-held device that will transform ultrasounds in an everyday tool for an early and accurate diagnose.
short-description: Somax Systems is a startup born with the aim of designing and commercializing pocket-sized high-performance ultrasound for the future.

description: We build intelligent Lidar perception technology with Deep Learning. Our software helps the machines to understand their surrounding environments, such as detecting people and cars. Our technology helps the development of autonomous system into reality. The current focus of Seoul Robotics is on self-driving car’s intelligent Lidar perception, and soon, we will bring the same technology to a wide field of robotics. With Lidar becoming mass produced, we are expecting huge potential in our field.
short-description: We build intelligent Lidar robotic perception software for autonomous robots, self-driving cars, and security systems.

description: We have a unique method to coat textiles with electrically conductive polymer that enables active heating garments. Our customers include winter athletes, motorcyclists, outdoor workers, and anyone wanting to stay warm in harsh environments without compromising flexibility. To address this, we have designed electrically heating garments that operate free of metals, bulky wires and battery packs, and they can be worn and washed repeatedly, unlike what is on the market today.
short-description: We have a unique method to coat textiles with electrically conductive polymer, which enables smart garments without metals or bulky wires.

description: SiLAS is a first of its kind browser-based software that allows students to act out social scenes using video game pads and microphones to control their own 3D avatars.  Students work in groups or with their teachers. SiLAS records the interaction in real-time, then produces a studio-quality animation that teachers and students can watch and share, critique, and assess. Student-performance data can be tracked by teachers, with charts that show improvement over time.
short-description: SiLAS improves children's social skills by combining technology with proven social skills training techniques.

description: There are more than 7000 rare diseases yet only 400 approved treatments. 350 million people worldwide are living with rare disease. 75 percent are children and 30 percent will not live to the age of five.
short-description: TREND Community turns anecdotes into evidence on a platform for those living with rare disease who can engage in community powered science

description: RFID is a large and fast growing industry that's expected to reach 20 billion by 2020. RFID has applications ranging from manufacturing to healthcare to retail.
short-description: RFID is a 20b/year industry (by 2020). Our reader is better/faster/cheaper than current readers.

description: Access to space in the transportation industry has never been more scarce. Real estate prices have exploded near major seaports and rail hubs, while trucks suffer from a shortage of parking spaces that costs the industry an estimated $5.1 billion per year.
short-description: SecūrSpace is an online marketplace for parking and storing trucks, trailers, and shipping containers.

description: Rootastes creates experiential lunch programs as a perk for the staffs of fast-growing and culture-centric companies. With Rootastes, you're getting a hyper-personalized lunch that satisfies every eater. Rootastes is designed for companies run by people who believe that taking good care of their team is smart business and the right thing to do. We believe a great lunch can create a more positive and productive environment for employees and deliver measurable results to a company's bottom line.
short-description: Rootastes creates experiential lunch programs as a perk for the staffs of fast-growing and culture-centric companies.

description: We’re introducing the first-ever connected hardware device that will keep the 10.6M US women who take the Birth Control Pill from missing a dose again, reducing the 770K annual unintended pregnancies due to inconsistent use of the Pill. The user simply inserts her usual blister pack in the sleeve, a pocket-sized device that recognizes each Pill. It knows when she has not taken her Pill by her daily set time and sends discreet and customizable reminders to her phone until she takes it.
short-description: We’re empowering women with FemTech. With the first-ever connected Birth Control Pill sleeve, our users will always take the Pill. On time.

description: Aluna has developed a Respiratory management system consisting of a portable spirometer and gamified app to detect early signs of asthma attacks. Aluna, in collaboration with UCSF, won the prestigious $225K National Science Foundation award to conduct a 300 subject study which was completed in June 2017. The $500K Phase II of the same study will begin in November 2017. As of now, over 400 children and adults have used Aluna and three hospitals have placed purchase agreements.
short-description: Aluna is building an innovative respiratory management platform using machine learning.

description: Walkli empowers people to have more authentic, tailored travel experiences while helping destinations capture maximum economic value from their visitors. Today visitors struggle to go beyond standard tourist sites, while local travel stakeholders don’t have an easy way to help their visitors explore locally and on foot. Walkli provides mapping tools for the travel industry to design routed self-guided tours, and our website site allows visitors to search for tours that match their interests.
short-description: Empowering people to have authentic, tailored travel experiences; helping local economies capture maximum value from their guests

description: One of the biggest struggles people face in their health and fitness goals is reaching their nutrition goals. Many struggle because it is hard to fit in proper nutrition along with a busy lifestyle. WarmUp alleviates this problem by infusing high quality hydrolyzed protein and Brazilian espresso into a powder form, allowing for either hot or cold consumption. However, it doesn't stop there. WarmUp is free of carbs, sugar, and fat, lactose, and artificial ingredients making it truly healthy.
short-description: WarmUp is a high protein coffee with 15g of protein and 223mg of natural caffeine per serving. It is free of lactose, sugar, and carbs.

description: Each year 450,000 preterm infants are born in the U.S.  Of these, 109,000 are born before 34 weeks.  The health of these infants' gut is central to their growth and brain development.  There is no standard to measure the health of a preterm infant's gut. NICUtrition makes it easy to quantify gut health, optimize treatments and personalize nutrition. We have two modules: Guidance, a dashboard to track growth and automate feeding protocols and MAGI a proprietary algorithm that measures gut health.
short-description: We are developing NICUtrition, a microbial health informatics platform to measure and monitor the gut health of preterm infants.

description: X-COR has created the first low-flow extracorporeal CO2 removal (ECCOR) circuit in modern medicine to revolutionize modern COPD treatment. At blood flow rates 10x lower than existing products, XCOR's ACORN cartridge enables new ICU and outpatient therapeutic applications for patients worldwide. XCOR’s product offers hospitals and clinics a low-complexity method to vent CO2 from patients with acute respiratory failure, instead of intubation and mechanical ventilation.
short-description: X-COR ACORN dialysis cartridges use low-flow ECCOR to treat respiratory failure in a cheaper, simpler and safer non-ICU outpatient procedure

description: Wagmo is building the underwriting brain behind better pet health insurance. On the front end, Wagmo offers the 150 million uninsured pet-owners access to affordable pet wellness and health insurance. On the back end, Wagmo products are supported by a proprietary underwriting model driven by leading-edge data science and predictive analytics.
short-description: The underwriting brain behind better pet health insurance

description: In an age of rising antibiotic resistance, treating patients with the right antibiotic quickly can be a matter of life and death.  DZD uses novel sample prep, high throughput sequencing and machine intelligence to shorten the time it takes to identify a pathogen and predict its drug resistance profile from days to hours.  Using our diagnostic, hospitals will be able to dramatically reduce hospital length of stay, the overuse of antibiotics, and save lives cost-effectively.
short-description: DZD combines whole genome sequencing and machine learning to revolutionize infectious disease diagnosis and treatment

description: Epion is a patient access company, beginning with digital check-in, expanding to solutions aligned with provider and patient goals. Our connection with over two-million patients, along with associated EHR data, and a platform that ensures the patient's attention, puts us in a unique position to improve the patient experience, reduce administrative burden and improve clinical accuracy. We work with over 250 clients, have a 97% retention rate and a 12-month trailing revenue growth rate of 330%.
short-description: Epion is a patient access company, beginning with digital check-in, with 250 clients, a 97% retention rate and 330% 12-month revenue growth

description: DynamiCare Health is a digital coaching program that helps monitor and motivate people to achieve healthy goals with drugs, opioids, alcohol, and tobacco.
short-description: Monitoring & Motivating Health & Recovery

description: Unsize believes size labels don't fit and personalizes an experience where you can find clothing online without thinking about size or gender. We know something will fit by trying it on but there is no equivalent for online shopping. This design problem causes 30-40% of all clothing bought online to be returned. Unsize cures this for retailers while eliminating the question of “will this fit me?” for online shoppers through a connected measuring device and apparel recommendation app.
short-description: Unsize eliminates the question of “will this fit me?” for online shoppers while making fashion more inclusive.

description: Tuverl is a Public Transport  App, that seeks to make public transport in African countries more affordable and accessible to commuters, while simultaneously increasing revenue and cutting out inefficiencies for public transport operators.
short-description: Tuverl seeks to make public transport in African countries cheaper, faster and more convenient for commuters.

description: Epharmix proactively engages rising-risk members with easy-to-use SMS texts and IVR calls. Epharmix standardizes member outreach to collect real-time member-reported symptoms and biometrics across 24 conditions so that payers’ care coaches can support member health. Differentiators: industry-leading engagement and long-term data collection enable timely intervention before members incur costs, and 10 peer-reviewed publications and >20 commercial implementations prove clinical outcomes and ROI.
short-description: Epharmix proactively engages and monitors high and rising-risk members with easy-to-use, evidence-based SMS texts and IVR calls.

description: Chinese patients’ demand for US care is fast growing due to huge treatment gaps: in cancer, 5-year survival rate in the US is double that of China (68% vs. 31%). On our platform, a patient can book an appointment with a top US doctor, have a virtual consultation on a screen, and receive medical recommendations. We have hundreds of top US physicians and top academic medical centers in our network and some of the largest Chinese healthcare players as B2B2C channels, covering 25mm patients.
short-description: DocFlight is an international telemedicine company connecting Chinese patients to top US doctors.

description: BLUE FAIRY CARE SYSTEM is an innovative product, enables a wireless monitoring of vital signs in the hospital’s NICU. It integrates all wires, adhesive electrodes, sensors and clothes into one, soft and smart textile garment. Its holistic configuration and wireless features allow an approachable and progressive treatment by medical teams and parents.
short-description: BLUE FAIRY is an innovative textile based monitoring system for premature babies, creating a new standard of care in the hospitals.

description: Cardiac rehab (CR) is a post-acute program for patients with recent cardiac events. Patients who complete CR cut their risk of readmissions by 40%. However 4 out of 5 patients don't enroll because current CR is facility-based and is therefore limited by space and location availability. Lack of participation in CR costs $54B in preventable medical costs annually. Movn is a rehab service that produces the same outcomes at four times higher participation and at a fraction of the cost.
short-description: Moving Analytics provides Movn - a virtual cardiac rehab service for patients with cardiovascular disease

description: SIBYL builds the optimized schedule in real-time, cutting expensive gaps and and creating more efficient operations. It's an add-on for intelligent scheduling. SIBYL increases revenue by maximizing the likelihood that 1 patient will show for every 1 slot. Providers can see more patients each day without adding overhead costs. Sibyl runs macro-eyes AI, deployed and refined at leading academic medical centers in New York City and California and at one of the nation's largest health systems.
short-description: AI co. personalizing care. Product: Sibyl machine learns when to schedule patients to increase utilization, cut the damage from No-Shows.

description: Brightmerge simplifies the project development lifecycle, closing the gap between engineers, bankers, lawyers and investors by analyzing vast amounts of relevant data to provide the optimal 100% renewable energy system for commercial, industrial and government clients. Our SaaS model provides project professionals a common view of the project, removes data related errors and inaccuracies increasing success rates and reducing the time and costs to develop a project.
short-description: Brightmerge vision is to enable the rapid deployment and scale up of renewable energy microgrid systems globally.

description: Positive mental health is fundamental to our lives. With it we can flourish, but without it we will have poorer outcomes across all of medical care. Mental ill health is an expense we cannot afford. Using patients' smartphones HealthRhythms offers real-time, personalized assessments of mental health and provides within-reach activities that have been proven to boost mental health.  HealthRhyhms is creating a future that enables healthcare providers to promote health, instead of treating illness.
short-description: MAKING THE TRACKING OF MENTAL HEALTH AS EASY AS TRACKING STEPS

description: Healthimation brings highly effective population health solutions to life for chronic diseases. We marry evidence based programs with highly engaging Hollywood grade animation in an easy & fun mobile format. Digital transformation enables scalability, accessibility, affordability & engagement essentially reshaping the patient-provider relationship and health care delivery. We are addressing the first unmet need of patients with diabetes: Self-management via our flagship program Why WAIT.
short-description: Healthimation brings the world’s most effective diabetes management program to mobile devices in a cost effective, engaging and fun format

description: Great patient education is critical to successful healthcare outcomes, yet in most healthcare settings patient education consists of rushed conversations or paper handouts. Medumo’s CareTours™ enable healthcare organizations to guide patients using automated just-in-time instructions and checklists pre, peri, and post-procedure.  CareTours are “education pathways” that are customizable, mobile friendly, highly engaging and adaptive to patients’ needs without requiring staff time.
short-description: Medumo helps healthcare providers guide patients using just-in-time digital instruction that is engaging, effective, and easy to deploy

description: Unima developed a fast and low cost diagnostic and disease surveillance technology which allows people, even with no technical training, to diagnose a disease directly at the point of care, without the use of lab equipment, in less than 15 minutes and at $1 per test. Our goal is to solve the problem of lack of access to a timely diagnostic for 3 billion people living in the developing world or in low resource settings in developed countries.
short-description: Fast and low cost diagnostic and disease surveillance technology

description: Activice is developing a non-implantable pacemaker for the bladder to help women with overactive bladder. Our device is a closed-loop neuromodulator that senses bladder contractions and in response delivers electrical stimulation to inhibit the contractions. As such, it provides a safer, cheaper, more effective alternative to both PTNS and SNS.
short-description: Non-implantable neuromodulator for treating overactive bladder

description: If you have ever been ill while travelling, you can sympathize with how stressful and helpless this experience can be.
short-description: Have you ever been sick while travelling?  Air Doctor connects between local doctors and travelers needing medical assistance.

description: TCARE reduces long-term-care claims for Medicaid & Life/LTC insurance carriers by providing an evidence-based family caregiver support program thus delaying/preventing nursing home placement.  TCARE’s clients include Payors, Health Systems, State Governments, Medicaid Payers and Life/LTC Carriers.
short-description: TCARE reduces the risk of Medicaid & LTC insurance claims via an evidence-based family caregiver support program.

description: Orbita is a provider of digital healthcare solutions that use next-generation voice assistant and AI technologies to vastly improve remote patient monitoring, education, care coordination, and research.   Orbita works with healthcare systems, care management service providers, pharmaceuticals, and other healthcare organizations to enable digital healthcare solutions that improve outcomes, reduce costs, and minimize risks for patients with chronic or post-acute care needs.
short-description: Orbita transforms patient engagement through next generation voice assistant, chat bots, and conversational AI solutions.

description: People can wait a long time to receive a genetic diagnosis. As a company co-founded by a patient advocate and a genetic counselor, we know this firsthand. People also have the power within themselves to shorten this diagnostic odyssey. ThinkGenetic helps them harness this power by offering trustworthy information to guide them to the help they need, faster.  Undiagnosed individuals, patients, and families are our focus and this sets us apart.
short-description: ThinkGenetic is an artificial intelligence solution for reaching diagnosed and undiagnosed individuals living with a genetic disorder.

description: We have created a home health and wellness platform centered on a voice-first countertop device called Pillo: the first intelligent healthcare assistant for the home. We offer three core services: Medication Management, Care Plan Delivery, and Pillo Insights. For users, Pillo provides a suite of engaging features and digital health services inside of the home. For partners, Pillo bridges the last mile of care, enabling the previously impossible task of risk stratification from the home.
short-description: Pillo Health has created an intelligent health assistant and remote engagement platform for the home.

description: Most chronic conditions are either caused or exacerbated by poor diet, yet for the 60% of adults, access to clinical nutrition experts is a major barrier to care. Clinical nutrition has been used in healthcare settings for decades and has been shown to improve outcomes and reduce cost for over 50 conditions such as heart failure, diabetes, and cystic fibrosis. Nutrimedy improves the outdated care delivery model to provide the intervention, education, and monitoring right at their fingertips.
short-description: Nutrimedy is redefining access to clinical nutrition care for high-risk populations through automation and AI.

description: SafeInHome is a leading provider of assistive technology solutions delivering peace of mind to caregivers. Our innovative data collection and measurement technologies enable us to offer the lowest-cost product with the highest customer ROI.
short-description: We solve the delivery inefficiency problem of fuel companies with the lowest cost tank monitoring solution.

description: GoPeer leverages an available and underutilized labor force of college students to provide high-quality virtual tutoring for K-12 students at 1⁄3 the national average cost of professional tutoring.
short-description: GoPeer provides high-quality virtual tutoring for K-12 students at 1⁄3 the national average cost of professional tutoring.

description: The Vortex TA captures the hearts ventricular systolic pressure to act as a passive ventricular assist device. The device has three components, a member across the atrio-ventricular valve orifice to harness the pressure gradient between the high pressure ventricular systolic phase and the atrial pressure, a shaft to transfer that energy to a baseplate and a baseplate to transfer that energy to the heart wall. The device acts as a 3rd papillary muscle transferring the force the ventricular wall.
short-description: Indwelling cardiac implant using natural pressure gradients as a Passive Ventricular Assist Device for HF

description: tripBuddy is a carpooling platform with the goals of reducing the number of cars on the road and improving the lives and productivity of employees. We pair up employees who live in local clusters so they can carpool to a centralized workplace.
short-description: carpooling platform that encourages employees within the same organization to carpool together to work.

description: VAMPIRO was founded by Dr. Steven Santanello, an Acute Care Trauma Surgeon with 30+ years of experience. He was performing a complicated laparoscopic appendectomy and wished he had an instrument that could suction the contaminated fluid and irrigation more effectively than his current device, which could improve clinical outcomes and potentially reduce OR time for the patient.After years of customer validation and product development, the VAMPIRO was created to help surgeons help patients.
short-description: The VAMPIRO creates dual lumen poole suction with existing suction catheter allowing for efficient unobstructed fluid removal in laparoscopy

description: Each day, students across the country face a 'curriculum void' - use of curricula/educational resources/materials that do not reflect them, their communities (and associated histories) or their life experiences. T-Time Productions, through its digital curricula, seeks to eliminate this void by incorporating more diverse protagonist representations and learning styles into classroom materials , fostering increased student agency, content engagement and ownership of their classroom environments.
short-description: T-Time seeks to eliminate the 'curriculum void' students experience by integrating more diverse representations into classroom curricula.

description: The Innovation Scout is an innovation matching, discovery, assessment and pipeline management solution that uses Artificial Intelligence and Big Data to accelerate corporations ability to test more ideas, leverage emerging new technologies, and create growth through innovation.
short-description: Machine Learning to match startups, research and open partners with corporate business challenges. 'Match.com' for startups.

description: Consumer product manufacturers spend millions on generating awareness, consideration and sales of their products, yet have little idea who is actually buying them when they are sold through resellers like Amazon or Best Buy.    RacerX's Snap4that app helps these companies identify their customers by enhancing the ownership experience by providing a single source for all their product-related info such as owners guides, warranty info, replenishment parts, and customer service.
short-description: RacerX helps consumer product manufacturers identify their actual customers by providing product specific info to owners on their phone

description: SmartOR is a platform meant to completely revolutionize the modern operating room. Consider that only 25% of current ORs in the US have the ability to send/receive digital information. SmartOR is a device that combines 3D hand gesture recognition and voice recognition to give surgeon's sterile control of a revolutionary application suite (video calls, DICOM viewer). Finally, to bring it all together, SmartOR utilizes a voice assitant, Maestro, to anticipate surgical needs.
short-description: SmartOR is the first smart platform for a surgeon-controlled, fully integrated operating room.

description: Environmental impacts, animal welfare issues, lack of traceability – today’s meat is unsustainable. AgBalance Livestock enables customers across the livestock value chain to eliminate inefficiencies and improve sustainability through digital transparency. With us, customers can automatically create precise and trustworthy information about the environmental impacts and provenance of their products – supporting them and end-consumers to make informed decisions.
short-description: Enabling customers across the livestock value chain to eliminate inefficiencies and improve sustainability through digital transparency

description: Parquery analyses static images from any camera to detect objects and provide real-time results on both parking availability and exact parking duration to car park managers: retail, real estate, airports, train stations, private car parks, bus depots, gas stations. If cameras are already installed, then no additional infrastructure is required.
short-description: Parquery analyses images from any camera to detect objects and provide real-time results on parking availability and exact parking duration.

description: SoaPen is a portable, cost- effective, soap-crayon with which children can draw on their dry hands. This drawing lathers up when taken under water. By removing every trace of the drawing, children wash their hands for the ideal span of 20 - 40 seconds. Hand washing is known as a life saving do-it-yourself vaccine and can dramatically reduce infant mortality rates in developing countries. With a hybrid model, we will donate SoaPen to schools and hospitals in low income communities.
short-description: Promoting better hygiene practices among children around the world through play.

description: WeKey strives to create a curated, safe and verified community of travel enthusiasts and weekend explorers.
short-description: WeKey is a peer to peer home and apartment exchange service specifically targeting New England travel.

description: CADLAB.io is a cloud-based hardware development platform which helps hardware engineers to collaborate on PCB design projects. Based on Git version control it allows companies to organize teamwork on projects, keep track of all design versions, view and visually compare schematics and board layout revisions, annotate changes and more. With CADLAB teams can easily perform PCB design reviews to foster knowledge sharing and catch design mistakes early reducing time to market and development costs.
short-description: CADLAB.io is a collaborative platform for hardware teams that helps to improve PCB design process, reduce time2market and development costs.

description: Worksense continuously tracks biases and disparities in salaries, promotion decisions, and assignments of high visibility projects. We provide organizations with a dashboard to monitor these metrics as well as action plans for identified gaps and disparities.
short-description: Worksense is a platform that allows organizations to track and address metrics that matter for improving workplace inclusivity.

description: We provide food brands and producers with a platform to promote and test products at low costs.
short-description: Brightbites is a marketing and market research platform for food brands and producers.

description: Everyday people are fired upon while serving their country or community. Whether or not they go home when a projectile finds its mark is 100% up to the body armor they choose that day. Our company addresses this need by developing impact reactive body armor with test results approaching 50% improvement over the competition. Utilizing materials designed for NASA, we add less than 1lb & 1/4' in width. In the next 3 years our goal is to grow from bulletproof vests to full scale bomb disposal suits.
short-description: Impact absorbing body armor for police and military use. Developing from simple vest applications to full scale EOD (bomb squad) & K9 suits.

description: PowerDocks LLC is a marine technology company innovating dynamic products servicing Blue Tech. Our company is commercializing the world's first line of solar electric docks known as  BlueIsles™.  Our intelligent floating micro-grid platforms collect, store and distribute renewable energy in-situ in the Aquatic space.  BlueIsles™ are used to power vessels,marinas, ports, moorings and robotic systems deployed in Marine, Defense, and Aquaculture industries worldwide.
short-description: PowerDocks develops In-Situ Aquatic Power Charging Solutions

description: With granted patents, Your Heaven Audio has invented The CloseUp® System, a hardware/software technology platform for amplifying and recording acoustic musical instruments accurately and easily. This uniquely integrated system examines each instrument individually to create custom solutions that solve critical feedback and sound problems. The microphone system renders the acoustic sound accurately and is used by acoustic musicians, audiophiles, recording studios, and sound engineers.
short-description: The CloseUp® System is a hardware/software technology platform for amplifying & recording acoustic musical instruments accurately and easily

description: Today the 8% of dental implants fail because of bruxism (teeth clenching during sleep). Bruxism is the main cause of mechanical stress on dental implants. Today there are not solutions to reduce the excessive load on implants induced by bruxism. Aesyra develops high-tech dental appliances that actively reduce bruxism forces in a minimally invasive fashion at night time, helping to save 1.3M implants per year. Bruxism is a $3B market and our product will be commercialized starting early 2020.
short-description: Aesyra develops a medical device for monitoring and reducing sleep bruxism using biofeedback, helping to save millions of dental implants.

description: We have developed a high performance, smart Digital Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) Technology. It is a patent pending SW/HW solution (available for licensing) that minimizes unwanted/disruptive audio noise in products & applications such as:
short-description: Our groundbreaking Active Noise Cancellation technology is a wide-band solution outperforming all available techniques in the market.

description: Alternatives to replace fossil-based chemicals are likely to come from plants. Bloom recently developed a disruptive technology able to fully valorize the largest natural source of so called 'aromatic' molecules - a major building block of large-scale industrial products. This technology enables, for the first time, to convert the chemical potential of plants and makes bio-based chemicals cost-competitive.
short-description: Bloom makes industrial biomaterials from plants

description: For women diagnosed with breast cancer surgery is still the frontline therapy. However, 1 in 4 of women who have breast conserving surgery will have a repeat operation, because some of the cancer cells have been left behind. At ALAnostics, we develop a patent protected tumour paint for surgeons to remove all of the cancer the first time. Our mission is to make tumour painting the gold standard for breast cancer conservation surgery, ultimately saving breasts and patients' lives.
short-description: Enabling Precision Breast Cancer Surgery

description: Be My Eyes is a free app that enables blind people to lead a more independent life by connecting them to sighted volunteers. By the tap of a button, blind people can get connected to a sighted volunteer or a company representative, who is ready to provide visual assistance with the task at hand. The community consists of  85,000 blind users and more than 1.5 million sighted volunteers - our users are in 180 countries and we are able to provide help in more than 180 different languages.
short-description: Be My Eyes brings sight to the blind and visually impaired all over the world

description: The NaviSpine is a product developed at Uni Basel's Biomedical Engineering Department. It provides a cost-efficient  pre-operative planning tool and navigation system for spinal surgeons. Using medical imaging techoinology developed at CERN, the company is able to provide CT scans that have 5-7x higher resolutions whilst reducing patients' radiation exposure by up to 90%.
short-description: NaviSpine is a state of the art, cost-efficient navigational system developed for spinal surgeons.

description: We believe that health and nutrition are part of a lifestyle. There is no silver bullet and that's why we strive to develop healthy and innovative products that fit with our lifestyle. So we can all benefit from those healthy and balanced foods, wherever life takes us.
short-description: Snacking without compromise: delicious & balanced, 100% natural & organic, always at your side wherever life takes you.

description: HIGH5 is a free strengths test that helps people to find out what they are naturally good at.
short-description: HIGH5 is a free strengths test that helps people to find out what they are naturally good at

description: Every year, 65 million obstetric and gynaecological treatments require access to the uterus. The standard use of Tenaculum forceps may be painful as well as traumatic and pose a risk of cross-contamination. Aspivix are developing a new generation of Tenaculum forceps which painlessly uses vacuum suction, reducing discomfort for the patient, eradicating the risk of bleeding and lesions and as a single use instrument avoids the risk of cross contamination.
short-description: In genecology, uterus access requires traumatic forceps. Aspivix, a new forceps gen using vacuum suction, eliminates pain, bleeding & lesion

description: VR/AR experiences are nowadays diffusing fast; VR googles and computation units are available to everyone at affordable cost. However, the immersive experience is limited by the lack of tactile interactions when grasping VR objects. Commercial VR joysticks either only vibrate or they are very bulky and costly. Foldaway-Haptics brings forces to the human finger inventing portable and cost-effective solutions to use in VR joysticks and to embed in laptops, drones’ controllers and smartphones.
short-description: Foldaway Haptics interfaces render forces under your finger. Users can “touch” VR objects thanks to the new generation of portable joysticks

description: At Evezy, we’re rethinking car ownership. Our platform is designed to free consumers from long-term commitments and remove the pain point of charging electric cars. We launched our first derivative, rentE, in partnership with Uber in Sept' 2017.
short-description: An all-Inclusive Electric Vehicle Subscriptions Platform - swap your car at the click of a button

description: FIBERCARE's vision is;
short-description: FIBERCARE, a disruptive, new filtration material that employs the latest technological advances in textile manufacturing

description: Industrial companies are involved in a transformation process: they order raw materials and transform them into finished products. This implies planning purchases way ahead. This activity - order planning - is challenging. The number of trade-offs involved, plus existence of real-world constraints, prevented to solve it through traditional models. We built a AI SaaS platform at ETH delivering optimum and trustworthy plans in seconds– unlocking savings between 5 and 10% of total purchasing costs.
short-description: Saving millions for industrial companies by optimizing the way they purchase their raw material

description: The way of transportation and mobility is changing rapidly. Companies and cities are facing challenges to make their fleets ready for the future.
short-description: goUrban offers mobility solutions for sharing operators and fleet management in companies.

description: Flight tickets distribution today is built on systems from 30 years ago. In addition approx. 1 billion $ are frozen in guarantees to the airlines as the ticket &payment settlement is asynchronous.
short-description: FLYLA offers a global airline distribution system (GADS) powered by a proprietary billing and settlement blockchain.

description: Today's VR goggles use 2 flat screens creating 3D images with wrong focus. This causes an unpleasant eye-strain and drastically reduces the depth immersion. The resulting discomfort holds back the entire Virtual and Mixed Reality industry. Our light-field technology allows to create true 3D images with correct one-eye depth cues allowing an eye to change focus naturally. CREAL3D’s light-field screens will replace the flat screens in today’s goggles and will truly enable the emerging market.
short-description: CREAL3D is a startup company developing a near-eye light-field display for Virtual and Mixed Reality glasses bringing depth immersion in 3D.

description: Joto is bringing creative robotics into the home and workplace. Joto is a robotic drawing board, which turns pixels into pen and ink. It is an award-winning product by Those Ltd, hailed as 'the Etch-A-Sketch for the digital age' by Dezeen magazine.
short-description: Joto is a robotic drawing board, which turns pixels into pen and ink. Award-winning creative robotics for the home, school or office.

description: Kejako is developing non-invasive solution for demanding presbyopic patients seeking to keep their quality of life through the compensation of visual accommodation decay. Our promise, unlike any other existing surgical solution, is to delay the need for reading glasses without compromising the patient’s quality of vision.
short-description: Addressing presbyopia in the field of ophthalmology, with an anti-aging mindset in order to treat the gradual loss of visual accommodation.

description: We firmly believe that every individual regardless of their origin, sex, colour or religion should have the right to life and health. But today in the World, inequalities persist and are growing. 5.8 billion people don't have access to quality Healthcare. Hippocrate.org provide 800 free consultations to poor patients this year in Developing countries by offering a Disruptive Patient Engagement Platform to Health Professionals willing to increase by 70% their Patient Acquisition rate.
short-description: Hippocrate.org is one of the most used Big Data Health Platform in the world by country (129 countries) presented at Stanford and the MIT EF

description: Preparing a unique cake with personalized decoration is one of the nicest ways to express love and gratitude for your dearest. Occasions for these special cakes are without limits; time, skill and budget are not. Regardless if you are pastry chef or private baking enthusiast, we offer a simple, digital solution for everyone, to deeply personalize your cake decoration. Our 3d-printing technology and digital interface enables everyone to create unique, individualized 3d-printed fondant figures.
short-description: Imagine your mother’s delight if you present a birthday cake with her family as 3d-printed fondant figures on top. Heartfelt joy is ensured!

description: The cost of servicing a personal vehicle is at a record high in Switzerland, particularly for motorcycles.
short-description: Rideshaper is a communal workshop for motorcycle enthusiasts who want to wrench on their bike while socialising with the community.

description: Artificial Intelligence fashion stylist and retail aggregator that makes 1 to 1 personal styling services available to apparel shoppers. Using the latest research in deep learning, we analyse the choices of online stylists to understand the elements of style, and then taking into account the individual user’s body type, skin tone and own style preferences, completely personalise the entire e-Commerce experience providing outfits and clothes for any occasion across digital and physical channels.
short-description: Intelistyle is an AI Fashion Stylist. Snap a photo of any garment and get personalised outfit ideas.

description: Wounds or defects of the skin can have severe physical and psychological impact on patients. Many patients could be treated with a small, very thin skin samples. However, only a few ones benefit from this type of treatment because only plastic surgeons can take such samples in an operating room. Our vision is that with our device surgeons and dermatologists alike can take small skin samples in a much faster and reliable manner.
short-description: With TeD dermatologists can treat wounds with patients-own skin in a short and affordable intervention.

description: We are an EPFL startup initiated in 2014 and incorporated in January 2016. We are based in Lausanne and have offices in Shenzhen (China) thanks to HAX.co.
short-description: ROVENSO makes agile robots for security monitoring in any environment.

description: Prometheus is an innovative start-up, creating 3D human and animal tissues for regenerative medicine and pharmacological tests. The first product is a second skin that finally solves the problem of chronic wounds, like bedsores, halving healing times and avoiding scars formation. The second skin is obtained through our system Ematik, that creates a new biopolymeric mixture using patient's own blood.
short-description: We developed a technology able to create human living tissues for regenerative medicine and for drug testing to reduce animal trials.

description: Nagi Bioscience aims to revolutionize the way toxic/beneficial effects of substances are tested today, with the first “Organism-on-Chip” technology. This combines the use of microscopic worms as in vivo models for drug/chemical screening with the first all-in-one device for their automated in vitro handling and use. Finally, “in vivo testing at the in vitro scale”: ethical alternative to animal testing and key to boost innovation and efficiency in pharma, cosmetic, and chemical industries.
short-description: We aim to set a new standard for testing toxicity and efficacy of drugs, cosmetics and chemicals: the first “Organism-on-Chip” technology

description: Companies have very high health care costs due to employee absences, of which half are due to bad indoor air quality (IAQ) leading to various sicknesses. HVAC systems are costly and emit harmful chemicals themselves. With data analytics and machine learning we identify the actual problems of the IAQ and create a customized combination of plants to improve the office environment leading to healthier and more productive employees, while also reducing energy costs and improving the environment.
short-description: We help companies reduce health care and energy costs by using data analytics and specific plants to improve office indoor air quality.

description: LIfT Biosciences is a socially-minded Biotech start-up commercialising Leukocyte Infusion Therapy (LiFT), building on 18 years of ground breaking research. LIfT BioSciences has a patent pending technology platform for developing the World’s first and only Cell Bank of Cancer Killing Neutrophils for all solid tumours. Our first mission is to have Developed a Cure for Pancreatic Cancer by 2021. We have successfully cultured The World’s 1st Cancer Killing Neutrophils and completed SEED funding.
short-description: A socially-minded Biotech start-up creating The World's First Cell Bank of Cancer Killing Innate Immune Cells to cure a range of cancers.

description: Our laser probes and systems form a feedback loop system which enable medical doctors for the first time to monitor absorbed dose to the tissue during minimum invasive surgery in real time. Value proposition: (1) increased patient safety, (2) shortened surgical times, (3) lower treatment repetitions, (4)new areas of application for laser surgery will be opened up. In particular, laser oncology will benefit from this innovative approach.
short-description: LoF revolutionizes laser surgery by integrating new and innovative sensing functionality into the distal end of the laser probe.

description: Our device agnostic gateway infrastructure automates the data-readout of wearables worn by hospitalised patients and acts as a two sided platform promoting co-creation:
short-description: Enabling continuous patient monitoring in clinics with infrastructure for automated data capture from wearables using wireless technologies.

description: We bring interactivity, sociality and fun to the living room of fans. The vast majority of fans can´t participate in live events. They watch the event on TV or via live stream from home instead. However, it is not much fun, because you can´t share your emotions (frustration, joy etc.). We enable fans to not only share their emotions, but also have more fun thanks to gamification. Users of live streams (e.g. ESports) can interact with one another and the streamer via customized avatars.
short-description: We  revolutionize the way fans experience live events.

description: Our vision is to contribute to the global health by providing an alternative to sugar for consumers & food producers with LEGRIA - a healthy, sustainable, natural, cost effective & tasty food ingredient. Legria is based on a food side stream raw material and will substitute up to 50% of sugar in food products like breakfast cereals, cakes or cookies. By combining bulking, sweetness, taste & nutrition in one product, Legria will outcompete all other solutions price and performance wise.
short-description: Legria has the solution to the “sugar problem” - a healthy, tasty and cost-effective ingredient to replace up to 50% sugar in baked goods.

description: A challenge. Try to book a trip to go to visit Katiola in Côte d’Ivoire, a nice village where you'll discover an African ancestral method to make pottery. You can’t do it easily as in Europe or in America. It is the problem we face when we travel in Africa. It is the same problem for more than 65 millions tourists coming in Africa and for more than 550 millions local travelers. How does Africa promote tourism if traveler can not book easily and get key informations for his trip? We solve this.
short-description: Tripafrique, the African KAYAK

description: Tunnll is a next-generation passenger transportation technology. It transforms existing public transport bus services into smart mobility systems. It allows any existing transport operator in a small town to serve many more passengers with the same buses and drivers. At the same time it brings totally car-free smart mobility to the town residents: with Tunnll they can order any bus with a smartphone app, like with any modern app-enabled ride-sharing or taxi service.
short-description: Tunnll: a smart mobility system for any small city, a personal bus for everyone.

description: Non-compliance causes 23% of Nursing home Admission costing $31 Billion USD/380 thousand patients. We are trying to build a bridge between doctor, patients and caregivers by monitoring and providing medication intake status of patients in real time so patient gets required counselling thorough caregivers. We provide alerts, analyse and compare health status of patients by converting manual medical reports to digital records in single click. Stithi helps as a personal nurse to every patients.
short-description: Our aim is to enhance monitoring and compliance of patients on Long Medication through connected healthcare using IOHT

description: ShelfWise is an instant, real-time shelf recognition software that enables companies to audit planograms execution – the way store’s products are displayed. Thanks to artificial intelligence, in only few seconds application enables companies to assess shelf share, product presence and the planogram compliance directly in the store during the sales rep’s visits. The solution can be used by CPG companies, retailers and OTC pharma companies.
short-description: Shelfwise is real-time image recognition software designed for CPG companies and retailers that brings valuable insights about store shelf.

description: Our probiotic formulation offers a range of benefits to ranchers, meat-consumers, and the global community. By optimizing the gut health of ruminants, our product increases metabolic efficiency without pumping livestock full of antibiotics, by reducing methane emissions by 50 percent. The probiotic also produces a natural antibiotic that reduces food-borne pathogen such as E. coli, Salmonella, and Campylobacter.
short-description: A probiotic formulation that reduces methane from cattle while increasing meat and dairy production, and reducing the need for antibiotics.

description: We take the guesswork out of open brain surgery with a uniquely capable 3D Optical scanner and Computer Vision System.
short-description: 3D Optical Computer Vision System saves $3,000 per case for the hospital, 30 minutes for the surgeon, and speeds patient recovery.

description: Atlas was formed in El Paso, Texas, and is developing a hardness sensor that can improve the efficiency and performance of water softeners and other water treatment equipment. Our company mission is to produce easy-to-use, cost-effective devices for the detection of calcium and other ions in water. Our vision is to change the paradigm of salt-regenerated water softening by introducing a novel method for on-demand regeneration and smart water treatment systems.
short-description: Atlas was formed in El Paso, Texas, and is developing a hardness sensor that can improve the efficiency and performance of water softeners.

description: Backspace is junk removal with an environment saving twist. Rather than taking items to the landfill, Backspace can recycle most of it. We donate what we can like clothing and furniture, but if not then we can recycle it. We can recycle computers, appliances, metal, cardboard, mattresses, and lots of other items.
short-description: Backspace - text us a photo and we make your junk disappear. We can recycle 80% of most junk.

description: We have a vision where food insecurity doesn’t exist, where people grow their own food on shelves, desks, window sills, or kitchen counters, and everyone has a micro farm. Hydroponic systems typically cost thousands of dollars but we figured out how to do it for less than the cost of a large pizza. The Aggressively Organic Micro Growth System™ is a patent pending foolproof hydroponic growth system that does not require pumps or electricity and is made of backyard biodegradable materials.
short-description: We offer a simple hydroponic system for plant-to-plate food production that anyone can afford and use regardless of experience and space.

description: Our mission as a startup is to create a platform for healthcare facilities wherein a dermal patch will be able to diagnose sexually transmitted infections (STIs) and cervical cancer.  Globally, on an annual basis the burden altogether of these malignancies is affecting 550 million individuals. The focus of the company is to provide a technology that allows in a non-invasive manner diagnosis to help the most susceptible: young adults and pregnant women.
short-description: Our products help healthcare workers and doctors appropriately test patients’ gynecologic health by providing faster, same-day diagnosis.

description: CDC reports 1 in 4 children under age 5 have developmental issues.  resulting in 1 million kids every year entering school with an undiagnosed disability. BabyNoggin  is an app platform that allows parents to track their kids’ milestones at home, their pediatricians to get reimbursed from insurance, and the child to be connected to local resources and treatment when in need. The team has 3 prior exits and partners with providers, early childhood nonprofits, and the state department of health.
short-description: BabyNoggin help catch the 1/4 American kids who are at risk of developmental delays to their doctors and local resources.

description: Prescription opioid abuse has become an epidemic in the United States. The prescribing system used by physicians, pharmacies, and patients is antiquated and needs to be updated.  BlockMedx intends to be an online electronic prescribing platform that aims to provide trustworthy authenticity to prescriptions. We aim to overcome the problems of over-prescribing medication and identity verification by using the blockchain to verify, transmit, store, and analyze prescription information.
short-description: Blockchain e-prescribing to combat the opioid crisis, improve health outcomes, and save lives.

description: Brands of Americas offers local entrepreneurs the digital tools needed to export their products and grow their brands by providing digital marketing tools, services and consulting, as well as business intelligence. Through our platform and other services, we help them advertise their products targeting especially their home country's diaspora (US Hispanics), as well as consumers locally and worldwide. We are building the largest quality-based catalog of Latin American brands and their products.
short-description: Help local brands and businesses better understand the market of their diaspora and export their products worldwide.

description: Big Wheelbarrow is a technology provider for wholesale food buyers to make their acquisition process faster and more efficient when working with small local farms. Using AI, we automate the management of orders from the field to fulfillment. By making it easy to work with small farms as it is to work with a large farm, Big Wheelbarrow enables wholesalers to offer farm-to-table products the market is demanding without squeezing profit margins. That means more demand for locally grown products.
short-description: Big Wheelbarrow helps food wholesalers easily find & purchase from small local farms by using AI to aggregate, automate and manage orders.

description: Just as other arts have been supported for generations, Black Fret believes popular music deserves the support of its community. Since 2013, Black Fret has provided over a million dollars to exceptional local musicians to enable the creation and performance of new music. Employing an innovative and scalable chapter-based membership model in which a limited group of members enjoy premium musical experiences, Black Fret has proven to be a profitable organization with plans for national expansion.
short-description: Employing a membership-based patronage model, Black Fret provides exceptional local musicians the resources to create and perform new music.

description: Black business university courses not only educate & empower black entrepreneurs to grow their companies, BBU also provides access to mentoring to coaching and ultimately the capital that can help them not only start a business but perhaps even ultimately take a business public. I believe the key to stamping out poverty disenfranchisement and crime in some cases in black and brown communities can be directly correlated to their ability to access financial empower.
short-description: Black Business University is an online course marketplace that provides affordable biz education, mentoring, support to black entrepreneurs.

description: Dynofit, Inc. is a Biotech startup that created and sells the Flexdot, a cell phone based wireless wearable EMG sensor that is easy and inexpensive to use.   It reads muscle activity and pairs with apps to quantify and gamify physical therapy protocols.  Therapists can use the device to visually and audibly show a patient when they are doing an exercise correctly, using the right muscle.  Use of the Flexdot can shorten the time after surgery to get key muscles firing and improve outcomes.
short-description: Flexdot is a cell phone based wearable sensor for physical rehab that reads the muscle action of any muscle and pairs with apps and games.

description: EllieGrid makes medication management easier and more enjoyable than ever. Our solution helps people by:
short-description: The smart pill box with brains and beauty.

description: We produce and distribute multimedia educational resources which give students a visual appreciation of the real-world application of the subject matter which they are learning. Through our proprietary device, StudyBox, we make multimedia educational resources accessible to learners in off-grid, offline communities. Our low-cost offerings make high-quality educational resources accessible to students in low-income communities; these students make up the majority of secondary school students.
short-description: EduDoc produces and distributes curriculum-based multimedia educational resources, serving students in off-grid, offline communities.

description: Komeeda enables restaurants to get online to boost digital awareness and online sales. With our all-in-one SaaS product, restaurant operators are able to manage their consumers, email marketing and online sales through a singular app, saving restaurant operators valuable time. The app also adds transparency into consumer insights for restaurants to better serve consumers to increase retention and revenues.
short-description: A consumer management tool for restaurants of the future digital economy.

description: Every 11 sec. a senior is admitted to the ER for a fall resulting in 800K+ hospitalizations & 27K+ deaths/yr. 1/10 have dementia & 60% wander. If not found in 24hrs, 50% suffer serious injury or death. Devali combines the functionality of a FitBit with the safety features of a Medical Alert System in a discreet & comfortable connected sock with apps for active seniors, caregivers, family and senior community administrators as well as connected emergency services.
short-description: Devali- Combining the functionality of a FitBit with the safety features of a Medical Alert System

description: The 5-year survival rate for Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML) is 26%.  Emerging therapies offer new hope, but most are targeted to minor subsets of patients.  Diffregen hopes to significantly improve the outlook for AML patients by developing a first-of-its-kind therapeutic that simultaneously halts progression of leukemic cells and activates the immune system against cancer.  Diffregen has shown proof of concept in patient cells and animals models and hopes to translate to clinic in 2 years.
short-description: Diffregen is developing new therapeutics that stop the progression of cancer and activate the healthy immune system.

description: Laelaps is a patented and trademarked advanced GPS tracking system created to meet a need to stay connected to valued assets in “off-the-grid” hunting, adventure and security situations. Laelaps applies an innovative combination of GPS, VHF radio and Bluetooth technology.  Laelaps devices are assembled and supported by Austin partners. The system already shows superior range, accuracy, and battery life compared to existing products that rely on wireless network service.
short-description: Laelaps is a groundbreaking GPS-based system that brings reliability to tracking and asset monitoring devices in the outdoors

description: JustSpot.me is a smart location device that doesn’t need to be charged. It is lightweight, small and waterproof, with a customizable minimalist design and trendy colors.
short-description: We connect people to their loved ones and their loved things with a simple and charge free  smart location device.
