description: Over 39,000 legal cannabis businesses struggle with hiring short term contractors due to low trust (safety & theft are major concerns), difficulty to find relevant skilled labor, and no existing banking solutions.
short-description: Kanna provides the legal cannabis industry with an end-to-end hiring and training platform for cannabis labor.

description: Every year, 5 million Americans undergo biopsy to diagnose cancer 20% procedures have to be repeated due to inadequate biopsy quality, which can delay life-saving treatments for over 2 months. Instapath ensures the quality of biopsies and prevent repeat procedures, by providing an exact picture of a whole biopsy at subcellular resolution within seconds of removal. By reducing procedure time, Instapath also doubles throughput for the hospitals.
short-description: We developed a revolutionary microscopy system for real time pathology review, so patients can get an early and accurate diagnosis.

description: FastVisa is the new standard for Immigration workflow.We handle the complex process of applying for US immigration/visa.We automate immigration expertise and legal review improving success rates and creating legal compliance from the very start of the process.We’re committed to transforming US's broken immigration system into one that is more accessible, safer & easier to navigate.Within FastVisa’s platform, individuals & Businesses can communicate and exchange information easily and effectively
short-description: FastVisa is a process automation company for immigration workflow.We're reinventing the current immigration process as an automated process.

description: GuestBox is a subscription box service for Airbnb and vacation rental hosts to welcome their guests. Each box includes luxury essentials and high-end extras in toiletries, skincare items and snacks, and features conscious brands led by female and minority entrepreneurs. By providing GuestBox, hosts are conveniently able to offer amenities, add value to their listings, generate five star reviews, gain repeat customers, support small businesses, and gradually increase the prices of their rentals.
short-description: GuestBox is a subscription box service for Airbnb and vacation rental hosts to welcome and delight their guests.

description: Over 10% of the US suffers from bad valves in the veins of legs and advanced vein disease, with no option for replacement. Innovein, a Y Combinator and venture-backed medical device company, addresses this unmet medical need with a minimally invasive replacement valve for veins.
short-description: Innovein is advancing vein care with a first-of-its-kind replacement valve for veins.

description: FunnelAI connects businesses with qualified prospects in real-time by scouring through social media and other social content. Our qualified prospects are people with high intent to buy a product or a service or even those seriously looking for recommendations for a particular product
short-description: Connecting businesses with their prospective customers in real-time by leveraging AI.

description: Today's highly-processed, high-carb, sugary foods are making us sick. Billions suffer from obesity and related health issues costing over $2 trillion a year. Our solution is Naturalin, a natural, low-cost, widely studied breakthrough phytonutrient that supports glucose & weight wellness and cellular function and validated at Dell Pediatric Research Institute at The University of Texas. Naturalin powder and liquid forms easily integrate into foods and beverages making everyday foods 'healthier.'
short-description: Halo's functional nutrient Naturalin, added to foods makes them better for you, more nutritious, and will significantly impact world health.

description: Construction companies still rely on pen and paper to get work done. This costs these corporations millions-billion of dollars every year. Future Sight AR provides a platform for these organizations to digitize their expert knowledge (or use our library) and create 'smart' workflows in mixed reality. This save companies time, money & churn.  The industry is experiencing a generation gap and this presents the perfect opportunity for companies to transition from analog to digital.
short-description: Digitizing the workforce to make companies more efficient with AR & VR

description: NemoCare aims to end all preventable neonatal and maternal deaths in the developing world by building innovative affordable, accessible, highly accurate monitoring solutions for the emerging markets.We use unobtrusive wireless wearable sensors and networks,analytical algorithms and big data as tools to provide continuous, high resolution monitoring and preventive care for every patient in hospital, and at home- making sure that no stone is unturned to prevent any form of mortality and morbidity
short-description: Developing affordable,accurate,continuous monitoring wearables for  distress detection and management  in neonates for  developing countries

description: We believe online shopping experience must be same as experiencing shopping in any brick-n-mortar store or experience in any mall. Consumers embrace experience.
short-description: B2B Augmented Shopping for Innovative Fashion Brands.

startupname: Living a Book - A reading experience
description: Living a Book offers a unique and immersive experience combining technology and good reading.
short-description: Living a Book gives you a unique and immersive reading experience, Books, audiobooks and VR-360 stories with multiple endings.

description: The rise of graph processing and machine learning has spawned numerous innovations that have proven useful in solving problems ranging from image recognition to customer recommendation systems.   Despite this success, modern hardware solutions are surprisingly inefficient and consume extraordinary quantities of power.  Revolution Computing's core technology is a revolutionary hardware architecture that excels at emerging graph and machine learning workloads within energy constrained environments
short-description: Revolution Computing is developing a revolutionary new processor architecture to accelerate emerging graph and machine learning applications

description: The U.S. makes up 5% of the world’s population but uses 25% of the world’s natural resources and creates 50% of the solid waste.  Loanables' mission is to reduce over-consumption by making it as easy to rent and share as it is to buy. We are the amazon of rentals. We aggregate the inventory of both rental companies and individuals onto a single platform to make it easy for everyone to find and compare rental options. Every product someone rents instead of buys helps to save the planet.
short-description: We are reducing over-consumption by making  it as easy to rent and share as it is to buy.

description: In 2015, 2.7 million liters of fluorinated anesthetic gases were released into the atmosphere from
short-description: Resthetics converts waste anesthesia into a safe, renewable resource.

description: Our team is made up of software engineers and visionaries aiming to improve the way businesses and individuals communicate through the Internet. We accomplish this by developing exceptional software running on exceptional hardware resulting in a state-of-the-art VoIP phone system.
short-description: We are a modern telecommunications service provider revolutionizing telecom with game-changing infrastructure and software.

description: ReillyWorks' motto “Play Together”, underlines everything we do. Our “Phygital' Smart Kit with unlimited Game Packs blend the physical and digital into story experiences for family fun. Story + Augmented Reality + Smart Objects + Collaboration are the four foundational components of our philosophy. We consider “People before Technology” as the sum of the equation, putting the emphasis on never letting a screen overtake the interactions in 'Phygital' storytelling and play.
short-description: ReillyWorks “Phygital' Kit with unlimited Game Packs combine Augmented Reality + Smart Objects into immersive storytelling and family fun!

description: Founded in late 2016, Toggle Health aims to dramatically reduce surgical errors by providing surgeons with a wireless-sterile-controller to access their patient data during surgery without having to leave the sterile environment. Our platform provides surgeons easy-to-use software with extensive capabilities including an option to toggle between their desired applications and device feeds in the OR; and also the ability to prepare for surgeries in great detail.
short-description: Toggle Health connects surgeon to their digital case data in the sterile field of the operating room using a sterile wireless controller.

description: NVolve is on a mission to change global home construction.  Our solution identifies four ways to reduce the cost of delivering affordable housing by 20 to 50 percent: reduce construction costs through value engineering and industrial approaches, use healthy, green, zero, sustainable and recyclable building materials,  increase operations and maintenance efficiency, and reduce financing costs for buyers and developers using our easy-to-use design, buy, build “delivery platforms.”
short-description: NVolve Technologies has developed and deployed a sustainable and repeatable blueprint for addressing the global affordable housing challenge

description: We believe in the power to transform - and we're not alone! Before we launched, we did focus groups with 300+ families in 25+ countries. These parents value travel because they believe it will shape their kids' perspective and purpose, however family travel is hard. We designed our peer-to-peer platform to meet these families' needs. Penguino uses technology to provide personalized services and products that make it easy for families to plan, pack and make the most of the travel experience.
short-description: Penguino Travel is a peer-to-peer platform empowering families go on life-changing adventures.

description: The Tiny Heights is for first-time home buyers, young professionals, and downsizers who desire modern affordable housing.The Tiny Heights paves the way to home ownership by providing a smooth transition from renting to owning.Our competitive advantage is that we provide quality tiny homes that can be paid off in 12 years or less at monthly rates similar to rent. Our residents have the opportunity to live in a unique, thriving community, and gain equity in their home.
short-description: The Tiny Heights is a tiny house community development consisting of homes under 1,000 sqft. that can be paid off in 12 years or less.

description: Ellen.ai is a chatbot that personalizes employee career development in order to help companies attract, develop, and retain more diverse talent.
short-description: Enterprise AI software for inclusive mentoring

description: Today the pharmaceutical industry relies on the in‐vitro cell‐based high-content-screening (HCS) market, worth $ 557 Million in 2017, which often misses off-target subtle phenotypes. Humanized models is a better predictive model for disease pathology, but there exist no HCS assays. To fulfill the unmet need of HCS using humanized animal models, Newormics’ first product, a microfluidic-based platform, enables fast automated phenotyping of humanized C. elegans disease models and prioritizes leads.
short-description: Newormics provides optical and micro-technologies to advance early stage drug discovery with cost effective solutions using humanized models

description: Ungrocery is a food system built on human connection. We empower producers to sell directly to consumers through a simple marketplace. Consumers can discover the people behind the products, know exactly where their food comes from, and search a database of quality producers.  We use events, technology, and experiences as mediums for people to connect with producers, and our strongest form of connection is through stories.
short-description: A food system built for people not shelves

description: There are over 100,000 government entities in the US, most serving small towns and cities. The public can have the greatest impact in local government, yet turnout in these elections is at an all-time low.
short-description: We enhance democracy through livestreaming and archiving legislative sessions, offering innovative search, share, and notification features.

description: Currently, there is no other product available which directly measures shunt function via an integrated component of the shunt system. We anticipate that the US market for Smartshunt technology will be ~140M/Yr with 5% annual growth rate.  Led by a pediatric neurosurgeon, our team also has a strong medical device industry experience. We have partnered with a FDA qualified manufacturer to further develop our prototype and launch the product and are in process of filing a provisional patent.
short-description: SmartShunt cerebrospinal fluid flow detection is a compelling and disruptive solution to a common problem in the hydrocephalus patients.

description: The Steadi-One is a lightweight & responsive glove that adaptively reduces hand tremors in Essential tremor and tremors associated with Parkinson’s disease. Its novel, battery-free ball damper uses a smart material that was designed to resist tremors while allowing voluntary motion. Steadi-One is a Class I device that allows for full range of motion, with promising results in resisting multiple tremor directions during eating, drinking, and writing.
short-description: We developed the Steadi-One - a lightweight & battery-free glove that stabilizes the wrist in Essential Tremor & Parkinson’s disease.

description: SurgePower Materials is an ecofriendly technology company that produces graphene, a specific carbon based nanomaterial used in advanced batteries, from a renewable resource at a significantly lower cost when compared with other technologies. The technology is patent pending with ownership held by our founder. Our mission is to create the finest quality graphene on the market and have our product in every battery. We intend to make enough profit to generate a significant return for our investors.
short-description: A green company that produces high quality graphene, a key nanomaterial that improves performance of batteries, from a renewable resource.

description: SkillsEngine solutions help educators teach what matters. If curriculum doesn’t connect to the world of work, neither will students. Our flagship app Calibrate brings a brand-new approach to aligning skill requirements. Using artificial intelligence and machine learning we help educators identify and validate the skills that employers want in their new hires. The result is more employable graduates with the right skills needed to succeed on the job.
short-description: SkillsEngine connects educators and employers using artificial intelligence to validate skill requirements so students are more employable.

description: ScalaMed is a secure, integrated, blockchain medication ecosystem. ScalaMed moves prescriptions electronically from a doctor directly to a patient, where the patient owns an immutable one-use-only prescription, redeemable at a pharmacy of their choice (in-person or online – creating a new online platform for medications). Through our blockchain solution, patients become the integrator of their health data - armed with an integrated source of truth. Genomic data & warnings, add outcomes value.
short-description: Blockchain solution for digitizing prescriptions, democratizing a patient's healthcare data and creating an online market for medicines.

description: Berkeley National Lab's study shows that 70% of bathers leave their shower empty after it's warm. This results in $30,000 wasted per year for the average hotel. The Shower Stream is a smart shower head adapter that installs as easy as a light bulb, saves the waste, proves the savings via web and is completely unobtrusive to the user. We currently have 5 hotel paid pilot customers with 1 $15,000 pre-order. Here is a demo video with one of our pilot customers: https://youtu.be/c97_EvQop3g.
short-description: The problem of Shower Warm-up Waste, which costs $50bn in water and energy in the U.S. annually, can be solved by installing Shower Stream.

description: Shep guides SME biz traveler bookings, captures expenses, reports over-spending & rewards compliance on consumer travel sites so that business travelers can book on their favorite sites!
short-description: Shep is a plug-n-play Chrome extension that shows employees what to book on most travel sites, tracks expenses & rewards savings.

description: Vinder is a peer-to-peer, community oriented marketplace for homegrown produce. We connect home gardeners who hate seeing their excess veggies go to waste with their neighbors who are looking to buy local produce.
short-description: Vinder is a peer-to-peer marketplace for homegrown produce. Buy/sell/trade with your community. Localizing the global food system.

description: Web2ship helps online seller to expand their business globally by helping them discover, compare and book different shipping and courier services with high discounted shipping rate and single API. You can imagine us like trivago + groupon. Instead of booking for flight or hotel, you book for parcel service. instead of print out flight itinerary, you print out the shipping label.
short-description: Web2ship.com is an elogistic gateway that connects all the courier services and online merchant with single API and low shipping rate

description: Volt480 enables factories to recover from downtime in half the time and at half the cost by utilizing a nationwide network of resources then augmenting their troubleshooting skills using machine learning.  Factories struggle to support their highly complex, specialized equipment. In many cases, they're forced to go half-way around the world looking for support. We help connect them to local, qualified engineers and technicians that can solve the problem in half the time and half the cost.
short-description: Volt480 is supercharging industrial services with the tech-forward, on-demand experience we’ve all come to expect in our daily lives.

description: Injectable opioids come in single-use vials. The entire amount is rarely administered.  A witness must certify disposal of the excess but cannot verify the substance.  Excess opioids are commonly diverted for illicit use by covertly substituting another clear fluid prior to disposal.   DivertAlert™ replaces the human witness and automatically verifies the composition, concentration and volume of each waste dose at the point of use.  Electronic record keeping ensures full traceability by dose.
short-description: Prevent opioid diversion in the hospital and reduce the compliance burden by automating drug analysis and verification at the point of care.

description: At the end of retina surgery, a gas bubble is injected into the eye to tamponade (or affix) the retina in place. To keep the gas bubble (which floats) directed against the back of the eye, patients are required to lay face-down for 1 week or more and cannot see through the gas bubble nor fly until it dissipates. We are developing a optically clear, biodegradable polymer that will remove these lifestyle burdens from patients, as well as improve surgical outcomes and reduce reoperation rates.
short-description: Pykus Therapeutics is developing a dissolvable intraocular device to make retinal surgery less painful and more successful.

description: We are transforming the livestock management industry by using technology to remove fencing and labor from farms. Our proprietary hardware and software solution significantly increase the efficiency and productivity of livestock farms. To maximize the value of a livestock farm, farmers need to optimize grass growth as well as animal headcount per acre. For millennia farmers have done this using a combination of fencing and manual labor.  We enhance our customers profits and quality of life.
short-description: Reinventing livestock management, Invisible Fence meets Fitbit for livestock. We reduce fencing and labor costs while increasing revenues.

description: Off Grid Box is a modular and compact unit that provides renewable energy and treated water in remote areas. We saw that one unit, managed by a local women co-op in a Rwandese village, impacts 2000 people providing Tier 1 electricity and sterilized water with a $0.18 per family on a Pay-As-You-Go basis (half the current spending for energy alone).
short-description: Off Grid Box is a modular and compact unit that provides renewable energy and treated water in remote areas.

description: Vena Medical makes a forward viewing imaging microcatheter to provide a real-time navigational perspective for interventional physicians. We use bleeding edge fiber optics and a saline flush to empower physicians to see inside arteries and veins during complex procedures. Our microcatheter is 1 mm in diameter because our optics are only 0.25 mm thick. This allows the Vena Microcatheter to integrate seamlessly into physician workflow to make procedures faster, easier, and safer.
short-description: Vena Medical makes a fiber optic imaging catheter that allows physicians to see inside arteries and veins during complex procedures.

description: YOUR6’s goal is to revolutionize hiring through analyzing the nature of work. We combine the past performance, and future potential of job seekers who are then compared into the opportunity available. We provide businesses an unbiased, statistically valid rank ordered candidate pool.
short-description: YOUR6's goal is to revolutionize hiring by measuring performance and potential of job candidates, and providing business a verified ranking.

description: For working parents seeking infant childcare, CozyKin is their #1 choice for trusted, personal and developmental care. We match new families based on care needs and location, seamlessly place an incredible CozyKin nanny and nurture the children from both families in one of their homes. Our Montessori development is backed by modern tools, 24/7 customer support and our 100% satisfaction guarantee. Unlike daycares, we provide superior quality of care, shorter commutes and vastly better value.
short-description: Sharing Economy for Childcare. Match with a local family and welcome a Montessori-trained nanny to your in-home nanny share.

description: Yotta Solar’s goal is to accelerate the adoption of solar+storage by providing an industry first: a micro-storage product that simplifies the addition of batteries to solar PV systems. Our solution, SolarLEAF™, will reduce the overall design and installation cost, simplify deployment, and effortlessly scale energy storage to suit a variety of applications from telecom to commercial markets.
short-description: Energy storage coupled with solar panel installations through patent-pending thermal regulated high life battery.

description: Whimmly is a next-generation chat assistant that enables eCommerce stores to have one-on-one conversations with customers. Through proprietary AI & natural language technologies, our assistant is able to quickly process an eRetailer’s catalog & answer consumer questions in real-time. By gleaning preferences & personalizing recommendations, we are able to increase engagement and improve conversion. Plus, we distill our conversational data to drive insights that inform merch & product development.
short-description: Whimmly delivers a next-generation chatbot for eCommerce stores built on personalization, deep learning and natural language generation.

description: Athletes of Valor was inspired by our CEO/founder's difficulty re-adjusting to civilian life, and realization that sports provide the support structure and camaraderie that veterans need when returning home. We are changing the trajectory of veteran's academic lives and careers by presenting unknown opportunities in college sports. The platform is free for service members with hopes to increase veterans' retention/engagement on campus and improve employment outcomes.
short-description: Providing military members the training and resources to play college sports, earn their degree, and obtain meaningful employment

description: TasteHit is a Software-as-a-Service user engagement platform for modernizing existing online shops using Artificial Intelligence. It provides online merchants with a suite of data-driven user experience tools for web, mobile and email, to increase the sales performance of their shops. TasteHit increases the shop’s conversion rate by up to 20% and is installed in minutes by any non-technical person. TasteHit's customers include niche retailers, specialized marketplaces and famous fashion brands.
short-description: Data-driven user engagement tools for online shops

description: Twiage is an advanced mobile platform that uses best-in-class security technology to put telemedicine at the fingertips of first responders to accelerate patient care in the most crucial moments. By giving hospitals a complete picture of all incoming ambulances in one central dashboard, Twiage helps hospitals efficiently manage resources, such as cath labs, operating rooms, and hospital beds, while saving lives, improving metrics, and reducing costs.
short-description: @TwiageMed brings tele-triage to first responders and ER docs w/ realtime photos, EKGs, GPS. Save time, save $$$, and save a life.

description: We are a social enterprise whose mission is to catalyze grow through solar energy.
short-description: ILUMÉXICO is a B-Corporation whose mission is to catalyze grow through solar energy in the most remote communities of Mexico.

description: In CDMX the average time spent commuting is about 2.5h and collective public transportation is perceived as unsafe, inefficient and pricey. Urbvan offers a daily commute transportation system with strategic routes and executive vans, that aims to make commuting in Mexico more efficient, secure and comfortable all through a mobile app. We have a team with experience in successful companies in Mexico working to provide a top service to our clients both technology and service wise.
short-description: Urbvan provides an efficient, secure and comfortable service service in the world's most painful city in terms of commuting.

description: Recent clinical studies proved that consistently introducing food allergens to infants before 6 months old prevents allergies by over 80% (*LEAP, EAT). The trouble is that parents find it scary, inconvenient, and stressful to introduce a range allergens regularly to their infants. We have created a convenient set of organic fruit puree pouches that contain the same amounts of allergens as the breakthrough studies, making it easy and stress-free for parents to prevent allergies.
short-description: Preventing Food Allergies in Infants

description: The Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Films and Game industries are all avid consumers of 3D animations. The development of each of those high-tech projects require extensive production times, dozens of professional animators and millions of hours of work.
short-description: Mosketch is a disruptive software that allows to quickly and easily create top quality 3D animations.

description: 100M small farmers in India LOSE money on average from agriculture, largely due to climate risk. Kheyti changes that through its 'Greenhouse-in-a-Box', a low-cost greenhouse kit bundled with services. Our greenhouse fits in 2% of a small farmer’s land, protects crops from external risks and grows 7x food using 90% less water. In addition, we work with partners to offer financing, inputs, training and market linkages, creating a seamless path towards steady incomes >$100/month and out of poverty.
short-description: Ending poverty for 1 million small farmers through the 'Greenhouse-in-a-Box', a low-cost modular greenhouse bundled with end-to-end services

description: SyncThink assesses concussion and brain performance using mobile eye tracking analytics.
short-description: SyncThink assesses concussion and brain performance using mobile eye tracking analytics.

description: Severe visual impairment results in a significant decline in mobility and independence, with a huge & growing unmet need of millions. RenewSenses conveys vision through sound to visually impaired people by combining sensory augmentation and computer vision in a wearable device. These IP-protected technologies were tested and validated in the lab of Prof. Amir Amedi at the Hebrew university (co-founder) recruiting the visual cortex of blind people and enabling a new form of sensory experience.
short-description: RenewSenses convey the visual world through sound for people who are blind and visually impaired.

description: At CareAline, we are making the next generation of line management, increasing safety, comfort and healing! Our functional, clinically effective devices keep patients safe 24 hours a day. Hospitals need us to save money, nurses need us to increase safety and efficiencies, and patients need us to LIVE comfortably and safely!
short-description: CareAline takes a proactive approach to safety for patients with PICC and CVCs. Improve outcomes, clinically effective, hospital used, DME.

description: Adolescent girls globally face many health-related challenges, including inadequate nutrition and anemia, menstruation-related taboos, mental illness, gender-based violence, and teen pregnancy. Adolescence is a critical point of intervention to prevent poor health outcomes later, as these girls are on the cusp of womanhood. Girls Health Champions aims to train adolescent girls in these critical topics and cultivate peer educators who will become health leaders in their schools and communities.
short-description: Girls Health Champions works to mitigate gender inequality and its impact on health outcomes by training teen girls as peer health educators

description: The ChemAlive platform is designed for cheaper and faster access to computed chemical data with no expertise, hardware or software barrier through a SaaS model executable by any chemist on-line. Our system brings machine learning and big data to the chemical and Pharma industry who have a need for accurate reaction metrics to design, predict and understand chemical processes.  The speed opens up new markets where interactive accurate data can be used as a sales, marketing and R&D tool.
short-description: Software driven by machine learning that allows the chemical industry to model chemistry,  improve yield and generate new chemical leads.

description: Our technology transforms carbon dioxide into impurity-free alcohol for use in consumer products. We do this using only water and sunlight as the other two inputs. At scale, we are both both more profitable and better for the environment than alcohol derived by fermentation, which we achieve while actively removing the most abundant greenhouse gas from our atmosphere.
short-description: Concord Spirits produces the cleanest and healthiest alcohols on the planet using only air, water, and sunlight.

description: Heart failure as a consequence of myocardial fibrosis is the world’s biggest killer and represents a significant unmet medical need. No therapies currently exist that either directly target the heart or the fibrotic process itself. We have discovered a heart specific regulator of fibrosis – the long noncoding RNA, Wisper. By using our first-in-class proprietary approach to target Wisper, we are able to block myocardial fibrosis and treat heart failure in pre-clinical animal models.
short-description: We are developing a first-in-class biopharmaceutical therapy to treat heart failure.

description: Totolines is a snack based on corn flour and 'chapulin' designed for customers concerned about the environment, boosting the local economy and looking to enjoy a nutritious snack. A portion of Totolines provides the same amount of protein as a portion of tuna, it has no additives and it's a sustainable source of protein. Insects are up to 12 times more efficient than cows.
short-description: Totolines is a snack made with corn, chapulin and chili, that provides a significant amount of protein coming from sustainable sources.

startupname: Infrastructure Systems Managers / Dechets a l'Or
description: Dechets a l'Or is a tech-enabled provider of infrastructure services to fast growing cities of West African. We use a proprietary database system to enable city mapping to support service delivery to households and businesses. We collect and process solid waste to produce, fertilizer, energy, and electricity. Dechets a l’Or uses technology to provide better waste collection service, our mission is to make cities cleaner places with brighter futures through professional service delivery.
short-description: Dechets a l'Or uses tech to that brings infrastructure services to African cities. We create cleaner cities with brighter futures

description: Being disabled doesn’t only inhibit a person’s ability to move but also limits their social, financial & physical independence. 6Degrees focuses on enabling independence for users with its wearable AI ‘MyMove’ that studies an individual's movements similar to how a voice-activated device “learns” a person’s voice, and alongside Bluetooth connectivity, allows users to control their electronic devices. Its 2nd generation offering, functions as a VR game, Rehabilitation centered motion tracking.
short-description: 6Degrees Tech accessibility for all

description: 3Derm is a cost-effective skin imaging system that allows any user to take clinical-quality 3D images of concerning skin lesions and upload them instantly for review by a dermatologist. We implement our technology within accountable care organizations as a triage system, allowing primary care physicians to use our handheld imager in their clinics and send images via cloud to an in-network dermatologist for review - ensuring those with alarming conditions are seen as soon as possible.
short-description: 3Derm takes 3D pictures of skin with an inexpensive handheld imager to help detect skin cancer at the earlier more treatable stages.

description: Inspired by robotics, we developed a training system that automatically changes resistance to adapt to a user's needs.  The system provides safer and more effective training than traditional equipment. Controlled through an app, the system tracks metrics and provides valuable feedback. We work with leading coaches and professional athletes to reinvent strength training for the gym and for the home.
short-description: W8X provides the most effective and engaging workouts through connected fitness equipment

description: According to the Word Health Organization up to 50% of medications worldwide are substandard or counterfeit. Veripad has created an affordable and portable solution that allows for rapid screening of medication quality. A user would simply place the medication in question onto our chemically pre-treated paper then place the paper in some water. The water then mixes the reagents with the medication to create a unique color pattern which our mobile app interprets.
short-description: Veripad has created an affordable and portable solution that allows for rapid screening of medication quality.

description: Y2Y is building a network of student run homeless shelters for young adults ages 18-24. Young adults are uniquely vulnerable on the streets due to high rates of LGBTQ identity and experience in foster care. Y2Y provides sanctuary to move guests quickly off the streets, surrounding them with resources to facilitate their pathways out of homelessness. Y2Y provides opportunities for guests and volunteers to become the next generation’s leading advocates for youth-driven solutions to homelessness.
short-description: Y2Y is interrupting cycles of homelessness for a generation of youth by providing sanctuary from the street and pathways out of homelessness

description: There is a crisis in medical imaging. Current MRI contrast agents (GBCAs) contain toxic gadolinium. GBCAs cause brain deposition of gadolinium in all patients, and pose devastating risks to renally impaired patients. Each year over 4 million very sick patients worldwide must be denied crucial diagnostic imaging, and over 30 million patients are put at risk.
short-description: Saving lives with safe gadolinium-free MRI contrast agents for all patients who need crucial medical imaging.

description: 7 out of 10 Americans will need long-term care solutions. Rates of depression in these facilities can be as high as 50%, creating a substantial physical, mental and financial burden. Depression can lead to comorbid diseases such as COPD and heart disease, with preventable care costing over $20,000 annually. We've created a virtual reality platform to offer stimulation, therapy and family/social connectivity as a preventative intervention, improving care/outcomes and reducing healthcare costs.
short-description: VR platform to provide mental stimulation, evoke happiness, and improve patient care for the elderly, lowering downstream healthcare costs.

description: Voatz enables citizens to vote in all kinds of elections or voting events via a smartphone. Past attempts at internet based voting have failed or not gone mainstream due to fundamental concerns around security, auditability and voter anonymity. With Voatz, using biometrics for security and the Blockchain for irrefutability, we are able to tackle all these challenges and significantly streamline the process of voting and identity verification.
short-description: Voatz is a mobile election voting platform, secured via smart biometrics, real time ID verification and the blockchain for irrefutability.

description: Nonspec delivers affordable, adjustable prosthetic limb kits to clinics worldwide. We mass produce easily customizable prostheses that can fit any amputation site. Our initial focus is applying our patented core technology to below knee amputees.  Our lightweight device allows the same components to be fit to an 8 and an 18 year old and expand as needed to compensate for patient growth, while maintaining comfort. The device can be fit and adjusted with minimal training and equipment.
short-description: Nonspec provides affordable, adjustable prosthetic limb kits for amputees and clinicians worldwide.

description: Built on a donation-based business model, our innovative and transformable products provide solutions for the immediate needs of displacement, while also being relevant in today’s consumer outerwear market. Our clothing is designed for on-the-go or high-risk situations; this includes wearable shelters, high-visibility jackets, among many others. ADIFF brings attention back to the original purpose of clothing, while creating aid and awareness for global displacement.
short-description: ADIFF is a humanitarian fashion brand that creates functional clothing for style and survival.

description: People with physical disabilities have little to no access to mobile devices, and thus, a majority are either unable to independently participate in society or are prevented from utilizing integrated services such as transportation schedules, mobile banking, e-commerce, home automation, etc. Our development of an input device that easily allows users to access computers and mobile devices will not only help people live independently but also facilitate higher levels of education and employment.
short-description: We're enhancing lives of people with disabilities by creating assistive tech that facilitates community inclusion & employment opportunities

description: Miracle Messages helps homeless people record short video messages to their loved ones, and delivers them via social media as a step toward reuniting families. It’s deceptively simple, and it works. To date, our mobile and web apps have reunited 42 people, 14 of whom are now in stable housing. We just received a $200K grant to implement MM at a systems level in SF, and many other cities have reached out after learning about our impact from 350+ articles. Our goal is to reunite 1M people by 2021.
short-description: Miracle Messages rebuilds social support systems for the homeless.

description: We make low cost, networked radiation detectors for federal and local security departments for detecting nuclear materials to better protect our borders and cities from nuclear threats.
short-description: Helping governments to reduce the risk of nuclear terrorism with networkable, low cost, ultra-sensitive ionizing radiation sensors.

description: Cadence is an enterprise event technology focused on helping businesses gather insights from their employees and customers while at events. Our team has been in enterprise SaaS solutions for over 15 years, specifically event-related technology. Ten months ago we set out to create the most modern, visual, accessible, and insightful event technology in the industry. Ten months later, we believe this to be true. We're looking for partners to help us bring Cadence to people's lives.
short-description: Cadence makes event management effortless helping businesses deliver unforgettable events with purpose.

description: The average person spends fifty minutes a day on Facebook, the same amount of a time spent on a typical lunch break. But ironically, 45% of people report eating lunch alone, the highest rate in over fifty years. In this paradoxical state, we are so much more connected and alone at the same time. The solution is to connect with each other, honestly, authentically, face-to-face. We provide a social-networking service that helps users find new platonic relationships, face-to-face.
short-description: We help you find new platonic relationships over a free lunch. Let us introduce you to the most interesting person you've never met.

description: Carriers (e.g., UPS, FedEx, USPS) run overlapping, redundant networks, driving the same streets & making many identical stops each day. This is driven by an outdated, static pricing model that can't price daily network conditions.
short-description: Environmentally & Financially Sustainable eCommerce Shipping

description: OtheReality's  Emotional Training Platform addresses the urgent needs of Healthcare organizations: Allowing medical staff to see, hear and feel the treatment from their patients' point of view while improving medical care and patient experience. Thus, Empathy encourages patients' recommendations and prevents bad reputation; It also supports better treatment adherence, reduces complaints and malpractice claims, and eliminates attrition and compassion fatigue.
short-description: OtheRealty is leveraging a VR-based training platform to boost empathy, diversity & inclusion while cultivating belonging and compassion.

description: Women in India have to walk miles to protect their dignity while relieving themselves. Girls usually drop-out of the school without a well-functioning toilet and similar is the story of over 800 Million Indians, mostly women. To combat this, SUKRITI has designed a smart prefab toilet cabin which depends very little on manual intervention for maintenance. It is automated for self-cleaning &  self- maintenance, consumes 90% less fresh water, treats and reuses the waste on-site, and works on solar.
short-description: To provide safe and hygienic sanitation space to 800 Million Indians, mostly women, SUKRITI has developed self-cleaning smart toilet cabin.

description: 47% of all dogs over the age of 10 will die from cancer. With current treatment options expensive and potentially leading to negative side effects, VetiVax is a novel, personalized immunotherapy that uses the animals’ own tumor cells to fight the cancer.
short-description: With 8 million companion animals diagnosed with cancer each year, VetiVax is commercializing personalized cancer immunotherapies for pets.

description: We have invented an ingenious patent-pending method for implementing a firewall type functionality into the car network. This is a unique implementation that provides the necessary Intrusion detection and prevention capabilities at the highest level. We call this the 'Stamper'
short-description: C2A provides the most reliable, easy-integrated and innovative cyber security solution for connected vehicles.

description: GooseWay, a confidential platform that helps teachers in the kindergarten to manage all the administrative and communication activities in an easy and simple way.
short-description: A confidential Arabic platform that improves the connections between parents, kids and their kindergarten teachers

description: Clidrotech developed a new system that provides solutions for the $2B/year market of 'on board scale solutions'
short-description: Clidrotech developed a new patent pending system and method that disrupts the existing $2B/year market of 'on board scale solutions'

description: UrSure Inc. aims to prevent HIV by driving adherence to the drug, PrEP. If taken daily, PrEP is 99% effective at preventing HIV infections in non-infected individuals. Nationwide, PrEP adherence is estimated between 20 and 50%, but UrSure Inc. has driven adherence to over 70% in its HIV prevention clinic in Philadelphia through its urine tests. UrSure’s urine tests are noninvasive and painless, cheaper, more accurate, and have a faster turnaround time than alternative PrEP tests.
short-description: UrSure makes medical diagnostics to protect vulnerable patients from HIV infections.

description: MoonRun is shaping the next generation of aerobic experiences, fusing a portable plug-n-play urban-running device with an endless multimedia platform straight into your living room. MoonRun will be positioned as a new indoor aerobic solution in a $5.8B market, replacing for many the cumbersome, monotonous and expensive treadmills, ellipticals and indoor cycles. We will provide developers with simple tools to further create multimedia, virtual reality and gaming worlds of fitness. www.moonrun.com
short-description: A novel suspension trainer used for aerobic workouts while wirelessly connected to generate an addictive experience via digital immersion

description: Skillist is building a better job platform for America's skilled workforce. Our platform eliminates lengthy job descriptions and cover letters. Instead, Skillist focuses on the actual skills that candidates have and that companies want, leading to better outcomes for applicants and employers alike.
short-description: Skillist connects talented job-seekers without four-year college degrees to great jobs that match their skills.

description: ReviveMed is a precision-medicine platform that leverages the data from small molecules or metabolites. ReviveMed technology, which was developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods, uniquely overcomes the difficulty of using a large set of metabolomic data, and transform these data into actionable insight. Currently, we selected a few strategic clients from leading pharma/biotech companies to provide them with drug de-risking, biomarker discovery and therapeutic solutions.
short-description: ReviveMed is a machine-learning platform, translating data from small molecules into right therapeutics for right patients

description: There are 7.4 billion unique people in the world, but why are wearables like glasses, goggles, helmets one-size-fits-all? Skelmet is providing scalable mass customized wearable products and solutions, with proprietary A.I. Fit Intelligent Design System, combining state of the art 3D scanning with 3D printing to automatically measure, design, and produce bespoke products. With no inventory or footprint, and producing minimum waste, Skelmet is truly manufacturing at the scale of one.
short-description: Skelmet is the first company to provide scalable mass customized wearable products and services, utilizing A.I., 3D scanning and 3D printing

description: Lymphatica is a medical device development company that has designed and patented LymphoDrain, a novel implantable system replacing lymphatic vessel draining function. The system is based on magnetically controlled micropumps, and it has been conceived to treat  chronic lymphedema, a common side effect of cancer therapies. Currently there is no cure for lymphedema. LymphoDrain represents the first effective solution for more than 10 million lymphedema patients in EU and United States.
short-description: Lymphatica develops a micropump-based medical device for treatment of lymphedema, a chronic, disabling side effect of anti-cancer therapies

description: Fáctico creates technology that empowers citizens and helps promote freedom of speech. We develop mobile apps designed to help journalists and citizens create geolocalized, newsworthy content. Our app Supercívicos app geolocalices videoreports made by citizens and classifies them, to create huge database to help governments and communities transform our cities. From text to video, we passionately believe that anyone has the power to tell a story and change their community using his mobile device
short-description: Factico creates tech to empower citizens & promote freedom of speech. We are creating a network of citizen journalists with Supercívicos app

description: Novel membranes (PCT, USA patent) for separating hydrogen and oxygen during hydrogen production in alkaline water electrolysers have been developed by a start-up company MEMBRASENZ GmbH. Taking into account the relevance of hydrogen as a future energy career in providing green energy supply for industrial and domestic use and mobility applications, this technology possesses the potential to contribute solving some of the future energy challenges.
short-description: R&D, production and commercialization of novel membranes used in electrolysis for the production of hydrogen, as a new energy carrier.

description: “Dilo en señas” started like a Gaming App to learn Mexican Sign Language (LSM), designed for deaf children, but that all can play; created to improve the language development of deaf children and improve communication between deaf and hearing persons. Now, we offer technological solutions to improve quality of life of deaf people in Mexico, with 4 objectives: Language, Communication, Knowledge and Inclusion. Team: Rocio (hearing), Inclusive Education PhD; and Gerardo (deaf), Technology Engineer
short-description: 'Dilo en señas' offers technological solutions to improve language development (communication and Inclusion) of deaf children in Mexico.

description: Adian increases the collaboration between corporate researchers and top academics to develop products faster. Our software platform automatically compiles information on over 40,000 faculty members from top research universities, including their financing, research themes, and contact information. We started by establishing collaborations with universities; our products helped start research projects at Harvard, MIT, Boston College, among others. Our mission is increasing research.
short-description: We match corporate researchers with top academics to develop products faster.

description: Alkemy Environmental has developed a patented technology process that recycles industrial waste streams into structural-grade lightweight concrete aggregate. We have completed the commercial pilot testing of our technology and our recycled aggregate has passed all environmental and building materials standards.
short-description: Alkemy recycles industrial waste into concrete aggregate

description: With a passion for drug design and enabled by an innovative chemistry platform, we are focusing on orphan and unmet needs in oncology.​ ​​​​​​​​Metastasis​, spread of cancer to surrounding tissues and distant organs, is responsible for 90% of cancer deaths. Medical efforts usually fail in managing metastatic disease. We tackle approaches that block metastasis by applying our expertise throughout the drug discovery process to create novel small molecules to positively impact patients' lives.
short-description: Enabled by an innovative chemistry platform, Akanocure is a drug development company with a focus on orphan and unmet needs in oncology.

description: Precision vine works with wine producers to provide and integrate remote sensing data into both winemaking and vineyard management. Using drone based platforms and an international network of operators for multi and hyperspectral imaging we offer a vineyard specific data processing service.
short-description: Precision Vine is an analytics engine for remote sensing data of vineyards- improving quality and efficiency in the wine industry

description: 10% of the world population suffers from sleep apnea. Current take-home diagnostic devices lack accuracy, reliability, or comfort, whereas the clinical overnight gold standard is costly and uncomfortable. Sleepiz is introducing the world’s first non-contact medical grade screening solution for sleep apnea. With our device, anyone to get medically tested for sleep apnea at home without having to connect any sensors or cables – you won’t even know it’s there.
short-description: We measure patient vital signs in a contact-free manner to allow for clinical grade diagnosis of sleep disorders in a home based setting

description: IMVERSE is a spin-off from EPFL developing software and providing services for photorealistic Mixed Reality content creation. Our volumetric solutions reduce the time and money spent on pre-production phases of Virtual Reality movies and Hollywood movies by a factor of 10. This is only possible thanks to our proprietary volumetric graphics engine and our easy and fast process to transform a single 360-degree photo, from any camera, into a 3D VR/MR experience with live hologram actors and VFX.
short-description: From a single 360° photo to a volumetric VR room-scale interactive movie. We are democratizing virtual and mixed reality content creation.

description: Life Science sales is really, really hard.
short-description: Acenna uses machine learning to help life science sales teams drive sales by having more meaningful conversations with qualified prospects.

description: We believe the world would be better if consumers started doing their groceries the right way. To make this vision a reality, we need to make it easy for people to eat well and smart.
short-description: Local online groceries delivered the same day. 100% non-industrial, 100% no GMO 100% never frozen food

description: Alogo Analysis SA is a Swiss incorporated company active in sports analytics. At Alogo, we aim to develop innovative statistics for equestrianism that will increase fans engagement and ultimately educate people on the sport. Alogo SHOW a unique patented system enhance fans experience in venue and raise public interest in the discipline. Alogo MOVE sensors analyze horse’s movement and will allow coaches and riders to precisely quantify their performance and thus improve their training.
short-description: Alogo Analysis SA is a Swiss incorporated company dedicated in analysing equestrian sports and provide innovative statistics.

description: Trueke is a social enterprise whose aim is to bring a different approach of traveling, where the traveller can get involved with communities, cooperate with them while acquiring new experiences and knowledge from their culture, traditions and productive processes.
short-description: Trueke offers a different way of traveling, where people can get involved with communities, cooperate with them and acquire new experiences.

description: Adhark is an image performance software company that quantifies design to elevate brand performance. The Adhark Platform uses patented artificial intelligence and machine learning technology to understand the visual preferences of consumer audiences, guide creative decision-making, and deliver brand success through enhanced imagery.
short-description: Pixels That Perform: AI company Adhark is disrupting the world in the new era of quantified design.

description: 50% of Mexicans have visual acuity problems. Yet, people roam the streets with broken glasses, outdated prescriptions, or even worse, without glasses. Why? There is a disconnection between the current offer and the huge demand. High prices, poor service, and outdated delivery to a digital generation. Our service starts with optometrists who arrive at people’s doorsteps. We offer the entire range of products, with 48hr delivery, fair prices, 9.3 NPS quality service, and an online visual profile.
short-description: LECO is on a mission to change the way Mexicans see correctly. We are an on-demand service that makes eyewear accessible.

description: Swap is a free-for-download app, available on both the App and Play Store, that allows users to pay anyone on their contact list (as long as they have a phone number or email of the person they wish to pay) using any credit or debit card. If the person receiving the payment doesn't have the app, s/he will receive a link to a page where they can enter their bank details in order to receive the money immediately.
short-description: Swap is a free-for-download mobile app that allows users to pay anyone on their contact list using any Mexican credit or debit card.

description: Autonomous Healthcare’s mission is to reduce hospital length of stay by continuous analysis of bedside monitoring data, and ultimately, introducing automation to address detected adverse events. Our goal is to revolutionize the critical care and peri-operative care industries in the same way that the autopilot revolutionized the airline industry. The technology involves clinical decision support system for real-time analysis of medical waveform data from ventilators and hemodynamic monitors.
short-description: Autonomous Healthcare's mission is to decrease intensive care unit (ICU) morbidity and mortality by automating critical care.

description: We’re addressing 2 problems with the existing baby food industry:
short-description: We are Mexico's first all natural, cold-pressured baby food company focused on native Mexican ingredients.

description: Cancer Wellness TV is a free online platform featuring videos and content dedicated to cancer integrative therapies: yoga, tai chi, exercise, meditation, nutrition, art therapy, survivorship support & many others. Now people dealing with cancer finally have access to complementary therapies from any computer, tablet or smartphone anywhere in the world. We're taking the fight to cancer beyond the hospital walls!
short-description: Free online video platform featuring cancer integrative therapies such as yoga, tai chi, meditation, nutrition & survivorship support.

description: Intercity buses usually only run between the main transportation hubs of major cities, which makes bus travel inconvenient for traveling anywhere outside the city center. However, with the recent explosion of ride-sharing services, buses no longer need to stop near public transit hubs in order to be accessible. Axle offers long-distance travelers an effortless alternative to driving by aggregating demand through our door-to-door travel booking application, then hiring buses to fill supply gaps.
short-description: Door-to-door transportation for long-distance travelers.

description: BackTracker offers a solution to the increasing problem of mislabeled or substituted seafood. It is a third party application that links government fishery landing records with seafood products giving buyers absolute confidence in the source of seafood they buy. The BackTracker technology is currently being operationalized on a big scale, in conjunction with the State of Massachusetts, largest groundfish dealer in New England, a large seafood processor and distributor and Wegmans supermarket.
short-description: BackTracker verifies seafood claims, adds value to seafood products, and helps prevent seafood fraud.

description: The all in 1 container weighing solution providing software and hardware solution for instant legislation compliance. Having a container weighed with Conweigh is as simple as booking a taxi. The platform services all customer segments with On Demand service providers carrying mobile equipment, on site equipment for customers to use themselves or Integration onto existing weighing equipment to produce compliant VGM certificates.
short-description: The all in 1 container weighing solution providing software and hardware solutions for instant legislation compliance.

description: In an age of rising antibiotic resistance, treating patients with the right antibiotic quickly can be a matter of life and death.  DZD uses novel sample prep, high throughput sequencing and machine intelligence to shorten the time it takes to identify a pathogen and predict its drug resistance profile from days to hours.  Using our diagnostic, hospitals will be able to dramatically reduce hospital length of stay, the overuse of antibiotics, and save lives cost-effectively.
short-description: DZD combines whole genome sequencing and machine learning to revolutionize infectious disease diagnosis and treatment

description: In rural Ghana, some 1.6 million cocoa farmers live in villages with very weak healthy systems and therefore face dire health challenges. This also makes them vulnerable to dangerous pandemics such as Ebola. At Cocoa360, we believe that a robust rural health system should not only treat patients, but also fundamentally prevent diseases. We have pioneered Ghana’s first rural teaching hospital; a tuition-free girls school and a hospital which are sustained by proceeds from a cocoa plantation.
short-description: Cocoa360 is a non-profit that decentralizes and fast-tracks the impact of cocoa farming in rural Ghana.

description: Our work aims to transform public opinion about charity, just as it's been reinvented on issues like seat belts, smoking, and gay marriage. We're committed to ending the “overhead myth,” the false idea that low overhead indicates high performance. Indeed, experts have uncovered major consequences when charities are discouraged from investing in talent, infrastructure, and fundraising.
short-description: Our purpose is to correct misconceptions about charity and change the way people think about changing the world.

description: Food processes require constant cleaning, but today's technology is old and causes bottlenecks, water waste, and a bad impact to our environment. We've developed a technology that simplifies cleaning in the industry to maximize its resources and reduce its impact on the environment. Phoenix is a PATENTED machine installed underneath a flat conveyor belt while the food process is running. It reduces the downtime, saves 95% of water, sanitizes and eliminates disposals. 10 units have been sold.
short-description: Technology that simplifies cleaning and sanitation in the food industry, making it more profitable and more sustainable

description: CloudBoost is a complete cloud platform which helps developers build apps in half less time by taking care of all the mundane tasks like authentication, notifications, emails, managing and scaling your database, files, and a whole lot more. Think of CloudBoost as Parse + Firebase + Algolia all combined into one.
short-description: One Complete Serverless Platform for next web. Add Storage, Real time, Search, Notifications, Auth and more with one simple API.

description: The current method of larvicide application to combat mosquito-borne illnesses in water tanks common in South America involves labor intensive distributions that are not efficient against the mosquito. LAD (Larvicide Automatic Dispenser) is an automatic device that safely delivers the optimal concentration of larvicide with minimal human intervention. Using mechanical automation, LAD saves government labor costs and maintains a safe concentration of larvicide in water storage tanks.
short-description: Our automatic larvicide dispensing device mitigates mosquito proliferation in potable water tanks common in developing nations.

description: Each year 450,000 preterm infants are born in the U.S.  Of these, 109,000 are born before 34 weeks.  The health of these infants' gut is central to their growth and brain development.  There is no standard to measure the health of a preterm infant's gut. NICUtrition makes it easy to quantify gut health, optimize treatments and personalize nutrition. We have two modules: Guidance, a dashboard to track growth and automate feeding protocols and MAGI a proprietary algorithm that measures gut health.
short-description: We are developing NICUtrition, a microbial health informatics platform to measure and monitor the gut health of preterm infants.

description: Heart failure is a growing epidemic that costs the US system $35B annually to treat. Despite best medical therapy, many patients remain severely limited by the disease. Our device opens a new treatment option for these patients by creating a pressure relief shunt in their heart which significantly improves their symptoms. This innovation keeps them on their feet and out of the hospital, saving money for payers while generating revenue for hospitals and providers.
short-description: Developing next-generation devices to lift the burden of heart failure.

description: Cellino’s goal is to enable gene therapy companies and research labs to deliver gene-editing cargo to cells with exceptional performance, which is a major challenge today.
short-description: Enabling gene editing with lasers and nanotechnology

description: ETIQUETTE the online store for renting designer wedding dresses giving brides access to thousands of options for them to try on in the privacy of their home saving up to 80% by paying a fixed rental price.
short-description: EMPOWERING WOMEN TO TAKE CONTROL OF THEIR OWN WEDDING DRESS EXPERIENCE

description: Founded by a female combat veteran, DropZone For Veterans is a digital platform that connects members of the military with the individual, organizations, and companies who want to support them.
short-description: Matching the military community with personalized, high-impact resources, benefits and opportunities

description: John’s Crazy Socks is a father-son venture inspired by co-founder John Lee Cronin, a young man with Down syndrome. We're spreading happiness through socks.
short-description: Founded by a man with Down syndrome, we show what's possible and we're 're spreading happiness through socks.

description: Epic converts building wastewater into natural soil amendments and treated water that can be reused onsite for non-potable applications like toilet flushing, irrigation, and cooling towers, which can help a building lower its water demands by up to 90% and save hundreds of thousands of dollars on water/sewer bills.
short-description: Epic CleanTec is decentralizing wastewater treatment and reuse into individual buildings or groups of buildings.

description: KinTrans is a software solution that translates sign language into voice and voice into sign language automatically without the need for sign language interpreters, pen & paper or texting. KinTrans Chat creates face-to-face conversations that allow Deaf signers and hearing speakers to communicate together effectively and effortlessly everyone in their own language at any moment.
short-description: Automating sign language interpretation

description: During an emergency, people need to contact help as quickly as possible. However, many times people don’t have enough time to reach their phone before it’s too late. invisaWear has designed and developed smart jewelry, watches and accessories that allow users to instantly contact friends, family and/or police in the event of an emergency. With the push of a button, users can send an alert message containing their GPS location to pre-configured emergency contacts.
short-description: invisaWear creates smart jewelry that allow users to instantly contact friends, family and/or police in the event of an emergency.

description: Cervical cancer is highly preventable and easily cured if detected early, but less than 5% of women in the developing world have access to screening. At JaneDx, we’ve developed an easy-to-use, low-cost test for the detection of HPV. Our technology enables minimally trained health workers to test women in remote settings and provide results in less than one hour, eliminating the need for laboratory or transportation infrastructure and revolutionizing HPV screening in the developing world.
short-description: JaneDx offers an innovative low-cost, accurate, rapid, and easy-to-use HPV diagnostic chip for early detection of cervical cancer.

description: IntuiTap is eliminating the guesswork, frustration, and pain from the nearly 13M spinal punctures performed in the US each year. Their handheld device integrates real-time imaging with needle guidance to overcome the challenges of these traditionally blind procedures and help physicians access the spinal canal in less time and with fewer attempts.
short-description: IntuiTap's handheld device eliminates the guesswork, frustration, and pain from diagnostic and therapeutic spinal punctures.

description: For the last 2 years, we have been developing a virtual reality IFE system and content platform focused on the airline industry. We strongly believe that virtual reality will play a crucial role in the future of inflight entertainment. However, generic VR content will not be suitable for a safe and frictionless use on board of aircrafts. For this reason, we are developing together with Airbus the standards of how VR can be safely consumed in a cabin, thereby solving the content bottleneck.
short-description: We are the VR Solution Provider for the Aviation Industry, making VR consumption safe on board of airplanes.

description: The widespread irreproducibility in biomedical science is making scientific ‘experts’ obsolete. Hive leverages an innovative model to extract information from the scientific literature on a large-scale while providing confidence metrics that directly assess reproducibility of scientific findings. Hive offers business development executives, venture capitalists, and researchers the extraordinary ability to develop their expertise on any topic in biomedicine within a short period of time.
short-description: Most of scientific research is irreproducible. Hive develops objective confidence metrics to assess robustness of scientific observations.

description: For disadvantaged undergrads* trying to secure an internship/job, Frank is an instant messenger coach offering personalized, step-by-step guidance on how to navigate the job search. Unlike career offices or coaches that are not available on-demand or forums that are incomplete/confusing, Frank offers personalized, no-judgment support in real-time, anytime
short-description: Frank is a personal online career coach that helps disadvantaged students navigate the job search one step at a time. Founder: Gorick Ng.

description: Bystanders can be an invaluable resource in emergencies, but current products are limited to call stations and AEDs. Few technological solutions exist to empower bystanders. GEMS will provide remotely un-lockable stations with life-saving supplies such as naloxone, EpiPens, and hemorrhage control products. In an emergency, a bystander will call 911 dispatch; the dispatcher can then direct the caller to a station and walk them through the steps to help save the victim’s life before EMS arrival.
short-description: GEMS makes tech-enabled stations that provide high-reliability access to life-saving medications and supplies when every second counts.

description: Giaran is an artificial intelligence powered technical fashion company. We want to provide customers a smarter shopping experience with photo realistic, color precise, personalized virtual makeup try-on wherever they are, in store or on-the-go. Giaran not only provides users with products customized to individual face features but also takes into consideration external lighting and environmental conditions, while also having the capability to simulate various desired lighting scenarios.
short-description: Giaran is an instant, interactive and personal virtual makeup robot that provides you personalized makeup products and makeup looks.

description: General Biotechnologies sources and develops promising discoveries from tech transfer offices.
short-description: General Biotechnologies accelerates the rate at which biology becomes biotechnology by developing undervalued assets from tech transfer.

description: Finnest is a mobile based education platform that a allows parents to teach their kids good money habits. Finnest combines a FDIC insured debit card account with top in class parental controls and behavior affecting components to effectively teach kids between 8-18 earning, saving, spending and investing money.
short-description: Finnest is a mobile app and debit card for school kids that teaches financial responsibility through early relevant money experience

description: MathodiX evaluates student skills and understanding in Math. The assessment is based upon the student full solution to open-response questions. Our unique algorithm automatically checks and analyses every step of the student answer, unlike any other platform in the market that assess only by the final answer. The student receives a personal and detailed feedback about his performance and how to improve it. The teacher receives a full class analysis with typical mistakes of his students.
short-description: MathodiX evaluates Math skills and understanding in real time, by a platform that checks and assess each step of the student solution.

description: We remove barriers to mental health care such as stigma, cost, and accessibility for patients while scaling up today's overburdened providers. Patients can text into a moderated support group anonymously from anywhere, at any time. Providers manage this access with AI algorithms that run on patient texts, and automatically track patients, detect complications, and focus provider efforts in real time.
short-description: Text-based support groups + NLP to help those with Substance Use Conditions.

description: Health devices made by frontline hospital staff & patients represent an est. $500mil of undocumented value for hospitals & systems. They are made in shadows of supply closets, bedsides & homes. At MakerHealth we bring prototyping tools to the point of care through a connected network of hospital makerspaces. Our tools allow staff to invent, our software helps hospitals track impact of these frontline innovators & our community gives health makers a platform to share DIY health devices globally.
short-description: MakerHealth builds the tools and hospital makerspaces to support a global community of health device makers

description: nesterly is a digital marketplace that helps older householders with spare bedrooms connect with young people willing to exchange help around the house for cheaper rent. For example, a grad student could rent from empty-nesters for a reduced rate in exchange for cooking dinner once a week. The platform facilitates connections across generations and social networks through beautiful design, intuitive interfaces, and most importantly, our proprietary negotiation and relationship management tools.
short-description: nesterly is a digital marketplace that helps older homeowners rent their spare rooms to young people in exchange for help around the house

description: A biomedical technology company innovating implantable devices to…
short-description: A biomedical technology company innovating implantable nerve interface devices.

description: Lithio Storage is working on fabricating the next generation of flexible, self-healing, longer lasting batteries containing our laboratory-optimized gel electrolyte. Our gel-based battery is safer, cost-effective, scaleable, and can last up to 2 or 3 times as long as current batteries. The Lithio battery aims to meet the demands of energy storage for current and future technologies, which includes renewable energy systems and wearable electronics.
short-description: Lithio Storage is developing durable, enhanced lifetime, non-flammable batteries for grid-scale storage systems.

description: The biggest obstacle to successful content marketing isn't a lack of time, talent or budget. It's a lack of original content ideas. So what if the top freelance writers in your industry sent personalized content ideas for free? See where this is going?
short-description: A content creation platform where brands receive unique content ideas from the world's top freelance writers.

description: MUVIN enterprise proudly presents SNOWLITE, FULLY DISPOSABLE ORGANIC-MINERAL-MAT that dissolves 5 or more inches of snow over 50 sq. ft. with NO SHOVELING & NO CLEANUP AFTERWARD.  [SNOW MELTING POWER: 5” of snow at 30°F, 10” at 15°F, 20”at 0°F]
short-description: SNOWLITE: FULLY DISPOSABLE ORGANIC-MINERAL-MAT that dissolves 5 or more inches of snow over 50 sq. ft. with NO SHOVELING & NO CLEANUP.

description: Mycroft is the open alternative to Siri, Alexa, Assistant, Cortana and Jarvis. Our advantage? We are open. Mycroft inhabits the same segment of the voice assistant market that Android occupies in the mobile OS market or Wordpress occupies in the content management market. Today, companies use Nuance, Alexa or Hound, but these are imperfect(Nuance), don't protect corporate secrets(Alexa) and are proprietary(Hound). There is room for an open alt and Mycroft is the voice assistant for that market.
short-description: Mycroft is creating an open source artificial intelligence that runs anywhere and interacts like a person

description: myKidzDay, is a high impact, high growth and disruptive company, with over 30,000 active users and 160 paying daycares in 35 states. myKidzday is a mobile app to help daycare providers enhance parent communication & meet state regs for record keeping. It attracts millennial parents, boosts profits while reducing staff time & printing cost. Parents love secure real time updates, pictures, reminders to stay “Informed Included & Reassured”. Potential market is 832K centers serving 17 million kids
short-description: MyKidzDay- app to help daycares communicate with parents, attract families, boosts profits, meet regulations & reduce cost. 25K active users

description: Lanugo is a multimedia entertainment company for the underserved Latino preschool market. Through animated videos, digital apps, publishing, and live shows we connect children to the Latino culture and promote the Spanish language. Because although Latino children represent 26% of children 5 and under, only 1% of entertainment properties are culturally relevant to them & we truly believe that kids need to know where they come from in order to be confident about where they are going.
short-description: A multimedia children's entertainment company focused on the underserved Latino preschool market.

description: Minus the Moo is a premium, lactose-free ice cream made from real dairy and all the same ingredients as regular ice cream. We use the lactase enzyme to break down the lactose and make our ice cream lactose-free! Two-thirds of the population suffers from lactose-intolerance to some degree and either has to sacrifice taste and texture by eating dairy alternatives or eat regular ice cream and suffer the consequences.
