No lactose-free ice cream has offered the same creaminess and quality, until now!
short-description: Minus the Moo is a premium ice cream using all the same ingredients of traditional ice cream, with lactase enzyme to make it lactose-free!

description: We take the worry out of giving kids a smartphone despite the dangers, and help parents have conversations before there are consequences.
short-description: Take the worry out of giving kids a phone with an app for parents that analyzes what kids do and lets parents know when to be concerned.

description: We are a sports technology company that has developed a software platform called, MentalRep to revolutionize how football teams practice. With our software, we help football teams win and improve player safety by making the game it virtual. Unlike standard film, MentalRep allows a team to not only watch but actually practice their plays anywhere on a mobile device or desktop. It also gives the athlete real-time coaching feedback like a coach in your pocket.
short-description: MentalRep makes athletic practice safer and more efficient by making it virtual.

description: Kulisha works with food and beverage companies to convert organic waste into a sustainable, insect protein for animal feeds. The insects metabolize organic waste and are sold as a high-protein input for animal feeds. This solution addresses two key problems: it reduces the amount of waste going to landfill, and it provides a sustainable alternative to fishmeal. With over 90% of our ocean ecosystems overfished, there is an urgent need to find an alternative to fishmeal for animal feed.
short-description: Kulisha works with food and beverage companies to convert organic waste into a sustainable, insect protein for animal feeds.

description: KRAM Wellness' teen founders developed FLEXFIT, an 8th generation tool that incorporates static stretching, massage and trigger point into one device. Inspired by a winning STEM project, flexibility improvements have been proven by a clinical study with The Micheli Center. $60K of Kickstarter pledges from around the world have validated our concept. FLEXFIT's patent pending design not only supports injury prevention and recovery but is also proudly assembled by individuals with disabilities.
short-description: Keep moving with FLEXFIT, an innovative wellness solution. Teen developed. Clinically proven. Assembled by individuals with disabilities.

description: Our mission is to help military community (transitioning servicemembers, veterans, and military spouses) learn software development, enter the tech industry, and code the future! We do this through mentorship, scholarship programs, and community outreach near military bases. Past and present Army, Navy, Marines, Air Force, and Coast Guard service members, veterans and military spouses are welcome to apply to our programs.
short-description: Helping the military community learn software development, enter the tech industry, and code the future.

description: Kréyol is a high end women's fashion brand whose ultimate goal is to utilize fashion as a catalyst for change with job creation for poor & disenfranchised women in the U.S., & eventually in my homeland of Haiti. We have created a movement focusing on women who love fashion & aim to stand out, with a goal to empower them to be their best self. We believe that we are our sister's keeper. So when a customer purchases a Kréyol garment, they are directly affecting the sustainability of another woman.
short-description: Kréyol is a woman’s high-end fashion brand that aims to impact the world one garment at a time.

description: Orai uses latest advancements in AI to give users instantaneous actionable insights. In basic terms, our cool team created an even cooler code that analyzes your voice, picks up on filler words like um, tells you if youarespeakingtoofast… or.too.slow and provides you a transcript of what you just said - which highlights your varying tone projection… or lack thereof.
short-description: Orai is a mobile-based leadership development solution that brings personalized, communication coaching to employees at all levels.

description: At Oomf, we’ve built an extensible cloud platform that allows any thing to be located and shared.  We partner with manufacturers who integrate their products into our platform.  We then distribute their products to locations where sharing makes sense and we find a sponsor who makes the temporary use of that product low- or no-cost to the consumer.
short-description: Oomf is a cloud-software platform that enables the sharing economy – one thing at a time.

description: Drug-resistant infections have become a public health crisis. We are at the precipice of the post-antibiotic era, where routine surgeries and standard in-patient care present unacceptable risk.  Octagon has developed a novel approach to antibiotic discovery, which utilizes bacterial metabolism as a therapeutic target.  Our lead development candidates, which show no effect in standard industry screens, have been shown safe and highly effective in animal models. This is a critical medical need.
short-description: Octagon has developed a novel drug discovery technology and identified medicines that are effective against resistant bacterial superbugs.

description: Nvstr ('Investor') is reimagining stock investing by making intelligent investing a simple, enjoyable, engaging experience for everyone. Our platform helps you answer two of the hardest, yet most fundamental, questions in personal investing: “What should I invest in?” and “How much should I invest?” Find ideas from trusted friends as well as top experts, and let our effortless, data-driven process assist in building your custom, optimized portfolio. In private beta.
short-description: Intelligent investing is easier than you think - if you have the right process.  Nvstr makes data-driven investing social and enjoyable.

description: OYU is a youth led non-profit organization that strives to increase youth engagement in community centers and youth programs across Boston. There are numerous resources in our community but it is difficult to find updated and current information about the activities at each community center. OCC Youth Unleashed solves this problem by creating a user-friendly mobile application with information from each center, as well as hosting youth engagement opportunities.
short-description: OYU increases community engagement by connecting youth to local resources, events, and opportunities, empowering them to get involved.

description: We revolutionize modern playground equipment's capacity for education, energy efficiency, and entertainment.  Our products harness children's mechanical energy and convert it into electricity in the form of lights and sounds.  This real time feedback reflects the amount of energy generated, creating an interactive and engaging atmosphere.  We give children a chance to gain an intuitive sense of their relationship with energy, while increasing the playground's ability to entertain.
short-description: Playground structures that convert children's mechanical energy into electricity, creating an interactive and fun learning experience.

description: Power Assist Solutions is dedicated to reducing fatigue and injury in hospital caregivers by improving patient transport in hospital and healthcare settings. Our design features an affordable and detachable motorized device that can be easily affixed to the sides of wheelchairs, reducing human effort input and improving wheelchair mobility. This works to reduce nursing injury rates, while helping hospitals lower healthcare costs.
short-description: Power Assist Solutions is dedicated to reducing fatigue and injury in hospital caregivers by improving patient transportation in hospitals.

description: Today's cloud-based email security solutions (such as Proofpoint, Mimecast, Cisco, Barracuda) protect against most attacks. However, reports indicate these solutions have a 15% failure rate. The only solution available today to prevent phishing is employee training. Sadly, 25% of employees still end up clicking on phishing links in spite of regular training. Pixm is the world's first on-device phishing prevention to eliminate human error and shut down attacks at the point of click.
short-description: Pixm is the world's first on-device phishing prevention to eliminate human error and shut down phishing attacks at the point of click.

description: Most chronic conditions are either caused or exacerbated by poor diet, yet for the 60% of adults, access to clinical nutrition experts is a major barrier to care. Clinical nutrition has been used in healthcare settings for decades and has been shown to improve outcomes and reduce cost for over 50 conditions such as heart failure, diabetes, and cystic fibrosis. Nutrimedy improves the outdated care delivery model to provide the intervention, education, and monitoring right at their fingertips.
short-description: Nutrimedy is redefining access to clinical nutrition care for high-risk populations through automation and AI.

description: At NU-RISE we are improving breast and prostate cancer treatments by providing the first in-vivo and real-time dosimeter suitable for radiation therapy. Currently these treatments are performed without proper validation and monitoring tools. At NU-RISE we want to change this.
short-description: NU-RISE is innovating radiation therapy by providing the first in-vivo and real-time dosimeter.

description: PetsEmpower arranges temporary pet fostering for people in crisis in Massachusetts and Rhode Island. From domestic violence survivors transitioning into shelters, to seniors admitted to hospitals, to addicts entering treatment, there are thousands of people in crisis in Massachusetts and Rhode Island who face the real possibility of losing their pets.  We give these pet-owners unable to provide a safe home for their pets a way to seek help--and hope--without fear of losing their companions.
short-description: PetsEmpower arranges temporary pet fostering for people in crisis in Massachusetts and Rhode Island.

description: At Perseus, we simplify everyday tasks by creating hardware and software for smart surfaces. We make surfaces such as walls, desks, mirrors, smart. Our flagship product is the Perseus Mirror, a smart, interactive, voice activated mirror that helps users feel confident and empowered through delivery of actionable chunks of information when they need it most. Perseus strives to unlock the potential of the smart home ecosystem for both consumers and retailers.
short-description: We makes surfaces smart. Our flagship product is the Perseus Smart Mirror.

description: OZÉ is a business insights platform for Africa’s 70M small-and-growing businesses. It collects transaction data at the point-of-sale through mobile phones and then analyzes it to deliver time and location sensitive, data-driven recommendations. We use design-led methodologies to build trust into the platform, working with entrepreneurs from inception to investment-ready, making the African SME sector attractive, accessible and transparent to investors for the first time.
short-description: OZÉ is a business insights engine in the pocket of every African entrepreneur.

description: Peroxygen Systems is a clean chemistry company developing breakthrough technology for on-site hydrogen peroxide production. We are working toward fundamentally disrupting the existing manufacturing and distribution model for hydrogen peroxide. Our electrolyzer can reduce the cost of producing hydrogen peroxide by over 50%, while also completely eliminating the cost and safety issues associated with shipping and handling of high concentration hydrogen peroxide.
short-description: We produce hydrogen peroxide on-site at half the cost of conventional methods.

description: Developed from personal experience in the hospital, Resilience Gives is a fundraising and crowdsupporting platform for patients, survivors, and loved ones transforming their personal experience into tangible impact. Working directly with patients and their support network in the thick of treatment, resilience gives consolidates emotional support into digestible yet powerful mental support. As patients advance in their treatment journey, they can launch individual fundraising campaigns funding re
short-description: Product based peer to peer fundraising for patients, survivors, and loved ones.

description: Props Athletics is focused on creating unique lines of athletic products that are all about FITNESS, FASHION & FUNCTION. PROPS gloves, our signature product, double as a sweatband, allowing you to wipe and wick away sweat while remaining completely odor free. The superior silicone grip prevents sliding on any surface, protects against calluses and minimizes germ transfer without any added bulk. PROPS help you go harder in any workout, without compromising style. It's all about being active!
short-description: PROPS focuses on innovative design to create performance-enhancing products & equipment that encourage healthy and active lifestyles!

description: Most companies lose 25% of their customers every year. Utilizing machine learning algorithms built at MIT, Relativity6 uncovers hidden opportunities within company databases. We can predict with above an 80% accuracy rate, which high potential lapsed customers has a propensity to make a re-purchase.
short-description: Utilizing our proprietary machine learning algorithms we reactivate lapsed customers

description: State of Place is a predictive analytics software that quantifies what people love about places - based on over 290 urban design features collected for every block - and why it makes economic sense to make them better. We help cities and developers make the case for great places by literally calculating the ROI of making places more walkable and livable - so they can quell naysayers, get approvals, and secure funding, faster and affordably than hiring consultants.
short-description: State of Place is Moneyballing city-making: Our predictive analytics helps make great places, good for the heart, planet, and wallet.

description: Reia's first product is a fully redesigned pessary, a non-surgical device used to treat pelvic organ prolapse. Prolapse, a little known yet common condition, has been estimated to affect 50% of women over the age of 55 to varying degrees. While current pessaries are painful or impossible to insert and remove independently, Reia’s design enables today's women to manage their pessaries themselves, with comfort and confidence, so they can get support when they need it.
short-description: Reia is building a suite of women's health products by updating lesser-known, yet widely used devices to suit the needs of the modern woman.

description: Our first dental device makes any dental treatment faster, more comfortable and safer. It improves the patient and dentist experience by improving the treatment area accessibility. This is done by achieving tooth quadrant isolation that at the same time provides high moisture control.
short-description: Purple Dental improves dentistry using patient centered design. Our new device that improves the dental experience for the patient & dentist

description: Strayos is a visual AI platform for Mining, Earthwork and Infrastructure operations to reduce cost, improve productivity and safety by providing highly accurate sub surface data analytics. Strayos proprietary SaaS platform increases mining company ROIs, by automating complex tasks, directly reducing overhead and enabling enterprises to make actionable decisions using aerial images and sensor data.
short-description: Strayos helps Mining operations understand the sub surface information and rock better for accurate mineral extraction

description: In Sleepbox we are creating a unique hotel technology and brand, that disrupts the hotel industry by unlocking new, unique locations and opportunities. Sleepbox is a compact modular hotel room, that can be installed everywhere, including airports, offices, and hospitals for an hourly or overnight stay. We created a turn-key solution that allows our partners to easily open a hotel anywhere people need it. We make privacy and rest truly accessible for travelers.
short-description: Using modular stand-alone hotel rooms, Sleepbox creates a new type of technology-driven micro-hotel for millennial travelers.

description: Skyven's distributed solution for process heat enables developing nations to leapfrog natural gas distribution infrastructure.  We reduce cost and improve availability of process heat for commercial and industrial customers (e.g. food processing plants).  Our proprietary Intelligent Mirror Array (IMA) technology harvests high-temperature heat from the sun, displacing expensive petroleum fuel in customers’ boilers.
short-description: Skyven's distributed solution for process heat enables developing nations to leapfrog natural gas distribution infrastructure

description: Existing patient nurse communication technologies provide limited options for patients, staff, and lack data driven capabilities for administrators which are costing healthcare facilities up to $4B through avoidable costs and cuts in reimbursements.
short-description: RistCall helps hospitals and nursing facilities to provide better patient nurse communication using smart watches.

description: ScholarJet believes in helping students be successful by enabling them to pay for college through action-based scholarships, where instead of writing essays, students can paint, code, dance, volunteer or even build robots for their scholarships.
short-description: ScholarJet is a platform that revolutionizes the scholarship process. Instead of writing essays, students perform enriching challenges.

description: Roots Studio digitizes art from rural villages and transforms them into high-end and storied products, eliminating the burden of a costly supply chain. In 2 years, we have worked with hundreds of tribal artists across 4 states in India.  Through our design hubs, we enable artwork to be uploaded and discovered by retail markets that appreciate culturally authentic designs. Our vision is to build a world in which artists can financially sustain their livelihoods while keeping their roots alive.
short-description: RootsStudio.co digitizes art from rural villages and creates galleries for office spaces.

description: We want to keep people out of the hospital by preventing disease using vaccines and immunity enhancing therapeutics.  Our patented delivery system is differentiated because it’s non-toxic, economical to make and easy to purify. We are seeking funding to complete a clinical trial for our lead influenza vaccine candidate and to test our technology in other diseases. There are many opportunities to apply our platform technology in infectious diseases, allergy and cancer.
short-description: Versatope Therapeutics is a biotechnology company solving problems in therapeutic delivery and vaccine potency.

description: Upstream measures and monitors irrigation over vast geographic areas with field level precision by combining a range of satellite and meteorological data sources. By quantifying water usage, our technology will promote efficient water markets, empower environmental conservation, and reward farmers who produce more food with less water.
short-description: Upstream Tech monitors and measures freshwater resources from space with machine learning and satellite imagery

description: Biopharmaceutical companies developing T cell therapies can experience two pain points:
short-description: Structured Immunity is protein engineering company helping pharmaceutical companies to develop safer, more effective T cell therapies.

description: TeleLingo is on a mission to save drivers’ lives by offering attention and risk management to fleet managers, insurers and ride sharing companies. LingoFit is an AI CoPilot using Machine Vision and biosensor data to prevent accidents caused by impaired driving due to distraction, fatigue, stress, drowsiness or medical conditions. LingoFit combines head pose and eye gaze tracking with wearable biosensor technology to provide the driver with real time warnings of potentially dangerous conditions.
short-description: Machine Vision powered AI CoPilot to prevent distracted and drowsy driving for fleet managers, insurers and ride sharing companies.

description: TailorMed is an innovative financial management platform for chronically ill patients. Our mission is to help patients reduce their out-of-pocket costs, and decrease uncompensated care for hospitals.
short-description: TailorMed is an innovative financial management platform for chronically ill patients

description: Vox Pop Labs is a social enterprise operated by a team of social and statistical scientists that leverages advances in artificial intelligence to inform and give voice to citizens. Its signature initiative, Vote Compass, is a wildly popular, award-winning application that has been used by millions of people worldwide. Vote Compass has consistently proven to be a unique catalyst for democratic participation, with independent studies having demonstrated its positive effect on voter turnout.
short-description: Vox Pop Labs uses advancements in artificial intelligence to create online spaces which foster civic engagement and democratic citizenship.

description: I am a vascular surgeon and every day I see new patients suffering from, “I have a hole in my leg and it just won’t heal.”  Leg wound treatment is prolonged and healing takes many months and tens or even hundreds of healthcare visits for dressing changes.  Unfortunately, the appointments for wound dressing changes are often scheduled based on routine rather than objective data.  SuraMedical is the only  company building a wearable which will remotely monitor the status of these dressings.
short-description: Taking the guesswork out of chronic leg wound care

description: What readers of poetry crave is new connection through creativity and understanding. Trubadour, a card game like Apples-to-Apples for poetry, helps readers feel confident exploring and discussing poems: with theme and technique cards, players make timed arguments, and competition propels debate. Trubadour enables teachers, students, and poetry lovers of all ages to have fun in the combination of creative writing and critical thinking, while encouraging team teaching, community, and empathy.
short-description: Trubadour gamifies poetry reading and comprehension for interactive, discussion-based engagement, education, and experiences.

description: Hi, my name is Matthew. I am 13 and the founder of Treasure Socks. I am one of 6 million kids who have a life threatening food allergy. I need to carry my allergy medicine every time I leave my house.
short-description: Treasure Socks are socks with an enclosed pocket that can hold kid's treasures such as medicine, retainer, mouth guard, ID or money.

description: We are building technology that enables two people, anywhere in the world, to send money to each other instantly and at very low costs.  Utilizing digital currency, we are able to provide users with a platform to send cheaper cross-border remittances than any option currently available, and due to the way our software is designed, we're able to do so with much less regulatory overhead than traditional remittance / peer to peer payment services.
short-description: Enabling global, cheap peer-to-peer payments.

description: Bringing Augmented Reality to Surgery and High-Precision Tasks.
short-description: High-Precision Augmented Reality

description: Wunder is a reusable underwear for women with urinary incontinence, an issue impacting quality of life of women of all ages, but especially the 65+ population. Sales of adult incontinence products are forecasted to increase to $2.7 billion by 2020, but current solutions are unreliable and wasteful.
short-description: Wunder empowers women to lead active lives through a sustainable and reliable solution to incontinence.

description: Striga, a parasitic weed, is the worst pest threat in African food security - rampant in 18 countries and reducing farmer's staple crop yields by 20-100%. Because 85% of smallholder farmers are women, Striga is a gender-based food security issue. FoxyT14, an innovative biocontrol technology, uses 3 strains of host-specific fungus to kill Striga. Grown on toothpicks, FoxyT14 strains are inexpensively delivered to farmers to make a highly effective on-farm inoculum (50% yield increase).
short-description: The Toothpick Project uses an effective, safe bio-herbicide to kill Striga, a weed depleting crops on 40 million African smallholder farms.

description: We fight against the massified production. Each person is unique and deserves original things!
short-description: We make jewelry with the waves of your voice.

description: Waypoint is an award-winning company launched out of MIT and Harvard. We are building a platform that allows businesses to easily create, edit, and deploy augmented reality applications without needing AR developers or expertise. From enabling biotech labs to develop AR-powered SOPs to improve quality and compliance to enabling manufacturers to quickly create and distribute AR-enabled service manuals and product documentation, we are making powerful AR capabilities accessible to all industries.
short-description: Waypoint lets businesses easily create and deploy AR applications to help them solve real problems without needing AR expertise.

description: Household shopping creates 60% of global emissions and 94% of U.S. drinking water contain microplastics. 40% of Americans want to shop in a healthier and more responsibly.
short-description: An online marketplace to shop based on product certifications and values. Our fulfillment system reduces the environmental impact.

description: Many refugees in the current crisis are highly skilled, having completed high school and some college before the crisis.  However, due to legal restrictions, they can’t work and are likely to seek income in dangerous illegal markets or possibly re-enter the conflict.  WorkAround provides transitional employment to high-risk youth by connecting them with online microtasking opportunities that don’t require a work visa and offer payment alternatives to traditional banking that many lack access to.
short-description: WorkAround is an online platform that connects companies with displaced people to deliver online micro tasks such as data entry services.

description: WavePost is not only a powerful video collaboration and review tool, but is also leading the charge in 360 video and VR collaboration.  It was built by post production professionals to meet their needs. It's fast, powerful, and saves hours out of your day. Upload videos, share with your clients, receive comments, and publish the final video. Post production has never been so seamless.
short-description: Video collaboration made easy, for your team and clients.

description: We are a behavioral modification platform for individuals struggling with opioid addiction.
short-description: We are a behavioral modification platform for individuals struggling with opioid addiction.

description: HRT helps hospitals reduce readmissions and avoid penalties with a post-discharge patient monitoring and advocacy service called FollowApp.
short-description: HRT helps hospitals reduce readmissions and avoid penalties with a post-discharge patient monitoring and advocacy service called FollowApp.

description: Herald is on a mission to make healthcare safer by offering clinicians real­time access to clinical data exactly when and how they want it.
short-description: Herald is on a mission to make healthcare safer by offering clinicians real­time access to clinical data exactly when and how they want it.

description: Emerald is a WiFi-like box that analyzes ambient wireless signals to monitor health metrics such as gait, mobility, breathing and heart rate
short-description: Emerald is a WiFi-like box that analyzes ambient wireless signals to monitor health metrics such as gait, mobility, breathing and heart rate

description: Healthimation brings highly effective population health solutions to life for chronic diseases. We marry evidence based programs with highly engaging Hollywood grade animation in an easy & fun mobile format. Digital transformation enables scalability, accessibility, affordability & engagement essentially reshaping the patient-provider relationship and health care delivery. We are addressing the first unmet need of patients with diabetes: Self-management via our flagship program Why WAIT.
short-description: Healthimation brings the world’s most effective diabetes management program to mobile devices in a cost effective, engaging and fun format

description: The EDI Institute improves health outcomes by helping people express thoughts and experiences through imagery created on mobile devices.
short-description: The EDI Institute improves health outcomes by helping people express thoughts and experiences through imagery created on mobile devices.

description: ConquerX’s mission is to make early cancer detection simpler and accessible to all. To achieve this mission, our team believe that it takes a combination of innovation both in technology and in the perspective through which we see this old problem. We create Metachip, a pan-cancer test able to differentiate cancer cells from healthy cells using affordable molecular profiling. The Metachip’s core technology is a biosensor able to perform rapid and simultaneous molecular profiling of multiple biom
short-description: ConquerX makes early cancer detection simpler and accessible to all with a pan-cancer test powered by electrochemical biosensor technology

description: THINKMD developed a digital platform that delivers physician-like diagnostic and treatment plans that can be used by anyone, anywhere.
short-description: THINKMD developed a digital platform that delivers physician-like diagnostic and treatment plans that can be used by anyone, anywhere.

short-description: The modern API for healthcare. Redox is the bridge from health systems to the cloud and back

description: With ACT.md everyone caring for patients with complex health and social needs can act together to make health happen, wherever they are.
short-description: With ACT.md everyone caring for patients with complex health and social needs can act together to make health happen, wherever they are.

description: Spring helps patients find relief faster by matching them to the right treatment using AI.
short-description: Spring helps patients find relief faster by matching them to the right treatment using AI.

description: Remedy protects people from medical bill errors and overcharges.
short-description: Remedy protects people from medical bill errors and overcharges.

description: A stroke occurs every 40 seconds in the US. 85% of victims survive, but with vision, speech, memory and functional disabilities. 90% of a patient’s rehabilitation occurs in the first year, post-event. When repeated like physical therapy in this crucial period, electrical brain stimulation (tDCS) has been shown to accelerate recovery and enhance long-term patient functionality. NE makes this treatment accessible to all in need with an easy-to-use stimulation device connected wireless to the cloud
short-description: NE uses non-invasive brain stimulation to expedite stroke recovery & enhance patient functionality post-event.

description: CareThread clinical workflow software reduces the clerical burden for hospital care teams by eliminating barriers to quick, concise and actionable communication about patient care. Using EMR-integrated cloud-based push technology, CareThread enables real-time mobile/web access to patient-specific chat threads, dynamic care team rosters, intelligent routing of clinical information and clinical workflow automation across the continuum of care. We make it effortless for care teams to communicate.
short-description: CareThread's clinical workflow automation platform reduces administrative burden for care teams using EMR-integrated mobile technology.

description: Conventional troponin tests are not sensitive enough and require multiple tests over 12 hours to detect heart attack, and are not portable for use outside of the hospital. Mobiosense has developed HERO, a portable, high sensitivity troponin test that allows hospitals to rule in/out heart attack in just 3 hours, and allows for use in ambulances to begin the diagnostic protocol at the patient's side immediately, greatly reducing ER overcrowding and directing patients to the correct path of care.
short-description: HERO detects heart attack with high-sensitivity Troponin, providing instant & affordable disease monitoring, anywhere, anytime.

description: Neopenda is a social enterprise dedicated to advancing newborn health in low resource settings through innovative technology solutions.
short-description: Neopenda is a social enterprise dedicated to advancing newborn health in low resource settings through innovative technology solutions.

description: Great patient education is critical to successful healthcare outcomes, yet in most healthcare settings patient education consists of rushed conversations or paper handouts. Medumo’s CareTours™ enable healthcare organizations to guide patients using automated just-in-time instructions and checklists pre, peri, and post-procedure.  CareTours are “education pathways” that are customizable, mobile friendly, highly engaging and adaptive to patients’ needs without requiring staff time.
short-description: Medumo helps healthcare providers guide patients using just-in-time digital instruction that is engaging, effective, and easy to deploy

description: At VIT, we're helping companies save money by reducing injuries with our easy-to use wearable platform! We got your back.
short-description: At VIT, we're helping companies save money by reducing injuries with our easy-to use wearable platform! We got your back.

description: Meetcaregivers is a unique platform that uses online and video technology to help families safely find and hire qualified caregivers for their aging parents at up to 50% less than traditional  home care agencies.  Video profiles of pre-screened caregivers make it easy to hire the ideal match. After families select a caregiver, we handle the payments and insurance, and provide tools for tracking schedules and care.
short-description: Meetcaregivers enables more seniors to age at home by using online and video technology to connect them to qualified caregivers

description: XRHealth Virtual Clinics offer at-home medical and therapeutic treatments through Virtual Reality (VR/AR) and digital health technologies. XRHealth integrates immersive VR/AR technology, licensed clinicians, and advanced data analytics on one platform, providing a comprehensive therapeutic care solution for patients to receive treatment from the comfort of their home.
short-description: XRHealth Virtual Clinics offer at-home medical and therapeutic treatments through Virtual Reality (VR/AR) and digital health technologies.

description: LifeGuard Games creates edugame apps to teach and motivate adherence to medical recommendations. LifeGuard Games builds upon proven successful principles of engaging virtual pet games; the player learns to care for a pet with a chronic condition in a world with mini-games, exploration, point and item collection, and pet development. We first focus on kids with asthma and then adapt our app for food allergy and other conditions. Our members met at the US Finals of Microsoft's Imagine Cup.
short-description: LifeGuard Games creates virtual pet edugame apps to teach and motivate kids to manage chronic conditions.

description: Travel Insurers are facing existential challenges as their traditional business models are threatened by Consumer expectation for on-demand services. Claims management is in need of disruption as insurers rely on regional broker relationships.
short-description: Aero-plan is a Marketplace for Travel Assistance and medical Services, connecting Insurance/Assistance companies with service providers

description: Insightfil.com helps patients work with caregivers, with all their medications synced up in one simple package, leading to better health.
short-description: Insightfil.com helps patients work with caregivers, with all their medications synced up in one simple package, leading to better health.

description: We give nonprofits wings.
short-description: The next-gen of online fundraising for social causes. We've helped causes fundraise $26MM with an avg. boost of 5.67x more raised/client.

description: Premium investment channels provides investors with better diversity and yield opportunities but with a high required placements and embedded high risk, such channels are mostly limited to Very/Ultra High Net Worth investors. By combining unique technology solutions with collaborative platform we disrupt the traditional barriers of required capital, illiquidity and the need for personal connections, and introduce many more investors with new investing product tailored to their needs.
short-description: Innovative investing platform, enabling to pool assets and collaboratively invest in top global funds at low minimums

description: AuCoDe aims to be the Google Alerts of controversies and crisis situations. By automatically analyzing social media and digital news streams using sophisticated machine learning techniques, we provide early detection of controversies and crisis situations. short-description: First environmental-friendly web platform that match plants specifically to customers needs allowing them to create a pesticide-free garden

description: HARDAH is a Swiss B2B and B2C start-up wanting to optimize and improve the personal and professional use of internet on computer, smartphone and tablet  through our 3 products:
short-description: HARDAH is a Swiss B2B and B2C start-up wanting to optimize and improve the personal and professional use of internet on many devices.

description: About 150 ski freeriders die in avalanche each year. The current technology used by skiers today is the avalanche victim detector (AVD). About 50 000 AVD are sold each year. The search for victims using an AVD is usually slow and user dependent. Time is the most crucial factor in the search of victim. That is why we aim to automatize the process of search using a portable drone to reduce the human factors. LYF rescue drone localises the victim, contact the rescuing team and assists the skier.
short-description: We increase the chance of survival in avalanche situations by reducing the time to find the victim with LYF drone avalanche victim detector.

description: LEDsafari SA is targeting sustainability education & training in schools & education institutes. Our first product is an innovative solar kit which is already in the market and sold 15,000 last year in 15 countries via its online platform. We have developed state-of-art learning platform and created ready-to-use content using high quality animation, graphics and games. We will use AR & mobile tech in future. We want to empower future generation to tackle climate change and live a greener life.
short-description: LEDsafari, ed-tech company, develops hardware and software to help teachers to teach students in sustainable energy technologies

description: Komed Health is a state of the art messaging platform purposeful build for hospital use. Komed Health enables secured instant medical team communication, which is accessible on iOS, Android and Desktop. The application eases, bundles and organizes real-time communication between medical teams making other forms of in-hospital communication such as fixed phones, pagers, faxes and emails obsolete over time. The application is integrated seamlessly with existing clinical systems.
short-description: 'Slack' for hospitals. Patient centered. Fully secured. Integrated with IT clinical systems. Designed with & for clinicians.

description: Every day more than 1 million implants are placed into human and animal bodies using open surgery. Lumigbo has developed a technology to build up implants inside the body using an access channel of less than half a millimeter in diameter. The procedure can be used for almost any type of implant. We have developed minimally viable prototypes for neurovascular, orthopedic and dental applications. Currently, we are improving our prototypes and expect to close round A in the third quarter of 2018.
short-description: We place cm3-sized implants, anywhere in the body through a catheter or needle with a diameter of 0.3 mm.

description: We want to close loop by mimicking nature, because in nature everything is reused. We are a waste valorisation company that strives for the full reuse of all discarded material.
short-description: We are TheCycle. We produce gastronomical oyster mushrooms from used coffee grounds, recuperated from local restaurants in Lausanne.

description: To date billions of people mainly in cities unknowingly breath polluted air. The gas sensor market worth $2.5B has 6% annual growth. Our patented technology, a nano-sized molecule based gas sensor for dangerous gases (NOx, NH3, COx, benzol) monitors air pollution and can be integrated in smart devices, especially wearables. Standard fabrication technologies are used to fabricate a low power consumption, highly sensitive nanotech sensors that will enter a market with annual growth rate of 10-15%.
short-description: Our patented, nano sized environmental gas sensor enables OEMs to provide smart devices monitoring their surroundings for their customers.

description: Komp-ACT aims to develop breakthrough electric motors for aircrafts, helicopters and UAVs actuation systems as well as for electric aircrafts propulsion systems. Our lightweight & smart electric motors can reduce aircrafts weight, maintenance costs, prevent electric and mechanical failures as well as reduce fuel consumption and CO2 emissions.
short-description: Lightweight Electric motors for aircrafts, helicopters and UAVs actuation systems as well as for electric aircrafts propulsion systems

description: With more than 17 million people suffering a stroke every year, our ability to provide adequate aftercare relies heavily on appropriate resource management. Currently, there are not enough therapists to meet patients' rehabilitation need, and with an ageing population this problem is only getting worse.
short-description: Motus Innovations is empowering patients to recover their independence by bringing cutting edge therapeutic technology to the home.

description: Global construction industry is set to reach $10T market. Cement and its derivatives forms backbone of the industry with 3 B tons/year usage. Our unique patented additive formulations tailor key performance of these materials with valuable cost savings and cutting on carbon emissions. Plug-n-play mode for seamless integration, individual formulations enables un-paralleled product to clients. Already with considerable traction among potential clients, is open for Series A funding, September 2017
short-description: Concrete usage causes 10% global C emissions. Our patented tech shoots up its performance & durability by 50% and cutting C emission by half

description: Mixfit is the first at-home, connected nutrient delivery system that analyzes your health data in real-time to dispense a personalized nutritional drink. Mixfit's Digital Health Platform enables an unprecedented level of precision health. It uniquely leverages Blockchain-enabled credentialing and smart contracts through a decentralized exchange of owner-mediated data from untapped sources such as mobile devices, wearables and IoHT (Internet of Healthcare Things) devices.
short-description: Mixfit provides realtime personalized nutrition unique to each individual, enabling precision health.

description: In developing countries, especially the millions of children, are vulnerable. The nutrition is based on milk and this milk can spoil by bad conditions of the environment .
short-description: Decentralized and mobil food processing, to provide fresh products near to the customer

description: MoComics disrupts the rules of comics editing business in providing an internet based service plateform sustaining a unique  - immersive, tactile and enriched reading experience on mobile. Mocomics connects new and confirmed Comics, manga, graphic novels and children books authors with their worldwide growing millennial audience, while offering direct revenue generation for authors through own production, direct readers funding and content sales via own on-line / mobile shop.
short-description: Mocomics is an online community platform connecting comics authors to their millennial audience thanks to a unique mobile reading experience

description: Humans pick each other's brain in a chaotic and unstructured way. Putting human communication on-line does not help much, as communicating via emails, social media, and forums scales badly and stays unstructured.
short-description: Mindools are the first scalable form of communication which allows you to pick your group's brains on any topic using structured interfaces.

description: NeedsList is a comprehensive civic engagement platform efficiently connecting refugee aid communities with those who want to help. Ours 'needs registry model” for the refugee crisis bridges a critical gap in humanitarian aid. Groups in the field can list needs for goods, services, or donations.  Responders can immediately meet needs by donating funds or purchasing directly from local suppliers to fill 'virtual containers'. NeedsList acts as a marketplace, earning commissions on transactions.
short-description: NeedsList is a global marketplace connecting donors, NGOs, and suppliers to efficiently meet the urgent needs of refugees.

description: Radon is a naturally occurring radioactive gas that tends to accumulate in buildings.  It is the second cause of death by lung cancer worldwide. A new legal framework drastically reduces the level of radon allowed in all European countries: millions of buildings will be above the limit. Today’s radon measurements are inefficient and time consuming. To overcome this problem we propose a network of detectors  based on CERN technology which are efficient, SMART connected and affordable.
short-description: We help protect people from radon a natural radioactive gas which causes lung cancer through a SMART sensor network based on CERN technology

description: SoulSpice is the new organic spice company for people who care about good food with a good purpose.
short-description: We transform the world of spices: direct trading, 100% organic for the best spices in a great design - to cook food with a soul!

description: Still Active is a network for senior citizens to discover and book high quality local activities. Our online portal allows you to easily browse a wide range of exciting and unique physical, cultural and educational activities. It's not just a booking platform, but a community where our users can meet new friends and stay active with old ones. Our product offer is personalized to the needs of our members and co-created with them. We encourage a healthy lifestyle for this fast growing age segment.
short-description: Still Active is the first online concierge service tailored for people aged 60+, providing the best activities and services in their city.

description: Social Media has become essential for tourism industry, hotels and restaurants. Many of these businesses often face an intractable challenge: they have neither a specific budget to hire someone to manage these numerous communication channels nor enough time and/or knowledge to manage it by themselves.
short-description: Socialease is an Artificial Intelligent Assistant, designed for hotels & restaurants, that automates communication on Social medias

description: Sportskred is empowering inspiring athletes to use their social media presence to support their careers and achieve their maximum potential. With Sportskred, athletes can connect with brands to work on digital sponsorship campaigns. By promoting brands on the athletes’ social media channels, companies can reach, communicate, and engage with their target audiences in an effective, authentic, and organic way; while athletes obtain the financial support needed to focus on their passion.
short-description: Sportskred connects brands with inspiring athletes to create social media marketing campaigns and reach targeted audiences

description: Skypull is an Altitude Wind Energy system, which consists of an autonomous flying device (drone) connected through a tether to a ground-based generator. The drone transforms the wind power available between 200 and 600 m above ground into traction on the tether. The tether is unrolled from a drum connected to a generator that produces electricity. The drone has a proprietary airframe and a high-efficiency wing foil (patent). It is totally autonomous and has all the necessary safety redundancies.
short-description: Skypull is an autonomous drone that produces electricity from the strong and more abundant altitude winds

description: Smart is developing a wearable technology that is able to early detect heart-failure. This is done by monitoring the amount of swelling in a user's leg. This swelling is called 'edema.' Edema is a powerful metric in regards to the strength of the heart. If the edema goes unnoticed, a hospitalization is unavoidable. We can reduce the amount of unnecessary hospitalizations saving both the hospital and patient, time and money.
short-description: A wearable technology capable of reducing heart failure hospitalizations by monitoring edema in heart failure patients.

description: Social Fabric is a sustainable textile centre. We see a future that combines circular economy, innovative technology and resources, decentralised manufacturing, and ethical labor, to give customers meaningful and customised garments that are made just for them.
short-description: Prototyping the future of textile and garment production

description: What if amputees could walk with their prostheses without feeling pain? What if such a service was available worldwide, for an affordable price? This is the world that Nextep envisions and wants to bring to life. We devise innovative 3D printing solutions to provide high quality tailored prosthetics at low cost for the first time. Amputees experience true comfort, drastically reducing the pain they are used to endure.
short-description: To provide optimal, affordable mobility solutions to amputees, Nextep pioneers innovative 3D technologies to empower the prosthetists.

description: Acting as a Benefit Corporation, PROTEAS will develop and commercialise plant-protein beverages to help active and engaged flexitarians meet their daily protein intake. Using tasty and wholesome ingredients sourced fairly and sustainably, PROTEAS is the right alternative to dairy. With a subscription based e-commerce business model, PROTEAS is building a network of partners to address this €1+bn market opportunity. Founded by 2 seasoned and purpose-driven food industry executives.
short-description: PROTEAS: a Fair, Sustainable, Plant-based Food & Beverages company, targeting active Millennials, a €3.5+ billion global market.

description: Nextome technology has over 4 years of research in order to achieve high accuracy location of the user’s smartphone. The system catches the signal of bluetooth beacons spread inside the environment and, thanks to proprietary artificial intelligence algorithms, it calculates the position of the user with an accuracy of about 1.5 meters. The system is patented with international PCT (ID: WO2015/049660), EU, USA and Singapore.
short-description: Nextome is a software technology company providing indoor positioning and navigation system to enable location based services applications.

description: BP's oil rig, the Deepwater Horizon, exploded in 2010, causing one of the worst environmental disasters in history and costing BP an estimated $60B. Like most man-made disasters, this was caused by incubating risks and could have been averted. RiskTalk takes an innovative, simple, bottom-up approach to risk reporting. We’ve created an intuitive platform to crowdsource risks. We empower employees to flag risks, issues and anomalies- that are then tracked through action, mitigation and resolution.
short-description: RiskTalk empowers any employee to report anything - directly to their organisation's leadership, completely anonymously, via a simple app.

description: Between 125’000 and 250’000 people suffer every year a spinal cord injury leading to a permanent paraplegia. TWIICE is a modular and customizable exoskeleton for walking assistance that allows mobility impaired people to regain independence in their daily activities. The device was designed to meet a variety of pathologies, symptoms, morphologies, and expectations. The technology is being developed at the Laboratoire de Systèmes Robotiques at EPFL.
short-description: TWIICE is a modular exoskeleton for walking assistance that allows paraplegics to regain independence in their daily activities.

description: Recycling and remelting of Al alloys involve large amounts of energy and CO2 release. Based on on-line data acquisition and efficient numerical modelling, Novamet develops an artificial intelligence to optimize melting process.   This is aimed to reduce cycle time and energy consumption for a melting cycle by a 5 – 15 %.  For a medium size recycling furnace that saves ~€0.5 Million / year and reduces the CO2 emissions equivalent to CO2 emission of 250 persons.
short-description: Novamet develops a smart data-driven tool to optimize aluminium melting (recycling) processes.

description: Securaxis aims to offer the first global security and safety companion for companies, organizations and individuals to travel safely using big data and machine learning. By extracting relevant data from readily available sources (news feeds, databases, social networks), Securaxis draws analytical information fast and efficiently and stream it to a web dashboard and to smartphones.
short-description: Securaxis provides first-hand, real-time, geo-localized individualized security information for people traveling in volatile environment

description: REMINISCIENCES SA exploits the crucial role of gut microbiota in human physiology and more specifically as we have discovered in Alzheimer's disease. There is no effective treatment for Alzheimer, despite 51 million patients in need. Our company develops 2 products: CerebralX, a symbiotic therapeutic treatment to restore altered gut microbiota and stop or delay Alzheimer's disease, and ReminiTest, a diagnostic based upon microbiota profiling.
short-description: REMINISCIENCES develops a symbiotic treatment and a companion diagnostic for Alzheimer's disease through targeting the gut microbiome

description: Current wearable technologies are insufficient and lack versatility for full body tracking or remote training. Trainers tradeoff providing services in-person, limiting their reach, and virtually, limiting their efficacy. Tacit Motion’s kinetic sensors provide a new medium for body language communication, which doesn’t transcribe with print or video. Recordings create a digital impression that may be copyrighted and licensed. Kinetic tracking and training is constraint-free; whenever, wherever.
short-description: Utilizing a network of wearable sensors, Tacit Motion provides kinetic monitoring and personal sports coach, whenever, wherever.

description: For manufacturing companies, downtime is expensive. When machines fail, companies lose millions every hour that their plant has stopped. They mitigate this risk by stockpiling all the spare parts that they may need but this method is very wasteful. 30% of all parts inventory (value >$1 Tn) is obsolete. machIQ offers a less expensive on-demand buying model to achieve the same outcome. Customers can also identify & reduce their obsolete inventory and sell them to buyers on our P2P marketplace.
short-description: Industry 4.0-ready Software as a Service (SaaS) for Equipment Performance Management, advanced spare parts inventory and MRO purchasing.

description: Our web application instantly connects companies to the best talents in their area which have already been interviewed and recommended by our independent partners who work in the same field as the candidates.
short-description: Online recruitment marketplace disrupting the staffing industry.

description: Versantis is a pharmaceutical company developing an innovative drug capture platform to treat life-threatening intoxications. This liposomal system will lead to disruptive drugs in a broad range of indications of high unmet need. Built on a de-risked lead candidate with an orphan status (VS-01) , a lean development and regulatory path, and a qualified management team, Versantis will commercialize in 5 years the first drug to save patients with acute liver disease whose mortality rate is >50%.
short-description: Versantis is a clinical stage pharmaceutical company developing products of high unmet medical need in the field of liver disease.

description: Sensio AIR is for people with airborne allergies and asthma, who want to prevent their outbreaks. The device, that can be fitted at home, the office or in healthcare and commercial facilities, is the only allergen tracker with state-of-the-art patented technology. Connected trough your smartphone, it shows you in detail what is in the air you breathe: it detects allergens and irritants then informs you on possible actions to reduce your exposure and improve the quality of the air.
short-description: The smart indoors allergen and air quality tracker that helps you improve the air you breathe.

description: We provide an innovative software, training and service platform to analyze energy related data. It supports industries and facility management companies to automate and optimize the management, the usage and the maintenance of their assets or services. What are the advantages? You can reduce the costs and the complexity of your processes; you can improve your energy efficiency up to 25%; you can guarantee the optimal functioning of your plant by detecting malfunctioning in advance.
short-description: We developed a powerful AI-based software platform to analyze energy related data and improve operation efficiency of assets and systems.

description: ThinkEE develops a software to easily manage and control any kind of connected devices (temperature, gaz, humidity sensors, ...). It enables companies using or willing to use IoT devices to seamlessly and swiftly connect, manage and integrate them. Compare to the alternatives ThinkEE offers a data standardisation, data centralisation and a modular software. ThinkEE targets businesses (B2B). It sells an integration/customisation service and its software in form of a subscription or license.
short-description: ThinkEE provides to companies using IoT a software solution to simplify connection and management of its devices in a unique place.

description: EYL provides a hardware-based solution to secure computer network systems and replace software options that can be easily hacked. EYL provides unpredictable quantum random numbers by extracting them from a radioisotope in a tiny 5mm chip. The result is extremely fast and effective random numbers that can be deployed for security systems, computer networks and other purposes. EYL technology is being trialled in the public and private sectors.
short-description: EYL secures Internet of Things with an affordable micro quantum random number generator using radioisotope to replace less secure software.

description: eggXYt’s mission is to enable a sustainable future in the livestock industry. eggXYt’s CRISPR based technology allows non-invasive pre-incubation sex detection in chicken eggs - saving 8 billion male chicks from being unnecessarily hatched and disposed of each year, saving the industry billions of dollars and adding 8 billion eggs to the global supply. eggXYt is allowing ethically sourced male-chick-culling-free eggs to reach the market, answering the demand of conscious egg consumers.
short-description: Count Your Chickens Before They Hatch

description: Although women make up 47% of the workforce, they represent only 25% of STEM occupations.
short-description: Imagine today's girls growing up to be tomorrow's key players in science! Our unique STEM media products inspire and encourage kids

description: At Gus we develop proprietary artificial intelligence to automate all forms of customer operations. Our technology is pioneering natural language processing in spanish so we can understand the context of users commands instead of identifying key words. We mix humans and AI to go beyond client communications providing instant service across any chat app and saving money in the process.
short-description: Gus develops spanish based AI that understands users intensions and automates customer service and sales via chat.

description: Our team is committed to creating actionable intelligence from satellite imagery and other data about the planet.  Our technology allows us to quickly go from hypothesis testing to meaningful, global-scale measurements and forecasts aimed at decision makers in finance, insurance, government and agribusiness.  Our first product is called Kernel: an in-season yield forecast for US corn that is now in testing with a select group of pilot customers this growing season.
short-description: We are an applied science company that turns satellite imagery and other Earth data into the basis for better decisions.

description: WRIO revolutionizes how we interact with our smartphones. 73% of smartphone users are dissatisfied with their traditional keyboard, which was designed for typewriters 140 years ago. WRIO is a keyboard app with a newly developed “honeycomb” layout (patent protected) with larger keys, intuitive gestures, and intelligent algorithms that learn and adapt to the user’s typing behavior and language. Our 30,000 paying users type up to 70% faster.
short-description: WRIO Keyboard makes it fast and fun for everybody to interact with their smartphones.

description: GasZen is the first gas management platform focusing on the household market. Taking advantage on the Internet of Things and the New Legislation in Mexico; our team has developed a platform that connects the missing piece for most gas suppliers and distributors - the domestic and comercial stationary tank - through our device. Furthermore, the platform allows a communication tool between the end user and gas supplier to get an efficient, transparent and reliable service.
short-description: We are the first gas management platform enabled by a device that converts your traditional stationary tank into a smart one.

description: Surgeons still staple and suture more than they would like, as current glues don't live up to the task. But with limited success: e.g. leakage occurs in up to 15% of bowel resection procedures. We have developed a polyurethane based surgical glue which is fast acting, strong, flexible and fully biodegradable. This unique combination of features allows for use in unprecedented cases. It can function as a replacement for sutures topically, or as a suture or staple line reinforcement internally.
short-description: Next generation surgical glues based on polyurethane: Fast, strong flexible and biodegradeble it can be used in unprecedented surgeries.

description: Virtual Reality will change the way we tell stories, and this will impact how companies promote their goods and services.
short-description: Weavr helps business and brands to create their presence in Virtual Reality at low cost with little effort by using standard building blocks

description: BrainRobotics is based in Boston MA and focuses on developing EEG (aka, Electroencephalography, or brainwave) controlled robotic prosthesis, which can be directly controlled using brainwave without using hands on a cost effective basis. This can be a life changer to those who suffered from loss of limb. The project is perceived as a great combination of cutting-edge technology and social responsibility. With BrainRobotic’s technology, you are in control to live a wonderful life.
short-description: With brainwave controlled robotic prosthesis, BrainRobotics brings the control back to you and empowers you to live life to the fullest.

description: 3DFortify is a materials company spun out of Professor Randall Erb’s lab at NEU. Our innovative 3D Magnetic alignment technology controls the orientation of composite reinforcement in three dimensions. This merges superior mechanical properties with the customization of 3D Printing. Current composites are expensive, time intensive, hard to customize, and have limited geometries. Our patented technologies allow for cheaper, faster, and the most complex composite manufacturing to date.
short-description: 3DFortify is a materials company that uses patented magnetic alignment technology to create the most complex composites to date.

description: We produce animal feed the way nature intended.
short-description: Entocycle, is an innovative feed company that is developing the most advanced, efficient and sustainable systems to feed the world.

description: WeTrack provides a new way to manage projects. Born out of the London 2012 Olympic Games, WeTrack is a project management software built specifically around client needs. It covers the key principles in project management by combining all the best parts of an objective/tasking system with a full risk and issues register without the red tape. With a key focus on UI/UX, WeTrack is the easiest way to manage any large scale event, boasting clients such as The FA, Ryder Cup and The Jockey Club.
short-description: WeTrack is an innovative project management software, allowing companies to manage large scale events efficiently and clearly.

description: Joulez will empower tween girls globally with the skills, knowledge, vocabulary and courage needed to create the world-changing innovations and tech jobs of tomorrow. Playthings directly impact career choice – Joulez disrupts the boy-centric STEM toy offering with products proven to resonate with girls and their parents through deep user testing. Our kits let girls build and personalize beautiful crafts while learning valuable STEM skills and exploring fun, engaging online content.
short-description: Joulez fuses arts and crafts with electronics to create fun and educational gadgets that inspire girls to get excited about STEM.

description: Independent Beauty Professionals are having problems maintaining their skills in their craft and managing a business at the same time—BeautyLynk solves that problem by creating a full software solution that will manage the entire beauty business operation. BeautyLynk provides independent contractors and salon owners with a software platform that handles on-demand appointment booking, financial transactions, record keeping, and customer sourcing.
short-description: BeautyLynk is a software solution company for the beauty industry.

description: CoolComposites is a startup that is working to produce a phase change material (PCM) for energy efficient buildings. Competing PCM products are extremely expensive, require substantial modifications to building construction, or both. Our goal is to produce a drop-in additive for building materials based on inorganic PCMs, which are more than 10x cheaper than their existing organic counterparts. This will allow us to offer a 'zero-day' payback period enabled by novel materials synthesis.
short-description: CoolComposites is using materials chemistry to make buildings more energy efficient without making them more expensive.

description: Versatile (Formerly known as Versatile Natures) is a Construction Tech Company that has pioneered a new, non-intrusive way to capture jobsite performance data.
short-description: Hard Data. For Easier Decision Making.

description: Whole Heart Provisions is going to make you crave vegetables. We are a fast casual restaurant concept that takes flavors you'll find in the world's best restaurants, and serves them in under two minutes, for under $10. All of our food and packaging are plant based, helping us please the planet, our bodies, and most importantly, our taste buds. Since our launch in October 2015, we've served over 40,000 customers. We plan to become the Chipotle of the flexitarian generation.
short-description: Whole Heart Provisions is a fast casual, plant-based culinary startup serving delicious, fast, and environmentally conscious food.

description: Parents unable to console crying babies can become anxious and discouraged, which can weaken the parent-baby bond. Witnessing their heartache inspired a maternity nurse to design Tranquilo Mat to soothe babies in seconds by mimicking the womb’s familiar sounds and motions including gentle vibrations, whooshing, and heartbeats. The mat is a portable and versatile solution, usable anywhere, even in parents’ arms. Tranquilo creates happier families and a more peaceful world, one baby at a time.
short-description: Tranquilo is a portable, soothing mat that calms crying babies in seconds by mimicking the sounds and motions of the womb.

description: IBM called us the Uber for Education.
short-description: Tembo created a Home Educator network using mobile phones to educate 0-6 year old children in slums

description: We solve the most frustrating unsolved problem in laparoscopic surgeries - camera fogging. Laparoscopy has evolved into a surgical standard with many of open surgeries shifting steadily to this surgical procedure, currently 15 M surgeries are performed annually worldwide. Using breakthrough plasma technology, we eliminate the problem and maintain a clear view for the whole operation. By a simple and single pre-op treatment, done by the nurse, we make the surgeon forget the problem ever existed.
short-description: Using a very unique technology we help save patients lives and maintain the surgeon peace of mind.

description: ALS and other 'Locked in' patients represent a subgroup of people with fully functional cognitive abilities who gradually lose their ability to speak and the ability to use their upper limbs.
short-description: EyeControl is an affordable, mobile and easy to use communication device, that will unlock ALS and other 'locked in' patients worldwide

description: Neither kids nor adults enjoys having current orthodontic braces. You have to wear them 2-3 years and often get stuck with “metal mouth.” Signature Orthodontics addresses this problem by applying patented, next-generation manufacturing technology adapted for use in orthodontic treatment by the industry's leading experts.
short-description: We use next generation technology to unlock your unique 'Signature Smile' faster and more esthetically than current methods.

description: Sea Machines Robotics is building the technology that will enable the era of autonomous and remote-commanded marine & maritime vessels.  Sea Machines systems allow surface craft to operate & navigate safely and efficiently with or without an on board crew.  Initial applications ready to take advantage of autonomy are tugboats, launches, survey work boats, and dredging vessels, and as the technology gains wider acceptance we will expand into the over-the-horizon operations such as cargo shipping.
short-description: Sea Machines Robotics is a Boston-based startup developing Autonomous Control & Navigation Systems for marine vessels.

description: Bayonet is a financial technology company, focused on increasing ecommerce acceptance rates and reducing chargebacks due to fraud related issues. According to Visa, over 1.2 billion USD were lost to fraud related issues in Latin America during 2016. A 60 billion USD online sales region, where Mexico faces a 13.9% rejection of all orders due to suspected fraud and more than 1.9% of chargebacks. Bayonet's team experienced this problem first hand at a local payment gateway and is now solving it.
short-description: Bayonet enables companies to feed and consult a global database about online consumers' reputation, based on their historic payments.

description: RateGravity addresses the major issues in the $2.0T US mortgage market. Due to the actions of the highly commissioned mortgage salesperson, consumers are paying tens of thousands of dollars in excess interest on their loans and only 1 of 4 borrowers applies with more than one lender. RateGravity is redefining how consumers finance their home by eliminating the salesperson and providing a solution to compare, choose and close with local lenders, saving tens of thousands of dollars in interest.
short-description: RateGravity is redefining how consumers finance their home and delivering lower rates to borrowers through our network of local lenders.

description: Potentially billions worldwide suffer from underserved and treatable visual disorders. Current (so-called) solutions commonly mask the problem (e.g. glasses, contacts) while attempts at treatment are either inaccessible, widely hated, or ineffective after the age of 8. By leveraging mobile VR technologies, perceptual learning and eye training, Luminopia has created an unparalleled, proprietary treatment device that is safe, fun, and fast in order to improve both vision and quality of life.
short-description: Luminopia is using emerging, proprietary virtual reality technology to enhance vision, treat visual disorders, and improve quality of life!

description: BlindHash has developed and has been granted a patent on a new way to secure passwords and user databases on the internet.  Our 'blind hashing' solution completely eliminates the possibility of password theft, protecting companies and their customers from costly and disruptive data breaches.  Our technology can economically protect any business from the smallest SaaS startups to Amazon and Facebook.
short-description: BlindHash's technology, called 'blind hashing' is a completely new way to secure passwords, and protect customer data

description: Mobile entertainment has gone beyond sharing videos and playing Angry Birds; millennials are enhancing their videos with facemasks and playing Pokemon Go in Augmented Reality.  Escher is going beyond these simple effects to provide a true interactive 3D AR engine for developers. Whether it be turning the floor into lava, playing ball with a digital pet, or having a parrot land on your shoulder, Escher is powering the future of 3D interactive mobile entertainment
short-description: Escher Reality is bringing imagination into real life with our full 3-D augmented reality platform using only your mobile phone.

description: Every few hours, one Library of Congress worth of data is created on orbit by commercial satellite operators. The cost to get this data down to the ground for use is excessive and growing more complex. Analytical Space is creating a network of in-space relays that utilize laser communications to solve this problem, allowing operators to offload more data at costs comparable to cellular data plans, all while using their existing hardware.
short-description: In-orbit data relay service that enables satellite operators to increase data throughput at a lower cost per GB with no hardware changes.

description: We make the world's best alcoholic ginger beer. This is cold-pressed ginger, lemon juice & nutmeg. This is dry, fresh & well-balanced ginger beer. Willie Fenichel, a Cape Cod goat farmer, started making this ginger beer as a hobby. 5 years later, the brew was so good that we had to bring it to the world. Craft beer and, most recently, craft cider & ginger's explosive growth shows that the industry is ready for innovation. Let's go.
short-description: Delicious alcoholic ginger beer (4.5%) based on the recipe of Farmer Willie Fenichel. Welcome to Ginger with Soul.

description: LambdaVision is developing a protein-based retinal implant to restore vision to the tens of millions blinded by age-related macular degeneration and retinitis pigmentosa. There is no cure for these diseases and current treatments only slow their progression, and people are going blind.  LambdaVision's flexible, minimally-invasive, subretinal design, is the first to use a photoactive protein to replace the function of the damaged photoreceptor cells to provide high-resolution vision.
short-description: LambdaVision is developing a protein-based retinal implant to restore vision to the millions blinded by retinal degenerative diseases.

description: The primary limiting factor of an electric vehicle’s performance is the power and energy capabilities of its energy storage by directly affecting its range, cost, power, and lifetime. Electra’s hybrid energy storage module is a product of electrical engineering combined with chemistry:  our system marries the high energy density of safe battery chemistries with the high power density storage creating an efficient hybrid solution optimized for a vehicle’s performance and application.
short-description: Electra is a high-tech start-up that is planning to bring the electric vehicle market to the next level with innovative power solutions.

description: Donor breast milk (DBM) is used to enhance the chances of survival and long-term health of sick and premature babies who have no access to maternal milk. There is currently a lack of equitable access to DBM across the UK. The HMB will also establish a first-of-its-kind research biobank to enable novel studies, collaborating with scientists across nutritional analysis, cancer research, microbiomics, and optimal donor milk usage. Surplus revenue will support local perinatal services.
short-description: The Hearts Milk Bank will provide a consistent source of safe, screened donor breastmilk to neonatal units across London and the southeast.

description: Battery Resourcers is committed to changing the dynamics for processing end of life lithium ion batteries. Currently most lithium ion batteries are landfilled. If they are recycled only the metal value is recovered. Battery Resourcers proprietary process allows one to directly synthesize new cathode materials from spent lithium ion cells.  The Battery Resourcers recycling process will be able to deliver low cost cathode materials to the lithium ion battery market enabling green technologies.
short-description: Battery Resourcers, LLC recycles spent li-ion battery, to directly synthesize new cathode materials, which can be used in new batteries.

description: We make cardiovascular surgeries more accurate and safe. Our technology helps clinicians accurately plan and rehearse stent placements inside blood vessels. Using predictive computations and AI, we make maximum use of available patient data and previous cases to accurately predict the behaviour of devices inside each patient’s configuration. This allows clinicians to optimise device selection, thereby reducing complications and associated cost of stenting surgeries for hospitals and society.
