short-description: We reinvent surgical planning. Using predictive computations and AI, we ensure that surgeries are optimally planned for every patient.

description: Some people are thinner than others, and DLS has identified a mutation in humans that causes thinness.  The mutation in the target protein causes loss-of-function leading to the wasting of energy in the body and results in thinness.  DLS is in the process of creating a small molecule inhibitor to the target protein that will similarly cause an inefficient metabolism and lead to thinness regardless of the cause of obesity.  Following nature's example provides a safer path to curing obesity.
short-description: DLS is creating new drugs to treat metabolic and cardiovascular diseases by mimicking favorable genotypes/phenotypes in nature.

description: Imagine getting admitted to a hospital to get treated, but acquiring an additional infection. Ventilator Associated Pneumonia (VAP) is a Hospital acquired, fatal infection of the lungs, which happens in patients who are on the ventilator. Every year more than 250,000 patients succumb to VAP in India alone,while in US the reported cases of VAP are more than 120,000. Coeo Labs has developed an intelligent secretion and oral hygiene management system to effectively reduce the risk of acquiring VAP.
short-description: Coeo Labs is a medical device company solving unmet clinical needs in emergency and critical care through device interventions.

description: Angiex is pioneering a new approach to cancer therapy: vascular targeting. Angiex is making an antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) therapy against a novel target expressed by tumor endothelial cells and by most tumor cells.
short-description: Angiex is pioneering a vascular therapy for solid tumors. In preclinical studies, an Angiex antibody-drug conjugate regressed solid tumors.

description: TwentyGreen addresses the huge societal challenge of meeting growing world demand for protein by offering a solution to animal feeding that is at the same time more beneficial for the farmed animals, more profitable for the farmer, and more sustainable for our environment.
short-description: TwentyGreen produces a greener natural feed supplement for more sustainable animal farming.

description: Xsensio develops the first “Lab-on-SkinTM” wearable sensing platform for next-generation wearable solutions: a modular sensing tool able to continuously detect biomarkers at the surface of our skin to provide real-time continuous information about our health condition. Xsensio positions itself at the intersection of two massive and fast-growing markets: biosensors with blood tests, and wearables with simple, continuous and non-invasive feedback.
short-description: Xsensio develops the first 'Lab-on-SkinTM' sensing platform, to track biochemical information at the surface of the skin.

description: bitemojo is an e-commerce application providing couples and small groups the opportunity to experience destinations through their local cuisine by taking self-guided culinary biteTours. In addition to the tasting, biteTours encourage interaction with the local people behind the bites and learn about their personal background. During the tour travelers can gain biteCredits and turn them to free bites as part of the experience.
short-description: bitemojo offers self-guided culinary tours at destinations in a way was never done before for FIT's, couples and small groups

description: We build technology that leverages Blockchain and Bitcoin to achieve faster, cheaper, more secure, and more accessible financial services for individuals and businesses in Mexico. We believe digital currencies will revolutionize our global financial system and cross-border payments by reducing operational friction and lowering the cost of these services. We have a particular focus on remittances, international payments, payment processing, and micropayments.
short-description: Bitso is the bridge that connects Mexico's traditional banking infrastructure to the new Economy of Digital Currencies

description: As the world population rises and our natural resources become ever more depleted, the pressures on world agriculture have never been greater. Precision agricultural technologies are key to achieving maximum efficiency from our land, natural and manufactured resources. The onTrak precision guidance system developed by Agricision aims to provide access to some high impact technologies for the many producers for whom the large investment currently required is a major barrier to adoption.
short-description: Making precision agricultural technologies more affordable and accessible, we are dedicated to improving efficiency of world food production

description: Taste of Kenya provides an innovative field to fork solution that supports responsible farming, production, supply and consumption of coffee by: supporting responsible farming (regenerative agriculture and soil health), responsible production (giving farmers access to higher coffee margins), and responsible consumption of coffee (disposable and biodegradable coffee bags)
short-description: Impacting coffee farmers in Kenya and coffee buyers globally through: direct trade,  software access and sustainable initiatives.

description: SwissDeCode puts the power of DNA in your hands. Our DNAFoil line is the world’s 1st portable, self-administered, DNA detection kit. Revealing DNA of major contaminants, your staff confirms safety & compliance on the line. Invented at the University of Geneva. Certification label acceptance from the Swiss CTI. MC sponsors and other F&B customers are securing Right-First-Time processes with a tool simple as a home pregnancy test. Know it when and where you need it with DNAFoil.
short-description: Right First Time with DNAFoil: Food Safety & Compliance 24/7.

description: Loginno provides unique disruptive solution to convert normal containers into smart IoT containers, able to transmit crucial real time data as an industry standard. Loginno managed to secure several disruptive technological, operational and design advantages, which enable Loginno to be the only company in the world able to offer ROI projects to equip entire container fleets.
short-description: Shipping Container IoT as a Standard Solution to the Logistics Industry

description: Intento is a spin-off company of the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne (EPFL), Switzerland, developing a solution for the rehabilitation of upper limbs of paralyzed stroke patients. Our solution fosters higher functional recovery than conventional therapy, helping stroke patients to re-learn lost movements, already after two weeks of usage. Our product is based on a novel patent-pending electrode technology and non-invasive functional electrical stimulation.
short-description: Intento is an EPFL spin-off developing a solution for the rehabilitation of paralyzed stroke patients.

description: Granta is a dream of a group of talented people with the vision of helping the disadvantaged and making a positive change. We provide a high-end solution, to design and manufacture a faster, cheaper, exact and personalised implant for every patient, making possible to have an aesthetical result that facilitates their reinsertion to society. Annually more than 30k people experience this problem in Mexico, of which 90% are from the public health sector which is over saturated & could be benefited
short-description: Granta provides high-end technology patient specific implants that no one in Mexico currently does, a better solution to the health system.

description: We provide fast motion sensing based on 3D imaging . Our CMOS sensors promise to revolutionize automotive safety by making LIDAR functionality  affordable ; they also enable autonomous industrial vehicle and smart buildings that adapt to  occupancy.
short-description: Fastree3D imaging sensors help recognize and measure distance to fast moving objects in real-time, enabling automotive safety

description: BackStartup is a fast growing, virtual back office that helps Entrepreneurs concentrate in their core business, while revolutionizing how they handle their legal and accounting problems. Through a central dashboard and with a highly competent team of Lawyers and Accountants, we take care of the needs that every small business with big ambitions may have: incorporation, accounting, taxes, payroll, contracts, corporate IP and labor law, amongst others, all in one place and at an affordable price.
short-description: Technology based back office for startups and small business, which offers accounting and legal solutions to entrepreneurs around the world

description: AEROTAIN offers new and innovative ways to interact with audiences. Our flying machine Skye can take virtually any shape and brings brands and products airborne. This allows us to create fun, interactive, and memorable experiences for everyone to enjoy. Skye is safe enough to operate above crowds!
short-description: We shape the drone revolution by leveraging live events with safe and friendly flying experiences.

description: homePad is the first full-stack SaaS platform for rental activities - €16bn European potential market
short-description: homePad the first full-stack SaaS solution for rental activities - €16bn European potential market

description: The way we move is important to solving diseases like Parkinson's and cerebral palsy, to becoming a better athlete, from a baby's first step, to winning the Olympics. The way we move is essential to who we are. Gait Up makes and sells next generation wearable technology for motion analysis in the sports, healthcare and wellness industries. Our products include gait and running analysis, physical activity monitoring, and OEM solutions with partners. Motion analytics. Accurate. Easy to interpret.
short-description: Gait Up makes and sells next generation wearable technology for motion analysis in the sports, healthcare and wellness industries.

description: We transform how enterprises connect business models and impact, helping them understand, manage and communicate how they change lives in a simple and accessible way through our software. Our business model is a B2B Software as a Service (SaaS) launched in 2018, and since it has been used by +100 organizations in 9 Latin American countries. Unit economics 2020: Sales 240K   ARR: 56K       CAC: 3K         AVG ticket: 8K
short-description: Web app for evaluating the social impact of education projects

description: Vizir combines thermal vision and augmented reality to give fire fighters a clear vision in dark and smoky environments. Tests with fire fighters show that Vizir increases their sense of orientation and ability to locate victims and hotspots. Our unique visualisation technology provides a comfortable and clear understanding of the surroundings. Active engagement of fire departments and a market research in four countries show a strong interest in our product.
short-description: Vizir combines thermal vision and augmented reality to give fire fighters a clear vision in dark and smoky environments.

description: We are helping people book free flights by using their airline miles. As of today there are $700 billion USDs worth of airline and hotel miles & points. Yet only a small percentage of people know how to use them correctly, with the rest not knowing how many miles they have, let alone what they can use them for.
short-description: We help people fly for free by maximizing the return on their frequent flyer miles. Enabling them to book free flights easily & quickly

description: Access for Life's vision is to facilitate therapies that require repetitive vascular access for chronic disease patients. Our patented JEM™ platform's technology & design will preserve the vessel wall & reduce clinical complications due to vessel wall damage reducing morbidity mortality& costs. For the first time, real time data is gathered on the dialysis process, allowing for early intervention by the clinical team.
short-description: Access for Life JEM sensor devices are implanted under the skin to AV fistula/graft for chronic care patients on repetitive vascular access.

description: Snapp is the business platform for the mobile-only economy
short-description: Snapp is an app that allows entrepreneurs in developing countries to build, manage and publish their own app, from their smartphones.

description: Neuromotion empowers children to build emotional strength. Developed at Boston Children's Hospital, the company’s proprietary Bioresponsive Therapy confronts the access and quality challenges in mental health by combining the power of wearable technology, video games, and data into a clinically-proven, digital treatment platform for mental health. Neuromotion was founded by a team of scientists and technologists driven to build a new treatment model for mental health.
short-description: Digital mental health through mobile bioresponsive videogames

description: 80% of America is locked out of the solar market because they cannot install solar on their roof. Solstice expands the clean energy market by rapidly deploying community-shared solar at low-cost and at scale. We do this by creating a viral solar community--we tap the power of organizations and incentivize local champions to earn extra income by enrolling their friends digitally. With community solar, friends enjoy clean energy at no upfront cost and and save money on their electric bill.
short-description: Solstice grows the market for clean energy by providing community-shared solar power to Americans that cannot install it on their own roof.

description: Poppins App enables parents to search for fully-vetted childcarers in their area, even at short notice – perfect for last minute theatre tickets and emergencies. They can save their favourite sitters, allowing them to rebook at the touch of a button, and eventually providing them with a trusted network in their area.
short-description: Poppins enables busy parents to find, book, review and pay fully-vetted babysitters in their area, even at short notice.

description: The top rated door knocking app. Polis was created by canvassers for canvassers. It makes managing door-to-door sales or cause based canvassing easy.
short-description: Door-to-door outreach software for solar companies, home improvement groups, cable companies, non-profits and political organizations.

description: QSM Diagnostics has the fastest and lowest-cost diagnostic sensor platform for identifying and monitoring common bacteria in blood, urine, sputum, or wounds. Our technology provides results in 1 minute by detecting electronic signals from unique bacteria-produced molecules with zero sample preparation. It will provide early guidance at the point-of-care to doctors and veterinarians treating infections. The instrument is battery powered and portable. Only 10 microliters of sample fluid is needed.
short-description: QSM Dx makes sensors to identify and monitor infectious bacteria in humans and animals within 1 minute at the point-of-care

description: Urinary incontinence is a huge problem - billions are spent annually and a majority of people older than 50 are affected. First-line treatment is pelvic floor muscle therapy, which is successful in 60-80% of patients. However, PFMT is limited to specialized clinics. Our product allows users to perform PFMT whenever and wherever they choose. It is an undergarment with integrated and wireless pelvic muscle activity detectors and moisture sensors that communicate with an interactive mobile app.
short-description: We combined wireless muscle activity detectors and moisture sensors to provide a revolutionary solution for urinary incontinence.

description: Up Learn uses AI and neuroscience to ensure every student can achieve an A*. We detect each student’s strengths and weaknesses to construct a personalised learning experience.
short-description: Up Learn uses AI and neuroscience to ensure every student can achieve an A*, regardless of their background.

description: ADAY is a mobile platform that connects employers with labor they require on demand. Temporary labor firms for low complexity jobs, and the clients they serve suffer from high turnover and sub-optimal worker productivity.
short-description: ADAY is a labor optimization platform for hourly workers. Aday delivers a universal liquid workforce.

description: Half of prisoners lose touch with their families while inside, increasing their chances of reoffending upon release. Prison Voicemail is a social venture using technology to improve communication between prisoners and their families. Our service enables them to exchange regular voicemails, making it the fastest and most convenient way to stay in touch. Launched in October 2015, the service is rapidly expanding across prisons in England and Wales.
short-description: Prison Voicemail is a social venture using scalable technology to improve communication channels between prisoners and their families.

description: Communication is key to the learning experience, yet there's currently no effective and easy-to-use communication platform dedicated to education. That's the problem Ublend solves. Like Slack for education.
short-description: Making classroom communication easy and engaging for everyone.

description: Founded by Harvard Business School alum and former start-up executive, Sahar Meghani, Trunkaroo is a monthly subscription box for kids.  Every month we design and deliver smart, delightful hands-on projects for 3-8 year olds. By providing all the necessary materials, instructions and inspiration in a “trunk”, Trunkaroo makes the process of creating, discovering and experimenting magical for kids and super convenient for grown-ups. Each trunk encourages “STEAM-based” exploration, is gender-neutra
short-description: Trunkaroo is an edutainment startup delivering hands-on art and STEM-based projects to children aged 3-8 via a monthly subscription.

description: By clicking on the Pouch icon in their browser as they shop, our users are presented the best valid Voucher codes and discounts for the specific website they are on, without them ever having the leave the site.
short-description: Pouch is a free browser extension that recognises the website you are on, and then applies the best promo codes straight to your basket

description: Oorja aims to provide clean energy access to 450 million un/underelectrified people in rural Indian communities. We deploy smart micro-grids powered by biomass gasification and solar PV systems to generate, store and transmit reliable and affordable electricity to SMEs as anchor load and low-income households. We use a scaleable community-owned business model to leverage energy provision as a catalyst for socio-economic development to alleviate poverty, empower women and tackle climate change.
short-description: Oorja makes clean energy accessible and scalable by empowering rural communities to locally generate and intelligently distribute power.

description: Prostate cancer is a global socio-economic problem. A novel diagnostic approach will help to distinguish between Prostate Cancer and Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia, the most common non-cancer prostatic condition in ageing men with symptoms similar or overlapping with those of prostate cancer. The test can be regularly performed by men using a self-monitoring tool or by a GP using a bench top device. The test will monitor the wellness of the prostate, which is typically affected in cancer patients.
short-description: Cambridge Oncometrix healthcare company uses a proprietary set of biomarkers and analytical technology to detect prostate cancer.

description: AID:Tech brings transparency and efficient to the distribution of funds and social services by governments & NGOs. We use blockchain technology to create a fully traceable flow of information. Our solution works offline and in environments with interrupted power supplies.
short-description: We bring clarity, transparency and efficiency to the distribution of resources by governments, charities and NGOss

description: Clustermarket is an online sharing platform for life scientists to list, discover and book lab- space, equipment, expertise and tissues within their institution or cluster. The resources can be rented out to external counterparties and can also be shared internally to allow a simple integration in the lab manager ‘s daily tasks. Clustermarket's goal is to make R&D in life sciences more affordable and less time consuming, thereby every idea has the chance to become a breakthrough innovation.
short-description: Online sharing platform for life scientists to list, discover and book resources within their institution or cluster.

description: Our mission is to make history every student's favourite subject! We create highly engaging and effective short-form history videos and tailored written resources under the guidance of a former OFSTED inspector. History Bombs' Teachers Resources are now available on our website. Since our launch in October 2016, we have made sales to school customers in the UK, USA, Australia and France. Our focus is now to develop our sales and marketing approach and achieve strong market penetration.
short-description: We produce and publish award-winning educational resources for schools both in the UK and internationally

description: Naturebytes uses technology to re-connect you with wildlife in new and exciting ways. The Naturebytes kits make new technology and sensors accessible for everybody and provide activities that develop digital skills that enable you to see the natural world in ways that weren't possible before. We are a growing community of makers, engineers, scientists, schools and individuals all transforming digital making to help people to re-connect with wildlife.
short-description: Naturebytes - technology to reconnect with wildlife

description: DryGro is an Oxford-based AgTech venture that grows food in the desert. Using proprietary technology, DryGro can grow food in high-temperature environments using 99% less water than conventional agriculture. DryGro has the potential to significantly disrupt food markets globally. At scale, this technology could open up unproductive desert land to economic food production, making a significant impact on global food security and water conservation. Lets make the deserts bloom.
short-description: DryGro is an Oxford-based agriculture technology startup that grows food in the desert using 99% less water.

description: Our online marketplace solves the frustration of finding, calling and emailing dozens of event suppliers only to find that many aren’t available, out of your price range or can’t provide what you need.
short-description: The online marketplace that takes all the hassle out of finding the best event suppliers.

description: Antera is a venture-backed Harvard startup that has designed an all-natural regimen to reduce the risk of allergy development in infants; the first product focuses on peanut allergies. We are launching in Fall ‘16  with over 150 clinics across the US.
short-description: Antera creates therapies for the prevention of allergy development in infants.

description: Sensorwake improves the well-being and health of people by using the sense of smell.
short-description: Sensorwake improves the well-being and health of people by using the sense of smell.

description: Buttery is the easiest way to find and order craft beer and premium spirits from top local stores and get it delivered in under 60 minutes.
short-description: Discover & order craft beer & premium spirits from top local stores. Get it delivered in under 60 minutes.

description: Catalyst for World Water (CWW)  is a social enterprise that integrates photocatalysis with filtration to remove bacteria, viruses, protozoa, and organics from contaminated water. Our photocatalytic filter does not require an external power source as it only needs solar energy, and can be used repeatedly without loss of efficiency. By catalyzing safe, sustainable, and cost-effective solutions to the global water crisis, CWW has the potential to save millions of lives around the world.
short-description: Catalyst for World Water catalyzes sustainable solutions for the global water crisis by harnessing solar energy for water purification.

description: As loved ones go through challenging times, others often want to to step in to help, but don’t know how. At CareHood, caregivers learn what will help the people they love while getting their friends, family and community to pitch in and support them along their path. By curating specific services, tasks and gifts that have helped others in similar situations, CareHood provides a way to set up a supportive community that is truly helpful in meaningful ways from near and far.
short-description: CareHood is where caregivers & their loved ones can discover what can help them & let their friends & family pitch in.

description: Our vision is to offer an innovative solution for nature lovers around the world.  Cnature is a mobile application designed for the identification of plants and animals in real-time. By simply snapping a photo, our user receives a quick and reliable answer to their questions.  Our solution draws on our world-class content, vibrant community and innovative technology.  We are dedicated to connecting the community to nature and providing our users with a new way of experiencing nature.
short-description: Cnature is a mobile application designed for nature lovers. It enables the user to identify plants and animals by snapping a photo.

description: Media companies use CLEO to search and pick visual assets that drive engagement.
short-description: Find and pick the best visual content to drive engagement. Image search and selection for your private repositories.

description: Asarasi is pioneering the recovery and bottling of ~1/2 Billion gals annually of organic maple tree filtrate water; currently a wasted by-product of maple syrup production. We created a bottled tree water, a value added product for farmers and defined a new renewable and sustainable source of fresh pure water! Our product is a pure, sparkling tree-drawn water from the most unique source on earth!  Sysco Food Service is carrying Asarasi, and distributing Asarasi to over 6,000 potential accounts!
short-description: Asarasi is pioneering the recovery of a newly discovered byproduct of maple processing; bottling pure, biological, waters from maple trees!

description: bosWell is building a two-sided marketplace that connects health plans/providers to community-based organizations (CBOs). Both plans/providers and CBOs serve marginalized populations, particularly those who receive health coverage through Medicaid, yet the former often lacks the ability to reach/engage members. bosWell equips CBOs with a free application (www.boswell.io) for client management and links individuals at these touch points back to care teams.
short-description: Connecting vulnerable populations to care

description: Drawing on our team's unique experience in the space, we are building the go-to brand for access, inclusion, and rehabilitation for the 1 billion people worldwide with a disability. Our patent-pending Xogo technology is a new model in accessibility:  a universal platform that enables our customers to access technology via the accessible controls they already use. Xogo will unify a fragmented and underserved market and place us at the center of a newly revitalized disabilities ecosystem.
short-description: Xogo empowers the 1 billion people worldwide with disabilities to connect to and control consumer technology using their own assistive tech.

description: We help middle school students learn real science inquiry and critical thinking skills for tomorrow's STEM jobs using interactive virtual labs where students 'show what they know'. Because our labs can assess inquiry skills automatically, we cut teachers' grading time drastically, give them the real-time data they need to help their students in the moment, and enable them to meet the new national science standards. Apprendis: Deeper learning using virtual labs that grade themselves.
short-description: We give educators a GPS on kids’ science and critical thinking skills as they experiment with virtual labs

description: The boxed wine market's has grown 75% over the last year, fueled by the emergence of millennials as a new type of wine consumer, and remains a segment full of opportunity. Leveraging the consumer trends exhibited by Warby Parker, Harry's, and Everlane, Archer Roose is a 'luxury at a discount' wine company. Its model leverages inefficiencies in the production and packaging of wine, to deliver a high quality product and a unique brand.
short-description: Archer Roose is disrupting the wine industry through innovative sourcing model that delivers an artisan quality wine at an affordable price.

description: Donii is the smart city's answer to material need. Our platform directs good quality donated items directly to the people who need them most. Currently, over 80% of charitably donated items are resold at markup overseas, while thousands of local individuals and families struggle to obtain basic necessities. Donii is a new piece of civic infrastructure that seamlessly connects donors, companies, nonprofits, and recipients to ensure that donated items end up in the right hands and homes.
short-description: Donii eliminates material need locally by getting donated items to the people who need them most.

description: HUB by ekko streams high resolution audio from any source to your existing headphones or speakers. Each user simply plugs any pair of headphones into small, battery-powered sound pucks. The sound pucks can also be connected to any speakers creating multi-room audio. HUB gives users the flexibility to choose which headphones or speakers they use for their wireless listening and streams better than cd quality sound to up to 10 users simultaneously. It’s perfect for movies, music, gaming and more.
short-description: HUB by ekko is the world’s first Hi-Fi Wi-Fi hub for headphones and speakers.

description: Founded by a couple of coffee-deprived undergrads at Northeastern University, New Grounds Food is a health-conscious food company on a mission to provide people with simple & healthy foods to keep you energized for all of life's adventures. As their flagship product towards fulfilling this mission, they created the CoffeeBar: an organic, vegan, and gluten-free energy bar infused with a full cup of fair trade coffee. Eat your coffee!
short-description: New Grounds Food created the CoffeeBar: an organic, vegan, and gluten-free energy bar infused with a full cup of coffee! #EatYourCoffee

description: We're re-imaging what productive video conferencing session should be. We don't just deliver audio and video; we use machine vision, speech recognition and deep learning to enhance and augment the video stream. This allows us to build productivity apps on top of the video conference, that performs functions such as real-time audio transcription, whiteboard enhancement, etc.
short-description: Next generation web-based video conferencing that makes you and your team more productive

description: COURAGEOUS PARENTS NETWORK empowers and supports parents caring for children with life-threatening illness by using Web and Mobile to: (1) provide parents with coping tools to promote resiliency; (2) bring parents into 24/7 community with each other to lessen isolation; (3) educate medical providers about the psycho-social and emotional needs of these families; (4) promote pediatric palliative care. Our vision is that the family’s journey is one of minimal regret and maximum healing.
short-description: COURAGEOUS PARENTS NETWORK empowers and supports parents caring for children with life-threatening illness via Web and Mobile.

description: ConquerX’s mission is to make early cancer detection simpler and accessible to all. To achieve this mission, our team believe that it takes a combination of innovation both in technology and in the perspective through which we see this old problem. We create Metachip, a pan-cancer test able to differentiate cancer cells from healthy cells using affordable molecular profiling. The Metachip’s core technology is a biosensor able to perform rapid and simultaneous molecular profiling of multiple biom
short-description: ConquerX makes early cancer detection simpler and accessible to all with a pan-cancer test powered by electrochemical biosensor technology

description: Describli helps self-publishing authors make effective sales and marketing decisions using actionable data and analytics. Our software connects individual data with large-scale sales and marketing data, yielding incredible insights. Recommendations are specific and actionable, ranging from book pricing and effective Google keywords to audience demographics, sales strategy, and book cover design. We help authors in the $1 billion self-publishing industry to sell more books.
short-description: Data-based decision making, sales tracking, and marketing analytics for self-publishing authors.

description: We are developing an implantable, bioresorbable medical device to regenerate a damaged esophagus within the body. Our device will treat those suffering from esophageal cancer, severe GERD, birth defects of the esophagus, and where poisonous ingestions are fatal addressing a $20 billion dollar U.S. annual market. Our product improves the standard of care by avoiding surgical reconstruction from the stomach (gastric pull up) and saves CMS over $215,000/treatment as compared to the standard.
short-description: D&P Bioinnovations is focued on repairing damaged organs. We are developing an implantable medical device to regrow a damaged esophagus.

description: De-Ice has developed the first-ever fully electric de-icing technology for the aerospace industry. Our device makes de-icing 50% cheaper and an average of 30+ minutes faster than incumbent solutions. Our technology weighs as little as 55 pounds and can be retrofitted on any fixed wing aircraft. The market for our technology is over $10 billion globally. Our team is comprised of five MIT alumni and graduate students. We own 100% of our IP and to-date we’ve been exclusively funded by grants.
short-description: De-Ice is developing a fully electric airplane de-icing system that is 50% cheaper and 30+ minutes faster than any incumbent technologies.

description: Enginologi offers advanced analytics engines and data assets through a software-as-a-service business model to empower brand and analytics leaders to know - in a matter of minutes - where, when and how to confidently accelerate product launches and improve the performance of established brands.
short-description: Enginologi transforms how pharma/biotech brands leverage data and technology to identify and execute against growth opportunities.

description: EMBR labs is a team of passionate MIT innovators dedicated to providing relief to people who always run disruptively hot or cold in everyday environments. We are developing proprietary, cutting-edge technology solutions that leverage the body's natural response to temperature, enabling powerful relief in a wearable and sleek form factor. EMBR Labs is backed by Intel Capital and is preparing to launch its first heating and cooling bracelet, Wristify.
short-description: EMBR Labs is harnessing the power of temperature and changing the way people think about personal comfort.

description: Every day customers are exposed to over 3000 marketing messages – so many messages that brands have become
short-description: KonnecTo is a platform that enables you to reward your customers for engaging  with your brand in the real world.

description: Force SV, LLC aims to develop safe, effective, and environmental methods to further advance the fire protection industry. Primarily by the use of sound as an alternative to foam and chemical fire extinguishers. Traditional Fire Extinguishers have been the standard in extinguishing small fires for decades now, however, they not only leave a mess but are also linked to health problems. This technology causes less damage to equipment, has no expiration date, and requires no refilling equipment.
short-description: Force SV Technologies, LLC aims to develop safe, effective, and environmental methods to further advance the fire protection industry.

description: Parking garages and cities maximize time and space for profit. Have you ever heard of EZ-pass? Fetchpark is a transponder-based, app-complemented, automated parking service for stress free parking. Simply drive up Auto-pay and Walk away. we are completely changing parking. With real time data and cost effective technology. No more parking attendants and costly logistics management companies or pesky meter maids! Our share of $25B is at least 1.5B from 6% transaction fee installation and deals.
short-description: @Fetchpark is a transponder-based, app-complemented, automated parking service that alleviates the stress of city parking.

description: Fashion is fast, and fashion is trendy. Keeping up with what's hot means getting a product as soon as you discover it. And often that discovery is by flipping through a magazine, watching a runway show, or seeing someone wearing something on the street. We don't want consumers to have to type in keywords and fuss with filters to try to retrieve a products they saw. With MARKABLE, all you need is a picture. 'See it. Mark it. Shop it.' That's our promise.
short-description: See it. Mark it. Shop it. We promise to satisfy fashionistas who see products they want in magazines, in videos and in the streets.

description: 90% of all water leaks are from toilets. A faulty $10 part can cause $200 to $2000 in wastage. ALL 40 million toilets in our target market will eventually leak. It's an intermittent problem, hard to detect. The environmental impact: in 15 years toilet leaks in the US waste enough water to fill lake Michigan. Our $15 device clips under the toilet rim, analyses water flow, then flashes a light and sends email when a leak is found. It makes a profit of $10 per unit plus $1/month subscription fee.
short-description: Toilet leaks are huge water wasters and are mostly detected only after getting a huge water bill. Our thumbsized device solves this problem.

description: We are an advanced optical materials company built upon a patented technological breakthrough which allows us to control light based on its angle. We invented a nano-scale film that filters light selectively which will create better optics, significantly reduce energy consumption, and improve renewable energy capture. Our products will enhance displays of electronic devices, dynamically regulate the brightness and temperature of buildings, and improve the efficiency of LEDs and solar cells.
short-description: Advanced optical materials company using nanomaterials to control light, improve optics, and reduce energy consumption.

description: At Franklin Robotics, our first product is a weeding robot for home gardens: addressing the dirty, repetitive, unpleasant task of maintaining a healthy, weed-free garden.
short-description: Franklin Robotics develops robots for agriculture, including Tertill, a weeding robot for home gardens.

description: We are solving the problem for decision makers of the explorationindutry. Whenever miners are faced with the decision of proceeding with the acquisition of a deposit, or further development of a deposit, they must evaluate risk and evaluate the potential value of the deposit for the company. To do so, they currently have to rely on the intuitions of geologists, which is often very inaccurate from the quantitative perspective. We are developing an alternate solution: via machine learning.
short-description: Mission-critical solution that enables better exploration decisions, improves the odds of finding viable deposits, and avoid wastefulness.

description: Gadfly was founded by two real estate lawyers who recognized that existing methods for documenting commercial leases took too long, were too costly and limited easy access to lease information. LeasePilot is a SaaS platform that allows in-house and law firm lawyers to more efficiently document leases and converts those leases into data. The result: cost savings, accelerated revenue and portfolio optimization for property owners.
short-description: LeasePilot streamlines the documentation of commercial leases and converts them into data to deliver value to property owners and law firms.

description: High Q Imaging intends to lower the cost of MRI machines by an order of magnitude through an innovative redesign of the MRI system inspired by modern research and internally generated IP.
short-description: We're building a low-cost, portable MRI that aims to substantially reduce the price of medical imaging through newly developed technology.

description: Hive Maritime helps the shipping industry save billions of wasted dollars by optimizing routes around congested choke points.  By forecasting traffic in the world’s ports and canals weeks in advance, Hive will optimize a ship’s course and speed to minimize fuel expenditure, reduce machinery failures, improve cargo throughput, and prevent contractual late fees, adding directly to the bottom line of struggling carriers and bringing one of the oldest and largest industries into the 21st century.
short-description: Hive Maritime is revolutionizing the shipping industry, using predictive analytics and machine learning to save billions in inefficiencies.

description: Herald is a software platform that will help unleash the value of electronic medical records. Herald delivers the critical medical information providers need ­when and how they want it. It empowers clinicians to customize alerts based on real­time data from the EMR, thereby transforming the current “pull” model into a “push” model. This saves providers time and allows them to selectively filter for the data most important to improving patient outcomes.
short-description: Herald is on a mission to make healthcare safer by offering clinicians real­time access to clinical data exactly when and how they want it.

description: Health Advocacy Innovations is removing the guessing game from treating children suffering from disease. Many diseases, such as tuberculosis, have no medications in child-friendly forms. This means that doctors and nurses must cut adult pills by hand for each child to take. This is incredibly inefficient and inaccurate, and prevents children from getting the treatment they deserve. In partnership with Partners in Health, HMS, and Operation ASHA, our tool will address these failures in treatment.
short-description: Solving neglected global health issues in a low-tech, high impact way.

description: Over 1.5 billion people suffer from diseases in which the available medicines don't work, are too expensive or have harmful side effects. These include chronic pain, PTSD, Alzheimer's disease and many rare diseases, like childhood epilepsy. Many of these patients are forced to depend on crude, and unreliable products from medical marijuana. We use a yeast-based system to produce the active compounds of cannabis, providing specialized solutions for patients, researchers and pharma companies.
short-description: We are building a new supply chain for high quality and inexpensive medicine, by engineering yeast to produce natural products.

description: Gravyty is the first cloud-based, predictive analytics platform that combines private data with big public data and behavioral insights to help nonprofits raise more money. We democratize the fundraising process by predicting who is going to make the next major gift and when best to contact them - without having to migrate data. This solves a major problem for over 600,000 nonprofits - increasing efficiency by reducing onboarding time and amplifying their mission without hiring more people.
short-description: Superior nonprofit fundraising from major donors through predictive analytics. Offered as a beautiful, accessible, and turnkey solution.

description: Noex DOT (Data on Therapy) is a wearable device designed to passively monitor and track the activity of an individual regaining range of motion after injury or surgery. While DOT is worn, it provides the patient with statistics on their range of motion progress and gives clinicians hard data on the patient’s activity outside the office. Patients benefit from increased awareness on their recovery and the motivation it offers; clinicians are able to provide more effective and specialized care.
short-description: Noex is bringing data to at-home physical therapy and providing patients with immediate feedback on their recovery progress.

description: Parachute recruits, screens and trains members of the local community to be substitute teachers. Our teachers don’t just hand out worksheets, they bring their own unique talents to the classroom. Parachute Teachers are yoga instructors, dancers, photographers, chefs, scientists, and engineers. We’re Uber for substitute teachers – and our teachers are reimagining the role of the substitute.
short-description: A marketplace for substitute teachers.

description: HPVs, which infect 1 in 4 adults, cause cancers including those of the cervix, so preventive vaccination is imperative to combat this epidemic. However current vaccines suffer from incomplete protection and poor uptake (<40%). The low-cost, patented RGVax prevents infection by all disease-causing HPVs, opening new indications to market it as a childhood vaccine. With NCI grant support, RGVax will enter clinical testing in 2018 to displace existing offerings and expand the US$2B HPV market.
short-description: PathoVax is transforming the multi-billion HPV vaccine market with RGVax, a best-in-class candidate targeting all disease-associated HPVs.

description: Optimede provides a single-use disposable, flexible endoscope to reduce infections that can occur during the 60 million endoscopies performed every year. Currently hospitals must sterilize equipment before each use and yet 130,000 patients are infected with the superbugs annually. In many cases, this results in death. Our single-use endoscopes are sterilized at the factory to avoid contamination. It reduces cleaning and labor costs. The product will be available for sale this year.
short-description: Endoscopic related Healthcare-Associated Infections impact 130,000 patients annually. Optimede we help to eliminate this source of HAI.

description: PiraShield is a surveillance system for digital content. PiraShield locates and then reports stolen copies of online digital products.
short-description: PiraShield is a surveillance system for digital content. PiraShield locates and then reports stolen copies of digital products online.

description: We simplify how health conscious consumers can satisfy one of the most important basic needs every human has: a healthy good night’s sleep. To achieve this, we combine crowd sourced & the customer’s unique body data to configure and directly sell a “Personal Mattress” via our e-commerce platform to singles & couples. Furthermore, the German engineered & US patented product design allows an easy reconfiguration anytime by only replacing certain elements, if the customers’ body dimensions change.
short-description: Personal Mattress is the only customizable sleep system that combines crowd sourced & your unique body data to let you sleep healthier!

description: Parkloco brings data analytics to the parking industry. Our analytics software platform helps parking lot owners understand their business and drives revenue by providing real-time occupancy and actionable insights into customer traffic. Using this real time data, Parkloco can;
short-description: Parkloco increases revenue for parking facilities by providing data analytics and sharing the data with multiple consumer channels.

description: mDoc is a digital health company focused on sub-Saharan Africa which provides people living with chronic disease with 24/7 access to integrated care support through a network of providers via mobile and web platforms. mDoc aims to further build capability and to support physicians to provide education and tools to patients to improve self-management.  Our ethos is etched in the belief that augmenting the healthcare & technology landscape is paramount to helping Africa unlock its true potential.
short-description: We are a digital health company that aims to dramatically improve access to high quality healthcare by leveraging technology interfaces.

description: Mighty Well creates wellness wear designed for patients by patient to facilitate medical on a daily basis-- our first product is the PICCPerfect PICC line cover. We are humanizing people that have been dehumanized through the medical treatment process. Our products provide confidence, ease of treatment, and style during a patient’s difficult medical process. Products in development include PORTPerfect, PILLPerfect, and ShowerPerfect. We inspire patients to #LiveMightyWell.
short-description: Mighty Well creates wellness wear designed for patients by patients. Our first product is the PICCPerfect PICC line cover.

description: MiMecore's focus is the development of biomimetic proteoglycans.  Scientific research has demonstrated that natural proteoglycans are powerful macromolecules that maintain the health of the extracellular matrix of soft tissues.  In skin, by the time adults reach their late 30's, the natural aging process has reduced proteoglycan content by 40%.  MiMecore's solution is to restore that deficit by replenishing with its proprietary proteoglycan-mimics.
short-description: MiMecore Therapeutics is developing a novel therapeutic approach to disrupt age-related change to skin.

description: Modvion supplies tall and modular wind power towers in composite materials. Wind power plant owners get increased returns on investments if they build taller towers. However, conventional towers can’t reach higher than approximately 360 ft. in a cost efficient way. Modvion has an effective patented solution, part of the answer is the low cost composite material CLT which simultaneously makes the tower an effective C02-storage.
short-description: Modvion is the IKEA of Wind Power. Our modular tall towers in composite material enable transport, increase output and decrease costs.

description: Our VisionPort technology offers both clinical and economic value to surgeons, patients and hospitals. The VisionPort facilitates safer and more efficient MIS procedures at a lower cost than conventional laparoscopic systems. Advantages include: Combines four capital devices into one device, gives the surgeon complete control of the visual field, eliminates the need for an assistant (camera holder) and reduces the number of incisions/ports by at least one.
short-description: Minimally invasive surgical imaging firm that redefines and simplifies laparoscopic surgery with our novel,cost-effective VisionPort device.

description: NangioTx, Inc. has developed a proprietary injectable drug, V-10, that creates new blood vessels for the treatment of peripheral artery disease (PAD), for which there is currently no FDA-approved therapy. PAD is characterized by poor blood flow to the legs, which leads to tissue damage and ultimately limb amputation/death. V-10’s activity is localized, minimally invasive, reverses the disease, and is cost-efficient. We have secured IP and have 'freedom to operate.'
short-description: We have developed a drug that generates new, mature blood vessels that restores blood flow to dying muscles.

description: Movia increases the accessibility, decreases the costs and improves the outcomes of interventions for children with autism. Movia establishes competitive advantages through:
short-description: Movia provides collaberative robotics for a variety of markets, assistive teaching of Special Ed, STEM and other service areas.

description: The triangle of patients, hospitals and insurance is a broken $3.5 T industry.
short-description: Empowering Hospitals to navigate risk.

description: SalesBrief is a digital presentation folder that keeps your sales team organized.  By sharing all of the documents, videos, and websites used in an enterprise sale in a beautifully presented SalesBrief link rather than in a string of email attachments, companies can keep their prospects organized, move them through the steps of an evaluation process faster, and use action-based analytics to predict sales outcomes.
short-description: SalesBrief is a digital presentation folder that keeps your sales team organized, leading to faster deals and predictable forecasts.

description: 'Ohno' is a character that represents your great granddaughter. SaveOhno.org is your platform to take action on social causes today, in order to improve her world tomorrow. We've sourced over 7000 online petitions and partnered with 15 organizations to deliver a variety of impactful actions in a gamified environment. We market this platform through a campus competitions model, where 20+ student organizations generate thousands of petition signatures and partner actions in month-long campaigns.
short-description: SaveOhno.org is a gamified platform for environmental activism. Help shape your great granddaughter's future by taking action today!

description: Safi Organics produces carbon-negative fertilizer from locally available agricultural waste using proprietary low-cost, decentralized biomass conversion reactors. Safi Organics’ fertilizer, compared to traditional commercial varieties, can reverse long-term soil acidity/degradation, thereby increasing crop yield by up to 30%. In addition to being a profitable enterprise, the company creates local income, reduces waste, and mitigates environmental pollutions associated with waste burning.
short-description: Safi Organics produces a carbon-negative fertilizer blend from waste that improves rural farmers' yields by 30% and income by 50%.

description: Learning languages is one of the most important challenges many of us face, whether accessing higher education, conducting business globally, or integrating into a new society as an immigrant. Usually language learning is scary, boring and hard, discouraging learners from believing they can follow through. Skylight Games' first app, Lyriko: Learn Languages with Music, makes learning fun, effective, convenient, and social, empowering independent learners everywhere to reach these goals.
short-description: Skylight Games is a social enterprise aiming to inspire a love of learning through play. Lyriko: Learn Languages with Music is our first app

description: Searchin collects and analyzes data the web, discovers open positions and potential candidates and engages with both people and companies to find potential matches – all without any human intervention. With 76% of currently employed high-tech workers open to hearing about new opportunities, Searchin’s strength is tapping into the previously locked passive candidates market.
short-description: Searchin is an AI powered talent sourcer discovering & analyzing candidates by skills, personality & company culture – all within minutes

description: Rover Development has created the Jasha sensor - a very low cost RFID pressure sensor that resides within a tire, ball, or other inflatable.  The sensor is completely powered and queried by the user's smartphone, right through the outside of the tire.  No batteries needed!  The sensor has been released and is currently available for evaluation and purchase.
short-description: Rover develops new IoT concepts focused on consumer engagement with their everyday things

description: Few authors get the chance to publish with traditional publishing houses. We provide everyone a platform to publish their novels on. To get readers and feedback.
short-description: RoyalRoadL is a platform for authors to publish their novels on. It grew and became a free library with almost 6000 webnovels.

description: SherpaDesk focuses on what matters most to professional services - Time. The complete solution to manage customer issues, capture all billable time & expenses and monitor projects' profitability.
short-description: The complete help desk, time tracking and invoicing solution for professional service organizations

description: For manufacturing industry unexpected downtime is a major issue. For instance, on average downtime costs the auto industry $22.000 every minute, that equals to $1.3 million per hour of downtime.
short-description: Pzartech contribute to reducing unplanned downtime through spare parts recognition and 3D printing of spare parts

description: We help families live healthier lives by providing easy to use nutrition & portion control dinnerware systems. What we see is that kids don't know much about nutrition; Moms & Teachers are ill-equipped to fill the knowledge gap; and eating on the go makes everything so much worse. Our products are visual aids, with dietary guidelines  seamlessly integrated into the user friendly designs, at home or on the go. Backed by sound science; vetted & sold by the American Diabetes Association since 2011.
short-description: The only Nutrition Lifestyle Company to produce EZ habit-changing portion control dinnerware systems  for kids & adults for all occasions!

description: SoundBridge, formerly known as Lumit Audio, is a Boston-based advanced audio technology company focused on developing revolutionary methods for music creation. Our flagship product, Lumit, has proven to yield professional music, while eliminating the complexity presented by traditional systems. We offer a breakthrough technology that challenges the conventional standard – leading the music software industry into the 21st Century.
short-description: We make Lumit, a professional, affordable, and easy-to-learn music recording application for the modern mobile musician.

description: The explosive growth of internet video has been followed by a boom in websites that license music content to video creators. In the top 20 alone, there are over 5 millions songs available. With each site using their own search, video creators spend days sorting through content just to find the perfect song.
short-description: It shouldn't take a day to find music for a 3 minute video.  We're helping video creators locate the right song for their content.

description: There are 750k rec spaces in the US.  On average, these spaces go unused 57% of available hours, leaving an opportunity cost close to $100b for these facilities.  The Spaces to Go platform allows private rec facilities such as sports complexes, schools, YMCAs and Boys & Girls Clubs to publicize their available space to social, sports and fitness groups through an easy-to-use public-facing app.  We allow access to basketball courts, fields, pools and more with search, booking, and payment.
short-description: Spaces to Go is a platform that connects social, sports, and fitness groups with the spaces they need for the activities they love.

description: Today, AD is always detected too late - throwing patients into an invasive and painful diagnostic process that is expensive for the entire ecosystem of care. RetiSpec is developing a simple, non-invasive eye scanner to detect AD biomarkers before clinical symptoms emerge. RetiSpec’s solution will provide a catalyst for research, reduce treatment costs and ultimately improve quality of life for patients and caregivers.
short-description: RetiSpec is a medical device company developing a non-invasive eye scanner for early detection of Alzheimer’s Disease (AD).

description: STOKES is an all natural firestarter-made with no chemicals and only recycled pulp, wax and sawdust from sustainably harvested trees. I started making these firestarters as holiday gifts with lint from dryer, egg cartons and candle stubs when I was 11.They evolved into a product that is now in over 300 stores in 8 states. Retailers include Whole Foods, Market Basket, Stop and Shop, and Shaws. STOKES work! With one match. Currently manufactured in Natick in partnership with Charles River Indust.
short-description: STOKES-all natural, non-chemical firestarter made with recycled pulp, wax and sustainably harvested wood sawdust. Use with wood/charcoal.

description: Spyce has developed the world’s first automated restaurant - a machine that is manually loaded with fresh, raw ingredients, and is capable of autonomously preparing, cooking, and serving delicious meals with absolutely no human involvement. Spyce operates with drastically reduced overhead costs, and will transform the fast food industry by serving healthy, delicious meals from fresh, organic ingredients, while maintaining a typical 'fast food' price-point.
short-description: The Spyce Kitchen is the world's first automated restaurant. It autonomously cooks and serves healthy, delicious meals w very low overhead.

description: Users want real-time info from businesses (wait time, food special, private party etc). Businesses want to share but lack a dedicated channel to do so. Spots lets business share promotions, specials, events, and alerts to users in real-time. Users get access to the real-time info they want, and businesses can engage with new and returning customers and drive more people through the door. Spots helps users to find what they're looking for and gives business a dedicated channel to engage.
short-description: Spots is an experiential search platform that connects businesses and customers in real-time.

description: Spriteli is a digital health company which aims to reduce anxiety and elevate mood levels of our users through daily, 2 minute, video consultations.
short-description: Spriteli is a digital health company seeking to improve outcomes and lower cost for mental healthcare.

description: Suspect Technologies aims to continuously improve the security, safety of people and access to services by using computer vision software. This encompasses three product lines, which all represent 10B+ markets: intelligent video surveillance, analytics, and identity verification computer vision products.
short-description: Intelligent video surveillance, analytics, and identity verification computer vision products.

description: ParkWise app automatically collects parking related data from its users, such as: their parking locations, distance to their vehicles, current locations of other drivers looking for parking, routes they just passed and historic data for this area.
short-description: ParkWise is a crowd-sourcing mobile app providing drivers with real-time street parking availability and parking regulations.

description: The vast majority of existing dams in the U.S. don't produce electricity. The untapped potential is huge. By utilizing innovative & proprietary technology, Surge Hydro provides Renewable Energy as a Service, helping municipalities and utilities electrify our nations idle infrastructure. We currently own and operate five hydroelectric dams. By utilizing these assets as a working laboratory, we will stimulate and inspire the creation of hydro power solutions across New England.
short-description: 80,000 dams in America don't produce electricity. The potential waiting to be tapped is enough to power 4.8 million homes. It’s time to tap.

description: The Happy Hope Factory & Foundation goal is to build a permanent, year round facility where we would deliver a hope bag to every child in every hospital bed nationwide. We have reached over 250,000 children since 2013 through the popular 'Happy Hope Bag' project, a vital resource to hospitals and the emotional well-being of children with special needs, chronic and life threatening illnesses. Hope Bags are filled with age appropriate activities to keep minds occupied and hearts filled with HOPE!
short-description: The Happy Hope Factory, 501c3 charity, inspires communities nationwide to share HOPE packaging 'Happy Hope Bags' for hospitalized children.

description: TAA believes that scientific innovation can help to eliminate sexual assault. For the first time, TAA is integrating rapid evidence-validating tech into kits so that survivors leave the hospital knowing exactly what evidence has been collected and how it will be used in forensic labs.
short-description: TAA creates faster, less invasive, and more informative rape kits so that every survivor feels validated and in control of their future

description: Informal economies in sub-Saharan Africa -- 55% ($865B) of the region’s GDP -- are impaired by the world’s lowest levels of interpersonal trust. Without recourse, employers refuse service providers any advance payment. 87% of service providers cannot find working capital and 90% struggle to recover payments they’re owed. Our secure contracts allow clients to transact with confidence and build their professional equity. A trusted intermediary, we facilitate growth in low-trust economies.
short-description: We offer secure contracts that allow our clients to transact with confidence and build professional equity in low-trust, informal economies.

description: Over 1,000,000 procedures are performed every year in the US to insert tubes in the eardrum to drain fluid from middle ear infection. These tubes will cause over 150,000 permanent perforations of the eardrum that will require surgery to repair. Surgery is the only option, though it costs $18,000 per surgery and has about 40% success rate. We developed Perf-Fix to be the first gel patch to repair chronic eardrum perforations with an office procedure, and at twice the success rate as surgery.
short-description: We are commercializing the first gel patch for nonsurgical repair of eardrum perforations.

description: Sophisticated medical device companies invest in exploration of unmet needs and methods to de-risk the process of creating new device solutions. Currently such companies only operate where there are very large potential market opportunities, as in orthopedics and vascular devices for the developed world, and are not exploring the developing world pediatric opportunities. To fill this gap, we have come together to satisfy the unmet needs of the children and pediatric clinicians around the world.
short-description: We aim to redesign and reduce the cost of medical devices and hope that someday ALL children will have access to modern healthcare.

description: No one knows how much a minute of microwaving cost; you just know it’s cheap and it's paid through your monthly bill. Inspired by this, we’re a team of Duke and HBS graduates that want to pay for online media just as we pay our utility bills. Using blockchain technology, we developed a patent-pending process to allow the per-unit monetization of impressions and URL referrals. The NewsCoin makes penny-sized transactions simple, profitable and as convenient as the microwave’s 1-minute button.
short-description: The NewsCoin is a micropayments aggregator for media companies, using blockchain technology to allow direct monetization of pageviews.

description: Our founder suffered an asthma attack using a leading 'green' cleaning product whose label was hiding toxic and irritating ingredients. The Optimist Co. is disrupting the cleaning product aisle by only using recognizable ingredients and breaking down the culture of mistrust through transparency. We are the only company that encourages our customers to make our products at home, sharing the knowledge needed to clean without chemicals. Cleaning is simple and safe when you clean like an optimist!
short-description: Disrupting the cleaning aisle with recognizable ingredients and products @The_Optimist_Co teaches you to make yourself #DIY

description: At Symbiosis, our mission is to change the way healthcare is delivered and documented. We're building a Virtual Scribe, EVA, who lives on healthcare providers' mobile devices and integrates into facilities' existing electronic health records. EVA uses natural language processing and machine learning to automate intuitive, on-the-go clinical workflow while accelerating medical note writing, capturing more reimbursement revenue and improving patient satisfaction.
short-description: EVA is a Health IT platform for providers that accelerates medical note writing, captures more revenue and improves patient satisfaction.

description: When fishing for 'the big one', anglers worldwide know that live bait is best but can cost a lot of time and money to procure and keep alive.  Zombait™ is the world’s first robotic fishing device designed to impart realistic and powerful swimming motion to otherwise dead bait fish to be used in the commercial and sport fishing industries.
short-description: Zombait lures save fishermen time and money by putting the life back into fishing bait!  Live bait effective.  Dead bait easy.

description: Zasaka works with Zambian smallholder farmers to produce high quality legume seed. Zambian farmers are vulnerable to the production of the same crop every season. The crop is victim to volatility in prices and offers very little returns to the farmers. We diversify the crop provide unique loan package that includes high value legume seed, intensive production training, monitoring and marketing of the produce. When the loan is paid, Zasaka buys back 100% of the farmers produce at a premium price
short-description: We focus on increasing small-scale farmer incomes through, extension training, sustainable production and marketing of quality legume seed

description: We are creating a company to reinvent work for women.  Work is not working for many women in America. We are building an engaged and ambitious community of women to challenge traditional work models. WERK reinvents work for women, helping them thrive in work and in life. WERK modernizes working models by providing options, innovative models, and incentives, and speaks with an authentic, socially progressive voice to bring together a community of loyal users and improve the lives of women.
short-description: WERK is a marketplace of flexible work arrangements for ambitious women.

description: Companies often plan delivery routes days in advance, but on the day of delivery things can and will change. Wise helps companies respond to day-of changes by identifying delays & readjusting routes to maintain efficiency. Wise generates accurate realtime ETAs for drivers and dispatchers and learns from fleets to create informed recommendations. Wise is partnering with Global 500 and large transport companies. Wise can reduce late deliveries by over 80% and increase utilization by over 20%.
short-description: Wise Systems provides enterprise software to help companies make realtime delivery decisions

description: Thanks to drones autonomous capabilities, they are being used to perform tasks that would otherwise be too time consuming, dangerous, or expensive for humans.
short-description: We are developing state-of-the-art docking stations for drones, making drone applications 100% autonomous.

description: XenoTherapeutics is a catalyst to bring life-saving xenotechnology from the lab bench to patients in need. Its first endeavor is a groundbreaking xenoskin product derived from porcine donors that can be used to treat human patients suffering with severe burn injuries in both civilian and military settings around the globe. If successful, this groundbreaking technology can be translated to other applications and will also pave the way for future xeno-derived organs, such as kidneys and lungs.
short-description: XenoTherapeutics is a nonprofit entity seeking to further xenotransplantation by bringing xenoskin graft technology from the lab to patients

description: Mobile destination guides have huge potential, but the market is broken. Guides are expensive for institutions and authors to develop and maintain, and difficult for travelers to find and use.
short-description: The app platform for publishing, discovering, and experiencing mobile destination guides and tours.

description: WeThrive empowers children of under-resourced communities to overcome socioeconomic obstacles by teaching life skills through after­ school entrepreneurship programs. Using the campus chapter model, our college students mentor and teach students in their local community. Over the course of 1 academic school year, middle and high school students learn and practice life skills, gain mentorship, and form a support system in their very own neighborhood as they create a business venture of their own.
short-description: An entrepreneurial mentoring program pairing college students with middle school students of under-resourced communities.

description: During last decades there were no real progress in performance of parametric CAD.
short-description: Our mission is to allow users of parametric CAD applications to work in a fast and robust way with geometric models of unlimited complexity

description: We invented a new car. A car that you would want to drive in the city. And most importantly, a car that you would want to park in the city. City Transformer is a two-seater light, environmental friendly electric car that has the ability to fold into the parking space of a motorcycle while maintaining a high safety factor for the passengers. It consumes 1/4 of the parking area of conventional vehicle.
short-description: City Transformer is an innovative unique folding vehicle that you drive has a car and park has a motorcycle.

description: uSonik is the ultrasonic mouth cleaner that cleans all your teeth simultaneously in less than 20 seconds. Our unique architecture is designed to target all surfaces, crevices, and plaque deposits in your mouth. Ultrasonic cleaning can also eliminate bacteria, whiten teeth, and minimize gum damage common in brushing. Our mission is to revolutionize the way you clean your teeth everyday, and save time and improve oral health for millions of people.
short-description: uSonik is a unique ultrasonic mouth cleaner, designed to clean all your teeth faster and more effectively than toothbrushing.

description: VRDoodler.com is a free-form 3D content creation tool on the web that facilitates early ideation and creation in spatial prototyping and analysis. Draw/prototype a building, a story and render it in VR or AR! Also easily modifiable.
short-description: VRDoodler is a browser-based 3D drawing platform that offers low-level content creation for Virtual and Augmented Reality.

description: CloudBeat is an enterprise grade test automation and synthetic monitoring platform based on Selenium and Appium. It allows companies to automate manual testing process, reduce costs, improve product quality and speed up delivery process. It also allows to monitor live websites and mobile apps by simulating real-user behaviour and monitoring the most popular use cases and critical business processes. CloudBeat offers full cloud, hybrid cloud and on-premises service.
short-description: CloudBeat makes testing and monitoring mobile and web apps ridiculously simple.

description: WATER HERO IS “SMART” AFFORDABLE PLUMBING LEAK DETECTION + PROTECTION FOR EVERYONE
short-description: Plumbing catastrophe avoidance for everyone. Stops pipe bursts & small costly plumbing leaks. SmartPhone controlled & easy to install.

description: Globally, 1.2 billion people lack access to electricity and existing solutions are costly and hard to scale. We enable energy service providers to quickly develop and easily manage low-cost modular microgrids in off-grid areas using uLink: a smart device that has power routing, payments and resource management capabilities. We tap into the $3.1 billion global off-grid market by selling uLink and generate recurring revenue through the uLink cloud platform.
