description: Like  the ice  cream  truck in  the  USA,  My  Fruit Truck  passes  by  neighborhoods  on  the  same  day  and time every week, letting customers pick their own selection of fresh fruits and vegetables directly from the truck. Sourced on the day, the produces are guaranteed fresh and delivered on time, on a weekly basis. Building up our customers  trust, we will adapt the selection to their preference, and guide them through phone and online pre-orders.
short-description: My fruit truck provides fresh fruits and vegetables to housing complexes, lifting the burden of shopping for working class women in Kenya

description: We offer an online waste-to-solution marketplace that stimulates the creation of innovative B2B reuse solutions, supporting a culture shift towards a circular economy. We connect innovative companies having waste, side streams or leftovers, with like-minded manufacturing companies that are interested to procure their products in a more sustainable way. Our customers benefit from our inter-sectoral know-how and an intelligent matchmaking  to improve current and discover new reuse opportunities.
short-description: Rethink your waste streams! RethinkResource offers an intelligent marketplace for secondary resources, to initiate a circular economy.

description: Wealth management business models and processes are being disrupted by digitization, new financial products, and upcoming regulations. Protagoras is a digital solution for financial advisors. It offers unique risk profiling and country-specific tax functionality, addressing each investor’s specific situation and preferences. Our interactive, data-driven, algorithmic approach radically improves the understanding of client investment preferences and automates compliance with upcoming regulations.
short-description: Protagoras solves massive risk, tax, and compliance issues for financial advisors by providing the most precise investor profiling platform.

description: Rayform brings never-before-seen design opportunities to consumer products and packaging. The key to this technology is a computer algorithm that calculates the 3D surface needed to create any target image from light. By slightly modifying the shape of a transparent or reflective surface to the surface computed with the algorithm, incoming light is redirected to form amazingly clear and highly detailed light images on nearby surfaces.
short-description: Rayform integrates light redirection technology into products, allowing them to form highly detailed images when illuminated.

description: Hotels are missing out on additional revenue because ordering room service, massages or laundry services involves too many transaction barriers. Millennials are becoming the main holidaymakers and they spend more and more on services. JUBEO allows hotels to efficiently sell extra services through a platform of web & mobile apps. By addressing the common needs of independent hotels, which dominate the European market, JUBEO's business model focuses on creating win-win partnerships.
short-description: JUBEO boosts a hotel's revenues by facilitating the process of selling extra services to its guests.

description: Kapaw helps the youth get informed about things that matter to them. Kapaw will optimise storytelling and its distribution: The stories (episodes) will be created in content capsules, composed of video, memes, articles, social conversations, photos, gifs, live streams etc… each content item is shared across platforms and redirects to the full capsule.
short-description: Kapaw is the voice of the youth, telling our stories with a completely platform and format agnostic content delivery system.

description: PRAGMA Therapeutics develops innovative and proprietary First-in-Class small molecule drugs specifically acting at the mGlu7 receptor for the treatment of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder and hearing loss.
short-description: PRAGMA Therapeutics is a biotech company developing First-in-Class medicines for treating Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder and Hearing Loss.

startupname: Planet Hort - learning sustainability in a playful way
description: „Planet Hort - learning sustainability in a playful way“ is the first organization in Switzerland that aims to integrate Education for Sustainable Development into after-school care. Our activities and courses deal with the five main sustainability topics biodiversity, cultural plurality, consumption, energy and waste. With our program we want to encourage children at an early stage to engage in a sustainable interaction with the environment. And empower day-care personal to adopt our approach.
short-description: „Planet Hort - learning sustainability in a playful way“ wants to integrate Education for Sustainable Development into after-school care.

description: Are you part of the B2B industry and would you like to know the satisfaction of your customers at all touch points in real-time?
short-description: We enable B2B companies to implement their customer service vision in a smarter and faster way

description: Our startup is designing, building and commercializing small-scale Mobile Solar Water Pumps at a very low cost using local resources. These pumps are small-scale, robust and reliable alternative to conventional diesel pumps. Being mobile means a group of farmers can share the unit and split the cost, or one person can use it as a source of income and rent to other farmers. Our target market is 5 million Egyptian farmers who won less than one acre and mostly use diesel pumps for irrigation.
short-description: We develop, build and commercialize low-cost, reliable Mobile Solar Water Pumps for small farmers who own less than 1 acre.

description: Unlike other virtual tour solutions, our approach does not required any hardware components. This makes the proven concept of virtual tours scalable and accessible to the large market of private users. Our strategy to approach the large market of private users quickly and effectively is via partnerships with established real estate online platforms. These can increase their revenue by offering our virtual tour solution e.g. in a premium package to their users, while the profit is shared.
short-description: Spectando offers a novel and scalable solution to create virtual property tours easily and quickly with just a smartphone.

description: Ultra-rapid detection of pathogenic microorganisms in water and food.
short-description: ultra-rapid detection of dangerous bacteria in water and food

description: Speaksli is an engaging multi-faceted language learning platform combining real-world approaches to learning languages with practical yet entertaining educational content. Fueled by today’s immigration crisis, we make free video content to help foreigners build better lives and reduce the human burden on society. We are passionate about education and focused on creating simple, affordable and accessible technology solutions to accelerate social and cultural integration and economic empowerment.
short-description: Speaksli is an engaging multi-faceted language learning platform that helps accelerate global cultural integration and economic empowerment.

description: Before any surgeries, the use of sterilized medical instruments is essential to avoid infections. Today's solutions use extensive amount of water and electricity and require high maintenance. Keeping this in mind, and the fact that natural ressources in developing countries could be a problem. This leads up to 20 times more infections in these countries. Sterilux is developing a solution that enables every hospitals to benefit from correctly sterilized medical instruments.
short-description: Sterilux is a swiss medTech start-up developing a sterilization medical devices for hospitals in developing countries

description: SUN bioscience is the first company to standardize organoid cultures. Organoids are mini-organs grown from stem cells with potential from personalized drug screening to transplants. Our first focus is to bring retinal organoids to clinics with the long-term goal to transplant photoreceptors for retinal degeneration, a set of diseases with neither treatments nor cures. While establishing the GMP protocols, we service pharmaceutical companies for their drug screening needs.
short-description: We standardize organoids for personalized medicine.

description: Revenues of online clothing retailers keep growing, but margins are contracting. On average, e-shoppers return 30-50% of what they purchase. The chief reason for an item being returned is that the customer is disappointed with the fit. To get the fit right and dramatically lower returns we need everyone to shop with a personal stylist! This motivated us to create StyleBot37, a plug-in for e-commerce which mimics the brains of human stylists and solves the major problem that retailers face today.
short-description: StyleBot37 is an online personal stylist powered by a learning algorithm.

description: We are focused on bringing early stage malaria diagnoses to the masses. Last year more than 400,000 people died from malaria, 70% of which were children under the age of five. There are not enough medical experts in the world to diagnose everyone infected. Our solution is an easy to use, smartphone connected microscope adapter, and an app that uses deep learning to diagnose malaria within seconds, speeding up the process of diagnosing malaria many folds.
short-description: Diagnosing malaria with machine learning and your smartphone

description: Our focus is to improve existing systems in the world. We provide ultra low power, reliable and cost-effective solutions from scientific research with high standards of technology know-how. With an entire view of the process, we start from security and communication concepts and provide extremely power efficient systems with smart softwares to business customers in cleantech and smart home sectors.
short-description: We provide ultra low power solutions and security solutions for business customers based on advanced technology and scientific researches.

description: Drugs are usually prescribed at a standard dosage whatever the patient profile. However, critical drugs (anticancer, antiHIV...) need a close monitoring of blood concentrations and a personalised dosage prescription to avoid toxicity or loss of effectiveness. There is currently no ergonomic and comprehensive solution to help physicians interpreting these observed concentrations. The Tucuxi software fills this gap by combining sophisticated algorithms with a personalized and user-friendly tool.
short-description: The 'Tucuxi' software assists physicians to individually adjust dosage of medicines based on the monitoring of blood drug concentrations

description: Biopharma and diagnostic companies use our proprietary machine learning software platform to address integrative data analysis and extract knowledge and insights from their diagnostic, pre-clinical, clinical and contextual data.
short-description: Acquired by Precision for Medicine March 2019 - Translational analytics and biomarker machine learning platform BOSS.

description: Technis equips infrastructure destined to accomodate crowds with arrays of smart carpets counting the number of people in the venues. Beyond the enhanced security now monitoring allowed thresholds and making sure everyone has left the building in case of an emergency, Technis offers optimised marketing and staff management.
short-description: Counting the exact number of people in a building whilst respecting their privacy, thus optimising security, marketing and staff management.

description: There are millions of registered NGOs in the world, but unfortunately most people interested in helping only have access to the 100 biggest ones. Share A Dream will change this. How? Through an interactive communication platform, we aim at creating a bridge between little-known local NGOs and actors of change. By certifying and covering projects worldwide, our team ensures Transparency and Direct Impact to potential donors, experts and volunteers willing to contribute from home or in the field.
short-description: A communication platform that aims at connecting people to local NGOs to increase social awareness and allow anybody to have a direct impact

description: ScienceMatters is a new open science initiative dedicated to publishing single, well-validated observations. Its main innovations are the fact that we publish only single-observation publishing (rather than publishing stories), that we use a triple-blind peer-review (no bias due to authors’ identities, institutions, gender or nationality) and a quantitative peer-review system (scoring from 0-10), as well as open access, open data and open science licences. This brings back fairness, speed and to
short-description: ScienceMatters is a new open science initiative dedicated to publishing single, well-validated observations.

description: Apolitical is an international platform connecting the best ideas and people in the public service to solve the hardest challenges facing our societies. It’s like TripAdvisor meets LinkedIn for policy. Apolitical’s public service network partners include Chatham House, The Wilson Women in Public Service Project, the Presidential Innovation Fellows and the Open Data Institute. Media partners include The World Economic Forum, Vice and Fast Company.
short-description: Connecting innovators in government everywhere to the ideas, people and resources they need to solve society's hardest challenges.

short-description: Vize makes data working incredibly agile and easy, enabling people to squeeze every drop of data value.

description: Travis makes booking trips to events as easy as buying the ticket.

description: WeGaw is an Adventure Tourism Platform that helps any Outdoors Touristic Destination (DMO ) better manage and promote their touristic region. Based on the aggregation of satellite data, weather stations and other sources, we process and model the current and future status of the terrain, enabling risk assessment and monitoring as well as touristic product intelligent booking & analytics. This ultimately helps DMOs rising tourism affluence, quality and safety.

description: Virtual reality remain expensive when applied to vehicle simulators.  A lot of schools or small organizations providing training on complex vehicle are faced with a dilemma. Acquiring a high cost simulator to avoid risky training on the field or using a costly vehicle with an expensive teacher.
short-description: Provide a common high-tech cheap platform for all kind of simulators, with all kits needed to build a specific vehicle.

description: Amondo is a search engine for social media, automatically providing users with the best content surrounding their experiences. It's algorithm works seamlessly across platforms and devices, enabling everyone to bring together, showcase and share the most meaningful content from every available channel. Content is presented in a new format called an Imprint: a multi-layered, immersive and dynamic feed of images, videos, conversations & playlists, rendered as a cohesive narrative of the experience.
short-description: All the content you love, all in one place - from you, your friends and the best of social media.

description: Aparito provides wearable technology, disease specific mobile apps and real-time analytics to monitor patients remotely. Physical function is mostly monitored using in clinic tests, this is snapshot in nature and only provides a small insight into real life function. Aparito is using wearables to provide passive monitoring and synchronised phone apps to measure quality of life and other related measures. This will give a complete overview which helps deliver better care to patients.

description: Acorn Aspirations is a social impact company which aims to inspire young people aged 11-19 into the world of technology and entrepreneurship.

description: Unpaid bill? Problem with a supplier? It can take 30+ weeks in the small claims court. If that’s overseas, there's no guarantee their courts will respect the judgement. We believe that justice should be simple & affordable for everyone. Our online resolution platform can resolve issues up to 200 times faster than small claims court, at very low cost and with binding decisions made by an impartial expert which are easy to enforce internationally.
short-description: Don't waste time and money in court - use Ajuve, the fast-track alternative - providing fair, low-cost online dispute resolution.

description: The world currently consumes 5.8 million tonnes of wipes annually. Yet, 'flushable' wipes are just marketing gimmicks and they just clog the drainage systems!
short-description: ACE's flagship is Twipes - Toilet wipes that disperse in water within 3 hours! They don't dry out and come on a roll to hang in your toilet.

description: Many establishments deal with seasonal or unpredicted workload peaks, be it restaurants, hotels, ski resorts etc. In these cases, the owners often turn to their personal short list of friends, family and contacts to ask for help.

description: Yalty is the first virtual Human Resources manager for Small and Medium Enterprises.
short-description: Yalty is the first virtual Human Resources manager for small companies in Switzerland

description: Currently 10 metres of plastic wrapping must be manually removed from over 8 billion bales every year before use as livestock feed. Market research states that removing the plastic is ‘one of the most annoying jobs on the farm’. BioNet. have the solution, an edible biopolymer that saves the farmer time as the wrapping can be directly eaten from the bale. Furthermore, this reduces waste and the unique formulation allows for enhanced digestion leading to reduced methane emissions from livestock.
short-description: BioNet. Agriculture have developed an edible biopolymer to wrap hay, straw and silage bales.

description: We make sustainable nutrition exciting.
short-description: We make sustainable nutrition exciting.

description: We are here to energise the film industry with our weapon of choice: 'crewfunding', a financial model rooted in shared-economy principles which enables crews to invest in the films they work on. Crews accept lower upfront rates in return for legal packages of profit shares and deferred payment. This enables producers to optimise their budgets with up to 20% and helps crews feel invested in the production.

description: The contemporary electronics design process is slow (several months), tedious (often repeated due to errors), expensive (up to $50k to get to an initial prototype), and geared towards experts. Bread Inc.’s web-based platform enables anyone to quickly design fully-functional electronic hardware without prior electronics experience or technical knowledge. The software is not targeted at experts and simplicity is key.
short-description: Bread’s software enables anyone to design functional electronic hardware in minutes without need for prior electronics design knowledge.

description: Based out of the state of art Loughborough University Science and Enterprise Parks, we work with key stakeholders within cricket to engage with cricketers & non cricketers.

description: Arqlite has developed an innovative proprietary process that transforms all kind of plastic waste, even the ones today considered as non-recyclable, into an artificial rock used as replacement for quarry rock for the construction industry. This is not only green on the recycling side but also a more efficient material as it is ten times better insulator and half the weight of mineral rock, resulting in a lower carbon footprint and a reduction in costs.

description: DatePlay by Vana Koutsomitis is the app which combines online dating with gaming. We use games to analyse our users' personalities and preferences, so that we can suggest great matches. By using DatePlay, you are more likely to meet people whom you are actually compatible with, so no more wasted time on bad dates.
short-description: Dating app where you play games to meet your match.

description: refsix is the new smartwatch and mobile app that enables referees to record match incidents in-game, track their own fixtures, results and stats whilst also accessing physical performance data from their matches like the professionals.  The product has been tested by referees at all levels including Fifa and Premier League referees and we are launching our Beta this week!  We will sell hardware directly to referees and have a subscription model for our app too.  There are 850k referees globally.
short-description: refsix - the smartwatch and mobile app for football referees

description: We're aiming to raise awareness about the global issues in fashion and how sustainable apparel can change the industry. We collaborate with artists, brands, and designers as a collective to ethically source, co-create, and distribute apparel. We work with drop ship suppliers in the US and UK, and we're looking to distribute at pop-up events and music festivals to expand our community. Our end goal is to use supply chain technology that will allow us to measure our impact and drive collaboration.
short-description: We connect conscious citizens to sustainable apparel designed by ethical artists, brands, and designers to impact the fashion industry.

description: Our product is an integrated solution for parents using integrated devices and a mobile app that replaces current baby monitors, supports parents in establishing their baby's sleeping routine; and monitors and advises parents on their sleep and activity.

description: Freelancers have a unique set of challenges when it comes to finance which ultimately take them away from doing what they do best. From the day to day hassle of taxes, record keeping and invoices, to longer term financial security like mortgages, pensions and insurance. Coconut is a bank account that radically simplifies finance for freelancers and helps them build a strong financial future.
short-description: Coconut is the alternative bank account for freelancers that works out their taxes, tracks their expenses and helps them get paid on time.

description: Clover Lewis Swimwear: a collection of bikinis and swimsuits, glamorous & intelligently designed for the needs of women living with and beyond breast cancer.
short-description: Clover Lewis Swimwear: fashion-forward bikinis & one pieces, with smart features, developed for women living with & beyond breast cancer

description: Due to the complexity in financial regulation, insurers commit excessive resources towards understanding and managing their compliance activities. UK insurers spent £3.0bn implementing the new insurance regulation, Solvency II.
short-description: Making Compliance simple. A Compliance as a Service (CaaS), reducing the cost of compliance and helping insurers make decisions faster

description: Waste construction wood has to be landfilled for a high fee while biofuels suffer from high production costs. We have developed an environmentally friendly chemical process that can solve these two problems by using the waste wood as an inexpensive feedstock for the production of sustainable bio-fuels and materials, making it possible to generate revenue from waste and producing biofuels at a competitive price.
short-description: We produce low-cost biofuels and materials from waste construction wood using an environmentally friendly chemical process

description: We are a fair trade sustainable luxury brand that collaborates with the indigenous artisans in North Colombia. Our mission is to deliver one-of-a-kind luxury product with transparency to the global market that empowers indigenous communities while sustaining the finest craftsmanship in Colombia. We create products with a social mission, we give back water provisions from each bag sell. We aim to make a positive impact in the world and be the leaders of our generation. Be a consious consumer.

description: Little Riot wants to change the way that people use technology to communicate. We spend all our time staring at smart phones and computer screens, pushing little instant messages and photographs to each other. When did our human relationships lose their intimacy and personality?
short-description: We make loveable technology.

description: Trading since 2014, Eat Grub have hosted sell out pop-up restaurants, developed insect based products including a protein bar made from cricket powder, and published the first dedicated insect recipe book. Insects are tasty, nutritious and sustainable and should be seen as a credible food source. We have made a  lot of progress - being stocked in supermarkets and partnering with The Economist - but now we need funding to help our business grow.

description: Floom is a curated online floristry website that offers quality and beautiful bouquets from a curated selection of independent florists, delivered same-day. Floom makes those products accessible by providing an alternative to traditional retail and eCommerce channels. Customers type in a delivery postcode, and select a bespoke bouquet to send in a matter of clicks.

description: Legal services is an inefficient, low innovation space being disrupted by liberalization, technology and changes in buyer behaviors.
short-description: LawyerFair provide a curated marketplace for commercial legal services, matching legal needs of businesses with pre-approved lawyers.

description: Today, many mechanics struggle to work on the complex technology of modern cars. The problem is access to quality training: 38% of mechanics say they lack the training they need. That’s because training a mechanic once per year costs €6,000. KG makes automotive training available in any garage: while existing methods require in-person courses at a training centre, KG is the first solution enabling remote practical training with the same quality as in the training centre but at a 60% lower cost.
short-description: KG enables remote practical training for car mechanics through fault simulation and online coaching using real cars as a training platform

description: London’s £10bn childcare market is fragmented and inefficient, producing services which are inflexible, patchy in quality and cripplingly expensive. Founded by a former successful tech CEO (& mum), Koru Kids will be THE innovator in childcare. We're first building a managed network of nannies shared between families. Over time we’ll add services to create a top quality ‘distributed nursery’, competitive with all other childcare. CLV is high and network effects are strong. Let's fix childcare!
short-description: London's £10bn childcare market isn't delivering what parents need. Koru Kids makes high quality, flexible childcare more accessible.

description: New drug delivery methods for infants are urgently needed—many of the 4.6 million infants who die each year could be saved with access to appropriate medications. JustMilk is developing a Nipple Shield Delivery System (NSDS) to safely and effectively deliver drugs and nutrients to breastfeeding infants. The NSDS circumvents many current challenges in infant drug delivery involving dosage, storage, and hygiene, while encouraging the natural and healthy process of breastfeeding.
short-description: JustMilk: Safely delivering drugs and nutrients to breastfeeding infants.

description: Induo creates advanced fabric for business wear. Our first product is a repellent and breathable cotton fabric for shirting - you can basically forget about stain and sweat issues. It's also quick to dry and easy to iron. As it is a cotton fabric, everything feel the same - it is your everyday shirt, but enhanced.
short-description: Induo creates the most advanced natural fabrics for business wear in the world

description: JobLab helps small businesses grow by giving them direct access to the best interns and graduate talent across the UK. The platform matches employers with relevant candidates who can be reviewed on a personal level, through video cover letters.
short-description: JobLab gives employers direct access to the best interns and graduate talent across the UK.

description: IDEABATIC's vision is to deliver innovative hardware solutions to global challenges.  According to WHO, 2-3 millions of children die each year due to a vaccine preventable cure. 19.4 million infants are still not getting basic vaccinations. 20-50% of the vaccines perish because the cool boxes used in the last-mile aren’t reliable. We are developing a smart last-mile vaccine cooling system with precise temperature control, unlimited cooling and features that don't compromise the vaccines.
short-description: Smile-Smart last-mile vaccine cooling &delivery system for the developing world. We will reach every child however difficult the journey is.

description: The 2Go technology is capable of being deployed either on-premise or cloud-based and provides for users to have complete fully functional access via mobile devices to a wide variety of enterprise applications without the need for re-engineering of content or systems and without the risk of data loss as no data is stored on the device. Coupled with our user-definable, user-selectable custom gestures and custom keyboards and voice recognition based data input, users can be even more efficient
short-description: Our 2Go Enterprise Application Mobility Layer solution enables secure use of BYOD devices with ALL enterprise applications without coding

description: iWazat makes it really easy for just about anyone to build & deploy engaging apps for their events, in minutes, without any code. Our apps allow attendees to chat, network, book meetings & much more - before, during & long after events are over.

description: Today there almost  3 million Muslims that live in the UK. Don’t you think it’s time that they had there own take away delivery service just for halal food? We have successfully piloted our concept in East London and now we have over 300+ restaurants on board and a growing customer base
short-description: Halaleat.com is the UK's first online takeaway portal listing halal menus targeting Muslim consumers appetite for Halal food on demand

description: The food we eat is old, stuffed with chemicals to last longer and look nicer. With Fresh.land we change that. We allow farmers to sell their fresh harvest directly to retailers, cutting out the middlemen. Instead of months, it takes a few days from tree to store.

description: Today the most important tool for ER trauma assessment and monitoring is the vital signs monitor. This is only used in hospitals, due to its size and cost.

description: Video archives are incredible resources for knowledge discovery and learning but are notoriously untapped into due to limitations with their existing interfaces. The significantly higher user engagement that results is our core offering to the organisations that we will license our platform to.

description: Cows have been a currency and store of wealth for Africans for centuries. Africa has 10% of the world's 1.2 billion cows. Africans still aspire to own cattle but realise little value from them as they are not a recognised asset class like maize, wheat or gold.

description: MediSieve is developing a magnetic blood filter which removes disease causing agents from a patient's bloodstream. Similar to dialysis, their blood is circulated through a magnetic blood filter which captures and removes targets based on their magnetic properties.

description: Mark Labs helps asset managers to assess, manage, and optimize the ROI on their sustainability, impact, and charitable investments through data analytics and AI.
short-description: We help asset managers to access, manage, and optimize the impact and ESG performance of their investments through data analytics and AI.

short-description: Makercase is the world’s first IOT enabled deliverable retail store in a box. Consumers can discover, try and buy products direct.

description: Fundamentally transforming the way food is handled in professional kitchens everywhere is our global vision. The current status quo of manual labor and data vacuum is a problem not just for the food service industry but our planet too! Think food safety, wastage, lost revenue etc!

description: Coding is a vital 21st century life & career skill: our children will graduate into a world where almost all careers will require it. That’s why coding was added to the UK curriculum from 5+ in 2014. And why Pres. Obama wants to follow suit.

description: Nimble Babies' vision is to be the mum and dad's most loved cleaning brand with a lineup of products that help parents clean after the mess that their babies make.

description: Simulation Amplified, Yet Simplified: Accelerating the pace of science and engineering through superior simulation technology. MPMsim is a next generation simulation software that natively overcomes inherent limitations and subsequent inconveniences of competitors by using a unique technology developed by MPMsim Ltd. Featuring a simplified and shortened workflow, MPMsim eliminates the need for meshing and CAD de-featuring, the two most labour intensive and expertise extensive tasks in design.

description: MishiPay's technology allows in-store shoppers to pick up a product, scan the barcode with their phone, pay with their phone and simply walk out with it. And what's more, our patent pending technology ensures that if you try and walk out without paying, the alarms sound off immediately.
short-description: With MishiPay’s theft-proof, scan & pay technology, say goodbye to queues and experience online shopping in a physical store.

description: Every year stroke affects 150,000 people in the UK and 15 million globally. 70% are left with disability, and many don't recover fully. Robotic assistive devices can improve functional outcomes and lead to faster recovery, but existing devices are expensive, meaning most stroke sufferers cannot access this hugely beneficial technology. Motus has found new, simpler ways to effect these benefits, resulting in enormous cost reductions, and ultimately a device that every stroke sufferer can afford.
short-description: At Motus Innovations, we're developing a low cost, simple, but highly functional robotic assistive device for stroke rehabilitation.

description: We help put the maker movement into schools. The learning philosophy and skills acquired when implementing maker philosophy in schools is extremely attractive to a large portion of the world's school systems today. Implementing it is hard. Quirkbot's innovative design and simple technical solutions, uniquely solve many of the existing practical problems, as well as being engaging enough to compete for the learner's attention in the modern digital world.
short-description: Quirkbot is the maker movement in a box. It turns both class-rooms and living-rooms into full on makerspaces in a matter of minutes.

description: MyMed provides a solution for a problem that is objectively measurable nationwide; the difficulty in seeing a GP at the right time for you.
short-description: Online GPs, on demand, free to consult.  Electronic prescription fulfilment with revolutionary convenience. Maintaining NHS principles.

description: Powr of You is empowering consumers to benefit from data they create on digital streams e.g. mobile, social, etc. We tap into data sets that already exist, with their permission, to capture insights about their behavior in real-time. Brands & agencies such as M2M, Starcom MediaVest are already using our tool to access a unified view of consumer behavior. We’re already paying consumers up to £50 every time their data is used, along with providing personal insights about their digital life.
short-description: Powr of You is an analytics platform helping people monetize their data footprint and capturing a unified view of their digital life.

description: Current clinical criterion can only identify 5% of high risk stroke patients. Tenoke, considering plaque component and its mechanical loading can identify 100%. The software is fast, standardized and semi-automated MR image-based analysis tool which can be installed on most of computers. We first offer risk assessment report to consumers and when we have FDA approval we can license SPACE to hospitals. We need £1 million to set up the business and anticipate £57.5m revenue in the first 5 years.
short-description: Tenoke has developed a software (SPACE) to accurately assess plaque vulnerability to predict the risk of stroke.

description: Wine is complicated and wine lovers say they need to know more to be able to choose. Pulp helps them learn with a subscription for blind tasting boxes delivered to their homes supported by online gamified learning. With ratings unbiased by the labels, our algorithm will build a map of their taste to choose the right wine for them in any situation.
short-description: Subscription delivery of blind tasting boxes guiding wine lovers in a gamified learning journey to understand wine and build their wine ID

description: The Spixii SaaS platform delivers high-value conversations with prospects, policyholders and third parties by using conversational process automation. Integrated into core systems, the automated conversations create personal journeys to deliver high-value processes such as quotes and claims journeys as well as enabling self-service for policy changes. Spixii platform provides real-time conversation analytics used for continuous improvement of the CX and operational performance.
short-description: Spend less effort, create more value by digitising and automating powerful customer-facing processes

description: Storemates is a unique concept in self storage. By matching people who require storage space with people who have spare space, we create a win win situation – people save up to 50% off the price of commercial storage while those with space earn money by renting it out. The planet wins too, as we are utilising unused space rather than building more commercial storage warehouses on valuable city sites. Storemates - Your Marketplace for Storage Space!
short-description: Storemates helps you turn unused space into cash by renting it out to those who need low cost self storage.

description: Ever been to a gallery and struggled for more information about the artwork? Had to forfeit your retina display and Hi-Fi noise cancelling headphones in favour of a second-hand audio guide and a pre-selected tour? Using advanced image recognition, SMARTIFY provides access to inspiring audio and video commentary, straight to your smartphone.
short-description: SMARTIFY is your very own personal digital curator. Scan, Identify & Uncover the great stories behind your favourite art!

description: The UK spends £1.5b on smoothies and 1.13m British consumers have a smoothie a day. Making your own smoothie requires time and fresh ingredients. Frozen mixes are inaccessible to many. Fresh is often not the healthiest choice.
short-description: Providing delicious and nutritious freeze dried smoothie mixes to busy people. It has never been easier to make healthy food choices.

description: Silent Secret is a social enterprise and a safe, anonymous social network for young people aged 11-19 to share their secrets, thoughts, feelings, news and lifestyle, in a space free from judgment or cyber-bullying.
short-description: Silent Secret is a social enterprise and a safe, anonymous social network for young people aged 11-19 to share their secrets, thoughts, feel

description: Unscheduled aircraft maintenance caused by the environment leads to unscheduled maintenance, flight cancellations and lost revenue for operators. Satavia's patent-pending technology provides real-time environmental analytics for individual aircraft to support maintenance scheduling and flight planning. The service is offered at fixed price, per engine, per flight hour, at a fraction of the cost of ‘power-by-the-hour’ after-sales maintenance services, and delivers savings for OEM and operators.
short-description: Digitial environmental awareness for aviation to enhance maintenance and flight planning

description: ResSpot is the first global “911” emergency response mobile app that uses GPS technology & virtual panic buttons to instantly connect users to the closest emergency service providers, life-saving information, and their loved ones. Referred to as an “Uber” for emergencies, ResSpot consolidates all of the world’s emergency numbers, service providers, and real-time alerts, as well as user’s personal health and insurance information into one place.
short-description: The first global “911” emergency response and alert app

description: We've all received irrelevant marketing messages. If companies interpreted and acted on data better this wouldn't happen.
short-description: rais is a Personal Virtual Data Analyst for eCommerce SMEs who want to spot and act on profitable marketing opportunities.

description: CoupleWise revolutionizes the way you strengthen & repair your most important adult relationship with technology-enabled tools based on proven therapeutic practices & techniques. Start by evaluating your satisfaction level with 24 “relationship needs” identified by renowned researchers as primary predictors of long lasting relationships. This digital 'relationship map' informs our customized couple's journey, leveraging behavioral economics & courseware to motivate positive behavioral changes.
short-description: CoupleWise: The Home for Healthy Relationships

description: Train tickets are super-expensive, especially on short notice. 65% of people are not satisfied with prices and 57% of train travelers book their tickets on the day or the day before. Finding the right ticket for a cost conscious user becomes a logistical nightmare. There are a few little known hacks and tricks, such as re-routing and split-ticketing. The Reroo app makes navigating through the complicated rail industry a breeze with a simple and elegant one-touch-buy experience.
short-description: Reroo has been described as the Skyscanner for trains. The app helps student users find the cheapest train tickets via alternative routes.

description: Businesses waste hours every week manually scheduling social media posts, finding new content to share, and handling images and links - even using the leading scheduling tools. And after all that effort, only 5% of their audience see the posts.
short-description: SmarterQueue saves you hours on #socialmedia. Evergreen recycling, content curation, and categorised queues; all in one easy, beautiful tool

description: We solve low braille literacy rates among 39 million blind people all over the world by building hardware products with software and content to impart Braille based education. Braille literacy among the visually challenged are less than 10% in developed countries (4% in the UK) and less than 0.2% in India. Our Flagship Product Annie, provides Braille literacy solution to 90% of the blind people left out of Braille education pipeline by helping them learn how to Read, Write and Type in Braille.
short-description: Solving low literacy rates for 39,000,000 blind people worldwide.

description: Community organisations need resources to deliver projects that help local people. We match government suppliers, compelled to benefit communities by law, with community organisations who need resources. This is a huge opportunity as we're dipping into a pool of £140n each year!
short-description: The Social Value Exchange is a SaaS marketplace that uses public procurement to match resources with local communities.

description: Out of $32b of touch interfaces that will be produced in 2018, 5/6 of the costs go straight to assembling process, because of the quantity of sensors embedded. Tangi0 created a platform technology using 1 material to be both the sensor and the product exterior. It leaps into exiting applications including automotive interior, agile gaming hand-held and even flexible computer peripherals.
short-description: A platform technology using one material to produce 3 dimensional controls that are ergonomic, intuitive and engaging.

description: In LATAM, lack of affordable access to decent clothing perpetuates social inequality. Poor appearance limits educational, professional, and personal development opportunities. Estrenón, a for-profit social enterprise, disrupts poverty’s cycle of low self-esteem and exclusion by pioneering the reuse clothing movement in LATAM through a replicable model for buying and selling pre-owned clothing. Our retail stores create dignified & empowering experiences for families to begin improving their lives
short-description: Estrenón pioneers the 'reuse clothing movement' in Latin America through dignifying stores that empower the people to improve their lives :)

startupname: Sanitation and Health Rights in India (SHRI)
description: SHRI works alongside communities in rural India to increase access to essential health infrastructure by providing access to toilets, which convert waste into energy in order to run a water filtration system. SHRI sells safe drinking water at a fair price to generate revenue. SHRI encourages behavior change and positive health outcomes through education. Partnerships with local government ensures land and funding allocated for ending open defecation goes to those most in need of these services.
short-description: SHRI fights alongside communities to end outdoor defecation in an ongoing struggle for health equity and social and economic justice.

description: As bionics become increasingly advanced we see sophisticated technologies attached to limbs by an old fashioned and not fit for purpose stump and socket model. We are developing an implanted device to interface with the limb and provide an open standard connector to allow plug & play prosthetic attachment. This will allow a higher patient quality of life, cheaper care delivery for healthcare providers and allow prosthetic manufacturers to form a new relationship with the consumer.
short-description: A permanently integrated smart device that provides the interface between an amputated stump and any prosthesis.

description: Vieni is a web platform and mobile app that allows users to group their travel demand together before going to market. For example, if a group is travelling to a festival they can join others from their local area and 'group buy' a charter coach. This means the coach comes to them and takes them to their precise final destination thus reducing their overall cost and time whilst having a positive effect on the environment.
short-description: Bus Travel Demand Aggregator for 21st Century Social and Connected Travel

description: For the long-haul trucking market which faces large diesel costs, Hyliion is developing an add-on hybrid system for tractor trailers that will reduce their total fuel consumption by 30%, with an ROI of less than one year. In addition, it will improve the driver’s quality of life as well as reduce harmful greenhouse gas emissions.  We strive to offer a high quality solution that will lead the industry towards a more efficient and safe means of transporting goods.
short-description: Hyliion is creating an add-on hybrid module for tractor trailers that will reduce fuel consumption by 30% with a payback of under a year

description: Biorasis is in the business of developing a miniaturized, hypodermic-injectable biosensor for reliable continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) with autonomous operation for 3-6 months that requires no user intervention.  Our goal is to vastly improve the quality of life of diabetics.  Our solution eliminates surgery for sensor implantation and extraction,  restores active life style, enables remote care for juveniles and the elderly, enhances compliance, and saves 50-70% in annual healthcare costs.
short-description: Biorasis is developing a biosensor that will vastly improve the quality of life of diabetics and restore their active lifestyle.

description: Bringing a healthy, ethical and modern twist on Hotel Chocolat, Well + Happy offer a high end range of confectionary focusing on guilt-free indulgence. Operating in a £4.1* billion pound chocolate market, housed within a health and wellness market, which is forecast for rapid growth - Well + Happy will be a UK first in the raw chocolate space.
short-description: Well + Happy will be the UK's number 1 leading healthy chocolate brand, offering guilt-free indulgence through delicious confectionary

description: Our innovation lies in combining both solar power and Internet provision together into one central scalable system and using the revenue from the community’s mobile usage to subsidise the electricity generation and charitable services. This innovative approach to tackling the lack of electrification, whilst being commercially focused and able to provide investors with a financial return, is fundamentally driven by providing social benefits and significant positive climate impacts in Africa.
short-description: Socially driven business providing affordable solar power and Internet to off-grid communities in Sub Saharan Africa

description: USEUM is a virtual museum that democratises art. On USEUM, artists & museums promote their works & profit from them, whilst people discover, share, buy & even download works of art! It hosts 80K paintings by 2000 participant artists from 106 countries & 700 famous museums, such as the MET. With 100,000 artwork ratings USEUM exhibits the first ever democratically-curated art exhibition. USEUM is in the $25 BN Art Merchandise Market; it has received £110K & was on The Times & Wall St International
short-description: USEUM: Democratising Art with Crowdsourcing

description: Oral health affects heart disease, Alzheimer’s & diabetes and is the 2nd largest out of pocket healthcare expense: $250 BN! Yet 40% of Americans are not accessing this basic healthcare need. Sadly, this percentage is growing due to rising costs & inconvenience.
short-description: Virtudent is a telehealth solution for dentistry, expanding access to oral-health experts and improving the quality of dental care.

description: Survey and inspection of our critical infrastructure, such as wind turbines, bridges, oil/gas pipe, and power-line, is slow, expensive, and often extremely dangerous.
short-description: @XactSense builds #LIDAR scanning #UAVs for the $270B geospatial industry our scanning robots make the next generation of 3D maps in minutes

description: More important to buyers than product features or cost is the buying experience. Sales reps who deliver relevant information in buyer-friendly, unique ways achieve a significant advantage by making the buying experience easy and straightforward. Aberdeen Research reports that by using buyer portals B2B sales companies attain 28% higher revenue compared to those still using email to collaborate with buyers. BuyerDeck  is a unique way for B2B Buyers and sellers to collaborate from lead to close.
short-description: BuyerDeck is a Buyer Portal. B2B seller teams collaborate on content & deal information with buyers to deliver a great buying experience.

description: Did you know that 1 million children die needlessly every single year due to being born prematurely? What if I told you that according to the WHO 75% of these deaths could be prevented with simple treatments such as incubation. Current incubators are incredibly large, needlessly complicated and expensive. MOM is an inflatable incubator, created to dramatically decrease the size of traditional incubators  whilst being available at 1/30th of the cost and retaining all the necessary features.
short-description: 1 Million Children die needlessly due to premature birth every year. MOM - The Inflatable Incubator was designed to give them a chance.

description: Combine maps and game tech and you get Mantle, a toolset for prototyping rapid 3D environments. Stop wasting your team’s effort recreating the basics for every 3D spatial project. Mantle is the perfect solution for creative prototyping and discovery doing the heavy lifting for map import, styling and geolocated positioning. It's fast, ready to drop in content, place cameras and tweak lighting in seconds. Start environment projects faster for gaming, built environment and info visualisation.
short-description: Mantle is a toolset to create rapid 3D environments for games, built environment and geo-visualisation. Start creating through discovery.

description: Renovagen have developed the 'Roll-Array' transportable solar power system. It's a solar farm which unrolls from a container or trailer in a few minutes - to power mobile hospitals, desalination plants, mine sites, military bases and more. Batteries and inverters are built-in for 24/7 power - it can be used just like a genset. Our air-pallet container can be flown anywhere in the world on normal aircraft and packs up to 18kW of PV - 10x more power and much faster setup than existing solutions.
short-description: Renovagen - saving lives with solar power and driving down the cost of access to energy in remote locations.

description: TV rating is the most important number in the $70 billion TV ad market, but there has been no innovation in two decades. TVision Insights leverages state-of-the-art computer vision technology to collect viewers’ demographics, emotional reactions, and viewability/engagement by placing a sensor at the base of a television in a household. This data is extremely valuable to advertisers and media buying agencies who today have no real measurement of their advertisements’ effectiveness.
short-description: At TVision Insights, we leverage state of art computer vision technology to redefine TV rating for new generation TV

description: At Six Foods, we make healthy, delicious, and sustainable foods with insects. We use crickets milled into a flour to make high protein tortilla chips (Chirps) that are familiar to Americans. We want to normalize insect foods, starting with snacks to meat. The goal is to substitute animal protein with insect protein, thus converting livestock farming to insect farming. By doing so, we will reduce land & water usage, and greenhouse gas emissions.
short-description: Six Foods is normalizing insects as a sustainable food. Try Chirps, a cricket chip that has more protein per serving than an egg!

description: Instead of reinventing the syringe, our device, LyoKit, couples a standard off-the-shelf syringe with an external pressurized water chamber, resulting in a simple one-step reconstitution process. As a result, the LyoKit differentiates itself from other competitions by being customizable to a full range of biologic products that require reconstitution. We also have the potential to provide a cost advantage of up to 60% to both the customer and pharmacy, while still generating 70% profit margins.
short-description: Recon Therapeutics has developed a new drug delivery technology that simplifies reconstitution of a lyophilized drug with solvent at the POC

description: Digital and print displays dominate our lives - yet today’s flat displays only show an impoverished slice of reality. To solve the big problems that have prevented glasses-free 3D from going mainstream, Lumii is developing the first commercial light field engine: the evolution of our research at MIT. We can't wait to bring it into your hands.
short-description: Glasses-free 3D that looks great. Lumii light field displays: intuitive depth, in the native format of your brain.

description: LaunchPad Medical is developing Tetranite™, a bone adhesive that is gradually replaced by bone. Such a product has significant load-bearing strength and will provide a new tool for the surgeon to anchor metal implants, fill voids, and fix bone fragments back together while keeping procedures simpler, safer, and less expensive. Tetranite™ has a combination of strength, biocompatibility, and low cost to be commercially viable. The dental implant market will be the initial platform application.
short-description: LaunchPad Medical brings to you Tetranite™, the worlds first synthetic bone adhesive to stabilize metal hardware and repair fractured bone.

description: Today our ability to find new sources of oil to supply our energy needs, prevent illegal drugs from being smuggled into the US on ships, and keep our military safe by freeing foreign waters of dangerous mines all rely on the same thing: risking human lives diving into these unsafe and unknown environments. Hydroswarms solves this problem by using swarms of small, autonomous, underwater robots specifically designed to do this job, saving lives and revolutionizing a multi-billion dollar market.
short-description: Teams of small, autonomous, underwater robots + cheap sensors + modern mesh networks = a revolution in maritime commerce and security

description: Spoiler Alert creates the first cloud-based marketplace and reporting platform to allow organizations to sell, donate, and recover wasted food. Whether that’s healthy surplus product or valuable organic waste, we enable them to get it to those who can use it – quickly. We've built a more seamless user experience - supported with real-time notifications, easy payment processing, and reporting capabilities. As a package, we empower companies to save money  and become better community citizens.
short-description: Spoiler Alert is a B2B marketplace and reporting tool to help businesses manage wasted food, improve margins, and fight food insecurity.

description: Globally, 2 billion people are malnourished and anemic. Health impacts range from impaired physical and cognitive development, to infant prematurity, to death– 1 million people annually. Untreated anemia in children can have lifelong impact; 178M are undiagnosed today.
short-description: Obz Design is changing global healthcare: better anemia diagnostics today, 600 million healthier children tomorrow!

description: Nix86 is a universal order management platform that brings unprecedented scale & efficiency to the food service industry. Each year 990K US restaurants place 1B orders with 17k suppliers by fax, email, and phone calls. Nix86 optimizes order/fulfillment by replacing paper handoffs & data silos with a direct B2B cloud-based connection & central archive. Nix86 aligns restaurants & suppliers, reduces labor costs and food waste, and adds new business intelligence with accessible data.
short-description: Restaurants and Suppliers rely on fax-phones-email to manage 1B orders a year; Nix86's B2B cloud solution modernizes it all with ease.

description: Laundry is about to be reinvented! Current laundry machines use 20 gallons of water and significant amount of detergent to remove just one table spoon of dirty oil compounds, giving a cleaning efficiency of less than 1%. This inefficient process makes an average hotel spend $10K on water and detergent per month! With AquaFresco close-loop laundry technology, 95% of the water and detergent cost can be saved, capturing a market opportunity over $2B/yr.
short-description: AquaFresco is developing the next generation close-loop laundry technology that regenerates 95% of wastewater

description: Shoot is a unique website for amateur and professional gardeners to design, manage, care for and share their gardens online.  Shoot enables its 90,000 members to get the most from their gardens with Shoot’s award-winning design planner, personal plant lists, bespoke care calendar, email advice and plant identifier forums. Shoot also boasts the largest online plant encyclopaedia with horticulturally expert information on 20,000+ plants.
short-description: Shoot empowers all gardeners to be successful. Tell us which plants are in your garden and we'll send you care reminders each month.

description: Small businesses in the UK account for nearly 50% of the entire economy, yet historically their environmental impact has largely been ignored.  This is despite many business owners expressing a genuine interest in managing their emissions.
short-description: Carbon Analytics provides fully automated and action oriented carbon, energy and water emission insights to the SME/SMB community!

description: Smarter, Faster, Safer. Sinclair Fire develops and manufactures products leveraging its unique portfolio of fire detection and response intellectual property. The company’s primary innovation is the Sinclair Kitchen Fire Detector, an infrared fire detection device, designed to respond to fires rapidly and without false alarms, saving lives and reducing the cost of fire damage. The product is targeted at the Residential Construction and Social Housing sectors.
short-description: Smarter, Faster, Safer. Sinclair Fire - saving lives and reducing the cost of fire damage with groundbreaking detection technology.

description: Converge is an end-to-end solution for IoT in industry. We connect existing sensors across industries such as construction or manufacturing with our hardware nodes and provide automated, accurate real time monitoring through our software platform. Our hardware runs a low frequency mesh network and reports data back to our servers for analysis. We've started with construction, and are implementing our technology with one of the largest construction companies in Europe.
short-description: Converge – the IoT platform for industry that automates manual monitoring by connecting large scale sensor networks

description: World Tech Makers is the first on-site and immersive coding bootcamp in Latin America. In 12 weeks, we teach people with or without experience how to program since the beginning, so they can become software developers or technology entrepreneurs. To improve the skills and to help our makers in this journey, we count on an international network of allies and mentors. Our purpose is to to promote life-changing opportunities in order to close the digital gap that exists in the region.
short-description: World Tech Makers is the first on-site and immersive coding bootcamp in Latin America. We teach anyone how to code from scratch in 12 weeks.

description: Compare and Share is the world’s first comparison marketplace of the Sharing Economy, aggregating a $15 billion market growing faster than Facebook, Google & Yahoo. We act as a gateway to the Sharing Economy, helping consumers & companies access & exploit the world’s £3.5 trillion worth of spare goods without having to trawl through 8000 individual sites. Our vision is to open up the Sharing Economy just as eBay opened up the second-hand goods market & build the go-to global brand for Sharing.
short-description: Compare and Share is the comparison marketplace of the Sharing Economy, helping people and companies access 8000 sharing sites in one place.

description: In the $15bn market for second-hand sporting goods, SidelineSwap is the first peer-to-peer marketplace built for everyday athletes and fans. Each month thousands of new items ranging from equipment to apparel to footwear are uploaded by our community, making SidelineSwap the best place for buyers to find highly discounted or hard-to-find sporting goods and for sellers to turn their old sporting goods into cash.
short-description: SidelineSwap is a marketplace where people connect to buy, sell, and trade sporting goods.

description: The legal marijuana market is expected to be $10 billion by 2018.  Orange Photonics is poised to meet the needs of the growers, retailers and regulators with a portable and low-cost marijuana potency analyzer that can measure THC and CBD, key marijuana components.  Strains high in THC or CBD can yield double the revenue as less sought after varietals. The flexible technology can be easily reconfigured to serve numerous markets including tobacco, petroleum, cosmetics and pharmaceuticals.
short-description: Orange Photonics LightLab: affordable, fast marijuana potency analyzer.  An essential tool for the $10 billion legal marijuana industry

description: People shrink their clothes.  It is a universal truth.  While we gripe over cotton clothes, we truly cannot stand ruining costly wool garments.
short-description: Finally, the emergency sweater saver is here.  Unshrinkit helps unshrink wool clothing that accidentally shrunk in the washer or dryer.

description: Pavlok: the first wearable that transforms your habits
short-description: Current fitness bands track the steps you take---but they don't change your behavior. Pavlok CHANGES behavior and measurably forms habits.

description: Cogentis Therapeutics is developing a drug to treat a family of neurodegenerative disorders, including Alzheimer's Disease, Pick's Disease, and our initial target condition, Frontotemporal Degeneration, also known as Frontotemporal Dementia (FTD).
short-description: Cogentis Therapeutics is working on a novel and potential disease-modifying peptide therapeutic for Alzheimer’s, FTD, and Parkinson’s

description: danger!awesome is a retail makerspace bringing high-tech tools, fun events, and creative education to the consumer market. Our design staff, 3D printers, laser cutters, vinyl cutters, CNC and more are available for businesses and individuals needing quick and affordable design, prototyping, fabrication, and manufacturing. We make art, furniture, signs, gifts, and event-swag for customers, while delivering community benefit with free educational events, pro bono services, and scholarship classes.
short-description: Design and fabrication makerspace producing short-run manufacturing, customization, prototyping, collateral, and event swag for B2B and B2C.

description: The word Ajiri means 'to employ' in Swahili. Our goal is to create a sustainable cycle of employment and education in western Kenya. Ajiri's award-winning Kenyan black tea is handpicked on small-scale farms. Our Kenyan AA coffee is freshly roasted. We employ 60 women to hand-make the labels for each tea and coffee box using dried banana tree bark. Each label is unique. 100% of profits are donated to the Ajiri Foundation to pay school fees for orphans. Currently, we sponsor 29 students in school.
short-description: Ajiri aims to create a sustainable cycle of employment and education. And, of course, a delicious cup of Kenyan Coffee and Tea!

description: Livestock ranchers lack reliable herd information for better decision making. BovControl is a mobile data-collection, coupled with secure data housed [cloud] that improves efficiency and boost profitability. It is changing the way the world produce beef and milk, with a tool to prove they are not destroying the environment.
short-description: Empowering livestock ranchers with reliable herd information   that improves efficiency and boost profitability

description: Great Little Place (GLP) is a mobile app for discovering and sharing “great little places” around you - from quirky bars to extraordinary restaurants, the places that make a city special.
short-description: Great Little Place (GLP) is a mobile app for discovering and sharing “great little places” around you - @glpLondon

description: About a million ear tube surgeries costing 2.7 billion dollars are performed on children every year in North America alone. That means cutting a child’s healthy eardrum. We aim to replace these surgeries with a simple device, called a stent, like a heart stent which keeps arteries open. Our eStent drains fluid from the middle ear without surgery - no cutting!
short-description: DOYA Medical active eStent replaces ear tube surgeries, improves quality of life, reduces recovery time and saves millions in costs.

description: Glisser makes presentations interactive – it takes regular PowerPoint or Keynote slide decks and pushes them out live to audience mobile devices, slide-by-slide, as they are presented. It then enables members of the audience to interact with the presenter or each other, participate in polls integrated seamlessly within the original deck, and provide valuable feedback. Attendees can also electronically mark-up the slides with notes, and keep them for future reference, or tweet slides.
short-description: Glisser makes presentations interactive - we take regular slide decks, push live to audience devices, and gather data and feedback.

description: twosigmas is a Cambridge-based company that specializes in global education solutions. We connect learners from around the world to educators and educational opportunities in the UK, focusing mainly on using our proprietary videochat whiteboard technology to deliver live English lessons from UK tutors to Chinese learners. Our sales and marketing team uses strong personal relationships to partner with companies in China interested in corporate English education programs for their employees.
short-description: Matching corporate education demand in China with high-quality international education resources. Try our tech: open.twosigmas.com

description: You can book a car,  a plane, even book plastic surgery online, but you cannot book a meeting room. It takes assistants 92 minutes to find and book a meeting, meanwhile companies are tied into 2-10 year leases on their office space, leaving rooms sat empty at huge expense.
short-description: zipcube is booking.com for meeting rooms - don't enquire, just book

description: World Around Me (WAM) is local discovery app (available on Android and iOS) to help people worldwide, find services to eat, drink, shop, stay, pray, stay healthy, move, refuel and access money along with helping them visually orient towards a place using augmented reality.
short-description: World Around Me is local discovery helping people worldwide to search for places of interest and local services using smartphone camera.

description: 'Live Better With...' will be a one-stop online store of the latest healthcare, home aid and wellness products, for patients with long-term conditions (cancer, Alzheimers, stroke, diabetes) and their caregivers. It will be a curated range, with visible product ratings from other patients/carers. It will be complemented by an comprehensive information portal and community platform for patients/families, addressing how to manage side effects and symptoms, and live better with the disease.
short-description: A one-stop marketplace of healthcare, home aid and wellness products and technologies for patients with long-term conditions & their carers

description: At Vidsy we’ve developed a game-changing tech platform enabling brands to create fresh micro content & ideas from a unique community of digital natives & creators. Brands can tap into our creative network to quickly produce micro video for mobile viewing and digital channels. Were proud of the service we provide to brands and agencies, the opportunities we give new creative talent & the exciting way we are driving collaborative creation to produce engaging brand content people will want to watch
short-description: Vidsy is a game-changing tech platform enabling brands to create fresh micro content & ideas from a community of digital natives & creators

description: Talent Rank is an app environment for ambitious candidates to prove and improve their raw business skills. Users are immersed into an interactive game, dealing with real markets and real people; each a stream of fresh situations for their judgement to be tested, quantified and ranked. This pioneering apparatus trains young talent and delivers objective, differential data to assessors.
short-description: Raw commercial skills, made measurable via . Show, don't tell.

description: Apitite is a cloud software-as-a-service for creating and managing APIs. With Apitite you can create APIs in minutes faster and cheaper than developing them in-house or hiring a third party.
short-description: Apitite: Create APIs for your data in minutes.

description: The Allergy Amulet is a rapid, portable, point-of-consumption food allergen detection device that connects to a patent-pending, disposable test strip. The device enables simple, mobile measurements to help individuals avoid ingesting target allergens.
short-description: The Allergy Amulet seeks to improve the status quo for food allergy sufferers with a portable food allergen detection device.

description: Twitch.tv lets users stream themselves playing video games to viewers over the internet. There are 1.5 million streamers (and growing), and over 100 million unique monthly viewers. We help these gaming influencers monetize their large audiences by making it easy to connect with brands who want to reach a targeted audience.
short-description: Ader is the largest eSports influencer network for Twitch. We help brands sponsor eSports influencers.

description: Agora is an online idea town hall that offers communities a smarter way to engage. Existing forms of civic engagement discourage citizens who have less time and resources from engaging. By lowering the barrier to participate, Agora empowers more citizens to influence what they care about. Our votes matter only on election day, but our voices matter every single day. Agora is a digital civic place that gives citizens a voice to speak and decision makers a platform to listen.
short-description: Agora is an online town hall for the people. Our mission is to make democracies more democratic.

description: ARMR Systems develops hemorrhage control systems designed to increase the survivability of traumatic battlefield injury in situations where advanced medical support is not immediately available. The company’s simple, yet highly-effective standalone products and integrated solutions provide warfighters, combat medics and other field-based personnel with lifesaving trauma care capabilities unmatched in today’s battlefield environment.
short-description: We create wearable hemorrhage control systems that save lives.

description: Alike is a wearable for social networking. It allows guests at an event to discover and connect with each other in person and without the distractions of a phone or computer screen. Before an event, guests create an online profile with their information and personal interests, which are loaded into their wristband. When two people come into close proximity of each other, their devices exchange information and glow to indicate if they are a match.
short-description: Wearables for in-person social networking

description: Every student who drops out of university costs that institution £9,000 in lost tuition fee revenue per year the student misses. This equates to millions per university and is a growing problem.
short-description: We use predictive analytics at universities to identify students most at risk of dropping out to provide them with the necessary support

description: A company’s reputation is one of its biggest assets, and the hardest to manage and protect. Resonance is applying the latest Cognitive Computing and Big Data techniques to the problem of finding, quantifying and analysing key reputational data.
short-description: Resonance: Measuring reputation to make it manageable

description: People across the world are faced with a multitude of problems: lack of access to clean water, poor nutrition - and they spend years waiting on external bodies to secure funding, come in and save the day. Unfortunately over 50% of fundraising campaigns addressing these problems fail on the major CF platforms.
short-description: HelpingB helps revolutionary products with a social impact and financially sustainable business model come to life through crowdfunding.

description: RE-VANA is working on new drug delivery systems that can provide significant long-term benefits for patients who are suffering from severe eye diseases that can lead to blindness. The new systems that we are developing will enhance patient comfort and improve their vision, which will eventually reduce the burden on healthcare services, patients and care givers.
short-description: RE-VANA is focused on saving the eyesight of elderly and diabetic people by using it's high tech drug delivery systems.

description: GiveVision is a sophisticated software suite that powers smart glasses to be used as eyes for blind people. Developed by an experienced team of 3 Software Engineers, two of whom are completely Blind; it is designed to increase the independence and mobility of Blind and Visually Impaired by converting visual information to audio cues.
short-description: Developing Smart glasses that act as eyes for blind people

description: Adults with Autism Spectrum Disorders struggle with speaking and communication. 15 million Americans have social anxiety. This represents lost opportunity for societal contribution, until now. AutismSees creates tools that enhance presentation skills through rewards combined with a virtual audience mimicking human facial presence. Begin with a program that allows users to track eye contact with a virtual audience. The result: trained, engaged, motivated young adults are able to self-advocate.
short-description: Podium gives corrective feedback on physical communication to raise self awareness and presentation confidence.

description: In  FoPo, we collect ugly fruits & vegetables before expiry from groceries & farms, freeze dry them, & turn them into food powder to preserve their nutrients, prolong shelf life, & maximize logistics. It can be used for smoothies, soups, fruit shakes, & more. The product will be sold via online, supermarkets, humanitarian mission agencies & food companies. With low price, reduced food waste & support for local businesses & farmers, FoPo creates value from the inefficiency in the food system.
short-description: FoPo extends food shelf life from 2 weeks to 2 years by freeze drying & turning it into powder, while reducing food waste & helping farmers.

description: Gormley &  Gamble is here to empower women by disrupting the tailoring industry to create a modern-classic; custom-made, feminine, elegant suits. With appointment-only service in the City, on Savile Row, or from the comfort of your home or office, made in Europe with Italian, Scottish, and British fabrics, (absolutely no polyester), and a made-to-measure fit, back with you in 3 weeks and prices starting at just£400, & all monogramming and macaroons included, now is every woman's time to upgade.
short-description: London's first made-to-measure tailors exclusively for women.Complimentary monogramming, macaroons & appointment-only service #timetoupgrade

description: More people lack electric light today than did before Edison invented the light bulb. Energy poverty is a major impediment to poverty alleviation. Affordable technological solutions exist but they're not getting where they're needed. Colibrí bridges the distribution gap so that base of the pyramid consumer can receive poverty-alleviating technology. SolarRoute develops a network of solar sales agents through top up cell credit vendors, rural kiosks, agrochemical stores, and microbanks.
short-description: Why is energy poverty still a problem that plagues 2.5bn? The distribution gap. @SolarRoute provides affordable tech to households in need.

description: The World Health Organization calls air pollution the greatest environmental hazard globally, killing over 7 million people annually. There are no effective or low-costs solutions to living in pollution. Clear Breath is developing solutions for those suffering from air pollution in both advanced and developing countries, using a buy-one-give-one model to maximize impact and save lives.
