short-description: Clear Breath is developing a low-cost respirator for the 2 billion people living in polluted environments worldwide

description: CAKE (joincake.com) is the easiest way to think about end-of-life.
short-description: CAKE is the easiest way to think about the end of your life.

description: Cabbige helps small farms improve profitability and enter mainstream sales channels (grocers & restaurants) by moving their post-harvest business to digital platforms.
short-description: @thecabbige is a business intelligence web application that helps small farms make more money.

description: Camp Casco is a Massachusetts-based nonprofit that gives childhood cancer patients and survivors a week of fun. We create an encouraging and supportive environment to facilitate friendships between patients and survivors, and nourish emotional support networks that thrive well beyond the week of camp. Additionally, parents can rest easy knowing that their children are in the capable hands of a round-the-clock medical staff and camp counselors trained to work with children who have special needs.
short-description: Camp Casco provides an annual week-long summer camp for childhood cancer patients and survivors in Massachusetts, free-of-cost!

description: Clothbound is a mobile platform connecting candidates and employers across the restaurant industry.  We serve over 600k restaurants in the US, most having no formal process or tools for hiring & recruiting. We use attribute-driven profiles to highlight a candidate’s soft skills, interests, and work experience and in turn match him/her with a restaurant’s unique needs and culture. Our mission is to be the talent and workforce development solution for the restaurant industry.
short-description: Clothbound is a platform connecting restaurant industry candidates and employers using attribute-driven profiles to make the best match.

description: CityTaps is a social enterprise whose vision is running water in every home. Today, 750M urban people globally lack piped water at home. We bridge the financial gap between the urban poor and utilities via our integrated prepaid smart water metering system. The poor can pay for water with any mobile phone at any time, reducing the risk and costs of non-payment and collections for utilities. Our 3 founders together have 40 years of experience in water/sanitation, software engineering and finance.
short-description: CityTaps uses technology to help the urban poor in developing countries access running water at home

description: Conventional opioids such as morphine are effective at treating pain, but come with serious side-effects, including addictive potential. As a result, tens of thousands of people die each year in the U.S. from prescription opioid overdose, while countless others form dependence. In response, our team is advancing a novel small molecule that shows greater painkilling potency than morphine while demonstrating no abuse potential. Our goal is to move this compound from the lab to the clinic.
short-description: Blue Therapeutics is advancing a novel painkiller that is 50x more potent than morphine and completely non-addictive.

description: Businesses waste billions of dollars each year on irrelevant decisions in marketing, sales, product, and more. Why? They don't understand their buyers. Current customer research solutions are static, manual, and fragmented. Cintell is a cloud-based customer intelligence platform for the enterprise that helps companies continuously validate & maintain buyer insights, publish them companywide, leverage big data and third-party data sources, and integrate with existing business systems.
short-description: We want to create a customer-centric world. Cintell helps companies better understand their buyers and make more relevant decisions.

description: We are an augmented reality architectural visualization company serving both private design and development firms and the urban public process.  We solve a range of specific problems for both the designer and the public by  providing what amounts to a full scale mobile “hologram” view on site.
short-description: View multiple architectural design options perfectly registered on site with complete AR mobility and freedom; walk around or in and out!

description: WHAT WE DO
short-description: BIOWATCH is offering a new authentication solution based on wrist vein recognition & wearables as alternative solution to current methods.

description: Our mission is to nurture the exciting new medium of interactive audio storytelling on all platforms for a universal eyes-free, hands-free story experience of high quality voice acting, sound effects, and music. With our interactive audio technology you can play stories with your voice on mobile devices, in the car, and throughout the connected home. Earplay works with creative partners and shares revenue from sponsored content and in-app purchases.
short-description: Interactive Audio Stories You Play With Your Voice

description: Easy Pairings is an employment marketplace that allows restaurants and job seekers to experience low friction job matching and interview scheduling. The restaurant industry employs 13.5M people and experiences an employee turnover rate >80%. The majority of restaurants find their staff through Craigslist or word-of-mouth. Using innovative technology, Easy Pairings cuts restaurant time-to-hire from 18 to 3 days. We serve over 100 restaurant clients and our job seeker community is over 50,000.
short-description: @EasyPairings is changing the way restaurants find staff by making it faster and cheaper. #restauranthiring

description: Bedly is housing simplified.
short-description: Bedly provides housing on-demand built for the new generation of renters

description: Barakat Bundle is a social enterprise working to reduce preventable infant and maternal mortality in South Asia. Inspired by the successful Finnish Baby Box, we provide expectant mothers in South Asia with curated bundles of evidence-based, low-cost public health interventions paired with demand-inducing maternal and baby care items. The bundle itself doubles as a portable basket in which the baby can sleep or play. Receipt of the bundle is conditional on mothers attending prenatal care.
short-description: Inspired by the Finnish Baby Box, Barakat Bundle is a curated package of life-saving solutions for mothers and babies in South Asia.

description: Blackburn Energy makes a power unit that produces electricity from a truck’s driveline. The electricity is stored in batteries & can power any truck subsystem. Blackburn will first power battery Auxiliary Power Units which provide electric heat/AC for sleeper cabs. Blackburn creates a 4x increase in energy over current APUs, which makes eliminating overnight engine idle viable. The Blackburn solution saves $10K in fuel & 21 tons of CO2 annually, per truck. Total system payback is under one year
short-description: Blackburn Energy makes a power unit for long haul trucks that eliminates idle time saving $10K & 21 tons of CO2 per truck annually.

description: Who likes M&Ms? Or Skittles? Or Gatorade? Have you ever wondered where the colors come from? They come from food colorants, the majority of which are synthetic/chemical based. Yes, you are eating a chemical. With the growing trend for healthier, more natural foods with less chemicals, there is a growing demand for natural food colorants. We created the best natural plant-based BLUE food colorant in the world, from the unique bio-diversity of Colombia. Why Blue? Well, Blue is the hardest to make
short-description: We developed the most stable natural blue color in the world, creating a new family of healthy natural colors for food industry

description: Approximately 1/3 of all Americans are collectors, whether of books, coins, wine, etc. Fortunately, collectors can shop from a vast array of online auction houses to find items for their collections. Unfortunately, navigating this dizzying maze of marketplace activity is extremely time-consuming.
short-description: Collectable is an auction house metasearch engine that allows collectors to browse and search the best auctions, all in one place.

description: People between the ages of 18-30 years old are the most frequent movers in America yet, there is not one moving service that caters to their individual needs. Until now. Freight Frog has created the 'Micro Move' and is moving its clients to the 21st century. Customers can receive a flat guaranteed price in under 60 seconds from any computer or mobile device and can ship your items faster than any service in the country at a fraction of the competitor's prices.
short-description: Freight Frog is the easiest way to 'micro-move' to anywhere in the US

description: 'Flaying SpArk' will manufacture protein powders based on insect larvae as a superior source of animal protein that will be incorporated in various food products replacing protein powders used today. In order to produce the protein in large industrial scale, larvae farming will take place in our state of the art facility. Insects have an extremely high protein, fiber, micro-nutrients and mineral contents, low fat, cholesterol-free and will cost less to produce than any other animal protein.
short-description: 'Flying spark' is a Food-Tech company based in Israel, focused on finding new ways of utilizing insect protein in food products

description: Free Time Academy offers a fun and easy way to learn hands-on skills such as: arts, crafting or robotics, anytime, anywhere! Partnering with top retailers and educators, Free Time Academy provides a unique project-based curriculum, feedback from experts and peers, and supply all the materials users need directly to their home.
short-description: Free Time Academy enables you to learn how to create tangible things online!

description: eRated is the trust score agency for p2p transactions.
short-description: eRated is the trust score agency for p2p marketplaces. Allowing buyers and sellers to carry their track record wherever they go.

description: Energy Harvesters is developing the Walking Charger™, an off-the-grid power source to give people the ability to “charge their Smartphone and mobile device batteries anytime anywhere from their own walking”. It is a small device that will be incorporated within footwear by brand name companies to sell to their consumer, commercial, and military customers thru their retail channels. Later it will be made swappable among footwear to serve broader consumer markets.
short-description: Energy Harvesters LLC: Charge your mobile device batteries anytime, anywhere as you walk with the Walking Charger™. Be Your Own Battery!

description: Adhesions are potentially life threatening post-surgical complications that occur in 95% of major surgical procedures. US healthcare costs in 2014 for adhesion treatment were $2 billion. Envida Biotechnologies has developed a novel adhesion limiting technology, Endurafilm™, a bioresorbable adhesion barrier made from a proprietary and biocompatible polymer.  Endurafilm™ exhibits superior adhesion limiting properties and causes fewer post-surgical complications than current devices.
short-description: Envida Biotechnologies develops synthetic, bioresorbable polymers for drug delivery, anti-adhesions and tissue regeneration.

description: feelter social media search engine aims to become the standard tool for supporting consumer decisions and increasing conversions in eCommerce sites & apps. Text & media content from multiple crowd sources are analyzed & delivered on a seamlessly integrated widget, displaying the most valuable mentions and allowing users to filter & personalize the search. Retailers benefit from multiple calls to action, reports, credibility & enhanced UX, all translating into purchases. Beta proven results.
short-description: Social content search, analysis & monetization widget for eCommerce websites, proven impact on conversion rates, user engagement & UX.

description: Early intervention in Parkinson’s disease can slow progression for the tens of thousands diagnosed each year, but recognizing early symptoms can still be problematic. earlybird.io is software that exploits finger interactions with personal electronics to generate a novel biometric signal capable of identifying subtle motor decline. This will not only generate valuable personal data for individuals, but also revolutionize tracking of treatment and development of new therapies.
short-description: earlybird.io exploits finger interactions with personal electronics to generate a novel biometric signal to identify subtle motor decline.

description: DealerScience was built for dealerships by a dealer who wanted to eliminate bottlenecks created by the sales process. Our solutions predict low inventory so dealers can strategically stock cars, automate time-consuming tasks like updating website specials, and enable the entire sales team – not just managers – to quote accurate customer payments in seconds. With DealerScience tools, our pilot store saw an 117% increase in sales in one year with no additional sales staff.
short-description: DealerScience improves the dealership business process through intuitive, automated solutions that drive sales and increase productivity.

description: Response Technologies develops and manufactures superior flexible vessels, for partners seeking differentiated: explosion resistant fuel tanks, airbags, water tanks, and emergency rafts and evacuation slides.  Our novel products are a result of over 50 years of textile, polymer, and molding experience, which have culminated to a patent pending additive manufacturing process that can create more reliable, lighter weight, lower cost product solutions.  We bring NASCAR level safety to every car.
short-description: Response Technologies has created safer & more reliable fuel and water tanks, airbags, and other devices, aimed at saving 40 lives per day.

description: Commuting sucks. At Dash we want to eliminate the stress of your commute by providing a vehicle that is so fun to ride you will actually look forward to your commute to and from work every day. The electric longboard is the perfect platform because it can go anywhere you can but can also take you up hills and brake going downhill to give you a safe and efficient ride. The best part is it's only $500.
short-description: Dash is an affordable and lightweight electric longboard kit that can easily be mounted to any longboard.

description: Encore Alert is a new, smarter marketing automation solution that uses real-time threat and opportunity alerts to help marketers action on the conversations that matter most. Funded by investors including Sonny Ganguly (CMO WeddingWire), Tyler Peterson (Head of Google Social), Adam Riggs (president of Shutterstock), and Max Wessel (VP of Innovation of SAP), Encore Alert has been growing their revenue by 30%+ month-over-month for the last eleven months.
short-description: The right opportunities at just the right time to help marketers focus on what matters most.

description: GradTrain helps people from all over the world successfully apply and move to study at universities abroad.
short-description: GradTrain is a curated marketplace for people who move abroad, connecting them with services, schools, jobs and mentorship.

description: Goodwall is the first social network for high-school students to stand out, demonstrate social impact, do good, and showcase achievements.
short-description: Goodwall, the new social network for high-school students. The one place where you stand out, network, and present yourself to Universities.

description: Genesis DNA is developing a next-generation device for gene synthesis, the process of turning digital text into physical DNA. Our novel method will cut synthesis cost and time by an order of magnitude relative to our competitors. The synthesis market is $850M and growing, with new business opportunities in the energy, chemical, pharmaceutical, and agriculture industries. Our vision is to become the leading synthesis service and to hasten the pace of nearly all biological research.
short-description: Genesis DNA is aiming to accelerate biotech R&D with a next-gen gene synthesis platform that is 10x faster and cheaper than existing methods

description: There are no dolls for young black girls and Healthy Roots is changing that. We empower young black girls by creating positive representation through dolls and storybooks. Young black girls can suffer from low self esteem caused by unachievable beauty standards. This impacts their education and their future. Healthy Roots combats these issues by representing the diversity of the African Diaspora. We believe that no one should feel less than because of the kink of their curl or skin color.
short-description: Healthy Roots is a toy company that creates dolls and storybooks that combat internalized racism and colorism among young black girls.

description: Nowadays, electronic devices are becoming more and more connected and there is not a platform capable of controlling them as a network.
short-description: Software technology to be embed into wearables and mobile phones for gesture and motion control of external electronic devices.

description: For anyone living in a major city, filling up your car with gasoline can be a real pain. Limited gas stations coupled with high gas prices results in an experience that is dreaded by all. At fueldrop we ask ourselves, why are we still using this archaic method of getting gas? Why do we have thousands of cars driving to one gas station... what if the gas just came straight to your car? The team at fueldrop is creating a fuel delivery service so you will never have to go to a gas station again.
short-description: Tired of wasting your time filling up your gas tank? Let Fuel Drop deliver gas straight to your car. #wefillyoulive

description: Fuzzy Compass is a B2B2C SaaS platform empowering travel bloggers and influencers to monetize their audience. Influencers capitalize on their trusted destination knowledge by providing 1-1 custom trip planning services for a fee (itineraries, personalized advice and more). Fuzzy Compass makes it quick and easy for them to market their services to their audience, manage requests, display ideas beautifully and collect payment. We take a 20% cut of each transaction and own all content
short-description: Fuzzy Compass is turning the world’s top travel influencers into modern-day travel agents

description: KWIKSULATE is a self contained foam insulation system that allows a user to dispense  spray foam. The product consists of a handheld dispensor which takes a magazine containing foam precurosors which are dispensed by the user according to their need .  Said foam precursors are packed within flexible bags and when disposed of take less space than existing technologies.  Furthermore the basic architecture of the system has broad applications in other fields to reduce waste and expenditures.
short-description: Kwiksulate-DIY SPRAY FOAM & MORE

description: Iron Goat is replacing conventional methods for livestock feed production with automated robotic processes that can produce a better product at one-third of the cost.  Our platform is fully autonomous and generates its own fuel from the biomass being harvested.  The pelleted product we produce has reduced waste, better nutrient content, and better transportation and handling characteristics compared to baled hay.
short-description: Iron Goat -  A better way to make hay

description: Ivory is an iOS app that gives any musician, regardless of skill level, useful tools to engage with their sheet music electronically. We are using the recently updated audio recognition capabilities of the iPad to develop a lesson app that will provide curated lessons, easy access to digital sheet music, and real-time feedback as you learn to play piano. By doing this aspiring musicians can embrace their passion for music in the most convenient way possible.
short-description: Ivory is a music education app which listens to you play, providing real-time analytics, targeted lessons, and gamified elements.

description: When I travel I regularly starve - because I cannot find a Halal restaurant. I also need to pray 5 times a day and need information on prayer timings and mosques. There is no Arabic travel guide available. Irhal.com is the answer. 1 million unique visitors came to the website in 2014.
short-description: @Irhal Arabic/English mobile app for Muslim travelers. Includes Halal restaurants, mosque locations, prayer timings for 90+ cities

description: As someone in long-term recovery from heroin, which has plagued all of Massachusetts recently, I created a mobile App for smart phone’s called iRecover App.  Medical studies have demonstrated that people in recovery help one another by staying in consistent contact.  'One addict helping another' is a proven, successful tool in fighting alcoholism & addiction.  iRecover App will connect people, based on their location to others in recovery, meetings & services to help them combat their addiction.
short-description: @iRecoverapp is a mobile App for smartphone's that connects people in recovery from drugs & alcohol and their familes and friends.

description: Gene sequencing and CRISPR/Cas9 technologies have enabled affordable genome mapping and editing with unprecedented precision; however, the bottleneck in understanding human disease mechanisms and bringing breakthrough therapies to patients faster now lies in the manual experimentation to introduce these new vectors into model organisms. HIVE Biosystems' rapid, self-driving instruments perform large-scale genetic modification and deep phenotyping of model organisms with deep learning algorithms.
short-description: Hive Biosystems helps pharmaceutical companies streamline genetics-driven drug discovery by rapidly generating transgenic animals.

description: Insightfil is dedicated to positively impacting patient outcomes by reducing medication errors, improving medication adherence (from norm of 40% to NIH goal of 75%), optimizing health professional time, and eliminating wasted drugs and packaging. We are delivering to the market with a unique “Personalized Wellness Portfolio” (PWP) that dispenses custom medication regimens. It is the first of its kind to connect the patient, clinic, and pill manufacturer in the administration of therapy.
short-description: #Insightfil address adherence problem by linking HCP to manufacturer to patient

description: We collaborate with educators, therapists, parents, and kids through human centered design, to create playthings that encourage inclusion among all kids, regardless of ability, age, or gender. There are 2.8 million kids in the US with special needs, but many toys on the market for them create a stigma of being different, isolating them from their peers. Our first product is called the O-Rings, a large-scale sensory toy for tactile exploration, social play, open-ended play, and is locally made!
short-description: At Increment, we develop playthings that encourage inclusion for kids with and without disabilities to play together.

description: Half of America's chronic homeless and incarcerated population spent time as children in foster care. If we could provide opportunities to young adults aging out of foster care, then they can successfully transition into their communities. Honeycomb Homes will offer two-year apprenticeships in agriculture with housing, food, income, on-the-job training, follow on job placement, and long-term support. Our homes will demonstrate how they can be linked to the land and succeed.
short-description: Young adults aging-out of foster care are high-risk. Honeycomb Homes provides them agricultural apprenticeships leading to sustainable lives

description: LearnLux helps Millennials learn personal finance skills through online, interactive, learning tools. As individuals pass each module, they earn money, which they receive when they open an account with one of our financial partners. We work with financial companies to connect them with a market they could never reach before. LearnLux is on a mission to make financial literacy a priority.
short-description: LearnLux helps Millennials learn personal finance skills through online learning tools while connecting them with financial institutions.

description: OpenLab is a platform for scientists to get out of the stalls in their progress. We transform the scientific method from working mostly alone, to a social and machine-assisted system, where researchers can efficiently retrieve relevant information and suggestions. We do this by providing easy data sharing and exploration tools. Further, our tagging and machine learning system will create a searchable Research Graph of the strategies used to solve a problem.
short-description: OpenLab is building social tools and machine intelligence to accelerate scientific discovery within research groups

description: There is currently no reliable way to manage dehydration, which has significant unwanted effects for athletes, soldiers, the elderly, and general consumers. Consequences of dehydration can be severe (500k hospitalizations annually, and dozens of deaths) but even mild, pre-symptomatic cases cause significant unwanted effects on physical and cognitive performance. Nix is developing a wearable, power-free biosensor that empowers the individual to manage their hydration status in real-time.
short-description: Nix is pioneering consumer diagnostics through its disposable biosensor platform. First solution: a real-time wearable hydration sensor.

description: The world is getting more complex every day, but Navitome can make it feel more straightforward. We help you leverage all your institutional know-how no matter where it’s hiding — intranets, knowledge management systems, PowerPoint decks, even in someone’s head. Our easy-to-create, easy-to-share, and easy-to-use interactive guides turn complexity, distraction, and uncertainty into simplicity, focus, and action.
short-description: Navitome lets you give your employees and customers interactive, step-by-step guidance on demand.

description: Currently, there is no available drug that reduces tissue death during heart attack. MIFCOR is addressing this great need by developing a first-in-class biologic therapeutic for protecting tissue from cell death following reduced blood flow (ischemia). Our therapeutic, MIF-2, takes advantage of breakthrough science: by targeting a novel biological pathway, it protects tissue from ischemia-induced death. We successfully executed an exclusive option on an IP portfolio and building a business plan.
short-description: MIFCOR is saving your heart when you have a heart attack

description: We grow fat! This isn't a very attractive pitch, unless you're a plastic surgeon.  You see fat tissues are best material to reshape and reconstruct the face and body. Our injections can be used to direct your fat cells to cover wrinkles and erase signs of aging. Or for a natural and non-surgical breast augmentation. The main point is that the results are natural and comes from your own tissues. Our vision is the make plastic surgery natural instead of 'plastic'.
short-description: We make your own cells cover wrinkles and signs of aging.

description: Our solution uses user behavioral data obtained from mobile devices to provide personalized advertisements to website visitors who leave without purchases. The platform uniquely uses information from  both the mobile web and mobile apps. We currently have 33M users going through our platform, and have analyzed over 1.5B clicks and purchases. The click-through rate (CTR) is three to five times higher and people are buying more. We expect revenues of $4M+ this year, up from $0.6M last year.
short-description: We provide a marketing tool for advertisers to retarget mobile users who leave a website without purchasing.

description: Meetcaregivers is a unique platform that uses online and video technology to help families safely find and hire qualified caregivers for their aging parents at up to 50% less than traditional  home care agencies.  Video profiles of pre-screened caregivers make it easy to hire the ideal match. After families select a caregiver, we handle the payments and insurance, and provide tools for tracking schedules and care.
short-description: Meetcaregivers enables more seniors to age at home by using online and video technology to connect them to qualified caregivers

description: Makers Empire has created the world’s first 3D printing Learning Program designed for primary and middle schools. It includes everything required to get started with 3D printing in the classroom today:
short-description: Makers Empire makes the world's easiest to use 3D printing software

description: MagnebotiX reduces time and cost of drug development by automating an error-prone, manual process.  Developing a new drug takes ~$2.6bn and 10-15 years. Given 20 year patents, a pharma player’s biggest pain point is immediate launch: 1 year of exclusivity means $1bn in revenues. Our patented technology enables wireless, microrobotic-assisted transport of protein crystals at the nanoscale for their screening as drug candidates. This disruptive technology increases leap time while shrinking costs.
short-description: DELICATE OBJECTS - GENTLE METHODS: MagnebotiX microrobotic systems for next generation crystallography with automated crystal harvesting.

description: IVF success rates are only 30%, mainly due to the lack of effective tools to assess the viability of embryos to implant into patients (the current standard is visual inspection that is not highly correlated to quality). LuminOva aims to provide an accurate method, by offering a device to IVF clinics that images eggs/embryos and illuminates new features associated to viability. We hope to improve success rates by incorporating these features in a selection algorithm that indicates embryo quality.
short-description: LuminOva is developing an optical fertility device to assess egg and embryo quality to improve success rates of in vitro fertilization.

description: College deadlines, exams, and coursework mean that students are constantly under time-constraints to produce good work, but there are currently no ways for them to get immediate in-person academic help. 21mn US college students experience this regularly, as have we. Quickhelp is a mobile app that allows college students to meet with in-person, low-cost tutors within-the-hour. USA Today & Boston Magazine call it the 'Uber for Tutors'. The current version attracted 1700 active users since Feb.
short-description: Quickhelp is the only mobile platform that allows college students to meet in person with low-cost tutors in their area within-the-hour.

description: We build and sell practical Magnetic Nanoparticle Imaging Systems to meet the quantitative imaging needs of nanoparticle-based drug delivery platforms. The NanoPi-XYTM is a benchtop magnetic nanoparticle imaging system for histological tissue sections that operates in conventional lab space. NanoPi-XY images reveal quantity of nanoparticle accumulation within regions of interest, biodistribution within tumors and critical organs, and the targeting efficacy of the drug delivery platforms.
short-description: Benchtop Magnetic Nanoparticle Imaging.

description: “Fed watching” has become increasingly important in recent years, but existing methods for examining central bank policies and their potential impact on capital markets remain biased, qualitative, imprecise and hard to incorporate into investing models. Our core product, the Fed Playbook, utilizes a novel, patent-pending text analytics approach to synthesize Central Bank communications into a quantitative tradable signal that finance professionals can input directly into investment models.
short-description: Prattle - Provider of the first unbiased, comprehensive, quantitative data of central bank sentiment.

description: Real Food Solutions is launching a line of food products for everyday discomforts like nausea and heartburn. Our 1st product, Anchor Bar, is a nutrition bar that prevents and relieves nausea including motion sickness and morning sickness. The patent-pending bar was formulated by a Harvard-MD based on scientific research that links protein, ginger, and vitamins to nausea relief. Anchor Bar is a practical solution for nausea – healthy, no side-effects, convenient, and easy to eat. It’s just food.
short-description: Feeling queasy? Anchor yourself w/Anchor Bar – the safe non-drug nutrition bar to prevent & ease nausea from motion sickness & other causes.

description: Quitbit’s initial product is the world’s first smart lighter and mobile app to help smokers quit. Driven by founders who built the first prototypes to help them-selves quit smoking, Quitbit is bringing data into the $100b smoking industry. Quitbit has a unique two-phase distribution strategy. First, by selling hardware directly to consumers and then by selling an enterprise smoking cessation platform to health insurers and large self-insured companies.
short-description: Quitbit is the first connected cigarette lighter to hep smokers quit.

description: Quiro uses video game design & technology to deliver affordable, portable and engaging medical training. Our initial product is the first minimally invasive surgery simulation video game for tablets.
short-description: Quiro uses video game design & technology to deliver affordable, engaging, and portable medical training worldwide.

description: PSM's online platform enables accredited investors to make direct impact investments in local commercial solar projects developed and managed by PSM’s team of solar experts.
short-description: PSM Clean Energy: Solar Investing, Simplified!

description: “I work 70+ hours per week, but I have to plan my entire Saturday around when my barber is available.”
short-description: Savanna connects customers to barbers for in-office & in-home haircuts saving customers time and hassle, while freeing barbers from shops.

description: Sevamob provides primary healthcare via mobile clinics and a tele-health marketplace in India and South Africa. Our mobile clinics provide comprehensive care onsite to groups on a subscription model. Our tele-health marketplace offers video consultations and second opinions from participating providers. Platform has sophisticated data collection and analytics. We operate 15 units, 14 of which are at breakeven. More than 450 healthcare providers are participating in our marketplace.
short-description: Transforming primary healthcare via mobile clinics and a tele-health marketplace in India and South Africa

description: We connect people for activities through existing communities.
short-description: Slack for activities

description: Viagra made more than 30 billion $, yet it was found by accident. It took scientists several decades to discover new use for Aspirin. Viagra and Aspirin are repurposed drugs. ReThink offers a distinct algorithm based on evolutionary genomics to find new uses for existing and failed drugs faster and more accurately. We harness the power of 2 billion years of evolution history to shed light on a new world of gene-drug-disease interactions.  Discovery shouldn’t take decades we can do it in minutes.
short-description: ReThink offers a powerful algorithm based on evolutionary genomics to find new uses for existing and failed drugs faster and more accurately

description: We are changing child care. We leverage unused space like function rooms at movie theaters, restaurants, hotels, sporting events, convention centers, and vacant retail real estate, to create PopUp Childcare locations staffed by our team of trained professionals. Parents search, or receive notifications, for locations with PopUp Childcare. Then book a slot, drop the kids off and enjoy a movie, meal or sporting event knowing their kids are close by, safe and having fun in our care.
short-description: PopUp Childcare provides professional drop-in child care onsite at movie theaters, restaurants, sporting events and more.

description: Coming out of MIT's Langer Lab, Poly6 bridges gaps between theoretical design and practical manufacturing, enabling the production of more complex components, improved tolerance control and overall higher efficiency of end-user systems. In certain verticals, this digitization reduces costs in established manufacturing sectors by as much as 30% while avoiding both regulatory and new material specification complications.
short-description: Our process intelligent materials offer digital manufacturing solutions to existing production within some of the most complex industries.

description: Resilient Coders is a volunteer-based program focused on making web technology more available to urban youth who might not otherwise be exposed to it. It's a three-part program that funnels students from learning HTML after school, through our downtown 'Coworking' sessions, and ultimately, hourly employment. Our higher performers participate in Resilient Lab, a web design and development shop with real clients. We believe in technology as meritocracy.
short-description: Resilient Coders teaches underserved, at-risk youth to code, here in Boston

description: Rich, chocolaty, and decadent, these bite-sized treats are perfect for health conscious women who want to satisfy their cravings, but are unwilling to sacrifice nutrition. PMS Bites are comfort without the guilt.

description: PianoArc is reshaping the musical keyboard. After building a circular keyboard controller from scratch in 6 months for an international music tour we have press, fans and musicians calling for more.    We have a 2nd unit ready to ship, one granted US patent,  more IP in the works, and no debt.  We are finalists in the Edison Award's 2015 innovation competition and are prototyping new designs to capture a broad swath of the international performing keyboard market. See www.pianoarc.com.
short-description: PianoArc is reshaping the musical keyboard for a new era of performance tools  - starting with a circular piano.

description: UCB builds social capital by connecting people, organizations, and resources in low-income communities.  We aggregate community opportunities and resources through a mobile application (ucbapp.org). Our members - Union Capitalists - earn social and financial service rewards for participation in our mission-driven partner schools, health centers and community programs. By rewarding involvement we aim to create a spark that ignites improvement and new opportunities in our communities.
short-description: Union Capital Boston is a rewards program for community engagement. Members transform human capital into social and economic capital.

description: Tuten effortlessly connects busy consumers with high-quality service providers throughout Latin America. Our mobile solution helps millions of busy working professionals complete chores, while generating thousands of more profitable, flexible, and local jobs for independent contractors. Tuten provides the best way to schedule, manage, and pay for household services at the tap of a finger. Sit down and relax - our contractors are screened, trained, and supervised to guarantee top-notch service.
short-description: Tuten's on-demand platform effortlessly connects busy consumers with high-quality home service providers throughout LATAM

description: The Red Button Association is a social start-up which aim to fight against the cyberbullying phenomenon over the network.
short-description: The Red Button is a social startup which design to use the crowd source in order to reduce the cyberbullying over the network

description: Think Board is a clear film that turns any surface into a dry erase board. Our vision is to change the way we think and learn. Through Think Board we inspire users from classrooms to conference rooms.

description: At ToneTree, we strive to introduce new, innovative ways to interact with music, while keeping the experience easy and affordable. We offer a unique music interface that is as sonically rich as a traditional instrument, yet intuitive enough to start playing right away. For beginners and avid musicians alike, our product stands out by providing an experience like no other, at a fraction of the price of our competitor's products. It's a whole new experience with sound, and it fits in your pocket.

description: StreetScan’s core business is a pavement inspection service that is fast and affordable to be used city-wide on a frequent basis, ensuring that repair decisions are never based on outdated or incomplete data. Our innovative patented sensing technologies (acoustic, radar, optical) detect surface and subsurface roadway defects within traffic. This enables frequent health monitoring of roads without traffic blockage and addresses the significant problem of aging infrastructure facing our society.

description: Tired of circling the block looking for a meter? Usually end up in a garage with no elevator in sight? SpotLight makes valet parking accessible, convenient, and fast with a mobile app for drivers and asset management software for valet operators. We replace paper tickets with smartphones and leverage experienced staff and an enormous parking inventory to offer the most convenient form of parking anywhere in the city. Download our mobile app today and reserve a valet at the tap of a button.
short-description: SpotLight Parking is the consumer-facing mobile application for valet parking across the nation. Simply #FindReserveRelax.

description: TeachersConnect is an in-person and online network that gives new teachers a safe place to ask their most urgent questions—even the embarrassing ones—and get answers from a trusted network of peers, mentors, and experts who understand the real-world challenges.
short-description: TeachersConnect is a mentorship and collaboration network for new K-12 teachers.

description: Millions of children struggle with chronic illness and the related medical treatment. Treatment can be stressful and stress can worsen symptoms and affect the ability to cope. SuperHealos creates stories, products, and communities that help children facing medical treatment feel like superheroes. Our products are developed with the help of medical experts specifically for these children. We're also working to increase patient satisfaction at hospitals as satisfaction's increasingly critical.
short-description: SuperHealos creates stories, products, and communities that make children facing medical treatment feel like superheroes!

description: Think of the last time that you were part of a group, really part of something. How did it feel? Great, we bet. Groups form are at the core of our lives. They drive what we do, where we go and how we get there. Now take that same cozy feelingand imagine collecting, managing and handling money with these people. Things suddenly become complicated, awkward, anxious and tense. It's a problem we've all experienced.
short-description: Splitzee makes group money easy. We're dedicated to saving you and your clubs, teams, and groups time, money, and above all else: HASSLE.

description: Sourcewater.com, from MIT, is the first online exchange for buying, selling, recycling and managing water and water services for oil and gas production, a $50 billion U.S. market. We create a marketplace that matches providers of water, wastewater, trucking, treatment, storage and disposal with energy producers, thereby minimizing the capital and operating costs of oil and gas production, ensuring reliability of the water supply chain, and reducing the environmental impact of energy operations.
short-description: Sourcewater.com is the water exchange for the energy ecosystem

description: Dry foods, such as nuts and cereals, have been associated with recalls costing up to $ 30 Mio per incident, caused by bacteria contamination.  Processors are now required to prove they reduce harmful bacteria during their process which involves tedious procedures. We offer a process monitoring service which reduces the risk of  recalls, ensures regulatory compliance, gives real-time overview of bacteria reduction and unlock the saving potential of minimum $ 100 K/line/year.
short-description: The company aims to provide a service to upgrade thermal processes of dry foods to trusted microbial inactivation steps

description: Small Fry creates economic opportunity in urban communities by employing talented lower-income youth, aged 17-24, to drive local small business growth online. Youth earn income and gain skills that lead to career mobility while small businesses get affordable online marketing to save time and build revenue.

description: SixPlus is like OpenTable for groups. Our website helps you find and book the best private and semi-private spaces for group dining events of 6 or more guests. description: Hello, we’re Burst. We make big data from little videos. Burst helps manage this new reality, with first mover advantage, proprietary tech and two years of video data
short-description: Burst powers brands and agencies to discover, manage and analyse social video content under 30 seconds on Vine, Instagram and Twitter Video.

description: Bladder cancer affects 10,500 people/year. There is a great need for a diagnostic screening test as early detection results in improved outcomes for both the patient and wider health economy.

description: We are living in a mobile-first world where real time maps and rich location data are central to our digital/physical lives - whether it is booking your holidays, looking for a new property or finding information about a recent event - and so demand for accurate and up to date data is only growing.

description: Babelverse is a platform that enables cross-cultural communication in any language by connecting you quickly and easily to a remote multilingual or pro linguist. description: Fugu is the travel brand of Anyvention, an invention company that specializes in simple solutions for day to day needs. description: There is a disconnect between the end consumers and their water Utility. Such lack of customer engagement has a bad impact: we waster potable water. At Advizzo, we then build a software comparing your usage with your neighbours and providing you with tips to consume the water you just need. As a result, the consumers are engaged and switch to digital channels, the water Utility has a better knowledge of its customers and decreases its cost to serve and, all in all, water consumption decreases
short-description: Advizzo software helps end consumers to use the water they just need

description: A R T C U B E is a social media platform for everyone involved in the art world or interested in art. Users create a profile, where they can discover new art, artists and galleries, whilst connecting with their friends to follow what they like and attend events together. We make art accessible to everyone.

description: We search thousands of websites so you don’t have to and bring together thousands of wines and merchant so you can find every wine, everywhere, via Baacco. description: We are discovering game-changing medicines for diseases like cancer.

description: Cambridge Carbon Capture Ltd is developing a breakthrough technology solution to Industrial CO2 Capture & Storage/Utilisation, based upon IP-protected advanced CO2 mineralisation technology. CCC’s technology has the potential to strip CO2 from industrial flue gases for less than the current carbon price, with the potential to offset this cost or even make a profit from sale of semi-precious metals and other mineral by- products from the process.

description: By 2020, almost half of people will get cancer. Early diagnosis improves survival rates. Peer-reviewed clinical studies show that dogs' extremely sensitive noses can accurately detect different cancers. Dognostica will be the first company to commercialise canine-assisted cancer screening. Using patent-protected high throughput systems which ensure high welfare standards for the dogs, our certified laboratories will screen large volumes of samples with low rates of false-positives/negatives.

description: Currently, people who donate money regularly to charities generally receive monthly or quarterly newsletters via the post as the primary means of communication - they tend to be quite long and non-specific about the impact of the individual's donations. Given that we live in a world of Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and more, it ought to be possible to deliver more regular and digestible communication to convey progress in a more engaging manner. Donative aims to solve this problem.
short-description: Donative is a platform that helps charities to communicate impact to their supporters, enabling them to inspire a new generation of giving.

description: CLARA is the unique and revolutionary smart jacket that incorporates ultra bright turn signals and braking sensors to automatically make cyclists, runners and every pedestrian safer in poor light conditions. The user can visualise all the information on the smartphone’s application to build healthy lifestyle habits and achieve personal goals.

description: Crop Intellect is a research and development company focusing on agricultural innovations. Our research identifies molecules produced by plants in certain condition and uses these to stimulate actions which improve the efficiency of resource capture and productivity. Inclusion of these molecules in crop nutrition products reduce significantly the environmental impact and increase yield and quality.

description: Imagine, never, ever, missing another parcel! That’s CornerDrop.

description: FilmDoo is a video-on-demand (VOD) platform focused on helping people to discover and watch great international (i.e. non-Hollywood) films. FilmDoo makes it easier, fun and engaging for people to discover films they would otherwise not hear about.

description: Cytora transforms unstructured data from the web into actionable intelligence by identifying relevant events & analyzing the risk to clients across Defense, Finance, Supply Chain, & Risk Management. From tracking flights in real-time to monitoring supply chains we provide a real-time understanding of risks in a complex world
short-description: By monitoring the web Cytora offers real-time geopolitical risk analysis on global events that impact organisations & move markets

description: Choosic is the world's first consumer music discovery app built on machine learning algorithms and over 600 curated music blogs.

description: Fall-Safe Assist detects and records all characteristics of a fall, so that falls in the elderly can be analysed and prevented in future, while at the same time preventing a fracture since the device is embedded in the successful Fall-Safe hip protectors, which are sold world-wide. Our hip protectors use new technology that absorbs 70% of the force of impacts. Fall-Safe Assist will also send an alarm to an emergency response centre if the faller does not get up within a pre-defined period.

It is an off-the-shelf product that allows the user to define their own listening experience for music and communication in any environment.

description: Moteefe makes selling custom clothing online easy, fun and financially rewarding.  We aim to create opportunities in the clothing e-commerce space for all. We only produce successful campaigns, so there is no upfront investment or unsold inventory!

description: We have figured out a way to help language learners remember every new word they come across - something that can revolutionize a £40 bn industry. description: Based on patented technology and principles of synthetic biology, Molecular Warehouse has developed a ‘toolbox’ for building custom biosensors. Our technology allows the development of electrochemical biosensors that detect various biomarkers (protein, DNA, small molecules) with high specificity and sensitivity, at a fraction of time and cost of that of existing platforms. Our platform can be customised for detection of novel biomarkers, while different sensors can be multiplexed on one chip.

description: Lobster is 'Etsy for social media content' going 'Google Images for social media content'.

description: SMART Beds allows admission and discharge staff to know exactly which beds are available, in progress of being cleaned or repaired. Saving time, money & heartache!

description: Q App is the mobile ordering platform that solves the problem of queuing in busy hospitality, sports and entertainment venues. description: Genetic Research	is often delayed due to difficulties finding relevant DNA data. Finding the right repository containing the data needed is difficult and time consuming. description: Balance can be hard to find in today’s world. We believe in the three Ps ­­– living in the PRESENT, believing everything is POSSIBLE and staying POSITIVE. description: Airbnb has 1.5 million listings. The choice is crushing. Finding the right space takes hours & the result is hit-&-miss, with many spaces amateurishly ran. No more! PLU&M is a curated collection of the world's most unique & inspiring spaces. We handpick the top 1% of spaces in every city from 100+ sites, using a mix of algorithms & physical visits by experts. Choosing is easy. You know with certainty, you’re getting the best possible space for your budget. And there is no risk of disappointment.
short-description: PLU&M: Handpicking the world’s most unique and inspiring spaces, for the passionate traveler

description: The photography market is huge yet fragmented. Photographers all have websites so clients struggle in finding the perfect ones. Meanwhile, many quality part-time photographers want more jobs but there's no good promote channel that needs little effort to manage.
short-description: Perfocal is an intelligent platform makes hiring a photographer as well as working as a freelance photographer 10x easier.

description: Pingen is a web based service to automate the process of sending electronic documents as postal letters. By partnering with professional print companies distributed across various markets, Pingen achieves faster deliveries, cheaper prizes while even reducing the carbon footprint. Compared to the other offerings available, Pingen provides a fully automated, enterprise grade solution that is instantly ready to use, has no setup fees or any requirements for monthly letter volumes.
short-description: Pingen.com makes the process of sending postal letters a commodity

description: See Fashion is an online idea validation platform where consumers validate designs through pre-orders and social sharing. We take away the pain of manufacture, supply chain management, selling wholesale and reaching press by levering our existing award winning ethical supply chain infrastructure. We use pre-order sales data to pitch the best designs directly to retailers and buyers we know personally. See Fashion connects the dots for young designers helping save time, money and pain.
short-description: Designers submit fashion ideas; you pick with your pound and we get them ethically manufactured. Fund your favourite fashion trend today!

description: Your startup is hiring like crazy and you want to avoid high recruiter fees. Posting jobs on social media both dilutes your marketing message and confuses your customers. TalentRocket helps you build a talent pool of awesome people who want to work for you, to keep you ahead of the game when it comes to hiring the best.
short-description: TalentRocket is the social media platform for promoting your employer brand.

description: Theatrical publishing is broken and our team has fixed it.
short-description: TreePress connects the people who write playscripts with the people who need them.

description: Telos is an open source project building the common infrastructure for a decentralised, citizen-led  industry and Internet of Things. The Telos Services project is developing open service kits: providing citizens with the opportunity to become co-producers for the core services of their homes, and setting a civic framework for our future ‘smart’ built environment.
short-description: Telos is designing, testing and building infrastructure for the decentralised economy.

description: Sidekix is a new way to navigate, offering  a personalized way to experience the city by foot.
short-description: Sidekix is reinventing urban navigation, leveraging the power of big data to recommend personalized walking routes.

description: Cahootsy connects like-minded enthusiasts to get the best buys.
short-description: Cahootsy: the crowd-powered marketplace. Discover great products through like-minded shoppers, team up to ask for discounts on the go.

description: Stickyworld is a participation platform for shaping design of the real world together with your colleagues, customers and end users.  Organisations use Stickyworld to host discussions and consultations on images, maps, architects’ plans and 360 virtual tours. Participants simply stick their comments and questions in virtual post it notes which are then processed and exported via actionable reports. Stickyworld's customers include local authorities, communities, developers and architects.
short-description: Stickyworld makes it easy to involve people in projects that matter to them.

description: Timelooper is the first platform of its kind in a new virtual reality category called edu-cultural entertainment. A location-based time travel app, Timelooper transports visitors right to the heart of the most memorable moments in history through 360° virtual reality videos using only a smartphone and a cardboard viewer. By showing history, instead of telling history, Timelooper enhances the current visit experience by letting you re-live the most memorable moments of amazing places and events.
short-description: Timelooper is a location-based mobile virtual reality time travel app helping visitors re-live the most memorable moments of amazing places.

description: E-commerce has changed - contemporary customers buy in many different channels. Shoplo helps you reach them all and sell your products everywhere your prospects are.
short-description: Shoplo.com is the easiest way to sell online. We help small brands sell more and save time.

description: Serket is a unique mobile service that ensures medication adherence, the top priority for public health and pharma. Our system seamlessly connects patients to our partner pharmacies. A smart, personal notification encourages patients to adhere to their medication and connects them with experts immediately when help is needed.
short-description: Serket is a pharmacy-integrated mobile service which ensures medication delivery, solving the urgent adherence problem costing billions.

description: Shade 7 specialises in publishing premium quality educational pop-up, novelty books and 3D interactive digital apps teaching children of all faiths about Islam in a fun way. Drawing on the similarities within the 3 Abrahamic faiths, we have a strong social purpose of developing an understanding of interfaith dialogue, respect, tolerance and commonality from a young age, through creative storytelling of some of the most glorious, classical, historical and timeless events common to all our faiths.
short-description: Shade 7 is the world’s first specialist Islamic children’s novelty publishing house.  Making faith accessible, inspiring and fun for all.

description: Power plants have been stuck using the same inefficient condensers for decades. Putting a hydrophobic coating on these condensers would save millions of dollars in fuel and thousands of tons of CO2 every year for each power plant. Until now there hasn’t been a coating that survives long enough while providing good thermal performance. We invented and patented a durable hydrophobic coating at MIT and invented a way to manufacture it at an industrial scale.
short-description: DropWise: on a mission to avert megatons of CO2 with a nanoengineered coating for power plants

description: Aquaculture is the fastest growing animal sector and is one of the best sources of protein to accommodate the world’s growing population of 9 billion by 2030. At the same time, the world’s natural fisheries are in decline and fish farming is unsustainable currently. KnipBio's high-yield proprietary fermentation technology offers a more economical, healthier and sustainable alternative than today's approaches.
short-description: KnipBio: Our proprietary biotechnology makes animal feed more nutritious & sustainable.

description: Visualwise can transform architectural construction and engineering designs into virtual reality, allowing you to look around a realistic 3d space as if you were actually there. All that is needed is a mobile phone and a £5 headset. Visualwise supports designs from a wide variety of CAD platforms, and produces stunning real time graphics within our highly optimized rendering engine. We charge a per project fee depending on the project size, or an annual license for the self service plugin.
short-description: Transform architectural and construction designs into virtual reality, allowing you to look around a space as if you were actually there.

description: The publishing industry can save millions of dollars annually with Dimples. Dimples, Inc. develops software for reducing the cost of printing documents. Our patented technology enables organizations to use their existing fonts while reducing costs by 30 to 40%. Dimples specializes in engineering ink- and toner-conserving software and font overlays for newspapers, magazines, and more. Our target markets include: publishers, government, institutions, and bulk printers.
short-description: 'With Dimples, it's like printing money.' Dimples reduces ink costs when printing documents.

description: Grapevine is pioneering Advocate Marketing, a powerful new digital marketing platform connecting brands with relevant communities of online influencers to deliver breakthrough advertising ROI.
short-description: Grapevine's advocate marketing platform helps consumer facing brands generate sales by working with relevant YouTubers

description: For many diseases whose treatment involves frequent delivery of injectable drugs (diabetes, Parkinson's, osteoporosis, etc.), using continuous infusion pumps often leads to better outcomes than multiple daily injections, resulting in healthier patients and lower healthcare costs.  Existing pumps' limitations, however, inhibit their adoption.  Our Evopump - a more comfortable, precise, therapeutically flexible, and lower cost pump - should significantly increase adoption, yielding better outcomes
short-description: Evopump - the first soft, flexible, bandage-like patch pump for active and simultaneous subcutaneous delivery of one or more medications

description: Annually 47 million people in the US fall victim to a water-borne infection. Current testing methods take 24 hours or more. This waiting time is too long for efficient quality control and to prevent disease outbreaks. Fluid-Screen brings the power of an entire lab into a portable device. Fluid-Screen detects bacteria in water in 30 minutes or less. The patent pending technology is based on a silicon biosensor chip developed at Yale University. We believe that Fluid-Screen will change the world.
short-description: Fluid-Screen makes the world a safer place by enabling more sensitive bacterial detection from fluid samples in 30 minutes as opposed to day

description: SQZ Biotech’s CellSqueeze enables the delivery of molecules into cells by a gentle squeezing. It was invented at MIT in the labs of Prof. Bob Langer and Prof. Klavs Jensen. It's shown 10-100x improvement relative to competing technologies for major unmet needs: primary cells and non-nucleid acid molecules (e.g. proteins). We own the exclusive license from MIT to any application. We started in the research market but plan to pursue higher impact applications (e.g. therapeutics) in the future.
short-description: SQZ Biotech's CellSqueeze (invented at MIT) enables delivery of molecules into cells by a gentle squeezing. That's right, we squeeze cells.

description: 3Derm is a cost-effective skin imaging system that allows any user to take clinical-quality 3D images of concerning skin lesions and upload them instantly for review by a dermatologist. We implement our technology within accountable care organizations as a triage system, allowing primary care physicians to use our handheld imager in their clinics and send images via cloud to an in-network dermatologist for review - ensuring those with alarming conditions are seen as soon as possible.
short-description: 3Derm takes 3D pictures of skin with an inexpensive handheld imager to help detect skin cancer at the earlier more treatable stages.

description: 200 million people across India and Bangladesh suffer from arsenic and fluoride poisoning due to contaminated drinking water. Drinkwell transforms this $2.3B market into economic opportunity by blending novel water filtration with a franchise business model to provide 20L jugs of water daily to customers for a low monthly fee. Compared to reverse osmosis, the current best practice, Drinkwell delivers 60x more water, is 16x more energy efficient, and reduces waste by 7 orders of magnitude.
short-description: Drinkwell transforms the global arsenic and fluoride water crisis into economic opportunity.

description: Early-stage investors can manage a pipeline of investment opportunities. You add the companies you’re interested in, we gather all known data about them. Then you add your own ratings, notes and private data. Your data always remains private to you.
short-description: Xenapto brings you comprehensive decision support for investors, whether you're a solo angel or a team of full-time investors.

description: What if I told you I could save one million lives every year with just refrigerator magnets and a laser pointer? For the 500 million annual infections that go undiagnosed, current malaria diagnostics are slow, expensive, inaccurate, and chemical-based, meaning they require refrigeration and clinical expertise.
short-description: What if we told you we could save one million lives every year with refrigerator magnets and a laser pointer? We are DDG.

description: Catie’s Closet, provides, through it’s in-school, discreet resource, essential clothing and basic necessities to homeless students and those living below the poverty line. Students are able to privately access what they need – which helps remove barriers to learning and school attendance. Participating students want to attend school. We are helping kids fit in, feel valued and focus on education. By providing a hand-up over a hand-out, we are leveling the playing field for at-risk students.
short-description: Catie’s Closet improves school attendance and removes social stigmas by providing clothing and necessities  to students living in poverty.

description: Power meters are a training and performance tracking tool for cyclists; think of it as a super Fitbit for cyclists. While they've become essential for elite cyclists, their high price (often well over $1,000) prevents mainstream fitness cyclists from using power data to train smarter and ride faster.
short-description: Ashton Instruments: We're making the first affordable cycling power meter. Think of it as a super Fitbit for cyclists.

description: Anfiro is developing ultra high-permeability membranes for water purification.  Our step increase in membrane permeability results in transformative cost reductions by enabling small-scale cost effective systems.  The massive footprint reduction translates into large CAPEX savings, while the lower operating pressure results in a decreased energy requirement and associated operating cost.  Anfiro's ultra-high permeability membranes are enabling clean and affordable water for a better tomorrow.
short-description: Clean and affordable water for a better tomorrow.

description: Our mission is to provide remote management information, intelligence and solutions for agricultural & food supply chain stakeholders. We combine targeted hyper-local weather, agronomic models, best practice farming modelling & high-resolution satellite data.
short-description: Agriculture meets Big Data: key management intelligence and smart climate solutions for agriculture.

description: Diagnostic of diseases is a 40 billion USD global market where current technologies are expensive, require specialized equipment and take several hours to produce results, affecting billions around the world mostly in developing countries. We developed a 5 minute and $1 diagnostic technology for infectious diseases that allows health data collection and analysis in real time for disease surveillance, using big data algorithms to help decision makers to create strategies for disease control.
short-description: Today diagnostic of diseases is a long and expensive process. Unima developed a low cost and 5 minute process usable by anyone, anywhere.

description: ReFleece brings new life to old stuff.  We partner with trusted clothing companies like Patagonia, Woolrich, Ibex and Polartec to upcycle their damaged clothes and scraps into beautiful, modern accessories like iPad sleeves and laptop bags.  Started in 2012 by a former IDEO designer and former science teacher, ReFleece is dedicated to reversing the culture of disposability by demonstrating that upcycling can be scalable and  profitable.
short-description: ReFleece is a scalable model for upcycling: we make beautiful, modern accessories from clothes that would otherwise go to waste.

description: Widerfi is better than WiFi as it runs on cellular networks. Traveler‘s dream: flat, affordable, unlimited internet available everywhere, with the same SIM card, but no roaming fees!
short-description: Widerfi is better than WiFi as it runs on cellular networks. Traveler‘s dream: flat unlimited data everywhere, same SIM but no roaming fees!

description: Gecko Health develops products and services to improve respiratory disease management. We offer a unique solution based on mobile reminders, direct inhalers monitoring, data visualizations, challenges, and rewards that motivate patients, engage and inform caregivers. The system connects a small glowing sensor that can easily be attached to existing inhalers to a mobile app and a management dashboard, and allows patients to automatically log real-time information from their inhalers.
short-description: @Geckocap is a connected mobile device that improves management of chronic respiratory diseases for better outcomes and costs

description: Oncolinx is developing the next generation of antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs)--powerful, targeted cancer therapies that have dramatically fewer side effects. These therapies can be targeted to nearly any type of cancer, and are rapidly becoming the state-of-the-art in cancer treatment. Drawing on the scientific innovation of the National Cancer Institute, the world's leading biotechs and life sciences companies, Oncolinx is redefining the paradigm of cancer therapy.
short-description: Oncolinx is developing next-generation cancer therapeutics that safely and effectively treat the most aggressive types of cancer.

description: Medical diagnostics is still done using a venipuncture of the arm and a tube of blood that is sent to a central laboratory. Patients wait from an hour to several days for results and corresponding treatment. There has to be better way! 1DROP is the first portable easy to use device that provides laboratory quality tests of biomarkers from a finger-stick drop of blood immediately in front of the patient.
short-description: Save lives through better faster medical diagnostics at the point-of-care

description: AutoAgronom provides a unique solution that empowers farmers to practice sustainable agriculture. Our systems enable growers to increase yields by up to 30% and save up to 50% of water and 70% of fertilizers. Our patented technologies “listen” to plants and react in real-time to their needs, optimizing levels of oxygen, water and nutrients. We offer potential customers who cultivate large areas in green houses or open fields a complete service package with an annual fee based on area size.
short-description: AutoAgronom increases agriculture yields while providing savings of up to 50% water and 70% fertilizers by “listening” to growth roots.

description: Slang is an adaptive language-learning platform for individuals, businesses, and universities that is quickly becoming the largest source for specialized and professional English courses (e.g., Accounting English, Aviation English, Oil & Gas English). Slang optimizes each user's learning path in real time and syncs knowledge across all courses. With each new topic, students and professionals can master the remaining knowledge they need to rapidly advance in their careers.
short-description: Slang is an adaptive language-learning platform that's quickly becoming the largest source for specialized and professional English courses.

description: EdTrips makes field trips easy and drives more visitors to educational destinations by consolidating the booking and payment of trips among multiple locations and services. Over 400 venues in 43 states have joined EdTrips' marketplace to reach more visitors, including 60% of all destinations in Boston. We have created partnerships with 21 venues to exclusively manage the logistics and payments of over 20,000 trips this year.
short-description: EdTrips helps field trip venues manage their visitors and reach more teachers

description: Jisto creates an elastic compute cloud out of underutilized enterprise server cycles, and allows enterprises to transparently run more parallelized compute-intensive workloads on their paid-for but unused resources. Jisto operates in on-premises data centers as well as private and public clouds, reducing computing costs by up to 75–90% over acquiring more hardware or cloud resources. Jisto is complementary to, and does not interfere with, most existing systems, virtualized and non-virtualized.
short-description: Transforming idle computation cycles in organizations into a powerful cloud computing platform capable of taking on massive computations.

description: Droplette is our patent-pending transdermal delivery system for delivery of drugs up to 60% larger than current treatments deep into skin over large surface areas. Our unique device is painless, contact free, portable and generates no disposables. It is designed to deliver antibiotics for serious ulcers and skin infections, reducing risk secondary complications or antibiotic resistance.  Future applications include localized delivery of chemotherapeutics for skin cancer and drugs for anti-aging.
short-description: Droplette- effective, portable, painless transdermal delivery of large molecules that generates no waste products and never touches the skin

description: CarKnow produces hardware and software designed to capture and generate vehicle data. The CARduino connects to in-vehicle networks, adds digital sensors, and mirrors a user's car in the Cloud. A high-security API features privacy controls and allows developers to build applications to improve the vehicle use and ownership experience. Developers can build applications using our universal API to improve fuel economy, reduce congestion, and improve the vehicle experience. Smart cars = happy drivers
short-description: @CarKnowLLC liberates information hidden in vehicle networks, enabling a cross-manufacturer API and smart apps for analytics & visualization

description: The World Health Organization states that 200 million children worldwide have learning disabilities such as Autism, Dyspraxia, ADHD. Kinems  gamifies therapeutic exercises into highly customisable Kinect learning games that allow children  to perform engaging activities  with hand and body gestures and improve their skills. The games interoperate with  a cloud platform that offers learning & kinetic analytics. Kinems is being successfully used by professionals in several countries.
short-description: Kinems offers engaging & effective learning experiences for children with  learning disabilities  like autism via personalised Kinect games

description: Target, Boston University, New York Times have all been victims of targeted email phishing attacks. Hackers use names and email addresses of known contacts and brands to get employees to open emails and unwittingly share credentials or get infected.
short-description: Phishing and SPAM are different! Phishing attacks through email cause devastating losses.  Get protected with AstraID's PhishingGuardian!

description: Lack of mobility still the biggest barrier for independent life for the close to 300 million visually impaired people in the world. As current tools don't solve the problem entirely, we developed the Sunu band, a sonar bracelet that gently informs the user of obstacles in their way, making their mobility safer and easier. Product was field tested with leader authorities, manufactured and introduced to the market on October 2018.
short-description: Way finding sonar bracelet for the blind

description: ArtLifting is the bridge that connects homeless, disabled, and other disadvantaged artists with paying customers. Many skilled artists participate in art groups at hospitals and shelters to create wonderful pieces, but until ArtLifting, there was no sustainable marketplace where these artists could share their work. We sell our artists' work through two channels: an online marketplace (ArtLifting.com) and partnerships with commercial properties.
short-description: Empower homeless and disabled individuals through the celebration and sale of their artwork! @artlifting is #uplifting #art

description: Our vision is that every young person can get answers to any question about any career, anyplace, anytime. At CareerVillage.org, students ask career questions that are answered online by working professionals sharing their real experiences and perspectives. Our volunteers cover every career field and all walks of life. We reach students by partnering with schools, who use our lesson plans and trainings to bring CareerVillage into classrooms. We serve 25,000 students now, on our way to 8 million.
short-description: CareerVillage crowd-sources career advice for students in low-income communities. Now *every* student can get the personal advice they need.

description: Voxel8 is a startup company that is bringing novel materials to 3D printing.  We will embed function into the typical shapes of 3D printing. Our materials, based on research by Harvard SEAS Professor Lewis, allow us to print embedded conductors, wires, and batteries into the normal matrix materials of 3D printing.
short-description: Voxel8 utilizes next generation unique inks to 3D print multi-material functional products.

startupname: Sano LLC - low cost, point-of-care diagnostics
description: Sano offers a disposable, low cost, Point-of-Care (POC) diagnostic platform with first focus on chronic wounds, quantitatively measuring wound biochemistry (enzymes called MMPs) to personalize treatment, promote faster healing, and reduce treatment costs. In parallel, Sano will trial and commercialize an early equine arthritis diagnostic for earlier revenue in Q4 2014.
