Six other human and vet diseases that are characterized by elevated MMPs will be evaluated sequentially thereafter.
short-description: Sano offers a disposable, low cost, Point-of-Care (POC) diagnostic platform with first focus on chronic wounds

description: Beat Farm is focused on one thing only, to make your music experience incredible. Using your smartphone’s motion sensors, the Beat Farm software application remixes the music you're listening to based on your body movements. Skate, bike, snowboard, dance, or just MOVE to become one with the beat – connected and immersed in the moment!
short-description: Unleash the rare and incredible moments when music connects perfectly to your life. BE THE BEAT.™

description: BridgeU renders the U.S. university preparation & application experience more personalized and intimate, easier to understand and navigate, and easier to leverage to the student’s benefit. Our software solution extends information and tools to groups of students previously ignored by the $60bn university-preparation industry by creating an affordable, more efficient way of bridging the gap and smoothing the transition between secondary & higher education for globally mobile students.
short-description: BridgeU democratizes access to the world's best universities for globally mobile students

description: Imagine doing what Google does on the internet with adwords but in the physical word. According to the place a person visits, the time, the context, to have the possibility to send an ad. To have real statistic feedback on this ads, not just mere estimations. The empathy of an ad is higher if it cares, thus the possibility to become a call to action, if it´s in context the odds are higher to care for it. We develop hardware/software solutions for contextual communication for the real world.
short-description: AWR Ideas is taking contextual advertising outside the internet to the physical world.

description: ACEA is healthcare's definitive resource for Continuing Education (CE). CE is an ongoing licensure requirement of healthcare professionals to learn about new research, methods, and technology. Currently the CE “system” is highly fragmented, hard to manage, and ineffective to improve patient outcomes. We are aggregating course information and preference data to match healthcare professionals with the most effective and high-impact education available – to increase quality and save costs.
short-description: We make engaging with continuing education more effective and painless for healthcare professionals.

description: Admetsys has developed the world’s first automated glucose control system (artificial pancreas) for use in hospital and surgical care. Three clinical trial protocols attest to the system's next-generation performance: 97% control and complete prevention of dangerous low glucose levels. FDA has granted the system accelerated review. Admetsys is presently gearing up for commercial production, and for the final phase trials that will support regulatory clearance in the U.S. and Europe.
short-description: First-of-its-kind artificial pancreas for hospital/surgical patients—a new standard of care in diabetic control safety and precision

description: Biomille has developed the first device specifically designed for facial muscle rehabilitation. Unlike traditional one-size-fits-all electrodes, Biomille’s electrodes are shaped to match the muscle anatomy of the face, significantly enhancing signal selectivity and signal sensitivity. Our targeted rehabilitation approach is expected to result in a marked increase in treatment success rate, enabling patients affected by facial paralysis to regain their facial muscle functionality.
short-description: Biomille Technologies has developed the first device specifically designed for rehabilitation of facial muscles.

description: Over 12M older Americans live alone, many frail or chronically ill. They value independence while their adult children crave safety for their parent. Wearables and cameras are intrusive, inconvenient, and often rejected. Atlas5D uses tablet devices to quantify how someone moves at home while preserving privacy and dignity, and alerts family (and call center in future) if there is a change or potential issue. Atlas5D is currently in private beta with paying customers and has already saved a life.
short-description: Atlas5D reassures working-age children that an aging parent is safe at home by tracking movement and alerting when there may be an issue.

description: Artisan's Asylum is a non-profit organization furnishing education, tools, workspace, and community to empower dedicated fabricators, including hobbyists, artists, and early stage entrepreneurs, to create on large or small scale. We serve greater Boston and the global maker community, the arts, manufacturing, and the innovation economy with the goal of making the world a place where dedicated individuals are able give form to their ideas.
short-description: At Artisan's Asylum we get your hands on tools for making, for work or play. Discover, design, create, make your passion your business!

description: AirPooler is changing the way we travel by making flying private irresistibly affordable and easy. We’ve built a marketplace where pilots of light aircraft with extra seats can list their flights and people going to the same places can arrange to fly with them in exchange for sharing costs.  Users gain a level of mobility and convenience typically associated with private aviation, at a minuscule  fraction of the cost of chartering a plane, while pilots significantly reduce their costs of flying.
short-description: AirPooler redefines mobility by making flying private irresistibly easy and affordable, e.g. Boston to Vineyard for < than $50 and 50 mins.

description: Solar is winning, but solar panel manufacturers are not profitable! Agira’s business model helps solar panel manufacturers become profitable by reducing panel cost and increasing manufacturing capacity by using optics technology. Active solar cells constitute 60% of a solar panel’s cost and are its most capital, energy, and time intensive component. Agira’s optics enable manufacturers to produce solar panels using only a fraction of the solar cells currently required.
short-description: Agira develops optics technology to help solar panel manufacturers increase production capacity and profitability.

description: At Asulia, we believe healthy tastes delicious and we're obsessed with sharing our love of vegetables. We have a line fusion vegan dumplings in kale, chickpea, and taro root at Whole Foods, Formaggio Kitchen SE and more. Each retail box of delicious dumplings contains 2-3 servings of superfood veggies with low glycemic index ingredients. Nutrition and education changed our life and it can change many others. A portion of proceeds support girls' education.
short-description: We believe healthy tastes delicious. Our fusion dumplings have 2-3 servings of veggies in every box. A % of proceeds support girls' ed.

description: Aldatu Biosciences is using proprietary innovations in genotyping technology (PANDAA) to provide superior, cost-effective diagnostic tools that enable effective HIV management worldwide. Our affordable tests allow earlier and more sensitive detection of antiretroviral drug resistance, which allows clinicians to match every patient with optimal drugs, resulting in dramatically improved patient outcomes and a reduction in the global cost of HIV treatment.
short-description: Aldatu Biosciences is improving access to effective HIV patient care worldwide with better, faster, and cheaper diagnostic tools.

description: BrightLoop increases teacher satisfaction by taking the stress out of personalized instruction - improving student achievement and teacher retention. By supporting teachers in personalizing instruction, offsetting reliance on standardized data and highlighting a teacher’s positive impact on students, BrightLoop strives to decrease teacher turnover and renew a sense of confidence and respect for the teaching profession.
short-description: BrightLoop is Evernote for teachers. We enable teacher to use qualitative student insight to personalize learning and communicate progress.

description: We deliver a proprietary technology that identifies zero-day threats on their infancy along with misconfigurations on the existing defenses, as to visualize threats & provide mitigation actions. This enables enterprises to add a new security layer by expanding the intelligence of their existing defenses, maximizing the value of the logs they are already generate & collect without any change in their infrastructure, in a non-intrusive, OS independent way & that comes with no integration pains.
short-description: Responsive security based on threat intelligence & analytics, maximizing your logs value & detecting threats that bypass your defenses

description: Hundreds of millions need dentures. DCDI changes the uncomfortable and time consuming current dentures impression technique, which is a major pain and involves physical elastic impression materials, proposing a quick and elegant optical solution. This is a unique solution for a multi-billion $ market.
short-description: DCDI will shorten the time it takes to get dentures, from 30 days to 30 minutes.

description: D-Orbit develops propulsive devices to be installed on artificial satellites before launch and able to bring them back into the atmosphere and destroy them or re-orbit them into a graveyard orbit when they stop working, in a quick, safe and controlled manner. D-Orbit offers to satellites owners a reliable and cost-effective product to increase the operating life of satellites and especially to avoid costs deriving from collisions with other spacecrafts or assets on Earth.
short-description: D-Orbit sell smart propulsive end-of-life devices for satellites: more revenues for operators, no more debris.

description: Catchbox is the worlds first throw able microphone, designed to make it easy to ask audiences questions compared to passing a normal stick mic.  This in turn, is a major pain point for many events, which in turn is a huge industry, totaling 115B $ in the US alone composed of around 2M corporate events with 200M participants.  By making the outer shell customizable, event organizers gain a new medium to advertise sponsors through whilst creating a scalable and repeatable business model.
short-description: Catchbox is the world's first throwable microphone.  Make events fun and more productive by getting audiences to engage and ask questions.

description: CrowdComfort is a facilities management SaaS company that offers facilities operators a new way to communicate with occupants in real-time about comfort, maintenance, and safety concerns.  This crowd-sourced feedback is then converted into geo-located actionable work orders. Through a set of innovative tools CrowdComfort enables facility managers to analyze and manage those work orders more rapidly and cost effectively and identify energy and operational saving opportunities.
short-description: @CrowdComfort is unlocking the #HumanSensorNetwork with a crowdsourced, mobile solution for #FacilitiesManagement and #OccupantEngagement

description: Cocoon Biotech will advance the treatment of osteoarthritis with its novel long-acting injectable therapy. OA currently impacts 27 million US adults. The disease occurs when cartilage breaks down in the joint space causing pain and inflammation. Cocoon’s patented technology is silk--an innovative biomaterial known for its strength, lubrication, and drug-delivery capabilities that can be injected directly into the joint to provide long lasting pain relief and delay the progression of disease.
short-description: Cocoon Biotech is a company developing novel long-acting injectable therapies to advance the treatment of osteoarthritis.

description: Cell.in-sight is reinventing cytometry by simplifying and speeding-up cell analysis for both research and clinical applications. Our goal is to improve the efficiency of and reduce the costs for providing basic cell analysis services for clinical and research applications in high-resource markets (cervical cancer) and the middle of the pyramid in the developing world (HIV, cancer). Our technology has two disruptive advantages: higher cell throughput (100x) and lower maintenance costs.
short-description: Cell.in-sight reinvents cytometry to make blood-work cheaper, simpler, and faster

description: ChopChop, The Fun Cooking Magazine for Families is a non-profit quarterly food magazine, launched as an antidote to childhood obesity. ChopChop's mission is to inspire & teach kids to cook & be nutritionally literate & to empower them to establish better eating habits for a lifetime of good nutrition.
short-description: ChopChopKids inspires and teaches kids to cook and eat real food with their families through its award-winning ChopChop Magazine.

description: Colleges lose MILLIONS of dollars every year due to ~30% of students transferring in their 1st year. Through its private social platform CampusTap aides Offices of Student Success in increasing retention and job placement rates. CampusTap allows admitted students to build profiles matching them with groups, events and other peers on campus. The CampusTap jobs tool recommends internships and entry level positions based upon a students field of study and extracurricular activity.
short-description: @CampusTap is a private social platform designed exclusively for colleges. Discover events connect with peers and land your dream job.

description: I am focused on improving access to lifesaving pharmaceuticals and vaccines globally. Currently numerous pharmaceuticals are produced, stored and delivered in two-container formulations; this is an unnecessary burden across the entire supply chain. Our technology enables the integration of both containers into a single vial. Thus enabling the supply and delivery of up to twice as many essential medicines worldwide while also being environmentally friendly, cost effective and simpler to use.
short-description: Developing the next generation technology for optimized, simplified and affordable pharmaceutical production, storage and delivery globally.

description: Bubbl is a video platform that enables audiences to share their favorite parts of online video in bite-sized clips.
short-description: Bubbl lets you capture the best parts of online videos to share what matters most with who matters most.

description: Faze1 is reinventing the way traditional marketing techniques are applied through more informed and scientific methodologies. We enhance customer acquisition strategies by providing businesses everything they need to find, reach, and track customers in a single platform. Faze1 drives greater sales productivity by generating profitable marketing campaigns that reach the right audiences with unmatched accuracy and speed.
short-description: Faze1 is developing the data-drive outbound marketing platform for the home services industry.

description: Imagine a refrigerator that runs on just water. Sounds like a dream, but these have been in existence for hundreds of years.Cheap, reliable, and operating on no electricity, evaporative coolers can keep food cool in hot, dry climates, extending the shelf-life of produce by days or even weeks.EVAPTAINER takes evaporative cooling to the next level: we design evaporative cooling crates specifically for transporting produce in developing countries, thereby minimizing spoilage along the supply chain.
short-description: @Evaptainers builds mobile refrigerators for developing markets that run on nothing but sun and water.

description: Fairwaves is a new kind of full-stack telecom vendor, tailored to serve mobile operators in low-income areas. You could be a company of just few guys to start a mobile operator. No special skills and no expensive engineers needed. We provide everything you need to build a mobile network which is profitable even at $2/month revenue per user. It scales from a single site to a country-wide network, offers free calls and roaming inside global Fairwaves network and can be controlled from your laptop.
short-description: Mobile networks for a billion of

description: For the trucking industry Nueve (9) is a solution that reduces fuel costs and contributes positively to the environment. It simply converts water into hydrogen and oxygen to help the fuel burn thoroughly. Without modifying the engine and with the easiest maintenance of just adding distilled water, Nueve (9) will increase the torque of the engine, it will better the mileage and it will drastically reduce harmful emissions.
short-description: Eve's product Nueve (9) converts water into hydrogen and oxygen to increase the diesel mileage and reduce harmful emissions.

description: Imagine a tool that can help resolve our most impossible environmental problems. That can simply solve our landfill crisis, methane emissions, water quality issues and, depleted and poisoned soils. That big vision launched our company, we invented that tool, and after three years in development, we debuted the first-ever kitchen Compost Shredder.  A compost bin on steroids, this elegant appliance solves the universal problem that prevents folks from recycling food scraps: the ick factor.
short-description: Imagine a product that can turn your trash to the healthiest garden food in just days. Ecotonix makes that.

description: We started Grove Labs to provide everybody access to healthy, local, and sustainable food by empowering people with the tools to grow food themselves. We've designed a series of modules for kitchens that each grow a specific type of plant (tomatoes, greens, microgreens, mushrooms etc). These modules use aquaponics + LED lighting. Vegans, vegetarians, and other health-aware people love our products!
short-description: MIT Grads Create A Personal Farm For Your Kitchen. That's the most local and organic food gets, from @GroveLabs

description: SunSprite is like a Fitbit for the sun. It’s a wearable device that tracks your personal bright light and UV exposure to help you become happier and healthier. It was invented by two Harvard Medical School doctors and is backed by decades of scientific data. Bright light is clinically essential for setting your body’s internal clock. So let’s stop hitting the snooze button and start getting out of bed ready to face the day. Because only SunSprite can tell you if you’re getting enough light.
short-description: SunSprite is a wearable device invented by MDs that tracks your light & UV exposure to improve energy, mood & sleep.

description: ‘H2Only Battery Powered Devices’ are the only water-activated devices that can be re-activated multiple times anywhere and anytime. They are built to produce power per specific energy needs, come in a multitude of sizes and shapes, and are affordable by the masses. They carry our patented ‘H2Only Battery’ which does not expire, leak or disintegrate, and is absolutely safe for the user and the environment. Peace-of-mind in times of need and emergency, and electricity in Dark-At-Night places.
short-description: H2Only Battery Powered Devices. Water-activated devices for peace-of-mind when in need or emergency, and electricity in no-power places.

description: G-Therapeutics, a spin-off from the Swiss tech institute (EPFL), develops disruptive and cutting-edge therapies to restore controlled movement and walking in patients left paralyzed after partial Spinal Cord-Injury (SCI). The treatment paradigms developed by G-Therapeutics enable fully paralyzed animals to walk with a success rate of 100 %, and will be clinically tested in paraplegic patients in 2015.
short-description: G-Therapeutics is developing a medical intervention for paraplegic individuals to help them regain the capacity to walk

description: Gameblyr provides a mobile community for gamers where users can connect, share and play the best in indie mobile games. Our curated approach allows indie gamers to find the games they are most interested in and provides organic discovery and user acquisition to the 97% of mobile game developers who are currently unable to succeed in the app store.
short-description: Gameblyr lets you connect, share and play the best in indie mobile games

description: Demand for medical interpreters is rising fast. The BLS predicts 42% job growth by 2020. Bilingual talent is concentrated in low-income communities, where economic inequities prevent excellent candidates from entering this life-saving and lucrative profession. Found in Translation's rigorous Medical Interpreter Certificate job training levels the playing field for low-income bilingual women. With $0 tuition and common-sense supports like on-site childcare, success is based on merit, not wealth.
short-description: We help bilingual women to achieve economic security by capitalizing on their language skills & unleash bilingual talent into the workforce.

description: Many of the 3+ million annual sports related concussions in the US go undiagnosed. Jolt solves this problem with wearable sensors. The sensors track head impacts in real-time, while communicating with a mobile application. In the event of a dangerous impact, the app alerts parents and coaches. And the sensor notifies the player to immediately discontinue activity for sideline evaluation, where the in-app cognitive evaluation protocol determines the need for professional medical attention.
short-description: Jolt is a wearable sensor for head-impact tracking in youth athletics that enables early detection of head trauma and directs the response.

description: For new anti-epileptic drug (AED) development Ketogen uses known AED motifs as carrier prodrugs and incorporates know-how from the AED field on the ketogenic diet. This combination provides risk mitigation and strategic advantages for our target AED-ketogenic diet in a pill new chemical entities.
short-description: To treat refractory epilepsy and improve patient therapy, Ketogen is putting the anti-epileptic activity of the ketogenic diet in a pill.

description: Memory Lane is a unique non-pharmaceutical approach to dementia, inducing relaxation, stress reduction, and perceptual sensations. It stimulates the cognitive functions and episodic memory of the viewers through customized specific multi-sensory content.
short-description: An interactive, customized and multi-sensory media collection for the memory impaired an their care partners

description: Communciation is the foundation of development for every human being.
short-description: Hablando con Julis is the solution for people with special needs: allows communication and enhances learning skills

description: HigherMe gives businesses the tools and technology to easily find, screen, interview, and onboard employees. Quickly review applications, schedule interviews, and fill out employee paperwork all in one place, from anywhere on any device.
short-description: Find, screen, interview, and onboard employees from anywhere on any device.

description: Medlio solves the search problem in healthcare by building the authoritative healthcare provider network. Providers maintain professional profiles including such details as education, procedures, availability, and more.
short-description: Find the best doctor for you

description: We live in a DNA society. DNA science can improve crops, solve crimes, and help inform medical treatments. Yet most of us have no firsthand experience with DNA technologies because they are complex and expensive. Amplyus’ mission is to give everyone access to DNA experimentation. Our miniPCR platform enables DNA analysis at a fraction of the cost and through a simple and educational interface. miniPCR puts DNA technology in the hands of students, enthusiasts, and more researchers.
short-description: miniPCR democratizes DNA experimentation

description: Every 3 minutes someone is admitted to the emergency room for food allergies. With no good testing methods, food producers incorrectly label products, this leads to market share loss and product recalls.
short-description: MADbio’s innovative solution enables food producers to simultaneously detect all allergens anywhere and anytime needed

description: Mebotics developed the Microfactory, a hybrid 3D printer and CNC milling machine. It can simultaneously print in two materials and four colors as well as mill in plastic, wood, and metal. The Microfactory is built with a rugged, self-cleaning, noise-reducing chassis, a fully networkable onboard computer, and a comprehensive set of safety features. It was designed to compete with entry-level desktop systems, and it is clean, quiet, and safe enough to be used virtually anywhere.
short-description: Mebotics has developed the Microfactory: a clean, safe & affordable hybrid 3D printer + CNC mill that makes finished and functional parts

description: Lig enables an individual, without any prior legal knowledge, to start filing a lawsuit or protecting himself in 4 steps and 5 minutes of his time. At the end of the process the platform allows the claimant to either file his small claim to court or send the case he created in the process, to 15 best fitted lawyers.
short-description: Lig enables an individual, without any prior legal knowledge, to file a lawsuit or protect himself from one in 4 steps and 5 minutes.

description: LibertyX helps the underbanked improve their lives with blockchain technology.
short-description: @libertyx - making a bridge to the blockchain for the underbanked

description: Litter One is the 100% biodegradable, all inclusive, odorless, disposable cat litter system. Each kit includes: litter box, pine pellet litter, scoop, and waste bags. The kit is delivered to your door, all you do is open the box. When your cat urinates on the pellets they turn to sawdust. The sawdust then falls through the patented false floor. When 4-6 weeks has passed, all you do is close up the kit, throw it away, and open up the new one that has already been shipped to your door.
short-description: Litter One is the 100% biodegradable, all inclusive, odorless, disposable litter maintenance system for cats that lasts 4-6 weeks

description: Latitude six-six is an authentic, Native-owned adventure travel company that immerses intrepid travelers in a beautiful yet remote land while engaging with its Native people. We want travelers to understand Alaskan culture and experience this majestic part of the world. We operate trips in Northeast Alaska in the summer and winter, offering unparalleled access to this beautiful, largely inaccessible part of the world while creating positive, sustainable econ. opportunities for its Native People.
short-description: Latitude six-six is an adventure travel company based in Northeast Alaska that creates positive econ. opportunities for the Native community

description: Kuona is the most intelligent shopping list app in the world. We have the info on prices, photos, location & indoor maps of thousands of products in Grocery stores in Monterrey MX & the SF Bay area. Users plan their grocery trip in Kuona: They get their shopping list sorted by the real aisles of their store, build a communal list, compare prices & get relevant deals. We have a “Google Adwords” like marketplace of consumer product brands and we also generate valuable behavioural analytics.
short-description: Kuona app helps users find the best products & prices across retail stores & inside them. We sort their list by aisle & give'em great deals

description: LOOLY'S is an impact-driven start-up leading a Zero-Compromise food movement combined to a Beyond-Fair-Trade brand. We are keen on changing the world through food&travel not only because it's a multi-billion dollar opportunity but especially because it’s a chance to empower an untapped mine of 10.000 marginalized but yet highly talented men & women across the globe. Our first product is around a gluten-free, GMO-free, all natural, handmade & heartmade couscous for breakfast for the US&UK market.
short-description: LOOLY'S is an impact-driven food start-up reinventing ancestral food to turn it into a trendy, zero-compromise & beyond fair-trade choice

description: Myndlift brings personalized neurofeedback training to mobile, making it easier for ADHD diagnosed people, professionals in demanding careers, students, athletes and anyone concerned about brain fitness to improve concentration abilities effectively without prescription drugs, inconvenience to visit specialized clinics and huge bills, thus saving thousands of dollars and tens of commuting hours.
short-description: Myndlift offers a drug-free solution to enhance concentration abilities using wearable and mobile technology.

description: We are changing the story of the smallholder farmer starting with Moringa, known worldwide as “the miracle tree” for its highly nutritional leaves. We take the forgotten part --the seeds-- and process them into an oil with unmatched cosmetic benefits for hair and skin care and a press meal for animal feed and water purification. We manage the entire supply chain- training, micro-credit, miniaturized value-added processing, and marketing to a global audience.
short-description: We unlock the potential of agriculture in Africa by bringing nature's finest tropical plants to the global market

description: Financial institutions rely on quantitative models for investments and risk control. The financial crisis of 2008, regulation & complex financial models have made model risk assessment a top priority.
short-description: Quantitative Analytics for Model Risk Assessment for financial institutions

description: Oral cancer patients often suffer from debilitating damage to healthy tissue during treatment. OralSave's radiation delivery device aims to protect healthy oral tissue, allowing for non surgical, pinpoint radiation therapy with no need for a specially trained maxillofacial prosthodontist. The device is patient-specific and manufactured rapidly using 3D printing. For patients around the world, this could result in retaining the ability to eat, taste, swallow and produce saliva.
short-description: OralSave works to protect the mouth from devastating radiation exposure during treatment for oral cancer.

description: At Platelet BioGenesis we have designed, built, and patented a microfluidic-based bioreactor that mimics human bone marrow to produce human platelets. Platelets are the 'band-aids' of the bloodstream, responsible for clot formation and blood vessel repair. Over 2 million Americans receive platelet transfusions every year and the current supply of donor-platelets is both risky and limited. Creating a safer and unlimited alternative allows us to fundamentally disrupt a  $2B market.
short-description: @PlateletBioGen has developed technology to produce the world's first donor-independent human platelets.

description: Millions of pets are lost each year. The PetSimpl Beacon is a small, wearable device that lets you always know where your pet is. If your pet goes missing, press the 'find my pet' button, and their location will appear on your screen.
short-description: PetSimpl creates easy-to-use products for pet owners. Beacon is a small, wearable device that helps reunite lost pets with their owners.

description: We have developed the first wearable injury prevention device for competitive equestrian sports. The wrist device wirelessly collects  and analyzes thermal data from the splint boots worn by competition horses so the rider can discern at a glance whether their horse is warmed-up or at risk of an injury. Herd mentality causes horses to mask minor injuries but PegaSense allows riders to make informed decisions during training, send data for remote veterinarian analysis, and monitor rehabilitation.
short-description: PegaSense is a real-time equine leg injury prevention, and rehabilitation system integrated into splint boots worn by competition horses.

description: PolyDrop is a scientific breakthrough for the coating industry. PolyDrop’s lightweight, liquid additive transforms standard coatings into highly efficient dissipaters of electrostatic discharge. PolyDrop’s proprietary process and product outperforms and outlasts anything else on the market today. PolyDrop is inexpensive and easy to incorporate into any coating. From sensitive electronic components to commercial aircraft applications, PolyDrop is setting a new standard for protective coatings.
short-description: PolyDrop’s revolutionary additive transforms standard coatings into highly-efficient dissipaters of electrostatic discharge.

description: Some work in factories requires you to stand for long periods of time or work in unhealthy postures because the factory has no room for chairs which get in the way of the work. This can lead to muscle and joint injuries. We provide a low cost exoskeleton that the workers can wear called Chairless Chair®. It gives the workers the option to rest when they want to. The factories will equip their workers to improve working conditions and factory productivity. The only low cost exoskeleton out there!
short-description: noonee brings you the Chairolution! be able to sit anywhere with a chair that walks with you.

description: Newton Photonics is developing a non-invasive glucose monitor for diabetes patients.  Our mission is to make self-testing of blood glucose  as convenient and painless as blood oxygen testing with a pulse oximeter. Our glucose monitor is  based on the company's proprietary optical sensing technology, which has been validated in two blind human trials.  We currently seeks $200,000 to build and test our next generation prototype that will be more accurate, faster and smaller.
short-description: Newton Photonics is developing a truly non-invasive blood glucose monitor for diabetes patients

description: OpportunitySpace is a new kind of marketplace that enables investment in and development of under-valued real estate in urban areas. Our mission is to rebuild our cities by empowering public, private, and civic stakeholders with knowledge to make decisions about land use and development. We provide dynamic online tools that streamline information access and create communication channels among these decision-makers. We're part of the open government, open data and civic technology movements.
short-description: A New Marketplace Driving Investment and Development in Under-Valued Urban Real Estate

description: Nodespan is an all-MIT startup building robust large-scale machine learning systems to aggregate and understand customer interactions across support, CRM, email, social media, and the web to provide better customer experiences.
short-description: Nodespan uses machine learning to understand the content of a discussion, leading to happier customers and more customer-centric companies.

description: Several key challenges prevent users from effectively using 3D printing technology—a steep learning curve; no queuing standard makes it difficult to share a 3D printer with a group of people; users must physically engage their printer throughout the printing process.
short-description: NVBOTS leases easy to use and easy to share cloud connected automated 3D printers.

description: You’ve been using a reusable bottle but are tired of drinking water. Oto is a new experience that makes water fun. Oto Water is a unique reusable beverage-making bottle with healthy flavor pods stored right on board. With Oto you can now make fresh drinks quickly on-the-go. No more remembering those messy packets to make water interesting. Oto pods add great tasting natural flavor. And by using local water and reducing waste, Oto makes it easy to do something good for yourself and the planet.
short-description: Water is boring and so are reusable bottles. Oto makes drinking water fun with a beverage-making bottle and convenient natural flavor pods.

description: Novarials has developed a next-generation ceramic non-woven nanowire battery separator technology that offers dramatically improved thermal tolerance, safety factor, power density, and long-term operating stability compared to existing polymer and emerging composite technologies.  At scale, the product platform will be useful for cost-effective solutions in electric and hybrid vehicle battery system applications.
short-description: Next-gen nanowire battery separator with superior thermal and long-term performance for electric vehicles

description: Meaningful relationships make make life special. Unfortunately, there is a big disconnect between the value of relationships and our ability to manage them. We have increasingly large networks coupled with increasing demands on our time.  As a result, our research suggests that we are at risk of losing touch with 40% of our most valued relationships. Social networks are impersonal and reactive.  Network Now leverages your existing online data to help you proactively manage your relationships.
short-description: Network Now ensures you keep in touch with who you want to, when you want to. Personal bonds make life special, we help you build them

description: Neon Mobile provides a customer-facing platform that creates an enduring engagement model between a business and their customers. A business sets their information using a simple administrative tool that automatically publishes a mobile application with an immersive touch experience accessible without a download. The business can track results and activity using the built-in applications including hours, events, scheduling, menus, catalogs, sales, promotions, social media, reviews and more.
short-description: NEON provides a turnkey publishing and analytics based platform for customer facing tasks including an integrated user mobile experience

description: People make music because they want to express themselves at the center of a world of sound. But short of getting a group of musicians together, there's no way to get this experience. Singing/playing with recordings doesn't cut it because they don't respond to you. We've created the only technology that transforms recordings into interactive tracks that follow your lead, adapting to your style and tempo in the moment through predictive algorithms.
short-description: Sonation makes it easier and more fun to make music through apps powered by intelligent accompaniment technology.

description: Splashscore is the leading influencer activation platform for Facebook. Through a patent-pending Splash Algorithm, Splashscore’s Influencer Activation Engine™ inspires an army of advocates to take digital actions on behalf of brands, generating 20x more clicks, likes, and leads than standard posts or ads. Splashscore currently has 110K influencers who engage 90M+ friends every week, and has worked with brands ranging from Cuisinart, Glad and the Miami Dolphins.
short-description: The Splashscore influencer activation engine makes powerful digital friendships more rewarding for everyone.

description: Resistance to chemotherapy, drug toxicity and drug-drug interactions cost the US healthcare system $200B annually. Rather than discover these ill-effects of the drugs in the clinic, scientists need high-quality methods to quickly and accurately profile compounds for such burdensome properties early on in drug discovery. TFC Biosciences develops reagents that deliver this capability generating relevant data in minutes in a cost effective manner.
short-description: TFC Biosciences develops reagents for early drug discovery research primarily to test compounds for potential toxicity.

description: Lip-smacking personal produce available wherever you live work and play.
short-description: SproutsIO is the maker of premium microfarms for personalized produce.

description: 25% of girls in rural India miss up to 50 days of school/work a year due to lack of access to affordable sanitary protection. Saathi developed a small scale mfg process to make affordable sanitary pads out of waste banana tree fiber. Throughout rural India, Saathi partners with women self help groups (SHG) to create entrepreneurial opportunities. The SHG purchases a Saathi machine and runs their own business that includes manufacturing, distributing, and selling pads in their local communities.
short-description: Saathi developed a small scale mfg process to produce affordable sanitary pads from waste banana tree fiber for girls in rural India.

description: At 4 million annual childbirths in the USA, 25,000 otherwise viable fetuses die during the third trimester of pregnancies. Prenatal death can occur without prior symptoms and can only be prevented by regular medical checkups. Frequenting hospitals is not only financially demanding, but also time consuming. Our portable fetal heart rate monitor utilizes a patented method that guarantees absolutely no harm to the fetus and makes home application available..
short-description: Remotaid fights prenatal death through a home use fetal heart rate monitor.

description: Retailers cannot correctly match product with person, for all customers in-store. Because tracking and understanding the demographics of potential customers through video has been previously unavailable.
short-description: Using video image processing as fast as the human brain, Real Life Analytics provides personalized advertising for retail stores.

description: ScriptEd equips students in under-resourced schools with fundamental coding skills and professional experiences that together create access to careers in technology.  We bring our tuition-free program directly to schools, where classes are taught by software developers on a volunteer basis. Students apply their new coding skills in paid summer internships where they work with role models in the field as well as gain the experience and confidence necessary to pursue careers in technology.
short-description: ScriptEd connects high school students to the education, resources and mentors they need to be creators of technology.

description: A leader in online and mobile predictive shopping applications, Rosie launched in July 2013 and today enables customers to shop online from local grocers for delivery or in-store pickup. Customers use Rosie on their phones, tablets, or laptops. Retailers select Rosie for e-commerce, delivery opportunities, and deep data services. Visit rosieapp.com today to sign up for a free account and find out why Rosie is the fastest, most convenient way to shop for groceries in your community.
short-description: Rosie lets you shop online from local grocers for same-day delivery or in-store pickup.

description: Gradberry curates the most talented software engineers and UI designers, and recommends them directly to fast-growing companies.
short-description: Gradberry curates the most talented software engineers and UI designers, and recommends them directly to fast-growing companies

description: RaceHQ is a first-of-its-kind cloud-based project management, collaboration, task management and market hub tool for the highly-fragmented participatory event industry. RaceHQ was developed specifically for event managers to operate more efficiently and execute quality events within budget. Replacing the clipboard and yellow notepad, RaceHQ allows event managers to easily take control of their events online ensuring nothing slips through the cracks.
short-description: @Race_HQ is a first-of-its-kind cloud based project management, collaboration, task management and market hub tool for participatory events.

description: We aim to increase sales & reduce unnecessary cost for brands by delivering a dashboard with real actionable insights of in-store customers behavior. We place cameras and with our artificial intelligence technology extract information like gender, age group, interaction with the shelf, path in the store, among others. With powerful Big Data and A.I. tools we automatically synthetize this information with business rules and behavioral economics models to deliver recommendations
short-description: We generate actionable insights to brands through computer vision to help them understand shoppers behavior in their stores

description: ProtonMail is a service that provides easy to use, end-to-end encrypted email. ProtonMail’s unique secure email system encrypts data on user machines so user data is not accessible to ProtonMail or any third parties. ProtonMail’s innovative technology is backwards compatible with other email providers such as Gmail and Yahoo and requires no software installation. ProtonMail is the first to make encrypted email so easy to use that mainstream market penetration is possible.
short-description: ProtonMail, Swiss based secure email with no compromises, brought to you by CERN and MIT scientists.

description: Fouling - deposition of ash on surfaces of boilers affects coal and biofuel powered power plants. Deposits reduce energy transfer from the combustion fuel to heated water and steam. In a typical base load boiler losses due to fouling top 5%, $25 million annually. Today there is no fouling sensing technology to direct cleaning of the boiler, driving up maintenance costs and inefficiencies. Our technology can directly measure the fouling buildup and create a close loop to optimize cleaning.
short-description: AMS-Qi improves electricity generation. We enable more efficient coal & biofuel burn, reduced boiler outage & reduced pollutant emission.

description: Varada Innovations develops surgical tools and systems that drastically improve major soft tissue surgeries. Our first product, the ArthroTense Surgical System, accurately determines tension of the suture prosthetic used in the most common upper airway surgery in horses, the tie-back surgery. In this $2.3 B global market, up to 40% of surgeries fail primarily due to improper suture tensioning. Our core technology has direct applications in multiple veterinary and human soft tissue surgeries.
short-description: Varada Innovations develops surgical tools and systems that drastically improve major soft tissue surgeries in both humans and animals.

description: Currently, when users are online and viewing photos on their favorite blogs, newspaper or style magazines, there is no easy way to purchase items of clothings from images. Trendi Guru’s (TG) technology and business model allows any image of clothing to be recognized, and purchased all automatically through a 1 line plugin in any website.
short-description: Wondering how to monetize images? #TrendiGuru automatically creates links to purchase from pictures automatically

description: Many inspiring and exciting live shows are free or in small or classical venues you've never heard about, but unless you know where to look online, you could spend a half-hour and never find them. Big ticket sellers and current apps only have major bands and venues. Trill, a discovery engine for live local shows, has anything that happens on a stage - from Beyonce to ballet to bluegrass at your local bar. At Trill.me and soon on iOS, Trill helps you find shows you wouldn't find otherwise.
short-description: With anything that happens on a stage - from Beyonce to ballet to bluegrass at your local bar - Trill finds you local shows you'll love.

description: It is almost impossible to not know someone affected by breast cancer with 1 in 8 women diagnosed. The 'Jacki' is a patent approved essential recovery garment that empowers cancer patients enduring extensive surgery. Its unique design increases mobility and independence, while reducing pain. Distributed by oncology network throughout 81 hospitals at the critical timing of diagnosis. This game-changing patient designed surgeon-endorsed garment is leveling the playing field in this unfair fight.
short-description: Essential post-surgical recovery garment addressing critical unmet needs for breast cancer patients now.

description: Twiage is an advanced mobile platform that uses best-in-class security technology to put telemedicine at the fingertips of first responders to accelerate patient care in the most crucial moments. By giving hospitals a complete picture of all incoming ambulances in one central dashboard, Twiage helps hospitals efficiently manage resources, such as cath labs, operating rooms, and hospital beds, while saving lives, improving metrics, and reducing costs.
short-description: @TwiageMed brings tele-triage to first responders and ER docs w/ realtime photos, EKGs, GPS. Save time, save $$$, and save a life.

description: 3dim changes how you interact with your smart devices. We unleash natural interaction by providing the first accurate 3D gesture sensor for the battery-powered mobile device market. Our patent-pending method dramatically reduces power requirements and eliminates sensitivity to lighting conditions, making reliable gesture control on the go possible for the first time. Sized and priced for phones, tablets, and wearables. Leave your screen for display and interact in 3D. Gesture is the new touch.
short-description: 3dim brings you freedom to gesture in 3D to your phone, tablet or smart glasses. Without a screen or without occluding, you're in control.

description: The ViralGains mission is to create authentic relationships between consumers and advertisers through the power of online video. ViralGains delivers Viral Marketing at scale through technology that measures how consumers watch, share, and talk about video content. The ViralGains Viral Marketing Platform is the first of its kind that maximizes views, shares, and conversations in real time for YouTube content.
short-description: The ViralGains Viral Marketing Platform maximizes views, shares, and conversations in real time for YouTube content.

description: RailPod robots increase the frequency and quality of day-to-day railroad track inspections. Through cost effective robots and data as a service RailPod ensures the safety of railroad track inspectors while providing much needed big data to the multi-billion dollar track inspection industry.  RailPod robots provide railroad track inspectors with repeatable and quantifiable data in real time, allowing railroads to make timely decisions that improve bottom line revenue and safety of passengers.
short-description: RailPod - Robotics technology for safer and more efficient railroad track inspections.

description: Recognized  by  President  Obama  as  one  of  the  best  new  social  innovations,  MT   strengthens  the  economy  by  educating a  generation  of  American  teens  about  money.  Placing  trained college  mentors  in  urban  high  school  classrooms  to  lead teens through action-focused  pop-­culture  curricula,  MT   makes  personal finance  relevant  to  the  kids  who  need  it  most.  MT will scale to provide every student  the  skills  needed  for economic security and prosperity.
short-description: Moneythink empowers urban teens to make and manage money.

description: In the US, over half a million patients suffer from chronic kidney failure (CKF). Most are dependent on hemodialysis to filter their blood. Unfortunately, more than 100,000 patients/year die from CKF, a large reason being the failure of the interface between the patient and the hemodialysis machine known as a “vascular access”. At Hemova, we have developed a blood access device that is safer and more reliable than current solutions; helping to keep our patients healthier and prolong their lives.
short-description: Hemova improves clinical outcomes for kidney failure patients, helping them live longer, healthier lives, spending less time in the hospital

description: Tools are only useful if they are readily available. Many multi-tools are too cumbersome to carry on a daily basis, so we designed the PocketMonkey. The PocketMonkey is a 12 function credit card sized multi-tool that fits in your wallet. Features include screw drivers, hex wrenches, phone stand and bottle opener. It is made in the USA and even TSA compliant so you won't lose it at the airport.
short-description: Zootility Tools make convenient to carry multi-tools in America by leveraging the latest technologies

description: VoiceItt is developing an innovative solution called Talkitt that will enable people that have motor, speech, and language disorders to easily communicate using their own voice, by translating unintelligible pronunciation into understandable speech. The software based solution can run on any mobile or wearable device, allowing the person to communicate freely with anyone, anywhere. This short video captures how millions of lives will be improved using Talkitt: vimeo.com/981362
short-description: TalkItt by VoiceItt, an app which translates blurred speech into understandable speech using the most natural means of communication: Voice.

description: 99Degrees Custom is manufacturing the future of retail. With the rise of me-commerce comes a unique opportunity for US manufacturing. Speed-to-market is key. 99Degrees Custom, based in Lawrence, MA, combines lean manufacturing with innovative technology, automation, and ops systems to manufacture and ship custom apparel within days of an order. We bridge low income workers with family-supporting wage careers in advanced manufacturing through training, living wage employment and next gen benefits
short-description: 99Degrees Custom manufactures build-to-order apparel for the me-commerce market and is built to empower the workforce in Lawrence and Lowell

description: Thompson SCI is commercializing a patented device based treatment for spinal cord injury (SCI). This is a patient population that currently has no clinically effective treatment options and represents a multi-billion dollar market. Our team of biomedical engineers and surgeons are completing the development of a system that integrates into current treatment practices to deliver a targeted therapy that inhibits biological responses that result in permanent neurological loss.
short-description: Thompson SCI is commercializing a patented device based therapy to preserve neurologic function in patients who suffer spinal cord injuries

description: Synthetic voices are robotic and generic sounding. VocaliD creates personalized vocal identities by combining recipient and donor recordings to generate a unique and understandable voice.  VocaliD leverages its voicebank and morphing technology to offer the first-ever individualized text-to-speech voices that make communication more human.  Applications range from assistive technologies to customized voices for the billions of communication devices in our connected world.
short-description: VocaliD designs custom crafted synthetic voices that make communication more human.

description: WorkSafe Technology creates tools to reduce workplace injuries. This reduces worker’s compensation costs and employee turnover and improves efficiency, morale, and quality.
short-description: Worksafe Technology creates products which reduce common occupational injuries. We make high exertion and repetitive tasks easier and safer.

description: Silverside Detectors helps governments reduce the threat of nuclear terrorism. Our lithium thermal neutron detection technology matches the performance of standard He-3 radiation detectors, but at 1/10th the price. This inexpensive radiation sensor is low-cost and efficient enough to be a 'connected device' for networks of discreet detectors within and around cities, in transportation pathways, and nuclear material storage sites.
short-description: Silverside Detectors develops low-cost, networkable radiation detectors that help governments reduce the threat of nuclear terrorism.

description: Leveraging our strengths in high-throughput screening technology we provide the fastest methods for directed studies of in vivo gene function which results in earlier identification of therapeutic targets. In combination with the rapid development time of small model organisms (4 days) our systems enable rapid iterations to shorten drug development times. We generate humanized transgenic models for mechanism of drug action studies preventing costly drug failures in later stages.
short-description: Elegant Therapeutics: We help pharmaceutical companies accelerate drug discovery by automating experimentation on small model organisms.

description: Over 400000 women each year are drugged and date raped. Prevention is near impossible as drugs are tasteless and invisible in drinks, thus the only current defense is constant vigilance over one's drink or bringing socially awkward drug tests that are impractical, onerous and ineffective. DrinkSavvy can eliminate the risk of date rape in establishments that use our safe and constantly self-monitoring drinking cup, glass or straw/stirrer that immediately changes color if one’s drink is “roofied”.
short-description: DrinkSavvy aims to eradicate drug-aided date rape with a constant self-monitoring cup or straw that change color if one’s drink is “roofied”

description: Cystic Fibrosis (CF) is an inherited lung disease with 30,000 US patients with a life expectancy of 37. There is no treatment for 96% of patients and a high unmet clinical need. Novel inhaled lead drug, Procaftor, shows clinically predictive efficacy in a human CF model. CF is an orphan disease with a lean development model. Our experienced CF drug development team are asking for a $8m to fund a 3 year IND to end of Phase 2a with several investor exits. We anticipate peak US sales of $1.2bn.
short-description: Calista Therapeutics is developing proprietary peptide drugs for Cystic Fibrosis that are 12 months from IND enablement and clinical trials.

startupname: Sword & Plough: Repurposed for a Purpose
description: Our mission is to create veteran employment opportunities, reduce waste and strengthen civil-military understanding by profitably selling fashionable bags and accessories made from repurposed military materials. Our name originates from the ancient saying, “to turn swords into plough shares,” which means, to take military technologies and materials and apply them to peaceful civilian applications.
short-description: Sword & Plough is a quadruple bottom line bag company that works with veterans to repurpose military surplus fabrics into stylish bags.

description: Burns and other skin tissue losses are currently treated with partial thickness skin grafts from healthy skin, a painful procedure that generates additional scarring and has to be performed in an OR under anesthesia carrying complications inherent to surgical procedures. KERADERM consists of 4×4in Skin-cell-coated sheets, cultured from a 5mm healthy skin sample of the same patient. It is a painless, non-surgical procedure that heals in a short period of time with a significant decrease in cost
short-description: With a 5mm healthy skin sample, we cover skin tissue loss of an area four times the size of a business card

description: The traditional preparation of fresh tortillas takes a lot of time, it requires know how and experience. flatev provides a new solution starting with a fully automatic machine and corresponding dough-capsules, which enable anyone to make a wide variety of fresh tortillas and other flatbreads in only seconds. Our USPs are authentic freshness, a wide variety of flavors and styles in single portions and  quick & hassle free cooking. We focus on the Millennials customer target in the USA.
short-description: flatev is revolutionizing the way people prepare fresh tortillas at home!

description: 30 million people throughout Asia, Africa and Latin America require assistance from an external device. The current fabrication process requires time consuming steps which need to be carried out by a trained professional. Our low cost socket device is made from a remoldable jammable material that can be fit by the patient. With our outreach partners, the Prosthetic Outreach Foundation, The BETH Project seeks to bring affordable personalized healthcare solutions to the global population.
short-description: Affordable personalized healthcare solutions for the global population

description: Vecoy Nanomedicines develops novel nanomedicines for the treatment of HIV/AIDS and other viral infections, using nano-scale virus traps that mimic human cells that lure and destroy viruses. This disruptive approach will revolutionize anti-viral medicine and can save the lives of millions.
short-description: Vecoy Nanomedicines develops patent pending virus-traps for the treatment of HIV/AIDS and other viral infections

description: Ras Labs makes synthetic muscle. Lenore Rasmussen, PhD, is CEO of Ras Labs. Her brother is a disabled American veteran. In our current conflicts, 90 % of injured soldiers survive, but at great cost. The percentage of amputees returning home is the highest since the Civil War. Most electroactive polymers bend – ours contract and expand. We own the patents for this transformational technology. The Ras Labs mission is to use synthetic muscle to make prosthetics that work, feel, and appear human.
short-description: Ras Labs produces synthetic muscles: electroactive polymer materials/actuators that contract & expand at low V with low heat/noise signature

description: Today, stem cells derived from blood are very difficult to harvest. Current harvesting methods end up destroying the stem cells in the process. Quad Technologies has a game changing dissolvable hydrogel technology, QuickGel™, that selectively isolates stem cells from complex solutions while mitigating non-specific binding. QuickGel™ has applications in label-free cell separation, offline-sample prep, and IVD.
short-description: Quad Technologies' unique dissolvable hydrogel enables cost effective, robust, and non-toxic consumables for stem cell separation

description: Raja Systems can cut the cost of generating electricity in remote locations in half. A common solution for generating electricity in a remote location is a hybrid power system including a diesel generator, solar PV, and a battery. For a power system like this with multiple sources of electricity generation, it is important to make smart decisions about when to use each of the generation resources. Our software forecasts solar production and electricity consumption to improve the coordination of
short-description: Raja Systems can cut the cost of generating electricity in remote locations in half

description: UPower is developing the only always-on, mobile, emission-free, recyclable nuclear generator for remote and distributed generation where energy costs can exceed 30 cents/kWh, and power is needed 24/7. The reactor is a compact, solid-state, nano reactor that produces 1.5 MWe and can cogenerate process heat for 30 years without refueling. Our unique technology enables us to reduce technical and regulatory risks so we can get to market for 1/10th the cost in half the time as competing technologies.
short-description: UPower offers the only always-on, emission-free, mobile, recyclable generator that refuels every 30 years for distributed generation markets

description: We offer a non-invasive solution for measuring intracranial pressure (ICP), a critical physiologic parameter that currently requires a neurosurgeon to drill a hole into the patient’s skull. Our device, RapidICP, has a patented method to noninvasively measure ICP using a portable, inexpensive ultrasound device that can be used by a trained technician. Approximately 40% of the severe traumatic brain injury patients in the US do not receive the ICP monitoring they need and RapidICP can change that.
short-description: We offer a noninvasive solution for measuring intracranial pressure that currently requires a neurosurgeon to drill a hole into your skull

description: EnerLeap is a patented, new lithium ion battery technology. In today's lithium ion batteries, the powder binders break down quickly, stunt performance and jeopardize safety. EnerLeap replaces these inefficient binders with a rigid 2D titanium silicide nanonet. The result is a lighter weight, faster charging, longer lasting and safer battery. We have lab scale prototypes and are currently planning to enter the $12B global lithium ion market through the consumer electronic space.
short-description: EnerLeap is a patented new nano technology that significantly improves the performance of lithium ion batteries.

description: Cape Commons Brewing Company is a social impact brewery that has a dual mission: to brew great craft beer and to invest in communities without access to clean drinking water. For every batch of beer we brew, we build one clean water project through our on-the-ground partner, Rainwater for Humanity. One Batch. One Project. Beer for Water. We're getting ready to build a brewery in Brooklyn and have the beer kegged, canned and in your hands by Fall 2014. So the adventure begins now, are you coming?
short-description: Good People! Our restlessness will create a beer to end the world water crisis @capecommons #brewedinbrooklyn #drinkgenerously #beerforwater

description: Web service owners are unaware of client-side errors. Front-end errors lead to customers and money loss.
short-description: Qbaka is frontend problem monitoring and analytics for web services. Qbaka helps companies provide better customer experience.

description: Bio-Adhesive Alliance produces an adhesive that is low cost and durable and can be utilized as a substitute to petroleum-based asphalt. It is a green product obtained from a thermochemical process that converts swine manure to liquid asphalt.  It has applications is pavement, construction, roofing, sealing, and carpeting. It improves pavement quality due to its enhanced water resistibility and temperature tolerance resulting in significant savings in pavement construction and maintenance.
short-description: Bio-adhesive Alliance: Producer of bio-adhesive and bio-asphalt from animal waste

description: Every single drug discovered and every advance in modern medicine depends on laboratory mice. MouseHouse is an iPad + web application that allows researchers in the life-sciences to save time and money in managing lab mice. Its unique proprietary optimization software reduces colony size by 15% and it's the first tablet drag/drop based application that tracks experimental data, health and complex breeding schemes. Scientists from labs across the US--Harvard, Yale, Stanford, UCSF, UChi--are users
short-description: @MouseHouseApp is an iPad+web app that allows scientists to save time+money in managing breeding, genetics and health of lab mice #research

description: Aeolus Building Efficiency will reduce energy use in large office HVAC systems at a much lower cost than current technologies.  Our full-service, software solution uses advanced technology (pat. pend.) for room-by-room measurement and optimization of airflow, reducing HVAC energy up to 20% without expensive equipment installations or labor-intensive rebalancing. Our scalable business model will create significant financial value for customers and prevent millions of tons of CO2 emissions.
short-description: Aeolus Building Efficiency: Advanced technology for low cost HVAC energy savings in large office buildings

description: 1 in 4 women will be attacked in her lifetime. Most safety and security product devices are designed for males and focus on lethal weapons. ArmHer has developed a patent pending product which combines alarm technology and beautiful jewelry. Our new product has significant market potential in the personal protection and jewelry industries. Using our brand recognition, female focused marketing, and being first to market, ArmHer will become the Tiffany of women's protective jewelry!
short-description: ArmHer offers effective and fashionable security products designed to protect women in an increasingly dangerous world.

description: Most surveillance systems rely on humans to identify threats while attending to a large set of disparate camera feeds.  Our “Pancam” disrupts this operational surveillance model by capturing and analyzing real-time, 3D, 360⁰ panoramic video.  The autonomous surveillance enabled by the Pancam will lead to tremendous facility cost savings and safety improvements.  It'll significantly impact the $100M addressable video analytics market and can be used in other apps, from robotics to entertainment.
short-description: AET’s “Pancam” delivers the first 3D, 360⁰ telepresent vision in real-time to enable enhanced surveillance, robotics and entertainment.

description: AdAgility™ cross-promotes thousands of offers every day, driving incremental revenue and margin to clients while delighting their customers.  Supporting both first and third-party offer delivery, we help monetization experts, ecommerce managers, and partnership teams run these cross-sell offers with minimal technical effort. A single line of code allows for the secure and efficient delivery of relevant offers, with 24/7 access to full-funnel analytics and powerful real-time offer administration.
short-description: Each day, AdAgility™ cross-promotes thousands of offers that delight customers and drive margin.

description: Engaged employees take pride in contributing to corporate goals. 85% of the employees don’t understand how they impact these KPIs. This results in employee dissatisfaction and loss of talent. Acsendo help high tech SMBs improve their profits. We categorize KPIs and competencies enabling employers to enhance and automate the employee review. The result is an open and metrics driven environment that improves employee satisfaction while optimizing employee talents to match business needs.
short-description: Improving employee satisfaction and talent optimization with quantifiable data

description: Tripzon™ is the first dynamic packaging platform for planning and booking complex trips. We provide a smart itinerary system for flights, hotels, activities, car, and other travel components. With Tripzon, users create and manage custom trips all in one place and save, eliminating the tedious process of having to visit and transact on multiple websites. Unlike traditional online agencies, our system offers itinerary sharing, multi-destination booking, and multi-component checkout.
short-description: Tripzon™ is the first travel packaging platform for planning + booking complex trips. Users can finally create great trips all in one place!

description: Aentropico is building a predictive analytics platform that empowers managers to take informed decisions in a simple and intuitive manner. We combine the best user experience with top-notch algorithms, in order to bring awesome predictive tools to non-tech users. Towards this end, we built a large pool of solutions for industry specific questions and data sources. Tapping the growing interest of Big Data, our  vision is to become the Amazon for Data Science.
short-description: @aentropico built a predictive analytics platform to solve business questions on your fingertips, using our intuitive insight digests.

description: As they did with mobile phones, emerging markets can leapfrog inefficient models of higher education. Spire is the first model to enable this jump, combining online content from elite US universities, offline instructional design from the best charter schools, and apprenticeship with top local employers. The result is a world-class education for half the cost of existing options, making the future of higher education available today to thousands of underserved students in emerging markets.
short-description: Spire: The future of higher education. Available now in Africa.

description: More than 15MM Americans have been diagnosed with a food allergy and nearly 40MM more claim to have food sensitivities. While diagnosis has been skyrocketing, the number of snack food products that are safely manufactured to avoid cross-contamination with top allergens has not sufficiently addressed this market. 88 acres will manufacture healthy and delicious snack foods, in a facility free of the top eight food allergens, crafted with simple ingredients that are designed for all to enjoy.
short-description: 88 makes healthy snacks free of the top eight food allergens, crafted with simple ingredients and designed for everyone to enjoy.

description: A big segment of India faces employment inertia. Fifty million disabled citizens lack jobs, but they're not prepared for modern work and most corporations don't know how to employ them. We're solving this problem on each axis: we create manufacturing jobs for the disabled in our own factory, and we provide job placement across industries by engaging and training corporate partners. Each track has the potential for impact at national scale and promises to improve life for the disabled in India.
short-description: In India, 80+ million disabled need jobs. Businesses don't know how to employ them. Aasadeep bridges the gap.

description: 3-Spark is a spinoff from Northeastern University who has created a new 3D Printing Technology able to build parts which have electronics and sensors contained inside. From biomedical technology R&D to later garage innovators, our desktop fabrication system will change the way we design & build custom devices. The sensor research began from NSF grants, the company began by winning the Catalyst Seed funding contest. In the first year we have completed our prototype and are now expanding the team
short-description: 3-Spark has created a smart 3D printing technology to build prototypes with sensors embedded inside. We are accelerating industrial R&D!

description: Rifiniti helps F500 firms optimize workspaces & workflow. Most offices worldwide (a >50B sq.ft. market) are 50% empty at all times, due to new work styles, mobile technologies, & changing needs. This costs firms in US >$180B/yr wasted on rent, & more in lost productivity. Our software compiles and exploits neglected company data sources through scenario modeling & predictive analytics to propose continuous improvements to workspaces & workflow while reducing costs 50%.
short-description: Our analytics SaaS helps F500 companies optimize their workspaces and workflow while reducing real estate costs by half.

description: EyeDoll Chatter saw a gap in the Tween and Teen cosmetics market. There aren’t any products that are all-natural and socially interactive for young girls. EyeDoll provides young girls and women with a new makeup concept that is fun, healthy for skin, and relevant to their lifestyle. Our products allow girls to mix and match colors with scents & flavors, giving girls control over their own experience. Our iPhone app lets these digital savvy young women share their personal creations with friends.
short-description: EyeDoll Chatter is a new, all-natural interactive makeup line for teens and young women. Girls can share their creations via the iPhone app.

description: Energy Intelligence is developing a road-mounted energy generation system for use at commercial sites with steady traffic. The technology captures energy wasted by braking vehicles and puts it to use as cheap, clean electricity generated onsite that can power local equipment. Depending on the installation, system costs are projected at 5 to 7 cents per kWh and payback of upfront capital expenses at 2 to 3 years.
short-description: EI captures waste energy from braking vehicles to generate cheap electricity onsite for local use.

description: EdFolio is a platform that allows students and aspiring professionals to use online education to boost their marketable skills and get jobs. We work with employers to curate skill-specific course playlists that include the best online learning tools from across providers. As students complete these playlists, we connect them with employers that are hiring.
short-description: EdFolio helps candidates harness the power of online education to gain professional skills and connect with employers.

description: Easily makes it easier for busy professionals to live healthier lives with greater work-life balance. We deliver ready-to-cook meal kits with all the ingredients and recipes for a home-cooked meal. We partner with employers to deliver these meal kits directly to their employees at the office, so they can grab them on their way home and cook a tasty dinner without ever having to go to the grocery store. Employers can encourage health and work-life balance by providing this employee perk for free.
short-description: Easily partners with companies to offer employees fresh, healthy, prepped meal kits for easy home-cooking.

description: DRESSFORMER is a B2B/B2C platform technology allowing the user to virtually try on clothing pre-purchase and receive personal or professinal feedback.
short-description: DRESSFORMER's groundbreaking 3D fitting technology changes the landscape of online shopping & fashion buying

description: We are Uber of Auto-Ricksahws in India. Autowale is a marketplace for drivers and commuters, offering easy commute in urban cities using auto-rickshaws, that act as a backbone of transit system in India and other Asian countries. Using technology, company reduces empty run and increases utilization, targeting gross profit margin greater than 40% and net margin greater than 30%. While increasing drivers earning potential by 2X, company is registering profits in Pune. We plan to go Pan-India soon.
short-description: Autowale aims to improvise urban mobility, by leveraging technology and existing infrastructure to fix the inefficiencies in daily commute.

description: Despite advancements bionic devices such as prosthetics and rehabilitation robotics fitting to the human body remains an expensive and painful challenge. Today's solutions rely on a multi-day custom fabrication process to create a custom fit and fail to adjustable fit as the body changes. We have a patent pending technology unlike anything on the market that can provide a custom fit again and again to increase wearer comfort while reducing cost for providers with broad applications.
short-description: BeTH is a novel human interface technology that addresses fitting challenges of bionic medical devices

description: Beantown Bedding®, the innovative creation of two Boston female entrepreneurs, is helping the world live laundry-free.  Its compostable sheets are disrupting the status quo of laundering, offering an easy and eco-friendly alternative.  Originally designed as a time-saver for college students who have better places to be than the laundry room, the solution has now helped universities, hospitality and emergency management organizations nationwide.
short-description: Beantown Bedding® is helping the world live laundry-free with its compostable sheets.

description: Our patented bindings are standard strap-in bindings with a removable rear binding. On the first run, strap in both bindings and remove the rear binding to skate and mount the lift. On the lift, use the embedded magnets to bring the board up to the bottom of the binding so you can rotate your foot and lock in hands-free and ride right off the lift. If you get stuck on flats, simply remove the rear binding to skate and then let the magnets pull your foot back in to rotate and lock in on the fly.
short-description: FREEBASE - strap-in snowboard bindings allow you to strap in once and ride all day by locking in on the lift using neodymium magnets
