description: CONTINUUS Pharmaceuticals is an early-stage company spin-out of the Novartis-MIT Center for Continuous Manufacturing, a $65M collaboration that led to the development of the most advanced manufacturing process for pharmaceuticals. Rather than producing medicines through batch-wise, step-by-step processes, CONTINUUS Pharmaceuticals offers a breakthrough integrated continuous manufacturing technology. Production lead time will be reduced by 90%, manufacturing costs by 50% and footprint by 90%.
short-description: CONTINUUS Pharmaceuticals will enable “on-demand” manufacturing of pharmaceuticals with advantages in lead time, quality, and cost.

description: Develatech seeks to protect the environment and improve global health through the dissemination of its fuel-efficient cookstoves. Develatech has designed an innovative, user-friendly, and fuel-efficient cookstove that meets the cooking needs of the users while also reducing deforestation, carbon emissions, and toxic smoke-related fatalities. Develatech is assisting ‘The Global Alliance for Clean Cookstoves’ to reach its goal of 100 million clean cookstoves by 2020 across the globe.
short-description: Develatech provides efficient stove technology to the 3 billion people cooking on open fires, saving lives and reducing deforestation.

description: We are changing the way people buy. We believe shoppers shouldn’t have to labor to find deals; good deals should find buyers as soon as they ask for them. This is the future of retail. Priceline has been doing this for the travel industry and we aim to do this for everything else. So we created Buyjacker – the first Intentional Marketplace™ and to do just that.
short-description: Buyjacker is the Mobile Showrooming App that drives sellers to bid on buyers at their peak purchase intent!

description: Nearly one third of IV lines are contaminated with microbes during a typical OR procedure leading to 40k infections and 6k deaths annually in the US alone and costing the healthcare industry nearly $10 billion per year in treatment and litigation.  B.B.R. Medical Innovations has developed a novel inline IV fluid sterilizer which renders contaminated fluid sterile in under 6 seconds, preventing these microbes from reaching the patient, saving thousands of lives and billions of healthcare dollars.
short-description: With disruptive tech. that prevents potentially lethal hospital infections, B.B.R. Medical is improving the quality and cost of healthcare.

description: The InfuGo is a light compression vest designed to safely manage infusion equipment on the patient’s body. The lightweight vest holds the pump and medication in cases to protect from impacts and water damage. The IV tube is also kept close to the body so it is not exposed to be damaged or hung up on objects. Pumps are protected to avoid costly repairs and the medication is protected from spills. Patients undergoing infusion treatments benefit from greater mobility and improved quality of life.
short-description: The InfuGo is a light compression vest designed to safely manage infusion equipment on the patient’s body, improving their quality of life.

description: Footnote is an online media company that showcases academic expertise to a mainstream audience. We collaborate with scholars to translate their research into engaging, accessible content. Footnote’s mission is to share the existing wealth of knowledge produced in academia in a form that can enrich public discourse and enhance understanding of substantive issues. Our network of academic contributors creates an expert consulting network and produces a unique educational archive.
short-description: Footnote collaborates with scholars to translate complex academic research into engaging, accessible content for a mainstream audience.

description: Although breast milk is the best nutrition for infants, many of the 2.5M new working mothers can’t keep up with the demands of pumping. Just imagine: taking an unnatural suction device that into an isolated and depressing space, and sitting for 30 minutes every 2-3 hrs. By mimicking the age-old and trusted art of hand expression instead of high-powered suction, I developed the most natural & effective breast pump. This technology enables completely discreet pumping, liberating women everywhere.
short-description: DS Labs presents a new technology that gives mothers unprecedented freedom, enabling discreet breast pumping anytime, anywhere.

description: The Affordable Care Act (ACA) is fueling a rapid transition in the way US healthcare providers are compensated. Unfortunately, US healthcare providers are ill-prepared to manage the analytical complexity of these new non-Fee-for-Service (non-FFS), value-based payment contracts.  By networking and mining disparate Electronic Health Records (EHRs), value-based contracts, and other relevant data, iQuartic's platform enables healthcare organizations to manage non-FFS payment contracts and get paid.
short-description: iQuartic unlocks EHRs for cost control, quality, and revenue. Our platform enables healthcare providers to manage non-FFS payment contracts.

description: Integrative Enzymatics is a biotechnology company dedicated to developing structure-based pharmaceutical products to treat chronic metabolic disorders. The company’s primary offering is an intellectual property portfolio that consists of two drugs used for the treatment of Type I Diabetes Mellitus and Type II Diabetes Mellitus. The efficacy of both pharmaceuticals have been demonstrated in silico, in vitro, and verified through pilot animal studies. Second round animal trials are ongoing.
short-description: Integrative Enzymatics has developed a proprietary method of designing pharmaceuticals. Our flagship patented drug treats diabetes.

description: lallitara is the first apparel and accessories brand of its kind. lallitara meets the needs of a growing population of LOHAS consumers who currently spend $10B a year on apparel that helps them live fashionably, yet socially responsible lives. Throughout our business, we look for ways to invest in the communities we work in, and to provide a positive social impact by sourcing our raw materials from informal recyclers in developing countries, by manufacture in the USA, and by reinvesting profits.
short-description: lallitara is an apparel and accessories brand that fuels impactful social change through fashion.

description: Jaze turns every car into a smart car with a free, easy-to-install device for your vehicle and a Bluetooth-enabled mobile app, which together provides instant crash responding and real-time automotive diagnostics for all cars built in North America and Europe since 1996. We hope to reduce vehicular crash response time by 50% and help eliminate friction between driver and mechanic in the $500B automotive service, repair and after market auto parts industry.
short-description: Jaze is a free mobile app that makes your car smarter, safer and more affordable to drive.

description: Thirty years ago food was local and fresh, however today it’s become more chemistry than biology. INRFOOD is essentially a personalized food GPS. It personalizes the nutrition facts but more importantly analyzes the ingredients for each individual user. It then alerts, assesses, and advises you about your food and what’s specifically best for you. The algorithm includes personalized drug interactions with food, medical/cultural concerns, and family medical history to name a few.
short-description: You don't need a PhD to understand what's in your food @INRFOOD is a food GPS that personalizes and simplifies diet and nutrition

description: Insight Numerics is dedicated to building the most advanced and visually intuitive software for safety analysis in the oil and gas industry. As former consultants in the field we became frustrated by the repetitiousness of the process and the tools available. Since our formation, we have provided our customers easy to use software tools that empower them to perform computational safety analyses in-house at a fraction of the time and cost compared to outsourcing.
short-description: Insight Numerics creates software that helps oil and gas companies prevent disastrous fires and gas leaks on oil rigs and in refineries.

description: Greenvolved is a platform where you have the power to make change happen. How? We give you the ability to tell large corporations how to invest their money back into the environment. How does it work? You log in to the Greenvolved site, browse through dozens of environmental projects, and vote for the ones you think are the most important. After enough people vote for a project, the sponsoring corporation provides the funding. Everybody wins with Greenvolved: Corporations, Individuals and Earth.
short-description: Greenvolved - innovative fund mechanism for environmental projects that lets individuals and corporations to cooperate for a better planet.

description: There are 15,000 skilled nursing facilities and each facility loses out on more than $200K per year due to inaccurate care data documentation. Gweepi solves this problem by providing facilities with a mobile point of care system which allows facilities to achieve $130,000 per year to their bottom line.
short-description: Gweepi Medical develops technology to increase profitability in skilled nursing homes

description: GCG is an Urban Farming company focused on growing as much food as possible in otherwise unused spaces. From rooftops to raised beds, GCG builds and installs urban farms, offering educational and hands-on programs for businesses, food service providers, and homeowners. Having fine-tuned its profitable business model, communication systems, and technologies with 5 years of 50% annual growth, GCG now strives to expand within and beyond Boston.
short-description: Green City Growers transforms unused space into thriving urban farms, providing our clients with immediate access to nutritious food.

description: Combining Harvard and MIT research, we bridge the gap between digital and live instruction, empowering people to practice social skills through open-ended dialogue (typed or spoken) in vivid, safe web/mobile-based 3D environments. SchoolLife is a 3D anti-bullying simulation where students walk in the shoes of a victim and bystander to learn empathy skills through unscripted conversations with characters driven by a massive database of recorded dialogue. Future products will target professionals.
short-description: We build simulations to teach social and communication skills using crowdsourced artificial intelligence

description: The jackfruit, though virtually undiscovered in the US, is a wonderfruit. Ripe, it has supreme mango, banana, and pineapple flavor and is a potassium, magnesium, and fiber-rich superfruit. Unripe, it is a 100% natural, high-fiber, low-calorie meat substitute.
short-description: Global Village Fruit introduces new wonderfruit to the US market, beginning with India's jackfruit.

description: We help companies solve two problems with employee giving programs—low engagement and painful administration. By making it easy for employees to fund “micro-foundations” through payroll and earn rewards like employer matching, we help them double their impact. They can give to any cause at any time from one place, with one tax receipt. We also reduce program costs by automating grant approval, charity validation and funds disbursement. We turn giving into a low-cost, feel-good employee benefit.
short-description: @GoodBenefits invented the “401k for charity” that makes employee giving programs painless to run & engaging to join. Giving is now a perk.

description: Weight is a crucial health issue for the 5 million wheelchair users in the US. Having mobility difficulties doubles your chances of being obese, which increases the risk of further medical complications like heart disease or potentially lethal pressure sores. Despite this, there are no viable home scales available. Using novel weighing technology, Lilypad Scales has created a convenient and easy-to-use scale that helps wheelchair users to track their weight on their own, in their home.
short-description: Lilypad Scales helps wheelchair users weigh themselves affordably on their own, in their home.

description: Severe neonatal jaundice occurs in 8% of all newborns and requires urgent treatment with phototherapy.  If untreated, newborns may suffer permanent brain damage or death. Nearly 100% of babies are cured with phototherapy, but >6 million babies in developing countries lack access to treatment. Jaundice may cause up to 30% of neonatal death in these regions. Little Sparrows Technologies has developed the 'Bili-Hut',  a low-cost, power-adaptable, phototherapy device to treat jaundice. Anywhere.
short-description: Jaundice is cured w/phototherapy, but thousands of babies/yr without access die. The solution? The Bili-Hut by Little Sparrows Technologies.

description: Our focus at NoMos is to rid the world of malaria and other vector related diseases which are the 5th leading cause of death on the planet. Our receptor binding technology allows us to bind to the receptors of insects such as mosquitoes, ticks and bugs. It disables their olfactory senses so they can no longer detect, bite and infect us! NoMos is a 100% natural, non-toxic, bio-degradable, child/pet friendly, target specific and most important of all mosquitoes cannot develop an immunity to it.
short-description: NoMos- conquering mosquitoes naturally- using an innovative technology that confuses them and kills them without using toxic chemicals. Wow!

description: 80% of cancer targets are still undruggable and sadly, the outcome for many cancer patients is poor. Cancer starts when 2 proteins interact with each other and turn on unregulated cell growth AND traditional drugs do not work. Noliva has invented a new way to stop this protein-protein interaction. We have created a computer driven way to design new drugs that silence the cancer protein and knock it out of action. We are seeking $500K to generate data and support an initial funding round.
short-description: Noliva Therapeutics is Silencing Undruggable Cancers

description: Staff in over 800 bars and restaurants in the Boston area use onthebar to convert patrons into regulars, drive repeat business, and generate point-of-sale, influencer-based drink recommendations for the $20B spirits and cocktail industry.
short-description: onthebar connects barstaff with their patrons and rewards bartenders for promoting sponsored spirits

description: Nyopoly’s Customer Engaged Pricing Platform (CEPP), finds the optimal transaction price between a single-buyer and a single-seller, via fast individualized pricing conversation.  This unique pricing approach is the most efficient solution to the traditional fixed pricing model.
short-description: Nyopoly’s Customer Engaged Pricing Platform (CEPP), finds the optimal transaction price between a single-buyer and a single-seller.

description: LifeGuard Games creates edugame apps to teach and motivate adherence to medical recommendations. LifeGuard Games builds upon proven successful principles of engaging virtual pet games; the player learns to care for a pet with a chronic condition in a world with mini-games, exploration, point and item collection, and pet development. We first focus on kids with asthma and then adapt our app for food allergy and other conditions. Our members met at the US Finals of Microsoft's Imagine Cup.
short-description: LifeGuard Games creates virtual pet edugame apps to teach and motivate kids to manage chronic conditions.

description: The legal industry wastes billions on unnecessary work, while many don't get the legal help they need. The problem isn't lawyers, but rather the stale, conventional ways of doing legal work, which have resisted fundamental change for decades.  Mootus is reinventing the way lawyers work through our platform for open, online legal argument, which lets users collaborate and compete to solve legal issues submitted by other users, with the results of that activity posted to an open legal repository.
short-description: Mootus is reinventing the way lawyers work through open, online legal argument.

startupname: Monkey in the Middle Apps LLC
description: Every day millions of middle school students dread taking out paper worksheets to practice what they’re learning.  Our apps replace paper and improve how students practice by making it fun, providing instant feedback, and giving them help when they need it.  Over 500,000 students have already used our apps.  Try our free apps today - go to the Apple App Store, search for “Middle School” and look for our cute monkey.
short-description: Monkey In The Middle Apps delights Teachers by making Fun, Educational apps for Middle School Students.  @PlayLearnRepeat

description: Pregnant women in the Arab world lack access to trusted healthcare information in Arabic.We’re developing the 1st smartphone intelligent healthcare App in Arabic to support women during pregnancy with reliable trusted customized healthcare info&tools to record&track progress, use of human sense detection technology to alert of positions/behaviors that may be risky.The app will be supported with social network meaningful to women Arab culture.The business model is a freemium model &sponsorship ad
short-description: Do you care about your pregnant relative? We do care too; MobiStine provides trusted healthcare apps for new parents for better healthy life

description: Our mission is to eliminate harmful medication errors.
short-description: MedAware - Improved health care through elimination of prescription errors

description: LTG is a tech-education company developing a robust self-learning mobile platform to enable students to study for standardized tests and achieve their target score at an affordable price, while preparing them more efficiently and supporting their learning style. Our technology is based on 'The Label Study Method', a unique way to solve standardized test questions which helps students improve their score significantly by learning how to identify the patterns of questions faster and more accurate.
short-description: LTG is a tech-education company developing a self-learning platform for iOS devices to enable students to study for standardized tests.

description: Mariwear was conceived and designed to address a universal issue shared by most women--how to get out of their bra but still feel dressed. This patent pending apparel was first introduced as lounge/sleepwear but has since proven itself as a new category of functional lifestyle clothing as it resonates with women for many uses.  It's built-in shape and support with no wires or fasteners has transformed the way women dress to be comfortable.  Braless comfort AND confidence – every woman’s dream.
short-description: Braless comfort and confidence. Get comfortable with Mariwear's built in shape and support - no wires or fasteners.

description: Landfills create more electricity than the solar industry in the U.S. This electricity is generated by burning landfill gas (which contains methane), collected from the trash. All landfills collect methane, and over half of them already have landfill-gas-to-energy plants that convert it to clean energy. The collection process involves tedious manual adjustments, and we make the process automated. This generates more money for the landfill, and more energy for the world.
short-description: Loci Controls maximizes revenue for landfill gas to energy projects, by optimizing methane gas collection.

description: In a world of rapid retail convergence MCast Analytics provides the missing link that enables retailers to completely understand their customers’ behavior across online, offline and mobile. We provide a platform that enables multi-channel retailers to, for the first time, passively track anonymous offline customer activity, without the use of an app or loyalty cards, and link this to individual customer profiles.
short-description: MCast Analytics provides the missing link that enables retailers to understand their customers’ behavior across online and offline worlds.

description: 80% of older adults do not press the panic button after falling.  Caregivers require passive connectivity to proactively monitor their loved one's safety and wellness in the home 24 hours/day.  QMedic is the first and only wearable medical alert service that passively detects and predicts emergency events in the home, and sends real-time alerts to caregivers when something is wrong.  The company has received over $2.4 Million from the NIH and has been named a top disruptor in healthcare by AARP.
short-description: QMedic's wearable medical alert service passively detects and predicts emergency risk in the home, and sends real-time alerts to caregivers.

description: A wave of new small scale manufacturers is beginning to use technologies now in place that allow almost anyone to make almost anything in very low quantities.
short-description: Process Prime provides mobile production management software for small scale manufacturers to help make it easy for them to succeed

description: When you hire someone to plow your driveway or mow your lawn, you’re not only paying for the service, but also for travel time and fuel. These 'distribution' costs explain why a plowguy charges $75 for a driveway across town and $45 for one around the corner. Through our PlowMe and MowMe brands, we match residential lawn and snow contractors with customers based on proximity, giving contractors super dense routes, and giving neighbors buying power to get priority service at the lowest price.
short-description: Uber for snowplows.

description: The e-commerce playing field is asymmetric: its Goliaths have access to user reviews about products, which they use to provide superior customer experience and enjoy higher conversion and retention. With this advantage they widen the gap from the smaller players.
short-description: PiplSay levels the e-commerce playing field by enriching small sites with product opinions and reviews

description: Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (SIDS) is the leading cause of death for infants under one year of age in the US, and a primary source of anxiety for new parents. Sensible Baby’s SmartOne uses a small, safe sensor to monitor babies' temperature, body position, and normal movements. The Smart One fills a need in the market, and introduces key performance features to the baby monitoring industry. The Smart One provides parents peace of mind their baby is sleeping safely.
short-description: Sensible Baby uses monitoring technology to provide parents the peace of mind they need to know that their child is sleeping safely.

description: 21% of 15-24 year olds around the world, 225M, are un- or underemployed, yet 40% of employers say lack of skills is the main reason for entry-level vacancies. By delivering the content needed to learn skill needed to secure a job, and by connecting similar learners via a mobile device, we will transform the world into a learning community where young people don’t solely depend on traditional universities to jumpstart their careers.
short-description: Plexx is a mobile skill-building marketplace for youth without a degree to learn skills, anytime, anyplace, get a job, and launch a career.

description: Sensulin has developed a glucose-responsive insulin, which may become the first once-a-day insulin for type I/II diabetes.  The current standard of care requires 4-6 injections/day, constant finger-sticks to feed the glucometer, and endless vigilence.  If we succeed, we may vastly reduce complications associated with diabetes (ER visits, hypoglycemia, etc.), profoundly disrupt the global insulin market ( will double by 2018 to $32B), and most importantly, give patients a chance at a normal life.
short-description: Sensulin may be the 1st 24hr insulin for type I/II diabetes, which will improve compliance, and give patients a chance at a normal life.

description: SEIN simplifies the process for investors who need to analyze and manage bundled consumer debt. Current technology requirements are expensive (1 million+/year) to launch and maintain and during the financial crisis it became apparent that investors did not have the best tools to understand what they were buying. SEIN integrates individual loan data and securities, along with offering in-depths analytics in an easy to use cloud based solution, making investing in credit markets easier.
short-description: SEIN builds a financial analytics software that disrupts and simplifies how bundled debt is sold and managed by investors.

description: Family caregiving can be complicated and chaotic. Our HIPAA compliant mobile social platform for caregiving brings some sanity to the process. It brings together family and friends to help everyone stay well, encouraged, engaged, and on track. At Semafores we believe caregiving is a tag-team activity, adherence and goal fulfillment are far easier with active involvement from family and friends, and that other people need to be involved in case memories and technology fail or fail to engage.
short-description: Semafores' mobile tools weave together family and friends to bring sanity to your caregiving and goal journeys.

description: Learning math and science can be hard. Online resources (e.g., Khan Academy, Coursera, etc.) attempt to solve this problem by distributing online lectures. As former educators, we know how ineffective lectures can be. So we're creating a revolutionary online learning platform that features an unprecedented interactive and adaptive user experience. We make learning math and science fun and easy for everyone.
short-description: School Yourself makes learning math and science education fun and easy with their revolutionary online learning platform.

description: RoundShip is developing the first SaaS (Scholarship-as-a-Service) platform that enables SMBs and nonprofits to quickly and easily create, administer, and award a scholarship.  We provide a clean interface for student applicants to manage their scholarships and connect with more money for college.
short-description: RoundShip delivers the first SaaS (Scholarship as a Service) platform for SMB's and nonprofits.  We simply scholarships.

description: Tencap is to racquet sports what a handicap is to golf. However, in racquet sports a player's ability directly impacts another's enjoyment, amplifying the need for a rating system.  We empower athletes to easily identify players in their area of a similar ability level and connect with them to play.  We are a social network offering athletes a free way to play more of the sport they love and have a more enjoyable experience when they play.
short-description: Want to play more of a racquet sport?  Find a Tencap Community near you www.tencaptennis.com What is your Tencap?

description: THINX solves 2 problems for 2 billion women on earth. Prob #1: Busy women sometimes have accidents during that 'time of the month' and embarrassing moments & ruined clothes follow. So we created a beautiful high-tech pair of underwear that is stain/leak resistant, anti-microbial & moisture wicking, keeping you safe. Prob #2: Girls in developing countries have nothing to use during that time of month and end up dropping out of school. So we help produce 7 washable cloth pads for every THINX sold.
short-description: Your underwear just got really smart. Check out THINX, the new panty product that thinks of you and of girls around the world. shethinx.com

description: TechLok is a software technology company focused on reducing pain points associated with lost mobile devices.   TechLok is creating big-data-analytics-powered mobile apps that install on your iOS or Android smart phone or tablet to enable these devices to determine when high-risk situations occur, so they can react automatically, preventing device loss, preventing data loss in devices that remain enabled after being lost, and assisting in the recovery of lost devices.
short-description: TechLok provides loss prevention, data protection, and device recovery for mobile devices

description: When I became a nanny for two children on the autism spectrum in 2011, I was not prepared to work with the children in my care and struggled. There are 2 million nannies in the US that are not certified. SitterCycle's platform provides nannies education through online classes taught by experts in childcare. Caregivers receive an online certification that helps improve their level of care and launch successful careers of nannies, with a certification parents can trust.
short-description: The first online platform where caregivers learn from childcare experts and get certified to provide quality care that parents can trust

description: Technology for Autism Now, Inc. (TAN), a 501c3 non-profit organization, we leverage technology to address deficits that are unique to autistic children.  Our recent endeavors include creating a suite of easy, customizable, and intuitive iOS applications that can be used to improve the communication capabilities of severely autistic children. TAN will provide a platform that is colorful and engaging as well as instantly customizable with camera and video capabilities in addition to  data feedback
short-description: Improving the lives of children and families living with autism through innovative technology solutions.

description: TeemPlay believes in the best ideas no matter where they come from! So we are building a platform to find the best ideas for videogames and use them to make games that we know ahead of time that people will want to play. By applying crowdsourcing to game development we can pre-validate the games we produce and only make the games that the community wants while we also draw on the creativity of the masses to make games that go way beyond what we could imagine on our own.
short-description: TeemPlay is the Quirky.com for videogames: By leveraging the ideas of the collective we aim to make games that people want to play.

description: Switch is a mobile app that controls and automates tasks in the real world. Whenever you want something you hit a switch or schedule a task.
short-description: Life has a remote control.

description: Tauros Engineering was formed in 2013 to commercialize a revolutionary technology for the detection of bridge scour. Bridge scour is the  erosion of earth around the foundation of a bridge and is the leading cause of bridge failure. Scour endangers public safety and can result in significant repair costs. Monitoring is required but current solutions do not provide accurate real-time detection. Our patent pending solution provides bridge owners with robust, accurate, 24/7 monitoring of scour.
short-description: Tauros Engineering is commercializing a revolutionary technology for the detection of bridge scour.

description: Currently in America, there is only one high school counselor for every 500 students. A student spends only 38 minutes with their counselor to make some of the toughest decisions for the future resulting in a high drop out rates and lack of vision for the future.  SSA pairs high school students one on one with top university students for guidance in college, career, and life.  These college students are young enough to relate yet mature enough to guide students in next steps after high school.
short-description: SSA connects high school students with university students across the nation through technology to transform the guidance counselor system.

description: Skillbridge is an online marketplace for users to post, find and execute short-term finance, strategy and marketing projects at revolutionary low price points. Projects can be a few days, a couple of months or longer. Skillbridge connects businesses to high quality freelancers at a price point they can afford.
short-description: A platform connecting businesses with premium professional services talent quickly and affordably

description: Ubidots empowers developers, makers and companies to easily create applications for the Internet of Things (like a 'Twilio' for the Internet of Things). From healthcare monitoring, Oil & Gas SCADA systems, to retail analytics, our corporate customers have been using our platform to harvest sensor data and turn it into valuable insights for their businesses. Thanks to this experience, we have gathered a great team of developers and designers to launch a new friendlier version of our platform.
short-description: Ubidots empowers developers, makers and companies to easily create applications for the Internet of Things

description: There are 3 times more technical jobs opening this year than computer science students able to fill them. And the problem is increasing.Our economic future depends on it. The digital revolution is changing all areas in the world from shopping to farming. Computer science is the basis for modern day creativity and expression. Let's create an opportunity for our children to become creators instead consumers of computer science. We need to teach them programming and inspire them to new achievements
short-description: There's a huge lack of programmers and computer science students. We'll fix it making coding popular among children.

description: UPower is developing the only always-on, emission-free, recyclable nuclear battery for remote and distributed generation. The reactor is a compact, solid-state, nano reactor that produces 1.75 MWe and can cogenerate process heat for over a decade without refueling. Our uniquely small size and truly modular technology enables us to reduce technical and regulatory risks so we can get to market for 1/50th the cost and in half the time as competing technologies.
short-description: The always-on, carbon-free, container-size and recyclable MW size nano-nuclear battery, which lasts for 12 years without refueling.

description: Our patented formulation of advanced cellulose insulation is superior in performance and lower in cost than traditional cellulose. As builders seek higher energy efficiency, cellulose simply outperforms fiberglass. Cellulose insulation has grown to a $400M market and is increasingly taking share from fiberglass.  Our company will work with existing manufacturing facilities and distributors to rapidly bring this technology to market with inherent cost, sustainability, and quality advantages.
short-description: Our patented advanced cellulose insulation gives us a performance edge in a rapidly growing $400M market, while costing less to produce.

description: Veraquel Technologies is commercializing a transformative platform technology for the synthesis and manufacturing of peptides, applicable from discovery to large-scale production. This patented technology has the potential to eliminate the need for labor-intensive column separations, revolutionizing the process of manufacturing scale-up and enabling the high-throughput parallel purification of peptides for library-based approaches to drug discovery
short-description: Veraquel is transforming the purification of peptide drugs at discovery and large-scale manufacturing scales

description: RallyPoint gives US military members unprecedented ability to influence their careers by leveraging their own unique military merits and connections. As a military member inevitably transitions to the private sector, we leverage his unique military identity to dramatically improve chances of finding ideal employment. Founders are 2 Harvard B-School military veterans uniquely positioned to lead this venture's success. GEN (Ret) George Casey, 36th Army Chief of Staff, is among Board members.
short-description: RallyPoint does for the military what LinkedIn does for business, empowering military professionals to pursue the best career opportunities.

description: 20 million people in developing countries need a wheelchair. Existing products don’t work on the rough terrain and break easily. We designed the Leveraged Freedom Chair (LFC) to solve this problem. It uses a lever drivetrain made from bike parts, enabling users to travel 80% faster than a standard wheelchair on tarmac and off-road like no other mobility aid available, while ensuring local repairability. The LFC empowers people with disabilities to access education, employment and independence.
short-description: GRIT’s Leveraged Freedom Chair uses a novel drivetrain to offer people with disabilities unparalleled mobility on rough terrain.

description: Imagine you or a loved one are in one of the 2.6 million hospital or nursing home beds in the US and unable to tell a nurse what you need. What would you do? Verbal is the solution that bridges the communication gap. No longer will there be three times more preventable adverse events due to poor communication! Our easy-to-use communication suite enabled 1/3 of the patients we piloted with at MGH to speak for the first time! After, the nurses concluded 'there is a compelling need' for Verbal!
short-description: Verbal bridges the communications gap between patients and their caregivers through a tablet-driven cloud-based platform.

description: Whether delivering a package for FedEx, carrying luggage for the TSA or just lifting in a warehouse, $50 Billion is spent compensating injuries from workers who lift incorrectly. Strong Arm Technologies, Inc. has developed an elegant solution to those expenditures. The Strong Arm Vest takes the forces of a load and disperses them to stronger more stable areas of the lifters torso, in doing so it constrains the user into a proper ergonomic lifting posture. Workers lift safer and with less effort.
short-description: 50 Billion is spent every year compensating injuries from workers lifting incorrectly, Strong Arm has solutions to those injuries.

description: Soldiers, fire fighters, and search and rescue workers put their lives on the line every day so that we don’t have to.  Life-saving imaging technology exists that could make their jobs safer, yet current applications are too expensive, classified, and impractical for wide-scale use.  Bounce Imaging is developing ultra-low-cost, easy-to-use imaging systems to meet the needs of soldiers and first responders, allowing them to explore potentially hazardous spaces without exposing them to harm.
short-description: Bounce Imaging saves lives by letting soldiers and first responders view hazardous environments remotely and at low cost

description: LiquiGlide is a revolutionary super-slippery coating platform that allows cosmetic products like shampoo, conditioner, and lotion and thick sauces and condiments like mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, jelly, and even honey to slide easily out of their bottles. What may seem like a trivial application is actually a $100+ billion industry worldwide.  But this is just the tip of the iceberg. LiquiGlide will be a game changing technology in energy, desalination, transportation, manufacturing, and more.
short-description: LiquiGlide is a super-slippery coating platform that will revolutionize the cosmetics and food packaging industry.

description: Research shows HALF of all women leave their careers NOT to start families, but because they lack role models and mentors have unclear career paths, unsupportive work environments and it cost a company $100,000 to replace each mid-career woman. Executives in F500 are all concerned with this.
short-description: WomenLEADinc, a B2B SaaS company; accelerating women’s advancement as leaders, with an innovative online Personal Advisory Board platform.

description: 82% recruiters consider candidate’s web footprint in deciding whether to interview them or not. But, less than 1% of 700M professionals have anything more than a LinkedIn profile!
short-description: WorkLife is helping 700M professionals globally get discovered for their skills and expertise by empowering them to become thought leaders!

description: Traditional technologies are prohibitively expensive and slow for vital characterization of surface sugars on biologic drugs.  Volvox Biologic Inc. is developing glycan detection tools based on nanosensor technology from MIT which costs more than ten times less and takes minutes instead of weeks.  These tools will deliver more quick and precise optimization of biopharmaceutical companies’ manufacturing processes, saving them time and improving their process.
short-description: Check out a sweet new sensor that improves biologic drug development by Volvox Biologic Inc.!

description: Zalvadora is the best LMS in latam, operating from Bogota Colombia.
short-description: Zalvadora. Online Corporate University LMS & 360 services

description: 12 million (M) people are currently living with active tuberculosis (TB). Inefficient, outdated diagnostic tools and lack of patient adherence to medication  contribute to 1.2M deaths a year from TB.  WaveGuide's handheld nuclear magnetic resonance (μ-NMR) device is 10,000X more sensitive and 1800X faster than the current sputum smear microscopy test ( 87M units/yr). The μ-NMR is packaged in a point of testing format that will provide immediate diagnosis ($1B market) and treatment for TB.
short-description: WaveGuide makes a handheld nuclear magnetic resonance spectrometer  (μ-NMR) for the low cost rapid detection of diseases

description: Wizeo is an all-in-one crowdgiving platform that drives micro-donations for Causes by letting people donate small amounts of money for access to live video events with inspiring and influential people (“Wiz”). Wizeo is currently in Private Beta: www.wizeo.org
short-description: Wizeo is a crowdgiving paltform designed to raise funds and awareness for Causes by driving engagement through online video events.

description: Wisr teaches anything from Chemistry to Algebra through Twitter/chat/SMS/email. Users learn by answering questions ('If 4x + 1x + 3x = 40, then x = ?') in the communication channel where they are most comfortable.
short-description: Wisr teaches anything from Chemistry to Algebra through Twitter/chat/SMS/email.

description: Today we see dramatic growth of tablets. People started to bring them to work, but they can't actually work on them. We re-invented the mobile productivity.
short-description: @zetuniverse, an intuitive way to visually organize and share files on tablets.

description: WindGap Medical’s patient and clinician surveys show that the EpiPen® is bulky and awkward to carry, especially for children. It has tight temperature storage requirements of 68-77°F and will rapidly degrade outside of that range. Through patent-pending microfluidics and miniaturization, our product is as small as a USB drive, intuitive to use, and extends the storage temperature range out to 32-105°F. The market for our product is $1.05B, growing at 20% YoY.
short-description: WindGap Medical makes a miniature, temperature-insensitive alternative to the EpiPen® addressing a pressing need in a growing, $1B market.

description: Bikesharing has experienced substantial growth over the past few years.  It has spread to North America and gained significant traction.  However, there is one problem - the lack of helmet availability.  Not having helmets available is a safety concern, and it prohibits the growth of bikeshare systems.  This is where we step in.  We have developed a helmet vending solution that allows for helmets to be easily accessed by users.  Our machine dispenses and allows for the return of helmets.
short-description: @helmet_hub corporation promotes safe cycling practices among bikeshare users.  #bikeshare #publicsafety

description: iAgree provides new and innovative online tools to more efficiently and cost effectively manage disputes.  Through the iAgree system, parties will be able to more easily initiate and facilitate dispute resolution, collaborate and share information securely with relevant parties, and resolve disputes by identifying and involving the most qualified mediators and arbitrators.  Our system allows parties to save time, money and energy while maintaining justice.  With iAgree, EVERYBODY WINS!
short-description: iAgree is revolutionizing the legal world by developing software to help clients resolve legal disputes in the most effective way possible.

description: Institutional investors are plagued by the inability of most trade order management systems to deal effectively with foreign exchange. BuysideFX provides clients all the benefits of modern trading: auto-trading, anonymity, netting, algorithmic trading, etc., in an intuitive 'set it and forget it' method that greatly reduces operational and market risk. Brought to you by the people who created eSecLending, and funded by some of the East Coast's top VCs and angels.
short-description: BuysideFX solves institutional asset managers' foreign exchange problems via smart automation. We are the FX Traders' one API to the world.

description: Ubiqi Health is a mobile personal discovery platform that serves the millions with chronic conditions such as asthma, diabetes and migraine. By analyzing patient-reported and passively collected data, we identify actionable evidence to optimize treatment plans for each individual. By taking the guess-work out of today’s trial-and-error process of health management, we help patients self-manage, enabling providers and payers to strategically reduce costs.
short-description: Ubiqi helps people manage chronic conditions by helping them gather evidence and gain insights through mobile apps & data analytics.

description: Stress is a silent killer. Where objective data is now critical throughout medicine and daily life, diagnoses and treatments of stress rely exclusively on subjective reports to evaluate symptom severity and trends. Neumitra (noo-MEE-tra) helps monitor and manage acute and chronic stress with wearable and mobile technologies for health, performance, and happiness. We compute recurring reports of personalized health to aggregate analytics from one person to thousands. Together we’ll solve stress.
short-description: Together we’ll solve the stress epidemic to improve health, performance, and happiness. Say hello to bandu and take a moment for yourself!

description: Animal deaths cause >$5B in economic losses for the US dairy & beef production industries. This occurs because operations are limited - looking for 'ears down & head down' a couple times each day to I.D. any animal health and productivity issues. At this stage, issues are in a clinical stage, so recovery is expensive & difficult. Vital Herd monitors animal 'vital signs' to catch issues reliably, efficiently & MUCH earlier than can be done today.
short-description: Vital Herd - Big Data for Dairy and Beef Production

description: 90% of people 80+ want to live at home, but there can be risks. NTG health service has health sensors and software intelligence to detect abnormal patterns in behavior, allowing for early response. Our service detects serious issues -- even if someone is unconscious, has not fallen, or has not pressed an alarm. We help aging people maintain independent, active lives, and assure their families they are healthy and safe at home. We give aging people freedom, and their loved ones peace of mind.
short-description: NTG health service gives aging people the freedom to live longer and more safely at home, and offers their loved ones peace of mind

description: We got a crash course in recovery when an EF3 tornado scrambled our town. Groups like the Red Cross bring resources into town, but don’t collect donations, don’t organize volunteers, and don’t stay. Untrained community members are tasked with all of the long-term organizing and given no tools. We can launch TownName.Recovers.org in 2hrs, providing searchable databases, social media aggregation and mobile apps, allowing local organizers to efficiently marshal resources.
short-description: Recovers.org is creating tools for community powered disaster relief. YourTown.Recovers.org!

description: NBA Math Hoops harnesses the power and influence that NBA stars possess and unleashes it to inspire students to be excited and happy about learning math. We have formed partnerships with the National Basketball Association and Hasbro Games to create an innovative, fast-paced, competitive board game that teaches and applies important fundamental math skills. Students use real-world NBA and WNBA player data to compete against classmates in timed, simulated basketball games.
short-description: NBA Math Hoops will improve math literacy among urban youth by making fun and effective educational tools that harness the power of the NBA

description: Black Island Wind Turbines are the toughest wind turbines on the planet. Reliable for over a decade in Antarctica in 200+mph marine environments, our HRX-series turbines will soon be offered to customers demanding high performance and survivability. As the high-reliability option, our HR3 model is the natural choice for meeting critical loads—and demanding customer requirements.
short-description: Black Island Wind Turbines--Reliable for a decade in Antarctica, our 3 kW HRx turbines bring peace-of-mind for meeting critical loads.

description: Cancer is diagnosed today much too late: increasing sensitivity by thousand folds, Akrivis’ Z-TECT technology will allow cancer detection so early that it will be cured faster and with less toxic drugs. Z-TECT can achieve this with blood tests or medical imaging of mm-sized tumors. After selling custom reagents to repeat customers for a year, Akrivis recently signed a worldwide distribution agreement and seeks $250k to hire 2 scientists and accelerate the launch of its first products by Q1 2013
short-description: Akrivis’ patented Z-TECT technology will allow cancer detection so early that it will be cured easier, faster and with less toxic drugs

description: Lab Automate has developed and globally patented the A3G technology which can reduce the time to market of Inhalation products by up to 25%.  The technology’s feasibility has been independently proven by tests done at Cirrus Pharmaceuticals and by University of Maryland.  The technology has a $2.8 billion market which is growing @ 6%/annum. Expects to be profitable in 2nd year with 5th year sales projected @$50MM--is seeking $1.3MM to develop commercial scale equipment.
short-description: LATech has developed an automation solution for inhalation drug testing which reduces time to market by up to 25% by biotech companies.

description: Ministry of Supply, founded by 4 MIT students, aims to change how we think about business clothing.  With an Advisory Board comprised of members from Patagonia, Zappos, Gilt and Under Armour, Ministry of Supply was Kickstarter's highest ever Fashion funded startup, raising $429K from 3,000+ customers in 30 countries in about a month.  It uses its proprietary NASA technology in business clothing to prevent sweat via temperature regulation, and eliminates ironing.
short-description: Ministry of Supply is inventing the future of apparel through fabric technology, engineering, and style.

description: 49 million Americans are hungry and food insecure (including 660,000 in Massachusetts), yet wasted food accounts for almost forty percent of food produced in the U.S.  Food is wasted at every level from production to the retail shelf. Lovin’ Spoonfuls facilitates the rescue and distribution of perishable, prepared and unserved foods that would otherwise be thrown away and wasted.  We deliver this food directly to local crisis centers, soup kitchens and other social assistance entities.
short-description: Why are ppl going hungry when there’s enough food? Lovin' Spoonfuls is the bridge from abundance to need-healthy food to those who need it!

description: Fragmentation of media consumption has made audiences expensive and difficult to reach with the current methods, especially within the $70B US TV ad market.  Building on years of experience with viewership data and ad tech, IntegralReach is offering next generation solutions to TV networks and advertisers.  We utilize large, rich data sets and analytics to fuel an activation platform that effectively places ads, promotes content and delivers meaningful, cross-platform reach.
short-description: IntegralReach is applying large scale data analytics to fragmented media, enabling advertisers to reach customers across multiple platforms.

description: Tooth loss affects nearly the entire adult population and significantly impacts quality of life. Dental implants are often the best treatment; however, it is hard to accurately drill a hole in the jaw to properly place an implant, and mistakes can be costly. We sell 3D image-based drill guides to help surgeons more easily and accurately place implants. Our patented guide solves the design issues of current guides, requires no investment (vs $5-10K), and is half the price of current guides.
short-description: Guided Surgery Solutions provides dental implant surgeons the accuracy of computer guidance, with the ease of freehand drilling

description: Every year the Global 2000 spends over $5 Trillion on General and Administrative functions like Finance, IT, and HR. Without employee feedback, effectively structuring and managing these functions is impossible. The 42stats SaaS solution integrates employee feedback from a global workforce with enterprise data. Our quantitative analyses identify inefficiencies, enable continuous improvement, and help to radically improve employee satisfaction. Our Global 2000 customers agree.
short-description: The 42stats SaaS solution integrates employee feedback and enterprise data, enabling continuous improvement in the Global 2000

description: Citybot has developed a mobile application that helps travelers create detailed itineraries over 100 times faster using our itinerary engine. Planning even a single day of travel can take hours! With Citybot you can do it in under 60 seconds. We are targeting the $27B destination activities market which is extremely fragmented, does not have a strong leader and is the fastest growing segment of the travel industry. Our app is currently in private beta on iOS and Android.
short-description: Citybot is an intelligent travel guide that lets you plan your day 100 times faster using artificial intelligence.

description: Dynamo Micropower is developing a small gas generator (<30 kW) that provides the operational benefits of a gas turbine and the capital costs of traditional diesel gensets.  This is achieved by leveraging a novel proprietary architecture that can utilize fuels on site, requires little maintenance and as designed for scale manufacturing.  These unique features will allow Dynamo to dominate the market, while the novel architecture enables low cost production and scalable design.
short-description: Dynamo has developed a novel microturbine that will replace small diesel (<30kW) because it is fuel flexibility, robust, and more efficient

description: CoachUp is a service that connects athletes with private coaches. We believe that private coaching is the secret to reaching the next level in sports + life. Pain 1:  It's hard for parents to find and compare private coaches. Pain 2: it's hard for private coaches to find and manage clients. Private coaches lack web, marketing, scheduling and billing - some would like to do private coaching on the side to make money but don't know how -  CoachUp can help.
short-description: CoachUp is a service that connects athletes with private coaches. We believe that private coaching is the secret to reaching the next level.

description: We are using our proprietary software algorithms and sensor technologies to read sophisticated biometrical parameters of your body. Those advanced parameters we interpret in a proper manner to show your energy, vitality and stress levels, optimal pulse level during your exercises (target training zone), and others. Sensor, algorithms, wireless technology and smartphones are giving consumers the ability to take control over their own health.
short-description: CardioWave has 2 products: mobile health platform and fitness tracker based on sensor technologies, it reads your personal vital signs.

description: Every 2 days people create as much data as mankind did up to 2003. Without the critical tools necessary to extract value from this universe of information companies put opportunities at competitive risk. The enterprise client feels underserved by the current crop of analytic applications.. Having bootstrapped our BETA product we are moving into an underserved market with the solution. Atomic Tower is revolutionizing reporting with a cloud based product and a 'no training' interface.
short-description: Atomic Tower has developed the next gen of reporting services specifically for cloud app developers to integrate quickly with their service.

description: Bootstrap Compost is a residential & commercial food scrap pickup service. Our mission is to collect organic material and redistribute it to local farms for composting. Every day we help Bostonians divert hundreds of pounds of scraps from landfills and create compost, a valuable resource for the local food economy. Our subscribers receive a portion of compost for personal use while our farms use it to feed their crops. We consider it thoughtful, sustainable and community-engineered composting.
short-description: Bootstrap Compost is a residential & commercial food scrap pickup service. Our mission: reduce waste, reduce guilt & improve the food chain.

description: Bottol rewards the chain of people that connect buyer to seller via online word-of-mouth. We have a patent-pending technology that tracks how promotions are shared from friend to friend across all social media, and even e-mail. We see the exact path a promotion takes and reward the chain of people that connect buyer to seller and because we incentivize people for the value they create beyond their direct friends, we create more sharing.
short-description: Bottol is a platform that rewards the chain of people that connect buyer to a business through online recommendations.

description: Women aged 30-55 have a hard time shopping online. 80% of new online stores focus on contemporary brands yet 65% of apparel sales are from women 35+. For these forgotten women, we are creating a virtual dressmaking shop that helps them find unique, appropriate clothing. Women browse and customize over 3,0000 garment options and request a Fit Kit pre-purchase that reduces returns and increases conversion up to 50%. A Build-A-Bear for clothes!
short-description: Bow & Drape is an e-commerce brand that allows women to design their own clothing.  A Build-A-Bear for women's fashion

description: With Appsembler, developers and software companies can quickly and cost effectively offer their software as a hosted service. We provide all the backend infrastructure like hosting, billing and operational support so you can avoid these things and instead focus on building a great product.
short-description: Appsembler is Etsy for software makers. Appsembler lets developers launch their own SaaS business in 5 minutes.

description: Electronic Reporting will disrupt the financial data industry. We’re leading the way.
short-description: Calcbench.com - the fastest and easiest way to retrieve, work with and share corporate financial data.

description: At Arcbazar, any person can launch an architectural design competition: an addition to a home, a remodeling job for retail space, a design of an entire family home, a landscape project, etc. The client describes the project, uploads images, and provides basic information that form the basis for designers to develop their architectural concepts. The client sets the award and timeline, and in the end picks the best design submission.
short-description: Arcbazar is a first-of-its-kind competition platform for architectural design services.

description: Arbsource uses biotechnology to transform wastewater treatment from a costly energy liability into a valuable resource for food and beverage companies. Breweries, dairies, and many other food and beverage processors are burdened with tremendous costs managing wastewater, often totaling six or seven figures every year in operations per facility. For half the cost, we match treatment performance and generate valuable byproducts with our patent-pending and exclusively licensed Arbcell bioreactor.
short-description: Arbsource uses biotechnology to transform wastewater treatment from an energy liability into a valuable resource for food/beverage companies

description: 'A.I.type text prediction software provides a solution for individuals to quickly compose complex and error free text, by suggesting complementary words according to the context, in the right spelling, grammar and syntax. This is done using various tools such as translation to local language, completion and correction of the current word , and other tools according to user’s preferences. The product consists of a “Knowledge Based” system which acquires its knowledge automatically.”
short-description: A.I.type's text prediction software makes writing easier, faster and better, on mobile phones and tablets.

description: In 10 months we have generated about $150k revenues, are profitable, part of TechStars Boston, and have European fortune 500 as customers.
short-description: Our web-based tool lets businesses keep control of their documents and track usage as they are shared wherever they are stored, in real-time

description: With Dpicd, obstructed views, sold out tickets, or even the inability to attend will not prevent you from experiencing an event. We aggregate live-updated pictures and videos into a collective event album, enabling you to see different perspectives, from different people, at the same event. See it all with Dpicd.
short-description: Compile and share live-updated event photos and videos. View an event’s live album before, during or after attending. See it all with Dpicd!

description: When you give a friend a book for her birthday, you go to a bookstore, buy and wrap a book, and give it to her. When you give an e-book, you send it in an email. Its convenient, but it feels hollow.  We allow you to create a tactile, interactive unwrapping experience on mobile devices.  We're creating a way for you to show your friends and family you care.
short-description: Delightfully allows you to thoughtfully deliver digital gifts to friends and family.

description: Atrial fibrillation (AF) is a progressive disease affecting 2-5+ M people in the US. AblaCor Medical Corporation is developing the CircumBlator™ (CB), a one-touch ablation solution for Pulmonary Vein Isolation (PVI), a key therapy for AF. CB addresses clinicians’ needs who say this is a game-changer. CB, an easy-to-use ablator, optimizes tissue contact for safe, precise and complete ablation. Shorter procedures and reproducible results will increase physician adoption and no. patients treated.
short-description: AMC is developing disruptive catheter technology to treat/cure 2 million+ US people with atrial fibrillation which causes 20% of strokes.

description: Akselos takes the pain out of high-fidelity engineering simulations and makes them 100x to 1000x times faster. We empower mainstream engineers to do detailed simulation and hence reduce the costs due to over-engineering and excessive 'safety factors'. Current engineering software requires too much expertise and too much time, so engineers today avoid these tools and develop suboptimal designs as a result. Our technology is based on over 10 years of research at MIT.
short-description: Akselos brings very fast and highly accurate simulation tools to the mainstream engineering market.

description: Design Museum Boston’s mission is to educate the public on the role of design in their lives and to unite the design community in ways that enrich our collective work and solve real-world problems more creatively. We’re a decentralized network of exhibits: whether in a gallery, retail environment, public space or on the web, our programming gives audiences new insights into the design process and the greater social, economic and environmental contexts that both affect and are affected by design.
short-description: @designmuseumbos' mission is to educate the public on the role of design in their lives through a decentralized network of exhibitions.

description: As an “invisible minority,” gay people rely on technology to meet. As they become increasingly accepted, fewer gay only places exist. Current apps show guys nearby looking to hookup or display an outdated listing of gay bars.
short-description: Distinc.tt is like Grindr meets foursquare. It helps people discover “gay gems” in a city and connect in real life.

description: Fantasy Politics applies fantasy sports dynamics to politics. The game incorporates 15+ objective scoring criteria and serves as an engaging educational tool.
short-description: Fantasy Politics applies fantasy football dynamics to politics and repackages the scoring data to share with media and political campaigns.

description: Freight Farms converts used shipping containers into hydroponic farms, 1 container equaling 1 acre of farmland in production. We provide a solution to our global food supply problem of food traveling over 1,500 miles before reaching your plate. Freight Farms allows individuals to create a local food economy no matter where they are in the world. Providing people with local fresh food year efficiently round while reducing the environmental food print of food production is our goal.
short-description: Freight Farms allows anyone to grow fresh food anywhere, anytime!

description: Points4Green is a new loyalty program that makes it easy for businesses to reward environmentally-conscious shoppers. For the first time, businesses can link customers’ everyday shopping decisions to making a measurable impact on climate change. We buy CO2 credits at auction and turn them into a patent-pending loyalty currency. Members earn Points for every dollar spent on participating products and services. Each Point eliminates 1 lb of CO2 plus provides an additional $0.01 in rewards.
short-description: Points4Green makes it easy for businesses to reward environmentally-conscious shoppers by linking their everyday purchases to CO2 reduction

description: Fetch is full-service storage for urban markets. We pickup your items at home, store in our secure facility, and redeliver on demand. Fetch features reusable plastic storage crates and up to the minute online inventory and tracking. Simply pack and label your crates and we do the rest. It's like cloud storage for your stuff!
short-description: Fetch is full-service storage for your stuff. Just pack your items into our reusable boxes, and we’ll store and redeliver them on command.

description: We manufacturer the best tasting gluten free items for retail & foodservice organizations so they can provide these items to the 25 million Americans who must have gluten free items per a doctor's prescription & to the 13 million more who will choose these items if offered. We developed proprietary processes to return moisture to these items & create great tasting foods that happen to be gluten free. We're building a distributor & broker network & are seeing the material impact we're having.
short-description: Manufacturer of gluten free prepared meals, gourmet potato pancakes and bakery items for retail and food service organizations.

description: Gradeable is a modern day grading app for teachers. Right now, teachers spend up to fifteen hours a week on grading and related paperwork.  With Gradeable, students can walk into class, turn in their homework, and have it automatically scanned with our app. Five minutes later, the teacher walks over to her iPad and pulls up a report showing her that 43% of the class got question 4 wrong.  Now she knows exactly what to teach.  We give every child the promise of a digital education, today.
short-description: Gradeable is a modern day grading app for teachers. Our system enables best practices that increase standardized test scores by 29%.

description: At Eone we are currently developing a visual and tactile watch. Designed in collaboration with the visually impaired, the timepiece is worn like any other wristwatch with the added benefit of being able to both look at, and feel what time it is. Who hasn’t found themselves in a scenerio—meetings, theaters, dinner with the in-laws—where they couldn’t check the time? Afterall, telling time shouldn’t require sight.
short-description: At Eone we are designing a visual and tactile watch that everyone—including the blind—can use silently and accurately.

description: Trains carrying mined materials like iron or coal loss around 1.5 ton of product per car, amounting to a loss of half a billion dollars per year, just in Brazil. That is a financial loss to mining companies and a major health and environmental problem. Dust suppressors are liquids that can be sprayed on top of train cars and we, at E-POL, have developed ProtectOre, a premium patented dust suppressor. Our main raw material is biodiesel waste that would otherwise be burned to the atmosphere.
short-description: E-POL has developed a process allowing waste glycerin from biodiesel production to be turned into a variety of products.

description: Fish farms operate below capacity because a key input for production, eggs, are only spawned during fixed, natural cycles. Eggs only remain biologically viable for a few days, so new crops of fish can only be bred certain months of the year. This leads to seasonal underproduction of fish by up to 40% of farm capacity, costing the aquaculture industry billions of dollars per year. Cryoocyte freezes excess eggs produced, giving farms full-year access to their highest quality eggs.
short-description: Cryoocyte freezes fish eggs enabling year-round supply of eggs to keep farms fully stocked and address problems of seasonal underproduction.

description: 50 million pounds of non-recyclable toothbrushes are thrown away every year in the US.  A lot of this is meaningless waste, since just the heads need to be replaced after a few months of use.  LittleBonsai is a product studio that is dedicated to creating fun and useful household products in a responsible way. We’ve developed ReBrush™, an exciting new toothbrush that features replaceable heads and high-quality handles made from aluminum and sustainably grown hardwood.
short-description: ReBrush™ by LittleBonsai. Replaceable heads and gorgeous durable handles. 80% less waste. A truly refreshing take on the toothbrush.

description: HandyBook is based on a simple idea – take frequently used services such as house-cleaning and plumbing, and make them available for purchase online in a time certain, price certain, quality assured manner. We get that no one likes “wasting” time booking services. And so, unlike Angies List, TaskRabbit or Thumbtack that operate on a request for proposal model, HandyBook has line of sight on inventory (we know when providers are free), and allows users to close transactions immediately.
short-description: HandyBook the easiest way to book a handyman or cleaner. Instant booking, confirmation and payment.

description: Infinite Analytics performs analytics on your customers' social data using our proprietary algorithms so that you can better understand their needs, making the shopping experience more targeted and efficient for you, and more enjoyable for them. Our algorithms evolve with your customers changing tastes so that you will always be kept up-to-date on their new desires.
short-description: Infinite Analytics is the easiest way for e-commerce sites to deliver personalized recommendations for their customers, in under 5 minutes.

description: We feel that shopping for clothes online is lacking the essences of shopping, such as trying things on, mixing and matching to create new looks, and socializing with friends. We wanted a virtual closet like in the movie “Clueless”, where discovering amazing looks is always at our fingertips. LookFlix currently has thousands of products from popular brands, with amazing looks you can't find anywhere else.
short-description: LookFlix is your virtual closet with thousands of products from popular brands. Discover amazing looks you can't find anywhere else.

description: 380,000 patients are injured annually in the United States from incorrect drug administration. IB's patent pending technology, the DeltaFlow Infusion Regulator, is the first and only automated regulator, reducing liabilities associated with medicine administration. DeltaFlow is designed for use with gravity flow, intravenous delivery systems that require accurate flow control to optimize drug delivery and patient safety. DeltaFlow will relieve hospital cost-pressures and offers an ROI of <2 months.
short-description: Imagnus Biomedical supplies quality, cost-effective instruments that offer advanced solutions to problems in research & medicine.

description: The mission of HydroConfidence is to provide the natural gas extraction industry with an offering of tools and services to help maximize gas production while minimizing environmental impact. HydroConfidence is developing two primary products. The first is an aquifer monitoring system that uses a network of well-based sensors to detect methane migration. The second is a downhole monitoring system that provides data on gas flow and mechanical integrity to help optimize gas production.
short-description: HydroConfidence advances the utilization of natural gas by enhancing its financial competitiveness and environmental safety.

description: 70M parents have a growing problem. Family content - photos, videos, posts, comments- is spread across multiple social accounts and devices, making it impossible to curate. Lifeables is the only service to automate the entire curation process for consumers - collecting, filtering and organizing the little moments that tell the larger story of their family's life.  The service is in public beta, has been described as 'addictive' by mom bloggers and will begin generating revenue this year.
short-description: The Lifeables service automatically collects and curates the little moments that tell the larger story of your family's life.

description: Klypper is a mobile media platform for businesses to reach out to customers and partners using video and pictures. This capability opens a new door for micro to mid sized businesses to create high quality video email messages, marketing campaigns, and training videos quickly and easily. Klypper allows companies to engage followers and customers more effectively and at a more personal level, with better results. Klypper is faster, simpler and cheaper than anything else available on the market.
short-description: Klypper an easy to use and cost effective media platform for micro to mid size companies to create engaging video content for customers.

description: Invisergy has developed a transparent, electricity generating window. In a 20 story commercial building, energy generation of 100 kW is possible, providing for 5-10% of a building’s load requirement. Invisergy’s window is an extremely low cost per watt solution that maintains the aesthetic appeal necessary to penetrate new construction in the Building Integrated Photovoltaic market. Invisergy's proprietary technology will add value for window manufacturers through strategic partnerships.
short-description: Invisergy has developed a cost-effective, transparent solar energy generating window that will revolutionize building sustainability.

description: Because the current methods for the design of utility networks are highly manual, the resulting designs are highly variable based on the skill and experience of the designer. Human (and existing software) cannot take into account the thousands of parameters, interconnections and therefore cannot design networks that optimize for energy, resource-efficiency, etc. NETGEN, basing on a proprietary math model, automatically designs optimized utility networks and recommends the most optimal equipment
short-description: NetGen is innovative software for automatically designing utility networks optimized on energy-efficiency or other parameters,

description: For busy couples who want to keep the spark alive, our new patent pending mobile platform uses gaming to inspire couples to get off the couch and out on more dates, having fun together more often.  Part game, part date night planner, and part relationship tool, KAHNOODLE is the fun, easy way for couples to discover and book dates and rack up 'kudos' (i.e. virtual brownie points) for investing in their relationship.
short-description: KAHNOODLE is the easiest way for busy couples to have awesome date experiences.

description: iSpecimen provides human biospecimens to life sciences researchers without the costs and complexities of traditional procurement methods. Our proprietary technology searches across our network of hospitals for clinical specimens and associated patient data for samples that exactly match research needs. Researchers gain timely, high-quality biospecimens and data while hospitals make profitable use of their clinical waste.
short-description: iSpecimen makes it fast and easy for life scientists to obtain human biospecimens and data for their research.

description: Med2Bed is an intelligent web-based solution that ensures safe, seamless, and timely patient transitions by allowing hospitals to book post-acute care beds for patients in need of intermediate care before returning home.
short-description: Med2Bed enables seamless, safe, and timely patient discharges from hospitals to post-acute care facilities.

description: Home health monitoring is a growing field that lacks the necessary tools to realize health and cost savings possibilities.  Ionu Biosystems is developing platform continuous, tattoo-like sensors that optically report concentrations of almost any molecule concentration in the body.  The founders of have developed this technology over 7 years, producing numerous patents and publications.  Further development will provide Ionu Biosystems with leading platform technology in a rapidly growing market.
short-description: Ionu Biosystems is developing tattoo-like sensor technology for mobile pain-free, real-time medical monitoring of key blood levels.

description: Magru offers a new ePublishing solution for young authors to publish, market and sell their works, which includes, but is not limited to, books, magazines, scientific articles, among others. The use of modern cloud technology also provides various and numerous styles, efficient and affordable editing options for authors, which will create interactive publications. Additionally, Magru believes that it will inspire many of its readers to become authors themselves.
short-description: Magru is ePublishing service designed for novice / non-pro authors who want to reveal the potential their works and find inquisitive readers

description: Noor launched a “proof of concept” pilot in May 2011 and in less than 6 months; NoorVitamins was sold by over 200 pharmacies and booked sales of about $65,000 on volume of over 5,000 units at an average price of $14/unit. Noor is now found in several Walgreen’s stores in NY and will be launching in Dubai in May 2012.  Our forecast suggests that the Muslim vitamin market is growing and is currently valued at $6-8B USD per year.
