Conservatively, if  Noor captures <2 % of the potential Muslim vitamin customers globally in this market within five years, it will result in >$300M in Year 5 revenues.
short-description: Noor Pharmaceuticals develops and commercializes halal vitamins and supplements to meet the need of the 1.6 billion Muslims worldwide.

description: Market Publique is a curated marketplace for vintage online.
short-description: @marketpublique is the only curated marketplace for vintage on the web! Browse #vintage from sellers worldwide. http://bit.ly/marketpublique

description: NBD Nanotechnologies is developing novel surface coatings that enhance the rate of condensation and improve heat transfer performance. These coatings can have a broad impact in many industries including HVAC, refrigeration, desalination, and dehumidification.
short-description: NBD Nanotechnologies is developing novel surface coatings that enhance the rate of condensation and improve heat transfer performance.

description: LuminAID Lab develops solar-powered, inflatable lamps for emergency aid, humanitarian relief, and recreational use outdoors. The LuminAID light is a solar-powered, inflatable lamp that packs flat and inflates to create a lightweight, waterproof lantern. The LuminAID provides up to eight hours of LED light ideal for disaster relief situations, recreational use outdoors or in the home. Our vision is to make light more sustainable, available, and affordable for everyone.
short-description: LuminAID Lab develops inflatable, solar-powered lights for emergency aid, humanitarian relief, and recreational use outdoors.

description: Millions of young kids are increasingly demanding more iPad time; and parents are feverishly buying apps in the education category to try to keep up with their kids and help keep them learning. Unfortunately, the actual learning outcomes too often fall short of the inherent promise these apps make - squandering the transformative potential of the platform and the kids' desire & ability to learn. Native Brain leverages leading edge learning research to build math apps that deliver on the promise.
short-description: Native Brain develops research-inspired iPad apps that help all kids learn, love, and master math.

description: Millions of people annually attend Open Studios: community-organized events that invite the public into the private studios of local artists. New Art Love offers an app that helps you learn about artists in advance, plan which studios to visit, navigate in the moment, as well as flag and share your favorites. It makes purchasing in the studio less awkward and purchasing afterward more convenient. Now you can find the art that you love—both during and after Open Studios.
short-description: New Art Love helps you discover & purchase art by connecting the experience of an artist's studio with the convenience of online shopping.

description: MODALYST is a curated platform connecting designers and independent boutiques through an online wholesale bazaar. With our features, up-and-coming designers meet hard-to-reach boutiques, giving each more accessibility and visibility, while streamlining the discovery process of unique products. MODALYST will break the traditional retail model by allowing multiple boutiques to participate in daily collective buys, thus enabling them to meet the latest trends while reducing costs collaboratively.
short-description: MODALYST is an online fashion trade show, connecting emerging designers with independent boutiques through a wholesale group buy.

description: Every year over 20 million children are not immunized and nearly 2 million people die from vaccine preventable diseases. This happens because vaccines are sensitive to temperature and must be kept cold until administered. Nanoly is commercializing a safe and proprietary polymer shield that stabilizes and protects vaccines. By eliminating refrigeration, we can ship vaccines anywhere in the world, especially to those most in need.
short-description: Nanoly is enabling immunization access worldwide by eliminating refrigeration and solving the vaccine transportation problem.

description: MOVL is connecting smart devices to TVs for a more interactive experience in the living room and public spaces. Smart TVs is the next big thing and we are going to see the same trend with third party applications happen in this space similar to what happened with smartphones and tablets. MOVL is leading this with a unique approach.
short-description: MOVL is connecting smart devices to TVs for a more interactive experience in the living room and public spaces.

description: Wireless spectrum is a limited and shared resource, which means that the more users there are, the less each user gets. Indeed, with the explosion of mobile devices, this fundamental limitation is leading to a capacity crunch in both Wi-Fi and cellular networks. MegaMIMO's patent-pending technology alleviates the wireless capacity crunch. We've demonstrated that it delivers ten times more data per unit of spectrum as compared to today's technologies, and requires no changes to end-user devices.
short-description: MegaMIMO's patent-pending technology delivers 10x more wireless data per unit of spectrum.

description: The nsyrt toolkit lets website publishers deliver more value at lower cost by making it easy to serve incremental content into a published page as each user views, scrolls, and moves the pointer. It's all done with simple HTML attributes, no JavaScript APIs or coding. The nsyrt toolkit is free for websites and developers and can be licensed for use in ad units and other third party content.
short-description: The HTML toolkit for user-driven web pages. Simple yet powerful, a web technology for post-publication driven by individual real-time usage

description: Memory on Hand is a product based company started by a student for students. Our flagship product is the MoH Band, a USB flash drive wristband.  As a company we design, manufacture, and distribute technology accessories. We have aligned our business with the collegiate market and gained national recognition with retailers in all 50 states.  We strive to bring style to functional products, making them portable, convenient, and stylish.
short-description: 'Portable. Convenient. Stylish.' Memory on Hand develops and delivers technology accessories for active students of the mobile generation.

description: We are developing aerial photography products for consumer and commercial markets. The product is a $250 smartphone controlled small airplane equipped with a high resolution camera and software that makes operation easy. Out of hundreds of applications we narrowed down to three initial markets: DIY drones, agriculture and first responders. The FocalPlane will initially be marketed to DIY drone enthusiasts and first adopters through a crowdfunding campaign.
short-description: Rotary Robotics is bringing aerial photography to the masses! The $250 FocalPlane lets anyone see the world from the sky.

description: RouteSprout is an innovative approach to inter-city and special event transportation that allows the traveling public to develop their own routes based on popular demand.  Through RouteSprout, anyone may suggest a destination by reserving the first seat on a proposed route.  When enough seats are reserved, the route is confirmed, and a modern transit vehicle with a professional operator is dispatched for the trip.
short-description: RouteSprout - There and back by popular demand.

description: Securigin is an MIT startup developing mobile security solutions for enterprise iPhone and iPad (iOS) devices. 92% of Fortune 500 firms are testing or deploying iOS. Protecting mobile data is crucial and the mobile security market is expected to exceed $4 Billion by 2014. Current security products are limited and there is no in depth solution available to systematically identify and mitigate risks. Securigin’s analytics tools can uncover vulnerabilities not seen by today’s security vendors.
short-description: Securigin is an MIT startup developing innovative mobile security analytics tools for the $4 Billion enterprise mobile market

description: Sextant develops groundbreaking cancer therapies from our patented drug discovery technologies developed at MIT. Instead of simply trying to kill the tumor, we have created a way for tumors to dynamically trigger an immune response against cancer, and our technologies help us discover the best drug combinations to prevent relapse. Sextant’s unique pre-clinical drug discovery platform could bring new, more effective chemotherapies to market and save millions of lives.
short-description: Sextant is developing personalized cancer therapies that trigger the tumor to recruit the patient's own cancer-killing immune response.

description: Roammeo is an event discovery engine that solves the moments of knowing that something good is going on in a city, but having no way of finding out what that 'something' is. It is a real-time website and mobile app that pulls nearby events automatically from relevant calendars and ranks them on quality and relevancy using proprietary algorithms. Roammeo is available around urban college campuses and earns its recurring revenues from hosts switching from print to online.
short-description: Roammeo is a website and app that shows you the best events for you, in real-time, based on your interests and where you're standing.

startupname: RetiCue: Retinal Imaging for Diabetic Retinopathy
description: An estimated 366 million people, or 6.4% of the world's adult population, lived with diabetes in 2010. It is expected to grow to 552 million by 2030. Currently, more than 70% of people with diabetes live in low- and middle income countries without adequate healthcare, causing blindness due to retinopathy. Early detection through retinoscopy can enable easier and cheaper cure. Inaccessibility due to cost and portability of current retinoscopes is resolved with this handheld camera.
short-description: A simple solution for early detection of diabetic retinopathy that can change the arc of growth of world’s largest cause of blindness.

description: Millions of small companies and businesses use email and spreadsheets to manage their hiring process. Recruiterbox is a web-based recruiting software that helps such companies receive all job applications at one place, from where they can collaborate on all hiring decisions, such as screening applicants and sharing candidate feedback.
short-description: @recruiterbox - the best way to receive and manage job applications sent to your company

description: Upon graduation students assume the responsibility of repaying their loans, inheriting an interest rate determined when they were students. However, upon graduation and beginning employment, shouldn’t their interest rate be updated to reflect improved credit? We believe so. Rather than relying completely on FICO scores, Prime Student Loan Corp has developed a proprietary risk model that targets the prime portion of outstanding private student loans which qualify to be refinanced.
short-description: Prime Student Loans offer qualified borrowers opportunity to reduce monthly payments by over 50%

description: We help firms grow their revenue by finding new clients & reaching new prospects through online events. We do this by 1)developing content that positions our clients as thought leaders 2)executing marketing campaigns that connect with prospects 3)running flawless webinars that deliver value to attendees and 4)creating conversations that lead to new clients. By applying our own marketing approach to our growth, we have served 23 clients & grown from $0 to $315k in sales in under a year.

Founded by Harvard/MIT students, Quantamerix is developing a novel diagnostic that is inexpensive, disposable, and reader-less. Our device is as simple as a home pregnancy test, but gives quantitative results as easily readable as a thermometer. Such a powerful platform enables a multitude of applications in resource-poor settings. We aim to address unmet needs in diagnostics, beginning with newborn screening in China and India. Join us in giving every baby a chance at the best start in life.
short-description: Only 1 in 4 newborns worldwide are screened for easily treatable diseases. Quantamerix is inventing a low-cost diagnostic to empower access.

description: Bike crashes happen, and when they do, they REALLY hurt. Road rash and contusions are common. Pegasus was established after its founder, an avid bike racer, had a severe accident that nearly cost him his life.  Using a patent-pending system of strategically placed sliding fabric layers, the cycling garments are engineered to be light, breathable, and protective.
short-description: Pegasus Performance produces patent-pending garments that reduce injuries from bike and other sports crashes, improving your safety.

description: RainBank is positioned to revolutionize the $6 billion stormwater management industry in the US by transforming passive stormwater infrastructure into smart networks that can be optimized for each unique storm occurrence. The Company's patent pending technology costs cities and towns up to 70% less than current solutions and delivers far greater benefits. Operated as a scalable SaaS business model with significant barriers to entry, RainBank will lead a new approach in stormwater management.
short-description: RainBank is revolutionizing stormwater management with its innovative technology; preventing flooding at a mere fraction of current costs.

description: Neuroscience has developed methods to objectively assess people’s cognitive + personality traits, + algorithms to accurately predict + enhance performance. Pymetrics will deploy this technology to revolutionize how companies hire, retain, + develop employees. This technology will disrupt an industry rife with talent “shortages” and 20% turnover rates, problems resulting from a fundamental inability to assess people, match them with industry and function, + develop them internally.
short-description: Pymetrics: neuroscience-based assessment of human capital that will revolutionize how companies hire, retain and develop their employees.

description: More than two billion people suffer from poor vision because they do not have the prescription eyeglasses they need. Eyeglasses are extremely cost-effective, yet there is a huge barrier to obtaining the appropriate eyeglasses in low-resource settings due to the acute shortage of trained professionals who prescribe eyeglasses. PlenOptika will improve eye care for all through QuickSee - an inexpensive, handheld device that quickly and easily prescribes corrective glasses at the click of a button.
short-description: PlenOptika will improve eye care for all through QuickSee - a low-cost, handheld device that prescribes glasses with the click of a button.

description: Founded by educators to combat low college graduation rates, Persistence Plus is developing the “Weight Watchers of College Completion.” Through a proprietary platform, Persistence Plus applies cutting-edge behavioral research to foster the student behaviors that lead to persistence and college success. Freshman attrition along costs colleges $8.4B in net tuition and we are signing a growing cohort of college customers for our cost-effective and innovative retention solution.
short-description: Nearly 1/2 of students who start college don’t finish. Persistence Plus is helping colleges change that stat. www.persistenceplusnetwork.com

description: Children are awesome at physical exploration. Give them a toy.  They will experiment and figure out what it does.
short-description: TinkerStories are interactive storybooks that give families innovative ways to share reading. Learning to read is social, intimate, and fun.

description: We have a patented process that cuts the Gordian Knot of separating waste tires into their component materials for recycling. Waste tires take up enormous amounts of landfill space and leach toxic substances. Existing recycling involves either burning them or producing products of very limited value. TireTech de-vulcanizes tires, creating clean raw materials in demand by manufacturers.
short-description: TireTech turns mountains of waste tires into quality materials for new tires. We eliminate this intractable pollution problem at a profit.

description: Narcissism and self-promotion are alive and well on Facebook. Already having intervened on 19 potential college suicides, Spill brings empathy online.
short-description: Spill brings empathy online through crowdsourced peer support, allowing individuals to 'spill' privately & hear from peers who understand.

description: Tomorrowish Social TV displays social media comments synchronized to video of an event like a TV show. We CAPTURE the social media commentary about shows when they're broadcast. We CURATE the conversation based on keywords, usernames, banned words and many other rules. Tomorrowish Machine Curation automatically decides the best content to display. We SYNC the captured social media conversation with the show, and allow it to PLAYBACK in our Embeddable Social Stream or via our API.
short-description: Tomorrowish is a Social Media DVR. We Capture, Curate, Sync & Playback Social Media conversations about TV and events.

description: Texifter provides efficient and intuitive solutions to capture, filter, search, human code, and machine classify large amounts of unstructured text, allowing users to quickly digest, adapt to, and act upon new data. DiscoverText improves the ability of individuals, groups and crowds to make crucial marketing, service, operations, and product decisions at Fortune 1000 corporations and in federal government agencies.
short-description: Texifter is a cloud-based text analytics solution. Early adopters include QVC, Google, JetBlue, Volvo, Marsh and many US federal agencies.

description: SAFEBOARD is a foldable, lightweight child seat. The patent ensures a competent protective structure which optimizes safety. With a depth of 4”, SAFEBOARD can fold to only 25% of a conventional seat's volume, offering unmatched convenience. SAFEBOARD weighs 12 lbs (30-50% less than conventional seats). SAFEBOARD has a fun, fresh design that appeals to high-end parents. 10M seats are sold in the US every year, and SAFEBOARD's safe and easy-to-install solution is perfect for people on the move.
short-description: Safeboard is a lightweight, foldable child seat for cars and provides unmatched convenience, appealing design, and uncompromised safety.

description: TableZest introduces dynamic pricing to the restaurant industry (i.e. minimum spend required on highly sought-after tables). In doing so, we offer our paying members last-minute premium reservations on peak nights. On off-peak nights, we help fill spare capacity by providing dining perks to members (i.e. incentives to visit the restaurant). We handpick each restaurant creating a curated marketplace that celebrates restaurant success. We are a win-win for both restaurants goers and owners alike.
short-description: TableZest is a members-only site for food lovers. We offer exclusive last-minute reservations and dining perks at the best restaurants.

description: Want to try the most delicious chip you have ever had in your life? Here, try this... (crunch, crunch)  That is the first tortilla chip made with real sweet corn on the cob, the stuff you grill in the summer. Where did I get this idea, you ask? I was raised on farm in Ithaca NY that grows Sweet Corn. I was sick of starchy tasting tortilla chips that relied on crunchiness and saltiness, so I created a wholesome chip from 6 simple, organic ingredients. Oh you want another? Here… (crunch, crunch)
short-description: @sweetcornchips w/ real sweet corn and 6 ingredients! Get em at your local @wholefoods 10/21 or on @kickstarter http://tinyurl.com/8zgmf5h

description: Wanderu is the first of its kind single-point ground travel search that helps consumer quickly and easily find and book inter-city buses and trains between any two points in the country. We have secured major travel partnerships as well as strategic marketing partnerships which allows us to reach millions within our target market.
short-description: Wanderu - Kayak-like ground travel search for consumers to find and book intercity-buses and trains

description: SocialMadeSimple's unique suite of web based tools and services enable small businesses to market effectively with social networks. We sell through white-label channel partners who are able to quickly add social marketing solutions to their product lines. Our self-serve platform combines an easy-to-use engagement dashboard with analytic-based guidance and industry-specific content. Our newly-launched 'Concierge' programs offer 'do-it-for-me' services at small business-friendly price points.
short-description: SocialMadeSimple provides tools and services that enable small businesses to effectively market with social networks.

description: Soundfest: Smartphone software and hardware to address the growing, worldwide problem of hearing loss, a multi-billion dollar opportunity.
short-description: Soundfest: Smartphone software and hardware for hearing loss. Better hearing when and where you need it.

description: Solar Tri-Gen is dedicated to the idea that innovative, affordable, renewable energy is the only solution to the growing tension between the aspirations of the developing world and concern over global climate change.  We transfer technology and build capacity through partnerships that manufacture, own and operate novel distributed energy infrastructure based on micro-CSP, and provide an affordable micro-utility service and trigeneration to health clinics and schools in remote areas.
short-description: Solar Tri-Gen develops innovative sustainable energy solutions to power remote areas, promote development, and mitigate climate change.

description: SkillHound is sourcing for technical teams made easy. We analyze sites like Github, StackOverflow and even Twitter to reveal the very best engineers on the web. We provide rich context to help recruiters put their best foot forward and make great intros to high quality candidates.
short-description: SkillHound is Pandora for technical recruiting

description: Veenome identifies the “stuff” — objects, brands, faces — in your video and automatically translates it into machine-readable data. We leverage existing computer vision libraries, natural language bodies and machine learning algorithms to process video.
short-description: @Veenome identifies objects, brands, & products in a video and translates it into machine-readable data for commerce, indexing & analytics.

description: Vaxess Technologies seeks to commercialize a Tufts University platform technology that stabilizes vaccines so they can be stored and shipped around the world without refrigeration – eliminating the need for the cold chain. The technology will stabilize vaccines in a silk matrix. Vaxess will lower the cost of distribution and storage for all vaccines while expanding access in areas with poor cold chain infrastructure.
short-description: Vaxess Technologies is increasing global vaccine access by using silk biomaterials to create vaccines that no longer need refrigeration

description: Timber companies need an inventory of the sizes and species of trees they own to value and manage their forests. Currently, they use a centuries-old method that is expensive, slow, and often inaccurate. SilviaTerra has developed a patent-pending technology that uses satellite imagery to generate accurate, fast, and cost-effective forest inventories.  Combined with our sophisticated management analytics, we're revolutionizing the management of the $200 billion timber asset class.
short-description: SilviaTerra: We use satellites and sophisticated analytics to help timber companies better manage the $200 billion of timberlands they own.

description: Tinfoil Security is providing the simplest security solution. With Tinfoil Security, your site is routinely monitored and checked for vulnerabilities using a scanner that's constantly updated. Using the same techniques as malicious hackers, we systematically test all the access points, instantly notifying you when there's a threat and giving you step-by-step instruction
short-description: Automated web security for small businesses like us who are 'too busy shipping' to worry about security.

description: Zimba is a simple device that automatically treats water from hand pumps, enabling governments and organizations to provide safe water to communities at a lower cost as compared to other technologies.
short-description: Zimba saves lives by making “last mile” water treatment cheap and easy with a simple device that automatically treats water at hand pumps.

description: ZoomTilt is a marketplace where brands create and test unforgettable videos.
short-description: ZoomTilt: The only place brands get multiple options of social video with built-in A/B testing. Keep viewers coming back to see yr message.

description: Artaic aims to revolutionize the design and fabrication of the ancient mosaic art form through mass customization.۝ Artaic's patent-pending robotic precision manufacturing and computer aided design systems drive the production of large scale and/or high volume mosaics. Much as custom print technology revolutionized the carpet industry 30 years ago, Artaic now offers exceptional customization, lead-time and financial value to the $76B global tile industry.
short-description: Artaic creates custom tile mosaics using our robotic manufacturing and computer aided design systems.

description: Sanergy permanently reduces sanitation-related diseases in Africa's slums by making hygienic sanitation affordable, accessible, and sustainable. Our team of engineers from MIT and University of Nairobi have developed a low-cost high-quality sanitation center. We franchise a dense network of these sanitation centers across the slums to local entrepreneurs who run them as viable businesses. We collect the waste from each center and convert it to electricity and fertilizer that we sell for a profit
short-description: @Sanergy makes it profitable to provide sanitation services in urban slums

description: 71% of Americans say they’d like to bicycle more yet list access to a bike as the number one barrier to doing so. Zagster provides bikes where people live, work and visit; giving them access using their mobile phone. We’ve found property managers (e.g. Related Management), universities (Yale), businesses (Cisco) and hotels are willing to cover the costs of providing bike fleets as an amenity. We’ve consulted in the space since 2007, launched at 55 locations and are a TechStars Boston company.
short-description: Zagster provides a 'bike fleet in a box' solution for property managers, universities, businesses, hotels and more. Think ZipCar for bikes.

description: Yosko is the first-of-its-kind mobile app designed to meet the needs of the physician in the hospital setting, thus providing a comprehensive on-the-run solution that cuts red-tape by 70% and allows more patient face-time, better quality care and less resident burn-out. Our platform boasts unrivaled elegancy of design, ease-of-use functionality that organizes and centralizes patient data so that care can be executed promptly and accurately.
short-description: Yosko is a mobile app that interfaces with the hospitals’ electronic health records systems to provide on-the-go access to patient records.

description: UberSense is revolutionalizing sports coaching! To win, athletes and teams need to analyze their biomechanics and game tactics. Our popular mobile and cloud platform helps them film their technique using mobile devices, perform analysis using our intelligent and proprietary video analysis tools, and get feedback from their coaches and peers via an online social community. We are the most installed mobile video analysis solution in the market, with over 2.5M videos analyzed till date.
short-description: UberSense helps athletes & coaches video-analyze their technique using proprietary mobile+cloud solutions.

description: Resolute Marine Energy, Inc.'s goal is to complete development and commercialization by 2012 of a wave-driven seawater desalination system that operates completely off-grid and fills a huge gap in the market for seawater desalination systems. Were seeking a two-tranche investment of $3.4M for additional IP protection and pilot-scale trials with a prospective customer in South Africa. By 2014, we will achieve $12 million of cumulative net income, serve more than 900,000 people.
short-description: Resolute Marine Energy, Inc.'s goal is to complete development and commercialization by 2012 of a wave-driven seawater desalination system t

description: Larger-breasted women need a highly supportive, comfortable sports bra, yet current bras are woefully inadequate. Problems include: painful bouncing, restricted breathing, shoulder strap pain, too hot/tight, chafing, and underwire pain.
short-description: No bouncing breasts! Patent-pending Lynx Sports Bra=unprecedented comfort, control for large-breasted women.

description: ARO Medical is a spinal implant company reducing back pain in patients undergoing their first surgery and reducing the $3 billion associated with failed surgeries. The company۪s patent-pending, minimally-invasive device stabilizes the spine from excessive twisting, a source proven in NIH-sponsored research to be directly linked to back pain. It is used as an adjunct to existing surgery and has support of renowned spinal surgeons. Approvals have been obtained for an initial clinical trial.
short-description: Reducing patient۪s back pain and the $3 billion spent on failed back surgeries with an implantable brace.

description: BIOARRAY Therapeutics is developing innovative molecular diagnostic tests that help women with breast cancer and their doctors identify more effective treatment sooner by predicting chemotherapy response across multiple cancer subtypes.  Our test will help reduce the present 'trial and error' approach to chemotherapy treatment decisions, helping patients while reducing overall treatment costs.
short-description: Diagnostics for effective cancer treatment sooner . . . because breast cancer affects us all.

description: Last year, corporations donated $15B and 5B hours to charities. The problem is that the tools they use are obsolete, boring and complicated. Solution: Invup is a fun and easy-to-use web platform that helps organizations manage their volunteering and donation programs. Game dynamics increase employee motivation, social media improve the brand image of the organization and, finally, simple analytics allow effective monitoring of the programs. Better impact for companies, employees and communities.
short-description: Invup is a web platform that makes it fun an easy to manage volunteering and donation programs.

description: Driveway Software, Boston based company, helps people save money on auto insurance and brings new clients to insurance companies.
short-description: @drvway saves people money on car insurance and brings new drivers to auto insurance providers

description: Using our proprietary light-control technology, products like windows, skylights and rearview mirrors  can be instantly adjusted to go from clear to dark, with adjustable tint in-between. These devices can even be controlled to transition between clear and mirrored states.
short-description: Imagine - being able to electronically darken a window with the flip of a switch. This is SmarterShade.

description: For over 2 years, Drync Wine has been the top downloaded mobile app for wine in the world. Drync has received accolades from the New York Times, Mashable, Macworld, and others. Today, Drync manages 600,000 bottles of virtual wine۝ for 300,000 affluent wine enthusiasts and has served over 2 million wine searches.
short-description: Carefully selected artisanal wines delivered straight to your doorstep.

description: A common problem artists face is getting their work shown. ArtVenue changes the game by creating a network of new art spaces. We recruit local businesses and connect them with artists, creating an exciting new avenue for showing artwork in the community. Artists and venues find each other and arrange shows through the site, similar to an online dating service. When art lovers at a show see a work they want, they can buy it instantly with their smart phone.
short-description: ArtVenue.com changes the game for artists by making it simple to book shows in local businesses.

description: The Tap Lab makes mobile games that allow players to compete with real people, at real places, in real time.
short-description: The Tap Lab makes mobile games that allow players to compete with real people, at real places, in real time.

description: There is a large clinical need for a safe, quick, and cost-effective method to extract bone graft from a patient without the complications to the patient and high costs to the hospital. To address this need, BOSS Medical is commercializing the BOSS Harvester a novel minimally invasive device that quickly and safely extracts bone graft from the patient۪s hip.

Our first business is based on a patent-pending solution to an important game theory problem in financial markets.  Finalta provides a secure, private, off-exchange trading network for global institutional asset managers.
short-description: A better way to buy and sell equity securities

description: PK Clean is able to transform the most painful waste (plastic) into the most useful energy (oil). Plastic waste represents an untapped $13 billion annual oil market. PK Clean will slash our metal recycling customers waste fees from $50/ton to $10/ton, saving millions. Simultaneously, we will sell the renewable fuel to refineries. PK Clean has 100% ownership over our IP and already has a 20 ton/day pilot running. Come join us in our mission of converting mountains of trash into barrels of oil.
short-description: Convert the most painful waste to the most useful form of energy through our patented depolymerization process

description: Pintley is an online beer community and mobile app for consumers and brewers.
short-description: Pintley helps brewers increase sales through in-depth market research and high-value word-of-mouth campaigns.

description: Many of todays beverages are unhealthy and loaded with sugar, and caffeine.  Consumers want a beverage that is healthy, tastes great and has function!
short-description: Sparkling, healthy all natural beverage, vitamins, electrolytes! No caffeine, low calories and it works!

description: Blank Label is a New York Times and Wall Street Journal featured custom apparel brand. Learn more at www.BlankLabel.com
short-description: Making custom apparel more accessible and affordable, starting with dress shirts.

description: There are 3 parts to Bindo:
short-description: Bindo is a retail platform and point-of-sale that integrates online and offline sales for unique retail shops.

description: 100,000 people die every year after contracting an infection in a healthcare setting. Also, 30% of buildings negatively affect the health of occupants from microbial contamination of the air ventilation systems. Axena's SeCure antibacterial coating uses selenium, a safe micronutrient, to control microbial growth in these high-risk settings. SeCure's low cost and ease of application makes it suitable for high volume applications where other technologies are too complicated and costly to be used.
short-description: Axena develops technologies to enable manufacturers to create enhanced products with antimicrobial properties

description: Altaeros is making remote wind energy possible by developing a patent-pending airborne wind turbine based on proven aerospace and wind technology. Using a helium-filed shroud adapted from the aerospace sector, the Altaeros turbine safely harnesses the immense, untapped potential of high-altitude winds. A stronger wind resource and lower installation costs will allow Altaeros to lower the cost of energy by up to 65% compared to existing diesel generators or other renewable technologies.
short-description: Altaeros adapts proven aerospace technology to develop a low cost, rapid deployment wind turbine.

description: Alltuition is TurboTax for financial aid. We provide a simple, intuitive online planner for managing the entire college financing process. From filling out the FAFSA to applying for additional grants and scholarships, Alltuition is the web application where families can untangle and manage the tasks, forms, and advice all in one place.
short-description: Alltuition is Turbotax for college financial aid.

description: A Parking assist adapted to the airport to keep ground vehicles from damaging Airplanes. AirVentions develops software that uses cost effective sensors to create a robust collision avoidance system. Baggage loaders and other vehicles damage aircraft during positioning. While repairs are costly, indirect factors like delays and lost revenue bring the average cost per incident to $200K. Annually, airlines lose as much as $10 Billion. Our patented system directly addresses this issue.
short-description: Collision avoidance to stop vehicles from hitting airplanes. AirVentions’ software uses low-cost sensors to save the airlines Billions!

description: AfterSteps is an online end-of-life planning service that simplifies death preparation, just like TurboTax does for tax preparation.   AfterSteps enables users to create a complete end-of-life plan, store it, and then transfer it to designated family members upon death, ensuring that they have this critical information when they need it most.
short-description: TurboTax for Death Preparation

description: Abazyme provides critical services and reagents to the life science market. Cutting-edge research is often blocked due to the lack of suitable reagents. This frustration motivated us to develop our proprietary ACE (Antibody Cloning and Expression) technology. We have the expertise and tools to offer fast and cost-effective solutions to difficult research problems. By enabling the success of our customers, we will accelerate the availability of new therapies to the patients who need them.
short-description: Abazyme is a premier custom reagent and research partner to the life science research marketplace

description: File2Part is implementing a new approach to Rapid prototyping and Rapid Manufacturing equipment and processes.  No other 3D printer except ours can produce both functional and full color parts.  Our printers are safe to use in any environment including schools.  Our software package is the best in the industry.  It allows the use of the all existing CAD formats and will work with Google SketchUp. Our low cost products will dominate the fast growing multibillion dollars RP market.
short-description: File2Part is connecting digital and physical worlds using innovative approach to 3D printing

description: Fetch is full-service storage for urban markets. We pickup your items at home, store in our secure facility, and redeliver on demand. Fetch features reusable plastic storage crates and up to the minute online inventory and tracking. Simply pack and label your crates and we do the rest. It's like cloud storage for your stuff!
short-description: Fetch is full-service storage for your stuff. Just pack your items into our reusable boxes, and we’ll store and redeliver them on command.

description: Fairbooks makes textbook buyback suck less. Customers using one of our 54 competitors have a mediocre experience at best  delayed payment, non-existent customer service, unfair payments, and unnavigable websites. In addition to several industry-firsts (like free Post Office pickup), Fairbooks pays faster than any of our competitors, provides great customer service, pays more than any of our competitors, and provides an overall pleasurable experience that makes every customer a repeat customer.
short-description: Fairbooks buys textbooks from primarily college students and resells those textbooks online.

description: Factor Bioscience works at the forefront of the regenerative medicine revolution, developing personalized cell-based therapeutics from patient cells.  With our team's years of experience in DNA-free gene expression and cellular reprogramming, Factor is leading the development of the first autologous cell-replacement therapies for a range of degenerative diseases.
short-description: Factor Bioscience is developing cell-based therapeutics for today's most devastating diseases.

description: EqualApp is an online admissions counseling program that connects families with former college admissions officers via an innovative learning platform, providing 'virtual' support and guidance that gets students admitted to the colleges of their choice  at an affordable price. With EqualApp, we're building the first international, online counseling business: 'the Kaplan of admissions counseling.'
short-description: EqualApp۪s online admissions counseling program helps students get admitted to the colleges of their choice.

description: Cerahelix uses DNA to produce highly efficient ceramic filters for industrial water recycling. Globally, industry uses three times more water than municipalities, and costs are rising due to increasing regulations, rising energy costs, and competition for fresh water. Our filter is 3x faster, uses less energy, and can operate under a wider range of conditions than competing technologies.  This translates to significant savings for our industrial users.
short-description: A new twist in water filtration- Cerahelix uses DNA to produce nanofilters for industrial water recycling.

description: Every day, hundreds of thousands of professors stand in front of large lecture halls, teaching subjects they've happily studied for their entire lives. Often the students seem distant and unresponsive, despite repeated queries like 'Are there any questions?' ClassMetric breaks down this communication barrier. Students use ClassMetric on their laptops to ask anonymous questions and notify the professor when they're confused. This creates a powerful dynamic that engages students.
short-description: ClassMetric improves student engagement in university classrooms by enabling anonymous questions and feedback.

description: We are developing a CPU cooler with the potential to save data centers upwards of 40% on cooling costs with patent-pending technologies out of Sandia National Labs and MIT. The technologies, in essence, shed the boundary layer that limits cooling efficiency.
short-description: Near liquid-cooling value, air-based priced coolers for PCs, game consoles, and servers

description: Down to Earth Waste Solutions turns food waste into fertilizer. We offer organic waste collection services for small to medium businesses, as well as value-add organic soil production solutions for composting/processing operations.
short-description: Turning Food Waste into Organic Fertilizer!

description: CJR Business Solutions is a software development company that will specialize in working with multiple early stage companies to build their ideas and test them for traction. This will be accomplished by building a minimum viable product (MVP) and helping the company with a launch to validate the startup۪s core business.  If the MVP is validated through traction then CJR will continue to build the product and help the company hire a team of in house developers in preparation for a series A round.
short-description: We build Minimum Viable Products to test for traction.

description: ELF empowers underprivileged students in Sri Lanka to achieve greater access to education. As its main approach, ELF has developed a unique peer-to-peer Micro-Scholarship Model that connects sponsors from around the world with students, creating a sustainable funding source for the students' education. In addition, ELF focuses on other complementary models to provide a more holistic solution to the problem. ELF is also focused on replicating its scholarship model in other developing countries.
short-description: A web-centric micro-scholarship model to empower underprivileged students to gain greater access to education.

description: EPC aims to enable high capacity DC underground power transmission. Two inventions underpin this effort: (1) elpipes are segmented, wheel-mounted underground high capacity transmission lines, which roll into a conduit resembling a natural gas pipeline; (2) ballistic DC circuit breakers address a common problem that has been limiting deployment of multi-terminal DC grids of all types, including overhead lines, cable networks and other underground options, and even shipboard systems.
short-description: Underground power transmission defeats NIMBY and enables renewable energy.

description: Diffuse 5 connects the LGBTQ community with businesses, services and products that support it by bringing together elements of Yelp, Angie's List and Amazon. By creating a platform that allows the community to buy specific products and review organizations that are 'gay-friendly', we can help redirect the high brand loyalty and disposable income that the conservatively estimated 300 million LGBTQ individuals in the world have and give them access to the people and products that let be themselves
short-description: Diffuse 5 connects the LGBT community with businesses, products and services that make it feel safe and secure

description: Day 2 Night (D2N) will enter the market with our first product: Convertible high heel shoes which allow women to easily adjust their heel height. They can choose up to 5 different heel heights from a shorter walking heel to an elegant higher heel. Our convertible heels allow women to feel comfortable, confident, and sexy at all times while keeping their feet pain free. Future products will be surrounded around allowing women to more easily transition in their various roles throughout the day.
short-description: Day2Night Convertible High Heel Shoes convert from high heels down to low heels by simply pressing a button.

description: Freedom TeleWorkers & Technologies is the first global marketplace for TeleWorkers, with the engine & manpower to execute customer service campaigns like traditional inbound, outbound, sales, customer service & technical support. To date FT&T is going strong with a Hosted Call Center platform fueling a crowdsourced TeleWorker army۝ of 4,000 certified individuals across the US and abroad.
